text.body:
siddhapramāṇabhāvasya dharme vedasya sarvaśaḥ |
vidhyarthavādamantrāṇāmupayogo 'dhunocyate ||
sāmānyataḥ prāmāṇye siddhe 'dhunā vibhajya viniyogaḥ pratipādyate | avadhṛtaprāmā- ṇyasya vā vedasyedānīṃ samastasya vidhyarthavādamantranāmadheyātmakasya yathāvibhāgaṃ dharmaṃ pratyupayogaḥ pratipādyate | tatra pūrvapakṣavādyabhiprāyaḥ | codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharma ityupakra- māttasya jñānamupadeśa iti parāmarśāttatkṛtānāṃ kriyārthena samāmnāya ityupasaṃhārādvidhi- pratiṣedhayoreva prāmāṇyaṃ pratipāditaṃ, na ca tadvayatiriktaśabdagamyatvaṃ dharmādharmayoḥ, nāpya- nadhigatārthabodhanaṃ muktvā 'nyaḥ śabdasya vyāpāro 'stītyuktameva | ataśca yāvantyeva sādhyasādhanetikartavyatāvācitvena vidhipratiṣedhāntargatāni teṣāṃ bhavatu prāmāṇyaṃ yāni tvatiriktarthānyarthavādamantranāmadheyānupātīni so 'rodīdiṣe tvorje tvodbhidetyevamādīni tāni satyapyapauruṣeyatve 'rthābhidhānasāmarthye ca dharmādharmayorapramāṇamatadarthatvāt | yathāśruta- gṛhītānāṃ tāvatpratītyanuṃpalabdheḥ prasiddhamevātadarthatvam | atha kayācicchabdavṛttyā tādarthyaṃ kalpyeta, evamapi vyavasthāhetvabhāvānna dharmādharmayoravadhāraṇaṃ syāt | yadeva hi vākyaṃ gṛhītaṃ tadevādhyāhāravipariṇāmādibhiryatheṣṭaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyate | tadyathā so 'rodīditye- vameva tāvadvākyaṃ viśiṣṭapuruṣācaritopanyāsadvārā rodanakartavyatāparam | atha vā mahatā-
mapyevaṃvidhāḥ pramādāḥ saṃbhavanti, tasmātprayatnena varjayitavyamiti | ato vidhiprati- ṣedhayorasphuṭatvāddharmādharmatvena nirṇaye śaktyabhāvaḥ | śāstradṛṣṭavirodhādayaśca sthitā eva | yattu bhūtānvākhyānamātraṃ yathāvasthitaiḥ pratipādyate tatra yadyapi satyatvamastyeva tathā 'pi na tena prayojanamityānarthakyam | api ca | dhūma evāgnerdivetyādīnāṃ svārthe 'pyaprāmāṇyaṃ vakṣyate | vidhyekavākyatvavaśenaiva teṣāṃ rūpabhaṅgaḥ kriyate | na ca tasyāpi kiṃcitpramāṇa- masti | bhinnairapi hi taiḥ kiṃcitpratipādayituṃ śakyameva | na ca tatpratipādayatāṃ niṣprayojanatetyavijñāyamānaprayojanavadarthāntarakalpanā śakyā | na hi loṣṭaṃ paśyatastaddarśanaṃ niṣprayojanamiti suvarṇadarśanatā kalpyate | sarvāṇyeva ca pramāṇānyupayujyamānamanupayujya- mānaṃ vā 'rthamātmagocaratāpannaṃ gamayanti | tenaiva caiṣāṃ hānopādānopekṣābuddhayaḥ phalatvena varṇyante | anyathā hyupādānamevaikaṃ phalaṃ syāt | api ca pramāṇotpattyuttarakālaṃ prayo- janavattvamaprayojanavattvaṃ vā vijñāyate na tu tadvaśena pramāṇodbhūtiḥ | tasmādyo yadrūpo 'rthaḥ pratīyate sa tathaiva prayojanavattvamaprayojanavattvaṃ vā pratipadyate | na hi prayojanavadeva pramā- tavyamiti kaścinniyamaheturasti | yatrāpi tāvatsvādhīnaḥ pramāṇaviniyogastatrāpyetaddu- rlabhaṃ kimutābuddhipūrvanityāvasthitavedotthāpitajñānagrāhye | na ca vedasya prayojanavadarthābhi- dhānaśaktiḥ prathamamavadhṛtā | ayameva hi parīkṣākālo vartate kīdṛśaṃ punarbravītīti | tacca viditvā yathānurūpamanuṣṭhātuṃ kṣamā vayaṃ na tu vedaṃ paryanuyoktuṃ kimayaṃ niṣprayojana- mabhidadhāti tadvā 'bhidadhatkimarthaṃ prayatnena dhāryata iti | sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ kevalaṃ pratipattṛtvena pāratanvyādvedagrahaṇottarakālaṃ ca parīkṣāvasarāt | na hyanadhītaveda evā ' 'dau parīkṣituṃ kṣamaḥ | paścātparīkṣamāṇasya tu nābuddhipūrvanirvṛttamadhyayanaṃ prakaraṇagatanyāyena niścayaheturbhavati | tasmādyathaivāgnihotrādivākyānāṃ gamyamānaprayojanavattvādānarthakyaṃ niṣpramāṇakamiti nā ' '- śrīyate tathaivaiṣāṃ prayojanavattvaṃ nā ' 'śrayitavyam | na hi yathāvagatāmyupagamādanyatkici-
tsādhīyaḥ parīkṣakāṇām | yo 'pi ca kleśena stutinindātmako 'rthaḥ kalpyeta sa bhāva- nayāṃ 'śatrayānantaḥpātitvānna gṛhyate | tayā cāgṛhītaṃ na vidhipratiṣedhāvāśrayataḥ | tadanā- śritaṃ ca dūre puruṣārthādbhavatīti | api caivaṃvidheṣu stutinindākalpanāyāmitaretarāśrayapra- saṅgaḥ | stutinindātmakatvenaiva hyekavākyatā tayā cānunmīlitastutinindotprekṣāśrayaṇam | na cānyataramūlaprasiddhirastiṃ yato vyavatiṣṭheta | tasmātpṛthagavasthitānāṃ dṛṣṭatvādānarthakyame- vopapannataramiti | sa eṣa vākyaikadeśasyeti | vidhyuddeśātiriktasya siddhāntābhiprā- yeṇaikadeśatvaṃ na tu pūrvapakṣe, bhinnavākyatvābhyupagamāt | atha vā vākyānāṃ madhya eka- deśākṣepaḥ katipayānāmityarthaḥ | tatra yāni tāvatkevalavidhiyuktāni teṣu naivā ' 'śaṅkā | yānyapi liṅādimanti prāgarthavādebhyo vidhisamarthāni taiḥ saṃyujyārthāntare stutistutyasaṃ- bandhe vartante teṣāmarthavādābhāve tanmātrameva hīyate na tu vidhitvena puruṣārthatā 'pi | yāni tu vartamānāpadeśayuktāni stutinirapekṣavidhyasamarthāni yathā “yasya khādiraḥ sruvo bhavati sa cchandasāmeva rasenāvadyati” ityevamādīni tānyekadeśadvāreṇa samastānyā- kṣipyante || 1 ||
vāṅmanasayorvidyamānamavidyamānaṃ vā steyānṛtavadanamucyamānaṃ dharme svārthe 'pi vā na prāmāṇyaṃ pratipadyate | atha tvadhyāhārādibhirevaṃ kalpyeta vāṅmanasayoḥ sarvaśarīreṣu ceṣṭāḥ prati prādhānyāditarabhūtendriyairapi taccaritamanuvartitavyamiti | tataḥ śāstravirodhaḥ | tatrai- tatsyāt | vihitapratiṣiddhatvātṣoḍaśyādivadvikalpa iti | itarastu kalpanīyaklṛptatvena vaiṣamyamāha | nanu cātyantadurbalo 'pi vidhistadadhīnātmalābhena pratiṣedhena tulyabalo bhava- tīti “pratiṣedhaḥ pradeśe 'nārabhya vidhā1ne ca” ityatra vakṣyate | satyam | yasya śāstramantareṇā- prāptirasti tatraitadevam | yatpunararthaprāptaṃ niṣidhyate tatra vidhyanabhyanujñayaiva labdhātmānaḥ pratiṣedhā balīyāṃso bhavantīti tatraiva vakṣyate 'rthaprāptavaditi cediti | steyānṛtavādayośca vinaiva śāstreṇa pravṛttayorvidhinirapekṣo 'vasthitaḥ pratiṣedha iti kalpyaṃ vidhiṃ bādhate | 1( a॰ 1॰ pā॰ 8 aṃ॰ 1 )
tasmādānarthakyam | ataḥ paraṃ svārthe naivā ' 'narthakyaṃ pratipādayati | rātriṃdivaṃ dhūmārciṣorapi darśanāt “dhūma evārcireveti” caitadadvayamapi pratyakṣavirodhādava- dhāraṇaṃ na saṃbhavati | atha vā yadanena pratipādyate divā 'gnirādityamanupraviśati rātrāvā- dityamiti tadavadhāraṇaṃ nopapadyate | pūrvoktasya hetorasiddhatvāt | tataścāgnisūryayornaktaṃdivaṃ vyavasthitajyotiṣṭavapratipādanāya stutirapyasatyatvānnāvakalpata ityeṣā vā 'navadhāraṇā | atha vā sūryo jyotiriti prātarayaṃ mantro 'gnirjyotirityeṣa sāyamityeṣā mantrayoravadhā- raṇā na sidhyati | atha vā samasto vedaḥ pramāṇamityeṣā 'vadhāraṇā na sidhyatī- tyabhiprāyaḥ | śāstravirodho dṛṣṭavirodhadvayaṃ punaḥ śāstradṛṣṭavirodha iti yat, sadṛśanyāyāni santi kramabhedena codyate tatparihārasūtrakramabhedānurodhena | na caita- dvidma ityārṣeyavaraṇaśeṣo 'bhimataḥ | sa cāyaṃ kriyātatsaṃbandhyanabhidhānāttadviṣayatvenāpra- māṇam | na hi brāhmaṇatvājñānasaṃdehaviparyayāḥ kenacidaṃśena karmaṇyupayujyante | na ca pratyakṣaviruddhā stutiḥ saṃbhavati | na ca svatantrabrāhmaṇatvājñānapratipādanena prāmāṇyam | kathaṃ punarayaṃ dṛṣṭavirodho yadā samānākāreṣu piṇḍeṣu brāhmaṇatvādivibhāgaḥ śāstreṇaiva niścīyate | nāyaṃ śāstraviṣayo lokaprasiddhatvādavṛkṣatvādivat | kathaṃ punaridaṃ lokasya prasiddham | pratyakṣeṇeti brūmaḥ | kasmātpunarmātāpitṛsaṃbandhānabhijñāścakṣuḥsaṃnikṛṣṭeṣu manu- ṣyeṣvanākhyātaṃ na pratipadyante | śaktayabhāvāt | yathā vṛkṣatvaṃ prāgabhidhānavyutpatteḥ | naitattulyaṃ vṛkṣatvaṃ prāgabhidhāyakavyāpārājjātyantaravyavacchinnaṃ svavyaktiṣvanugataṃ śākhādimadrūpeṇa dṛśyate | na tu brāhmaṇatvam | api ca vyutpannaśabdo 'pi nimittāntarādṛte naiva prati- padyate | na copavītādhyayanādi nimittam | varṇatrayasādhāraṇatvāt | adhyāpa- nādyapi bhinnācārakṣatriyavaiśyapratiyogitvātsaṃdigdham | sarvaṃ ca duṣṭaśūdreṣu sabhāvyamāna- gopa॰ brā॰ pū॰ ( 5—21 )
tvādaniścitam | yastvavicāritasiddhameva pratipadyeta sa śuktikāmapi rajataṃ manyamānaḥ krīṇīyāt | naiṣa doṣaḥ | kvaciddhi kācijjātigrahaṇa itikartavyatā bhavatīti varṇitame- tat | tena yathaivā ' 'lokendriyānekapiṇḍānusyūtiśabdasmaraṇavyaktimahattvasaṃnikarṣākāraviśe- ṣādayo 'nyajātigrahaṇe kāraṇaṃ tathaivātrotpādakajātismaraṇam | ayaṃ cotpādyotpādakasaṃbadho mātureva pratyakṣo 'nyeṣāṃ tvanumānāptopadeśādyavagataḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavati | na cāvaśyaṃ pratyakṣā- vagatameva pratyakṣanimittaṃ bhavati cakṣurādarenavagatasyāpi nimittatvadarśanāt | āntarāli- kasmṛtivyavahitamapi cendriyasaṃbandhānusāri pratyakṣamityetatsādhitam | na ca yatsahasā sarvasya pratyakṣaṃ na bhavati tannipuṇato 'pi paśyatāṃ na pratyakṣamityetadapyuktameva | straya/?/pa- rādhāttu durjñāno 'yaṃ saṃbandha iti svayameva vakṣyati | na ca tāvanmātreṇa pratyakṣatā hīyate | na hi yadgiriśṛṅgamāruhya gṛhyate tadapratyakṣam | na ca strīṇāṃ kvacidvayabhicāradarśanātsa- rvatraiva kalpanā yuktā | lokaviruddhānumānāsaṃbhavāt | viśiṣṭena hi prayatnena mahākulīnāḥ parirakṣantyātmānamanenaiva hetunā rājabhirbrāhmaṇaiśca svapitṛpitāmahādipāramparyāvismara- ṇārthaṃ samūhalekhyāni pravartitāni | tathā ca pratikulaṃ guṇadoṣasmaraṇāttadanurūpāḥ pravṛtti- nivṛttayo dṛśyante | na ca bhartṛvyatirekakṛtena varṇasaṃkaro 'parādhena jāyate | dṛśya- te hyaparādhinīmāmapi svabhartṛnimittaḥ prasavaḥ | tadaparādhanimittastu tāsāmaśubhaphalopa- bhogo bhavennatvapatyānāṃ varṇasaṃkaraḥ | na ca niyogato varṇāntaraireva saha pramādaḥ | savarṇena cotpāditasya naiva varṇāntaratvāpattiḥ | saṃkarajātānāmapi ca punarutkarṣāpaka- rṣābhyāṃ saptame pañcame vā 'nyataravarṇāpattiḥ smaryate | tatra tvetāvanmātramāgamikaṃ pratyeta- vyam | na hyayaṃ puruṣeyattāniyamo laukikapramāṇagamyaḥ | tasmātsatyapi sārūpye yathā kenacinnimittena strīpuṃskokilādivibhāgajñānaṃ tathaiva darśanasmaraṇapāramparyānugṛhītapratya- kṣagamyāni brāhmaṇatvādīnīti bhavatyajñānavacanasya pratyakṣavirodhaḥ | yeṣāmapyācārani- mittā brāhmaṇatvādayasteṣāmapi dṛṣṭavirodhastāvadastyeva na tvācāranimittavarṇavibhāge pramāṇaṃ kiṃcit | siddhānāṃ hi brāhmaṇādīnāmācārā vidhīyante, tatretaretarāśrayatā bhavet | brāhmaṇādīnāmācārastadvaśena brāhmaṇādaya iti | sa eva śubhācārakāle brāhmaṇaḥ punaraśubhācārakāle śūdra ityanavasthitatvam | tathaikenaiva prayatnena parapīḍānugrahādi kurvatāṃ yugapadbrāhmaṇatvābrāhmaṇatvavirodhaḥ | etābhirupapattibhistvayaṃ pratipādyate | na tapaādīnāṃ
samudāyo brāhmaṇyam | na tajjanitaḥ saṃskāraḥ | na tadabhivayaṅgyā jātiḥ | kiṃ tarhi mātāpitṛjātijñānāmivyaṅgyā pratyakṣasamadhigamyā | tasmātpūrveṇaiva nyāyena varṇavibhāge vyavasthite māsena śūdrībhavatītyevamādīni karmanindāvacanānyatha vā varṇatrayakarmahānipra- tipādanārthānīti vaktavyam | pūrvavaccātrāpi klṛptatvātpratyakṣasya kalpyenājñānavidhinā saha vikalpo na saṃbhavati | api ca tatrānuṣṭhānātmakatvādbhavedapi na tvatra vasturūpāṇāmaikā- tmyenāvikalpyatvāt | ko hi tadvedeti pūrvavadevājñānasaṃśayaviparyayāṇāmanaupayikatvādā- narthakyam | niścitavedaprāmāṇyaiśca traividyavṛddhairvijñāyamānatvātsvārthe 'pyānarthakyam | vika- lpābhāvaścānantaroktavat || 2 ||
yadi tāvadgargatrirātrabrāhmaṇavedānumantraṇajñānakāle vidyamānayoreva mukhaśobhāvāji- janmanoḥ saṃkīrtanaṃ na dharmaṃ prati pramāṇam | atha tvavidyamānayostataḥ svārthe 'pi | varta- mānāpadeśācca pratyakṣānupalabdhivirodhaḥ, karmānuṣṭhānayogyapuruṣakaraṇādvidyāsaṃskārasya dīkṣi- tatīrthasnānādivannirākāṅkṣatvātphalavidhitvaṃ nirākariṣyate | paunaruktyāttarhyatra na vicāra- yitavyamata āha tena phalavidhitvānnirākṛtasyehā ' 'narthakyārthavādatvavicāra iti | stutya- rthatā 'pi cāsatyasya nāstīti vyavasthitameva || 3 ||
anantareṇaiva pūrṇāhutyādiphalavacanāni vyākhyātāni vidhitvābhyupetyavādena tu doṣā- 1tai॰ saṃ॰ (7—2—2) | 2 (tā॰ brā॰ 2॰—16—6)
ntaramabhidhīyate | pūrṇāhuteragnisaṃskāratvātpaśubandhasya ca jyotiṣṭomopakārakatvādaśvame- dhajñānasya ca saṃskāratvānna tāvatphalavidhitvāvasaraḥ | yadi punariṣyate tato 'nyānartha- kyam | samānaphalānyapi karmāṇi yāni parasparānapekṣāṇi kriyante teṣāṃ yathārucyanuṣṭhā- nānnānyānarthakyakaratvam | pūrṇāhutipaśubandhayostvakṛtayoritarakarmānadhikārāt | prathamaṃ vā niyamyetetyanena nyāyenāvāptaṃ phale nottarakarmānuṣṭhānaprayojanamastīti tadvidhyāna- rthakyam | tathā ca dṛṣṭānto 'pi tenaiva pathā madhvarthina iti yatrānyaḥ panthāḥ parvatasya tatra gaccheyurapi na tu tenaiva gacchanti | tasmādbhūyasāṃ klṛptānāṃ vidhīnāmanugrahāya varaṃ kalpyā- nāmevānarthakatvam | na ca phalaviśeṣārthinaḥ parāṇi karmāṇyaviśeṣaśravaṇāt | na hi samā- nāyāṃ śrutāvapratyakṣaḥ san phalaviśeṣaḥ karmaviśeṣebhyaḥ śakyaḥ kalpayitum | na ca stuti rasatyatvāditi sthitameva || 4 ||
trīṇyapi pṛthivyādivacanānyapratiṣedhabhāginamarthaṃ pratiṣedhanti | antarikṣe divi ca tāvada- prāptatvātpratiṣedhaviṣayatvam | ataśca paryudasitavyābhāvānna paryudāsaḥ | anantarikṣe hyadivi ca pṛthivyāṃ nityaṃ cayanaṃ prāptamiti tadvidhiranarthakaḥ | athāpi nityānuvādastathā 'pyākriyā- rthatvameva | pṛthivīcayanapratiṣedhaparyudāsau tu cayanavidhyabādhenāśakyau | bādhe ca vidhyā- narthakyam | vikalpe 'pi pakṣe bādhaḥ | kāmasaṃyogāccāgnerastyeva pākṣikatvam | durbalaśca pratiṣedhaḥ | pṛthivīparatve sati cayane kalpyatvāt | etadevāsya svayamākulatvam | vidhya- 1(tai0 saṃ0 5—2—7 |)
nantarameva hiraṇyaṃ nidhāya cetavyāmiṣṭakābhiragniṃ cinuta etaccā ' 'kulayet | prarocanābudvistu naivotpadyate || 5 ||
sarvopākhyāneṣvanyaparatvāsaṃbhavātsvarūpapratipādanādanityasaṃyogaḥ | sa ca samasta- vedaprāmāṇye sati kathaṃcidanyathā nīyeta | yadā tu yathaiva pramāṇānāṃ madhye śabdasta- nnāpi ca vedaḥ pramāṇaṃ tathaiva vede 'pi vidhimātraṃ yuktayā kalpyate tadetaraikadeśavadani- tyārthaikadeśāprāmāṇyaṃ yathāśrutārthagrahaṇādāpannaṃ kiṃ nivāryate | tasmādevamādīnāmanapekṣyārtha- madhyayanamātrādeva phalaṃ kalpyam | atha vā yathaitānyupekṣāphalāni tathā tadviṣayaṃ pratyakṣa- mapi pratipattavyam | atha kasmānmantravadyathāprakaraṇaṃ prayogakāle na prayujyate | prayogarū- pasāmarthyābhāvāt | na hi mantrāṇāṃ pāṭhamātreṇa vinayogaḥ kiṃ tarhi tatsāmarthyāt | na cātra tadasti | atha vā yathā teṣāṃ pūrvapakṣe kāryāntarāmāvādrūpamātraṃ grahīṣyate tathā '- trāpyastu | yattu sūtrakāreṇānityatvamuktaṃ tatprāmāṇyāpekṣayā nāprayojyatayā || 6 ||
pūrvapakṣodāhṛteṣveva vākyeṣu siddhānte 'bhidhātavye kimarthaṃ vāyavyavākyamupanyasyate | kecidāhuḥ | samānanyāyatvādidamapi tatra tānyapi cehodāhṛtāni draṣṭavyānīti | yadya- pyevaṃ tathā 'pyapūrvodāharaṇamabhiprāyāntaramākāṅ‌kṣati | tadabhidhīyate | pūrvodāhṛteṣu sarvatra svārthāsatyatvamapyāśaṅkyate | tatra kaḥ prathamameva tatpratipādanakleśamaṅgīkuryāditi prāsi- ddhasvārthasatyatvānāṃ stutidvāraikavākyabhāvena dharmapramāṇaśeṣatvamātrapratipattisaukaryārthaṃ vāya- vyavākyopanyāsaḥ | tatra bhāṣyakārāḥ prasiddhenaivaikavākyatvena stutyarthopayogaṃ vadanti | etāvattvatra prathamaṃ vaktavyam | kimarthaṃ rūpabhaṅgo na balādekavākyatā puruṣārthatvaṃ vā veda- syocyata iti | laukikavākye tu dṛṣṭatvāditi yadyucyeta tatrābhidhīyate | yuktaṃ loke vākyārthasya pramāṇāntaragamyatvādanyathā 'pi kalpanam | iha tvatyantātīndriyatvādyathā- śrutādīṣadapyanyathātve pauruṣeyatvamāpadyeta | loke 'pi ca yāni pramāṇāntarānavagatārthāni 1( tai0 saṃ0 7-1-10 | ) 2 ( tai0 saṃ0 2-1-1| )
āptapratyayamātreṇa śrotṝṇāṃ pramāṇāni bhavanti teṣāṃ naivānyathātvakalpanaṃ labhyate | tatra kecidvadanti | “tulyaṃ ca sāṃpradāyikam” iti yadvakṣyāti tena samasto vedaḥ puruṣārtha iti sādhyate | na nāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ stuteḥ pramāṇāntarāvagatyapekṣatvālloke tatsaṃbhavādupapattiḥ | vede tvavi- ditavādatvānna śraddadhīran | atha vā loka eva yadyaviditaṃ kaścidvadettadā naiva śraddadhīran | pūrvavacanādiveti | vidhyuddeśādiva | atha vā vaidharmyopamā | yathā 'dhigatapūrvavacane śradda- dhate naivamaviditavāde | na coktimātreṇaite bahukṣīrādayaḥ prarocayante kiṃ tarhi vidita- tvādeva | vede tvarthavādāsatyatvena vidhau jātāśaṅko na pravarteta | atha vā yo vidha-
mutkramyārthavādaṃ prārthayate nūnamasya vidhāvaviśrambhaḥ | tatra cedanāśvāso 'rthavāde kutaḥ pratyaya iti | api ca vede vyaktamasaṃvādo vaṃrtamānenorjo 'varodhaneneyaṃ stutirna ca tadasti | tatrāvidyamānabahukṣīrasaṃkīrtanavadetatsyāt | svarūpatastāvadudumbare 'nnatvaṃ pakṣadharmeṇāprasi- ddham | anvayāprasiddheśca hetutvāprasiddhiḥ | na hi yadyadannaṃ sa sa yūpa iti loke vede vā prasiddhamityasaṃbaddham | tasmādasaṃvādādvaraṃ vidhireva kiṃ stutyā saṃvādāpekṣiṇyeti || 21 ||
ūrgudumbara ityādi tāvadūrjo 'varuddhyā ityasyopapattitathai/?/kavākyabhūtaṃ na vicchinnaṃ stāva- kam | na hyannamudumbara ityukte puruṣaṃ prati praśastatā gamyate | ūrjo 'varuddhyā iti tu prarocayati | tadupapattiritareti saṃgacchate | tasmātkṛtsnena phalaṃ prarocanā vā | tatra yadyapi tāvalliṅādiḥ syāttathā 'pi sutarāmarthavādatayā gṛhṇīyāt | kimuta vartamānāpadeśo yo vidhisiddhayarthameva | prakaraṇācca yāgopakāre prayojane labhyamāne kimityavācakāṃtphalaṃ kalpayiṣyāmaḥ | prakaraṇaṃ vākyena bādhyata iti cenna | avirodhāt | yadi hyekāṃśagrāhitvena vākyaprakaraṇe saṃnipatetāṃ tathā sati bādhaḥ syāt | iha tu prakaraṇamaudumbaratāvidhiṃ guhṇāti so 'pyūrgudumbara ityādilabhyāṃ prarocanām | tatra tadviśiṣṭaudumbaratvagrāhiṇaḥ prakaraṇasya ko virodhaḥ | tasmātphalavidhisāmarthyābhāvātprakaraṇābādhena niveśasaṃbhavo nātikramitavyaḥ | praro- canā 'pi ca vākyaśeṣādupapadyamānā nārthāpattyā vidhyuddeśādeva kalpitā bhaviṣyati | anyatra vidhirapi hi tāvattāṃ kalpayeta | iha tu sa svayameva duḥsthitaḥ kiṃ prarocanayā kariṣya- tīti | na ca stutyupayuktasya punaḥ phale 'pi pratiṣṭhādāviva vyāpāro yujyate | rātrisa-

karmāviṣṭakāṣṭhavacana ityupanītamātrameva gṛhṇāti | ataśca prasiddhe pārārthye 'rthavādatā | yattu yūpe nirākāṅkṣo jātiṃ pratīti śaravadbādho bhaviṣyati | na cābādhaprakāro 'sti | kāmyapakṣe 'pi yadi caivaṃjātīyakā vidhayo bhaveyustataḥ pūrvodāhṛtāḥ sarva eva dravyaguṇakriyāvidhayo bhaveyuḥ | vāyuḥ kṣepiṣṭhā devatā kartavyā, apsuyoniraśvaḥ kartavyaḥ, apsujo vetaso 'vakāśca kartavyāḥ, āpaḥ śāntāḥ ūrgudumbara ityādi | tatra yadyapi ke citkriyādividhayaḥ śakyante kartum | ete tvaśakyāḥ svabhāvasiddheḥ prayatnenāpi cāniṣpatteḥ | vāyuvetasā- vakādiṣu svabhāvasiddhiḥ | aśvaudumbarādīnāmaśakyatā | kīdṛśī stutistāṃ darśayati | śamayitrībhiradbhirityādi | tatrāsaṃgateragrantha iti vyākhyātāraḥ samarthayante | yasmā- dihāvakātatsaṃbandhayoḥ śamayitṛtvasya ca naivopanyāsaḥ kṛto vetasa upanyastaḥ so 'pi stutivelāyāṃ na pradarśita iti | tatra tviyaṃ gamanikā | vetasodāharaṇenaiva tulya- tvādavakādīnyapyudāhṛtāni | na cāyamaśvāvakayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ kathyate | kena tarhyadbhiḥ | tāvatā tu na stutiḥ kā cidunmīlitetyarthavādāntarāpekṣāpravṛttāṃ tāṃ darśayati— āpo vai śā2ntā iti | anena hi vidhitvātpracyutenāpāṃ prāśastyamucyate tatra kasya citprasiddhāpsaṃbandhasya tanmātrasaṃkīrtanādeva stutirbhavati | anyeṣāṃ tu saṃbandhisaṃba- ndhātsaṃbandhaḥ kīrtyate | prasiddhaśāntatvasaṃbandhābhiradbhiḥ saṃbandhādaśvādirapi śāntā- tmakastatsaṃvaddhena ca karmaṇā yajamānasya kaṣṭaṃ śāmyatītyevaṃvidhaprāśastyajñāpanārtham | evaṃ kṣipradaivatena śīghraṃ phalaprāptirannamayena ca yūpenānnaprāptiriti stutitve siddhe tatsamāna- nyāyānāmapyevamātmakatvam || 23 ||

iha ye hetuvannigadyante hiśabdādibhirna ca paramārthahetavasta udāharaṇam | tatra yadi tāvaddhetutvaṃ vidhīyate tataḥ pūrveṇaiva gatam | yadiha hetutvaṃ tacchūrpahomasaṃbandhaṃ prati na cāvihito 'sāvastīti kasya heturucyate | atha bhūtānuvādamātraṃ tattu vāyukṣepiṣṭhatvavadga- tamityanārabdhavyametat | ucyate | na tāvadanenaiva vākyena hetutvaṃ vidhīyate | na ca bhūtā- nuvādamātraṃ kiṃ tarhi hetoḥ prasiddhipūrvakatvātsiddhavadupadiṣṭasya yāvatyasiddhayāśaṅkā tatrā- rthāpattilabhyādvacanātsiddhiḥ | yā 'pi cārthavādākāṅkṣā kasmāditi sā 'pyanenaiva hetunā nivartyata iti manyate | athāpyarthavādatvaṃ tathā 'pi tadantanirṇītahetutvameveti sarvānnakara- ṇaviṣayaṃ vijñāyate tataśca heturapyastviti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ | saṃbandhasya ca vidheyatvāttadnata- 1tai saṃ. 2-6-3 | 2tai॰ brā॰ 1 | 6 | 5
meva hetutvaṃ homasyeti vadati | nanvaprasiddhe kāryakāraṇabhāva iti | kecidāhuḥ | kāryakāraṇayorevānumānam | tathā ca dadhnendriyakāmasyetyatrāpi vakṣyati | tattvayuktam | akāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapi kṛttikādīnāmacirodgatarohiṇyādipratipattihetutvadarśanāt | ato gamyagamakatvameva kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ manyate | nanu so 'pyanumānottarakālīnatvādanaṅgam | satyam | anyasminneva tu saṃbandhe sati paścātprasiddhayantamenamanumānavyavahāropalakṣaṇa- tvenopanyasyati | yadvā śaktyabhiprāyaṃ yayoreva hi vyāptigrahaṇakāle gamyagamakasāmarthyā- tmanā kāryakāraṇabhāvitvena sā 'vadhṛtā tatraiva hetutā | atha vodāhṛtaviṣayahetulakṣaṇametat |
avinābhāvo hyanekakāryakāraṇasvasvamisahacarabhāvādiprabhedabhinnaḥ, tatrānnakaraṇatā home hetutvenocyamānā saṃbandhāntarābhāvātkāraṇatvena syāt | taccāprasiddhaṃ tasmānna hetvapadeśaḥ | satyaṃ loke hetuvyavahārakālātprathamaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa saṃbandhaprasiddhirape- kṣyate vede tu hiśabdapratipāditahetutvānyathānupapattyā saṃbandhābhidhāyi dṛṣṭāntavacanaṃ kalpyeta yadyadannakaraṇaṃ tena tena juhotīti, tena copapannaṃ hetutvam | kiṃ prayojana- miti | yadi ca heturavatiṣṭhetetyanenābhiprāyeṇa | aparastvāha vyāptau siddhāyāṃ sarvānna- sādhanasādhanako homaḥ siddho bhavati | kuta iti | sa eva siddhāntābhiprāyaḥ | atha vā kuto darvipiṭharādeḥ sādhakatamatvam | itarastvāhānnakriyāyāṃ tāvattasyārthavattā 'sti tāvanmātraṃ vā ' 'śrayiṣyate | śakyate ca tenāpīti | upapattiśabdasyārthaḥ | pūrveṇa tu samānārthatā gamyate | tena vivakṣā | śaktyabhiprāyametat | yadeva hi tadupayogimātraṃ tadeva śakyate kathaṃ citsādhakatamatvena vivakṣitum | athavā 'rthavattvaṃ karaṇavibhaktirnirde- śālambanamupapattyā punarvartamānānnakriyasya hetutvābhidhānāttādṛśasya homaṃ pratyanupapattyā- śaṅkayopapattiṃ vadati | śakyate ca teneti | tatra codayati | etaddhi kriyata ityu- cyate tatkathaṃ śakyata ityabhidhīyate | vartamānakriyasyāsaṃbhavādityuttaram | yadvā svaya- mevā ' 'śaṅkya pariharati | yadi ca na darvipiṭharādīti | ubhayoḥ parāmarśaḥ | sādha-
katamatvavartamānatve cettatra na vidyete śūrpe 'pi tathaiveti stutirna syāt tena yathā tava stutyarthaḥ kathaṃ cidvidyate tathā mama hetvartha ityaviśeṣaḥ | hetau ca śrutirityādi, asaṃbaddhavākyasaṃbandhidoṣādante draṣṭavyam | stutau lakṣaṇeti | annakaraṇatvena sarva- janābhimatena prāśastyaṃ lakṣyate | śūrpeṇeti cāsminpakṣe nityānuvādo 'nnakaraṇasāmā- nyenaiva prāptasya | itthaṃ vā sūtragamanikā | tatrārthavattvaṃ tāvadarthavādātprayojanavattaratvamu- papattirityaprasiddhaṃ, saṃbandho 'pikālpanikavākyāśrayaṇāt | tasmāddhetuḥ || 26 ||
śūrpeṇeti tāvatkaraṇavibhaktiśrutyaivāvaruddho homo nānumānikairdarvipiṭharādibhiḥ saha bādhavikalpasamuccayānpratipadyate |
homaśca tena nirākāṅkṣībhūto nānyatprārthayate | anutthitāyāmeva ca darvipiṭharādiśrutau śūrpaṃ prāpnuvacchrutyanumānaṃ pratibadhnāti | tena bravīti—acodanā ca tasyeti | hetvapade- śaśca stutyaivopapadyamānaḥ sannaśrutadṛṣṭāntakalpanāyai prabhavati | śūrpaśrutiśca vidhyuddeśapāti- nyananyaprayojanā vispaṣṭā ca satī parityaktuṃ na yujyate | tasmādyadvā 'nnakaraṇatvādityeṣa kartavya ityanenāpekṣitatvāllakṣaṇayaitatpratipādayati praśastatvāditi | atha vā 'nnakaraṇa- tvāditi śrutivṛttameva | tatra yathāśrutaṃ vidhyuddeśe hetutāmapratipadyamānaṃ tadanantarākāṅikṣatā- rthopaplutahetvapekṣaprāśastyaheturavadhāryate, annakaraṇatvātpraśasta iti | kalpanādvaye 'pi ca lokaprasiddhadṛṣṭāntalābhānnāśrutatadvākyānumānaprasaṅgo bhaviṣyati | siddhaṃ hi praśastānāṃ karta- vyatvamannakaraṇānāṃ ca praśastatvamiti | acodanā ca tasyeti vyākhyāntaram | tava hi yadyadannakaraṇaṃ taccodyate na ca darvipiṭharādīnāṃ karaṇatā sādhakatamasya pākādeḥ karaṇatvāt | evaṃ cottarasūtramāpatati || 27 ||
yatpunaḥ śūrpe 'pyannakaraṇatvānupapatteḥ stutirna prāpnotītyuktaṃ kiṃ tatrābhidhīyate || 28 ||
asmatpakṣe 'rtho 'sti stutyālambanakaraṇatvaṃ nāma, vākyaśeṣo hi bhavanpāratantryādgauṇa- tvādyapi pratipadyate tadā ca vidheyāntaravaśādavaśyamanuvādena bhavitavyamanuvādaśca yathāvi- jñātasya bhavati | ataḥ śabdenaivābhyanujñātaṃ yādṛśaṃ vayamannakaraṇatvaṃ śūrpe paśyāmastādṛśamidaṃ saṃkīrtyata iti | anena vartamānāpadeśo vyākhyātaḥ | tatrāpi hi kṛtaṃ vā kariṣyamāṇaṃ vā stotuṃ kriyata ityucyate | kathaṃ stutiḥ, sarvalokasya bhūtabhaviṣyadanādareṇa vartamānopakārānurāgādvartamānālocanenaiva ca kālānta- re 'pi tatra prītiriti kriyata evānenānnamityucyate | atha vā 'nnakriyāśaktervartamānatāmanna- kriyāyāmevopacarya stauti | tatrāpi janānāṃ śaktyatikrameṇābhivyaktipriyatvātkriyata ityukte stutirbhavati | na śaktyabhidhānāt | tava tu vidhivāditvānmukhyānnakaraṇatva- vartamānatvayoragrahaṇe doṣaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | vidhānaṃ hyatyantānavagatārthaviṣayam | tatra yathāśrutādanyathāgrahaṇaṃ niṣpramāṇakam | etadevā ' 'ha—vidhau hi na paraśabdārthaḥ prayo- janamiti | paraśabdārtho hi lakṣamāsu prayojanam | tadiha bhūtabhaviṣyatkriyāvācinaḥ śaktivartamānatāvācino vā svārthe vartamānānnakriyāvācī śabdaḥ kalpanīyaḥ |
tannimittamātre śabdārthe sādhakatamatvavācinī tṛtīyā | nacaivaṃbhūtatvaṃ kutaścitsiddhamitya- pramāṇakam | atha mukhyārthaparigrahaḥ | tatrocyate | na ca vartamānaṃ sādhakatamaṃ vopadiśa- nvedaḥ śakyamarthaṃ vidadhyāt | na hi vartamānānnakriyeṇa śūrpādinā sādhakatamena vā pākena hotuṃ śakyate tasmādubhayathā 'pi vipratiṣiddham | asmatpakṣe tvanuvādatvātparaśabdārthagrahaṇam | yathā loke balavāndevadatta iti bhūmnyatiśāyane vā matuppravṛttirna ca viśeṣa upātto '- muṣmātprakṛṣṭabala iti | tatra sarvasattvebhyaḥ prakarṣe mukhyaḥ śabdo na ca tathā saṃbhavati siṃhādīnāṃ balavattaratvāditi devadattānnyūnatarabalānapekṣyaivamabhidhīyate tathā 'tra viprakṛṣṭa-
tarānnasādhanalāṅgalādyapekṣayā śūrpaṃ sādhakatamamityucyate | nanvevamāpekṣikapravṛttermukhyatvameva syāt, tathā ca devadatte balavacchabdapravṛttiṃ naiva gauṇīṃ manyate | satyamevaṃ, yadā tāva- nnyūnamātrāpekṣayaiva prayujyate yadā tvaviśeṣapravṛttestadadhikabaleṣvapi balavadbuddhirjātā tadā sa eva śabdaḥ kutaścidapi nyūnabale vartamāno gauṇaḥ saṃpadyate | tathā yadi vidhyuddeśopātte śūrpe 'nnakaraṇatvamanūdyate tatastannyūnamātrāpekṣayā vā mukhyatvaṃ nyūnānupādānādvā sāmā- nyataḥ pravṛttasya sarvaprakṛṣṭagāmitvabuddhau satyāṃ gauṇatā | bhavatastvapūrvavidhānādatyantasā- dhakatamatvavartamānatvayoḥ kriyāṃ pratyupādānānnyūnāpekṣāgauṇatvayornimittaṃ nāstītyatikleśaḥ syādityasamānam || 29 ||
abhyupetyavādo 'yam | yadyapi hetuvidhānaṃ tathā 'pi na darvipiṭharādeḥ prasaṅgaḥ | kutaḥ | śūrpaṃ hi vidhāyānnakaraṇaṃ heturucyate | so 'pi ca na loke prasiddhaḥ, śabdameva dṛṣṭānta- vācinamanumāya sādhayitavyaḥ | tadanumāne ca śrutahetutvānyathānupapattiḥ pramāṇaṃ, sā ca yāvatyeva hetutvamupapannaṃ tato 'dhikakalpanāyai na prabhavati | śūrpe ca homasaṃbandhitvena pratijñāte 'nyadharmasyāhetutvādavaśyaṃ tadgatamevānnakaraṇatvaṃ vaktavyam | saṃnidheśca tadavacchinna- meva tadgamyate | loke 'pi ca yaṃ dharmiṇaṃ pratijñāya yo heturupadiśyate sa prathamaṃ tāvattadga- taviśeṣātmanaiva pratīyate | tadātmakasya tu sādhyāṃśānugamābhāvātsāmānyamātraṃ vivakṣita- miti dṛṣṭāntaprayogavelāyāmevāvadhāryate, vedahetūnāṃ punarna sāmānyātmanā sādhyasaṃbandho '- vagato na viśeṣātmanā so 'dhunaivārthāpattyā kalpanīyaḥ |
tatra viśeṣasyopādānātsāmānyāprasiddheśca tatparityāganimittasyāsaṃbhavādupāttavi- śeṣamātropasaṃhṛtānyathānupapattistadgatameva dṛṣṭāntavacanaṃ kalpayati | tadakalpane hi hetu- nirdeśaḥ śruto virudhyate | yadi tu darvipiṭharādigatānnakaraṇatvahomasaṃbandhāvinābhāvo na kalpyate | na kiṃ cicchrutaṃ dṛṃṣṭaṃ vā nāvakalpate | tasmādīdṛśaṃ dṛṣṭāntavacanaṃ kalpyaṃ
yadyacchūrpamannakaraṇaṃ tena tena juhotīti | tadetadviśeṣadṛṣṭamanumānam | loke 'pi tṛṇadhūma- darśanāttṛṇāgnirevānumīyate nāgnimātram | yathā ca gamanaṃ gośabdavyutpattinimittatveno- pādīyamānaṃ sāsnādimatsāmānyapratyayottarakālaṃ tadgatameva nimittatvaṃ pratipadyate na gantṛ- mātraviṣayamiti gośabdavyavasthā tathā śūrpagatānnakaraṇahetvapadeśānnānyagatahetutvaprasaṅgaḥ | tatraitāvānarthaḥ syāt | yadyadannakaraṇasamarthaṃ śūrpaṃ tena tena hotavyaṃ na darvipiṭharādigrahaṇam | yathā balavadupadhmāte 'gnau dahanahetutvenokte sa evānupadhmāto na dahenna tu śaṅkhā- dayo balavadupadhmātā dahanti | tasmādvyavasthā | yadi punaḥ śūrpagatānnakaraṇavyatirekeṇa mahāsāmānyaṃ vivakṣyate tato yadyadagṛhītaṃ tasya tasya kā cidannanimittatā vidyata itya- vyavasthitatvāddhomākṣiptadravyamātrānuvādaḥ sannanarthako 'nnakaraṇaśabdaḥ | tasmādannahetutvena stutitvameva varamiti || 30 ||

ihā ' 'narthakyaśravaṇātkecidevaṃ saṃdehamupanyasyanti kimarthavanto mantrā utānarthakā iti | tattvayuktam | spaṣṭe śabdātpratīte 'rthe nānarthakyaṃ hi śaṅkyate | agnau dahati dṛṣṭe vā dagdhṛtvaṃ kiṃ vicāryate || sarvatra hi kāryadarśanācchabdānāṃ śaktayaḥ kalpyante | taccā- rthapratyāyanaṃ mantreṣvapyuccāryamāṇeṣūpalabhyate | na cāviśiṣṭastu vākyārtha ityevamādi- pratijñāmātrasādhyottarāḥ pūrvapakṣā bhavanti | tasmādayukto 'yamupanyāsa iti matvā ' 'ha—kiṃ vivakṣitavacanā mantrā utāvivakṣitavacanā iti | nanvanenaiva hetunedamapi na vicāraṇī- yam | naiṣa doṣaḥ | artha/?/vatāmapi vākyānāṃ dvaividhyadarśanāt | uccāraṇārthapratyāyane hyavi- nābhūte tannānyataravivakṣayā prayujyamāne 'pi kiṃcinnāntarīyakaṃ bhavati | yadyarthapratyāyanaṃ 1tadarthaśāstrādityārabhya mantrānarthakyabhityantasyaikasūtratve 'pi vyākhyāsaukaryārthamavayavaśo vibhajya vyākhyāyata iti jñeyam |
vivakṣyate tadoccāraṇamarthāt, athoccāraṇavivakṣāṃ tato 'rthapratyāyanamanuṣaṅgāt | yathā japeṣu viṣavidyāsu cetyasti vicārāvasaraḥ | kathaṃ punarasya pramāṇalakṣaṇena saṃbandhaḥ | pūrvamevo- ktametat | yathā ' 'mnāyasya kriyārthatvādityayamevātra pūrvapakṣa iti taduttareṇaiva ca nirā- kāṅkṣatvānna punarabhihitam | evaṃ hi manyate yatra so 'rodīdityevamādeḥ kathaṃ citsaṃbandhāpādanaṃ, tatra mantreṣu kaḥ saṃdehastasmādupayogaviśeṣa eva cintanīya iti | tatra vidhistutitve tāvatsvayameva nirākariṣyati, avidhisarūpatvāt | pradeśāntaravihi- tastutyasaṃbhavācca | pariśeṣātsvarūpaprayoge satyarthoccāraṇayoḥ kiṃ vivakṣitamiti vicā- ryate | sāmasu tu vācakatvābhāvādātmaprayogamātrākṣarābhivyaktiparatvagatasaṃdehaḥ | kathaṃ punaḥ pūrvapakṣavādinaḥ śrutyasaṃyuktānāṃ keṣāṃ cinmantrāṇāṃ prayogasiddhiḥ | kecidāhuḥ | aprayogārthamevāsāvavivakṣitārthatve yatate | na hyanāśritārthānmantrānkaścidapi prayuṅkte | ato yacca kimuccāraṇamātreṇopakurvantīti siddhavatprayogābhidhānaṃ naitadañjasaiva draṣṭavyam | ayaṃ hi tatra duṣṭo 'bhiprāyaḥ | yadi nāmoccāraṇamātropakāraṃ vakṣyati | tatra śakṣyāmya- syāprayogaṃ vaktumiti | yadapi prayojanakathane barhirdevasadanaṃ dāmītyayaṃ barhirlavanātpra- cyavyite tadanena prakāreṇa prayogapracyāvanameva draṣṭavyam | atha vā yājñikadarśanenāvi- gānātprayogasiddhimavicāryetaro vicāraḥ | kimarthaṃ tu yājñikaprasiddhirupekṣitā yataḥ saiva tāvadyuktāyuktatvena na vicāryate | tatrāyamabhiprāyaḥ | sarvathā tāvad‌dṛḍhameṣāṃ smṛtinyāyena prayogitvamavasthitaṃ tatra śakyaṃ bādhituṃ tasyaiva tvidaṃ mūlaṃ nirūpyate | tadyadi pūrvapakṣo bhaviṣyati tato 'nyapramāṇābhāvādviniyojakaśrutyanumānena mūlaṃ kalpayiṣyāmaḥ | siddhānte tu liṅgaprakaraṇayoreva mūlatvādhyavasānam | atha vaivaṃ pūrvapakṣe 'pi prayogaḥ | svādhyāyā- dhyayanavidhinaiva mantrāḥ puruṣarthāya nīyante | tathā hi | darśapūrṇamāsādibhiḥ kramaprakara- ṇābhyāṃ yāvatsaṃspṛśyate tatsarvamupakārakatvena svīkriyate | prayājādivākyāni mantra- rūpamapi ca |
tatra prayājādivākyārnyaṃtha samarpya caritārthāni svarūpasaṃsparśe satyapi prayojyatāṃ na pratipadyante | mantrāḥ punaḥ karmānaupayikārthābhidhāyitvāttenāṃśenānapekṣitāḥ | stutividhi- smṛtīnāṃ tu prakārāntareṇa siddhiriti prayogavacanenaiṣāṃ rūpamevāṅgīkriyate | svādhyāyā- dhyayanacodanā 'pi pratyāsannataramantrasvarūpameva samarpya caritārthatvānna viprakṛṣṭamarthābhidhānaṃ yāvadgacchati | prayājādibākyeṣvapi tāvadrūpagrahaṇameva prasaktapārsāttattvabhipretārthadānena
yuktaṃ na tviha tathā kiṃcit | śabde ca kāryasyāsaṃbhavādarthe kāryaṃ vijñāyate | mantrāṇāṃ tu śabda eva saṃbhavati | avaśyaṃ hyarthaprādhānyapakṣe 'pi puruṣaḥ śabde niyoktavyaḥ | tadvayā- pārottarakālatvādarthābhidhānasya | tasmādrūpamevāṅgam | tathā ca tadarthaśāstrādīnyucyante | parihārasūtrakramānurodhena viparyastānyudāharaṇānyabhrayā/?/dānātprabhṛti dātavyāni | bhāṣyakā- rastu yathātathodāhṛtairapi kāryasiddhiṃ matvaivamupanyastavānuruprathā uruprathasvetyādi | yathāsākṣa iti | nīlīrogādyupahatendriyasya cakṣurastyeveti parairdṛśyate, pareṇa tu nīya- mānamupalabhya na paśyatīti jñāyate, tathā mantrarūpamālocayatāmarthaprakāśanaśaktibuddhiryadyapi bhavati tathā 'pi pareṇa viniyogaṃ dṛṣṭavā svayaṃ viniyojakaśaktirnāstīti gamyate | tata- ścārthātantratvam | anyathā svayameva viniyujyeta | nanvarthavādārthamiti | liṅgaprakaraṇā- numitamantravidhistutyabhiprāyam | na hīticchedaḥ | vidhinaikavākyatayā 'rthavādāḥ stutyarthā, kalpitāḥ | pradeśāntarasthasya tu pratyakṣasyā ' 'numānikasya vā vidherātmanaḥ samīpe 'rtha- vādamapaśyataḥ svayaṃ prarocanāśaktyāvirbhāvena vyāvṛttāpekṣatvānna dūrasthayā stutyā kāryam | tathā 'bhrayā/?/dāne rūpādeva prāptatvānmantrāṇāṃ tāṃ caturbhirādatta ityanarthakaṃ vacanam | catuḥ- saṃkhyāmapi bruvadetanmantragatāmeva brūyānna kriyāgatām | na hyanyaguṇo 'nyagāmī bhavati | na ca niṣkriyatvātkarmāṅgatvenopadeṣṭuṃ śakyate | tenaivaṃ vākyaṃ bhadedya ete catvārastairabhryā- dānaṃ kuryātte ca prāgeva vacanāccatvāra ityānarthakyam | kriyānaṅgatvādeva ca saṃkhyāyāḥ samuccayaśabdābhāvācca pratyekaṃ ca sāmarthyādvikalpaḥ prasajyamāno na śakyo vārayitum | asmatpakṣe punarvacanagamyatvādadṛṣṭasya na caturbhyaḥ prāgastitve pramāṇamiti yuktaḥ samuccayaḥ | 1vā॰ saṃ॰ (1-22) | 2 tai॰ saṃ॰ (5-1-1) |
ubhayorapi tāvadraśanayoraśvagardabhabandhanārthamādānamarthaprāptatvānna vidhīyate | yadi mantro 'pi rūpātprāpto 'narthakaṃ vacanam | parisaṃkhyeti parervarjanārthatvāttadviṣayā buddhirabhidhīyate | sā 'pi gardabharaśanāyā ādāne vā syānmantre vā | ubhayathā ca tridoṣī | vidhiparaḥ sanna gṛhyata iti svārthaṃ jahyāt | parasya ca vākyasya gardabharaśanāṃ netyasyārthe kalpeta | prāptaṃ ca rūpādarthādvā mantramādānaṃ vā bādheta | adṛṣṭārthatve tvandhanyāyena yatraiva nīyate tatraiva vartiṣyate | yadi cāśvābhidhānīmiti saṃbandhaḥ syāttataḥ parisaṃcakṣītāpi na tvasā- vasti | kārakāṇāṃ kriyāparihāreṇānyonyasaṃbandhābhāvāt | tena vākyamapi kriyayaiva saṃbadhnīyāt | ekā ca sā | prakaraṇāpūrvasaṃyogaścāviśiṣṭastasmānna parisaṃkhyāprayojanaṃ kathayati | ato na pramāṇaṃ barhirityādi | tadā hi mahāprayogavacanena sarve mantrāḥ kevalapradhānārthāstatprayogābahirbhāvavṛttayo nāṅgaiḥ saṃbadhyeran | pāṭhakramānurodhāttu tadā 'pi naiva vyutkrameṇa prayogaḥ karmāṇyanādṛtya sakṛdevānuvākamadhyāyaṃ vā paṭhitvā 'nuṣṭhīyate |
agnirmūrdheti yo 'rthaḥ pratīyate sa mūrdhāgnirityanenāpītyanarthako niyamaḥ | yasya tvadṛṣṭārthatā tasya kramānyatve taduccāraṇajanyādṛṣṭapramāṇābhāvātkramānyatvaṃ na yuktamiti niyamārthavattā | aya niyatapratyāyanādadṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta taduccāraṇādevopapadyate tadadhīnatvā- nniyatapratīteḥ | yastu dṛṣṭārtheṣu prakṛtipratyayasamāseṣu niyamo dṛśyate yathendrāgnī nīlo- tpalaṃ rājapuruṣaścitragurniṣkauśāmbririti | yuktaṃ tatra viparyaye 'paśabdārthānyatvānarthakya- prasaṅgāt | ajādyadantaviśeṣaṇatvādinimitto hi tatra niyataḥ pūrvanipātaḥ smaryate tenāgnī- 1te॰ saṃ॰ (5-1-2) | 2 tai॰ saṃ॰ (4-4-4) | 2 tai॰ saṃ (6-3-1) |
ndrāvityasādhutvaṃ puruṣarāja ityarthānyatvaṃ kauśāmbinirityanarthakatvam | yastvagnīndrāviti kvacitprayogaḥ sa cchāndaso 'gnervā 'bhyarhitatvasya vivakṣayeti mantavyam | tulyakakṣā- rthapratītāvindrāgnīpadameva vyavasthitam | nanvihāpi kramānyatvādamantratvaṃ syāt | tadevā- rthaparatve sati tadavināśe tu kiṃ nimittamiti na vidmaḥ | tena mantraprasiddhau vākyani- yamādityapi sūtram | atha vā 'stvaprakaraṇādhītavākyaniyamāt | na hyarthābhidhāne 'nyadī- yasyā ' 'tmīyasya ca viśeṣaḥ |
atha vā mantrapauruṣeyavākyayostulye 'rthābhidhānasāmarthye mantravākyaniyamo 'dṛṣṭārthaḥ | atha vā 'nekadhyānādismaraṇopāyaprasaṅge vākyaniyamāt | na hi dṛṣṭe 'rthe mantrasya dhyānā- dervā kaścidviśeṣa ityadṛṣṭārthatā |
na hyavidvā2nvihito 'stītyavaśyaṃ tāvadagnīdhā ' 'tmīyāḥ padārthāḥ prāgeva karma- prakramādavagantavyāḥ | tatra praiṣaḥ piṣṭapeṣaṇanyāyenārthaṃ jñāpayitumaśaknuvannadṛṣṭārtho bhavati | atha smārako mantra ityucyate | tadapi nāsti | brāhmaṇajñānāmyāsapāṭavanimittasaṃskā- rādeva tatsiddheḥ | saṃskārābhivyaktiheturapi pūrvapadārthasamāptirbrāhmaṇameva vā bhaviṣyati nārtho mantraiḥ | tatra yaducyate saṃskāraviśeṣo bhaviṣyatīti nāsāvadṛṣṭādanyaḥ saṃbhavatyataḥ pūrvapakṣāpattiḥ | yadi hi pratīto 'pyartho naiva dṛṣṭaṃ sādhayati tato yattadda‌ūramapi gatvā '- vaśyaṃ kalpanīyaṃ taduccāraṇādeva varamiti |
na catuḥśṛṅgādi kiṃcitkarma tatsaṃbandhi vā prakṛtau vikṛtau vā vidyate | yadyapi ca guṇavādena kiṃcitsyāttathā 'pi tadanuṣṭhānābhāvānna tatsmṛtyā kāryam | na ca jñāyate 1nai॰ ā॰ ( 10—10-17 ) | 2 jai॰ sū॰ ( 3-8-8 ) |
kva pradeśe prayujyatāmiti | tatra mantrapāṭhakramānurodhenoccāraṇamāpatatīti siddhaḥ pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ | mā mā hiṃsīrmā mā saṃtāptamityādīni vedihavirdhānādiviṣayatvādacetane 'rthaba- ndhanādityatrāpyudāharaṇam | iha tvaprasaktāyāṃ hiṃsāyāṃ pratiṣedhānarthakyam |
oṣadhe trāyasva, śṛṇota grāvāṇa iti ca saṃbodhanaṃ kāryaniyogābhimukhyakaraṇārtham | na cācetanasyā ' 'bhimukhyaṃ saṃbhavati | na ca paśutrāṇe prātaranuvākaśravaṇe vā praiṣeṇa pravṛ- ttirupapadyata ityānarthakyamarthavivakṣāyām |
dyutvamantarikṣatvaṃ cāditerekānekatvaṃ ca rudrasya vipratiṣiddham | na caiṣa viprati- ṣiddho 'rthaḥ karmaupayikaḥ | kathaṃ vā 'ditirdevatā 'ntarikṣaṃ dyaurvā bhavet | na ca stutya- rthatayā 'pi hetudvayaṃ parihartuṃ śakyaṃ brāhma/?/ṇe hi vidhiśeṣabhūtāḥ stutayo 'rthavantyo bhavanti | mantrastutistvaprayojanatvānnā ' 'dartavyā |
svādhyāyādhyayanasya karmārthatvādyatkarmaṇyupayokṣyate tadabhyasitavyaṃ taccaivaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ santo vṛddhāḥ śiṣyānakṣarāvadhāraṇa eva pravartayanti saṃnihite 'pyarthe na tadvacanābhyāse | 1tai॰ saṃ॰ ( 1-3-13 ) | 2 tai॰ ā॰ ( 1-13 ) | 3 vā॰ saṃ॰ ( 16-54 ) |
tenāvaśyaṃ teṣāmuccāraṇamevāṅgatvenābhipretamiti |
kecitpadārthā jñānenāvijñeyāḥ | keṣāṃ cittu vākyārtha eva na jñāyate | na ca mantrārthaḥ sattāmātreṇopakaroti kriyāvelāyāmasmaryamāṇa iti yadekāntena śakye kartumu- ccāraṇaṃ tadeva kāryamityavadhāryate |
arthaprakāśanapakṣe yasya yo 'rthaḥ sa eva tena prakāśayitavyaḥ | keciccānityairakarmāṅga- bhūtaiścārthairarthavanto mantrā lakṣyante yathā kiṃ te kṛṇvanti kīkaṭeṣu gāva iti | ayaṃ hi dṛ̣dhenādhyetṛ/?/ṇāṃ smaraṇena viśvāmitrasyā ' 'rṣaṃ gamyate | tena kila karmārthaṃ dhanaṃ prārtha- yamānenendro 'bhihitaḥ | trailokyādhipate yāḥ kīkaṭeṣu janapadeṣu gāvastāstava kiṃ kurvanti | te hi nāstikāḥ kiṃ kratuneti vadanto na kiṃcitkarmānutiṣṭhanti | ataśca tā nā ' 'śiraṃ somasaṃskārārthaṃ duhate na dharmaṃ tapanti | na dharmatapane payodānena sādhanībhavanti | tasmā- tpramagandasya kīkaṭādhipateryadvedodhanaṃ tadasmākaṃ naicāśākhaṃ nagaramābhara | hagrahorbhaśchanda- sīti bhakāraḥ | atha vā 'smānprati tadbibhṛhi dhāraya poṣaya cetyetanno maghavanrandhayā sādhayāsmākamiti | chāndasaṃ dīrghatvam | yadyetadvivakṣitaṃ tathā satyādimadarthābhidhānā- dvedasya kṛtrimatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate | na cānyo mantrārthaḥ śakyate vaktumapratīteḥ | ato 'rthasadasadbhāvāvanādṛtyākṣaroccāraṇaṃ phalavadāśrayaṇīyamiti || 31 || 1ṛ॰ saṃ॰ ( 2-8 ) | 2 ṛ॰ saṃ॰ ( 8-6-2 ) | 3 ṛ. saṃ॰ ( 3-3-21 ) |
mantroccāraṇaṃ tāvadakṣaragrahaṇena nirākāṅkṣīkṛtaṃ na sākṣātkratvaṅgatvaṃ pratipadyate | akṣarāṇāṃ ca dravyavadanitikartavyatātmakatvātprakaraṇenāgrahaṇam | evaṃ padārthajñānasya vā- kyārthapratyayena nairākāṅkṣyādagrahaṇam | vākyārthapratyayastvakṛtārthaḥ prakaraṇe viparivartamānaḥ kriyātmakatvātprayogavacanākāṅ‌kṣitaḥ karmasamavetānuṣṭhāsyamānārtharamṛtiphalatvenetikartavyatā bhavati | tatrādṛṣṭakalpanānimittābhāvaḥ | samāmnānānyathānupapattyā hi tatkalpyeta nopapanne '- rthavattve | yadyapi ca tatkalpanāvasaro bhavettathā 'pi kāmaṃ vākyārthapratyayādeva na tvaupayi '- kārthapratītinirākāṅkṣādvākyāta | avaśyaṃ ca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭayorviniyujyamānasya pramāṇamupanya- sitavyam | iha ca prakaraṇādadṛṣṭārthatā liṅgācca dṛṣṭārthatā | na ca prakaraṇamaśakye 'rthe vini- yoktumarhatītyekāntenaitadāpatati yacchaknuyāttanmantreṇa kuryāditi | na cāsāvadṛṣṭaṃ śakno- tīti laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ vidyate | tasmādubhayorliṅgaprakaraṇayordṛṣṭārthaprayogeṇaikavākya- tā | evaṃ ca sati yājñikaprayogaprasiddherna mūlāntarakalpanākleśo bhaviṣyati | ataḥ svābhāvikamevārthaprādhānyavāsthitam | naivamiti | na dṛṣṭo 'rtho nirvṛtta ityetāvataiva tāda- rthyamavasīyate | puruṣārthānupayogena svādhyāyādhyanavidherānarthakyāt | na ca buddhaśāstrāvi- dyamānavacanācetanārthabandhanānmantrārthopayogaḥ | tatra yadi dūre 'pyadṛṣṭakalpanāto na mucyā- mahe tato 'tikramakāraṇābhāvāduccāraṇādeva kalpanīyam |
ubhayavādisiddhatvāduccāraṇakartavyatāyāstatprabhavatvāccādṛṣṭakalpanasya | tatrocyate yajñe yajñāṅgaprakāśanameva prayojanamiti | yadyapi lokavattairna saṃvyavahārastathā 'pi tatsva-
rūpaprakāśanamātramevānuṣṭhātṝṇāmupakariṣyati | ataśca yāvanmātramevānaupayikaṃ saṃbodhanādi kāmaṃ tanna vivakṣyeta na tu tadvaśena sarvameva tyaktavyaṃ na hyaikarūpyaṃ nāma kenacinniyatam | tasmādyathādarśanābhyupagamādbarhirdevasadanaṃ dāmītyevamādīnāṃ tāvadavihatamarthaprādhānyam | tāṃ/?/ caturbhirādatta ityatrāpi vadāmaḥ || 32 ||
yadyapi mantrāḥ prāptāḥ sāmarthyena tathā 'pi catuḥsaṃkhyāmādāne vidhāsyati | tatrāruṇai- kahāyanīnyāyena parasparaniyame sati mantragatacatuḥsaṃkhyāviśiṣṭamādānaṃ coditaṃ samuccayā- dṛte kartuṃ na śakyata ityarthātsamuccayaphalam | atha vā yāvalliṅgānumitāḥ śrutayaḥ pratimantraṃ kalpayitumārabhyante tāvadanena pratyakṣavacanena catuḥsaṃkhyāviśiṣṭāste vihitāstenāprāptavi- dhireva vacanam | tatra tu vinā 'pyetena mantreṣvarthātprāptavatsu tatparatve mandaṃ phalamityananya- labhya/?/catuḥsaṃkhyārthaṃ tasyopadeśaḥ || 33 ||
yāvaddhi mantrāmnānamanavagataprayojanaṃ prakaraṇī cākṛtārthastāvadyattatsiddhayarthaṃ kalpyate tatsarvaṃ vaidikaṃ bhavati | nairākāṅkṣyottarakālaṃ tu kalpitamapi pauruṣeyatvādapramāṇaṃ syāt |
na ca śrutimakalpayitvā liṅgādeḥ svātantryeṇa prāmāṇyamiti vakṣyate | tadetadāha | sati ca vākye liṅgaṃ viniyojakaṃ taccāsya nāstīti | yadaiva hi prakaraṇādanena yajeta raśanāṃ vā gṛhṇīyāditi kalpayitumiṣyate tadaivāśvābhidhānīmityanenāpahāro mantrasya | yadapi naivaṃ saṃbandha ityādatta iti kathaṃ tarhī/?tyaśvābhi/?/dhānīrmi/?/ti | tatkārakasaṃbandhāsaṃbhavātkriyayai/?/va
saha sāmānyābhiprāyeṇa draṣṭavyam | tasmānnā ' 'dānamātre vidhīyate kiṃ tarhyaśvābhidhānīviśiṣṭe | atha vā phalataḥ paścāttanakārakasaṃbandha upanyasyate | sarvathā darśaśāstratā nāsti | yadi hi yadeva mantravacanātprāpnuyāttadeva pratyakṣavacanenocyate tato vayamupālamye/?/mahi | nanveva- maprāptavidhirevāyaṃ saṃjāta iti na vaktavyaṃ parisaṃkhyeti | phalenaivamabhidhānādadoṣaḥ | sarvatra hi parisaṃkhyāśabdādevakārādvā vinā na śrutyā parisaṃkhyā niyamo vocyate vidhireva tvevaṃ- jātīyakasya phalenaivaṃ vyapadeśaḥ | kastarhi vidhiniyamaparisaṃkhyānāṃ bhedaḥ | ucyate | vidhiratyantamaprāpte niyamaḥ pākṣike sati | tatra cānyatra ca prāpte parisaṃkhyeti kīrtyate || vidhireva hi kenacidviśeṣeṇaivaṃ bhidyate | tatra yo 'tyantamaprāpto na ca prāpsyati prāgvacanādityavagamyate tatra niyogaḥ śuddha eva vidhiryathā vrīhīnpro- kṣatīti | yatra tu prāgvacanātpākṣikī prāptiḥ saṃbhāvyate tatrāprāptipakṣaṃ pūrayanyo vidhiḥ pravartate sa niyantṛtvānniyama ityucyate yathā vrīhīnavahantīti | taṇḍulaniṣpattyarthākṣe- pādeva tatsiddherna tatprāptimātraṃ vidheḥ phalaṃ kiṃ tarhyaprāptāṃśapūraṇam | tadaprāptipakṣe ca taṇḍulairupāyāntarāṇyākṣipyeran, pūraṇe tu sati yā teṣāṃ nivṛttirasāvarthānna vākyāt | na ca tadvāraṇaṃ niyamaḥ | parisaṃkhyā hi tathā syāt | pratyāsannāṃ vā 'vahantiniya- tatāmutsṛjya nānyanivṛttiphalakalpanāvasaraḥ | tatprasaktidvārā tvavahanteraniyatirā- sīditi niyamāntargataivārthānnivṛttirgamyate | na ca prāpte sati vidhirayaṃ pravṛtto yenāsyānya- nivṛttyarthatā kalpyeta | prāgeva tu pravartamānenārthasya prāpakaśaktinirodhādanyāprāptiḥ kṛtā sā cārthalabhyeti na tayaiva vyapadiśyate | yaḥ punaḥ prāṅ‌niyogāttatra cānyatra ca prāpnuyā- diti saṃbhāvyate yatra vā yaccānyacca sā parisaṃkhyā yathā 'traivodāhṛte yathā ca gṛha- medhīye pañcame pakṣe | atrāpi ca na prāpte satyeṣā pravartate prāpakasya śāstrasyānanumita- tvāt | kathaṃ tarhi | yadyetadvākyaṃ nābhaviṣyattata enaṃ prāpsyaditi | sarvasya pratyakṣasya vākyasya nānumānikavākyapratibandhamātraṃ phalamiṣyate | kiṃ hi tena paṭhitena yasyānyato '- pyarthaḥ sidhyati tadarthaṃ gardabharaśanānivṛttiḥ phalaṃ kalpyate | tenaivaṃ kalpyate kṛtvāci- ntānyāyena yadi nāmaivaṃ vākyaṃ na bhavettataḥ kīdṛśamanuṣṭhānaṃ syāt | tatra mantraprāpti- stāvadekāntena sidhyedaśvābhidhānyāṃ tadvadeva tu gardabharaśa/?/nāyāmapi prasajyeta |
yadā tvanena vākyena pratyakṣeṇa nairākāṅkṣyādaviśeṣaviniyogasamarthavākyānumānaṃ niṣiddhaṃ tadā kevalāśvābhidhānīviṣayatvasiddhirityapaunaruktayādarthavadvākyam || 34 ||
yadyapi pradeśāntarasthatvānmantravidhānaṃ na stūyate tathā 'pi prathanavidhānāttatprarocanayā ca sakalaṃ vākyamarthavat | tasya hyetadevotpattivākyam | nanu ca puroḍāśānyathānupapatti- prāptatvātprathanaṃ na vidhātavyam | naitanniyogataḥ prāpnoti | drutataraṃ hi piṣṭamaprathitamapi pratheta | vidhāne tu sati tādṛśaṃ kartavyaṃ yena prathayitavyaṃ bhavati | evaṃ cādhvaryukartṛka- tā 'pi sidhyati | paṭhyamānaṃ hyādhvaryavasamākhyāṃ labdhvā kartṛviśeṣaṃ niyacchati | artha- prāptaṃ tvasamākhyātatvānna niyāmakaṃ syāt | evamarthaṃ ca yadyapyekāntato 'rthātprāpnuyātta- thā 'pi vākyenaiva prāpayitavyam | tasmādupapannā prathanastutiḥ | evamapi yajñapatimeva tatprathayatītyanena stutau siddhāyāṃ mantragrahaṇamanarthakam | na | mantrasyaiva stutyarthamupādānāt, prathanaṃ kartavyaṃ tasya hi kriyamāṇasyāyaṃ mantraḥ sādhanaṃ bhavati | tatra coru te yajñapatiḥ prathatāmityetānyakṣarāṇi prayujyante tathā sati yajñapatiḥ prathito bhavatīti guṇo labhyate | kimetadevāsya phalamiti netyāha | stutyarthameva tad‌dravyasaṃskārakarmasviti nyāyāt | yadyapyatra karaṇamantrābhihitatvātphalaṃ kalpyate tathā 'pi brāhmaṇe tāvattatsaṃkīrtanamekā- ntena stāvakam | mantro 'pi tu liṅgaviniyojyo na phalakalpanāyai prabhavati | karaṇavi- bhaktiviniyuktānāṃ hi sakalopayogānyathānupapattyā phalasādhanatā yuktā liṅgānumitā punaḥ śrutirākāṅkṣāvaśena kriyāprakāśanamātraviniyogāyaiva jñāyate | tenaivaṃjātīyako 1nanviti bhāṣyeṇa brāhmaṇāmnātasya vākyasya mantrakāṇḍāmnātamantraviśeṣagataliṅgaprakaraṇānu- mitavidhiśeṣatvātaṃbhavādarthavādatvaṃ na yuktamityevaṃ pūrvapakṣyuktāmāśaṅkāmanubhāṣya satyamityādinā mantra- stutyasaṃbhave 'pi pra/?/thanastutirbhaviṣyatīti samādhatte |
mantro 'pi pradhānaphalasaṃkīrtanātmikā stutirevābhyupagantavyā | kathamasati prathana iti kasyāyaṃ praśnaḥ kiṃ vidhyuddeśavartinaḥ puroḍāśaprathanasyāthārthavādagatasya yajñapatiprathanasyeti | dvidhā 'pi cāyuktaṃ puroḍāśaprathanaṃ tāvad‌vidhīyamānatvādeva na praṣṭavyam | na ca mantrā- bhidhānāttasyāstitvaṃ kiṃ tarhi svarūpasadbhāvādityuttaramapyasaṃbaddham | atha punaritarārtha- vādanyāyena kathamarudatītivatpraśnaḥ | tathā 'pyuttaramasaṃbaddham | mantreṇādhvaryuḥ puroḍāśa- miti puroḍāśena saṃbadhyate na yajamānena | tasmādagrantha iti kecit | ubhayathā 'pi tvidamaduṣṭam | astu tāvatpuroḍāśaprathane | tatra hi yājñikānāṃ keṣāṃcidayaṃ mantraḥ kṛtvā prathanamabhimarśane prayujyate so 'yaṃ svasiddhāntena pṛcchati kathamasati—vṛtte prathane prayujyamānenānena prathayatīti |
tatrābhyupetyavādenottaraṃ mantrābhidhānāditi | yadyapi prathanaṃ prathamakṛtatvānnāsti mantreṇa nu sattayocyata ityupapannaḥ śabdārthaḥ | atha vā sarvaprayojakavyāpārāṇāṃ prayojya- vyāpārapūrvakatvamartharūpeṇa sthitamiti śabdairapi tathaiva pravartitavyam | iha ca stutiviṣa- yasiddhayarthaṃ prathayatītyetadvidhīyata ityuktam | tatrā ' 'ha nāyaṃ vidhiḥ saṃbhavati viṣayānu- papatteḥ | prayojakavyāpāro hi pratīyamānastadgocaraḥ syāt | sa cānupāttaprayojyavyāpā- ratvānna pratīyate tena yathā yajetetyanukte yājayatīti nocyate tatheha prathetetyanukte prathayatīti na vācyam | na ceha puroḍāśaḥ pratheta tena vā prathitavyamityupādānamasti | tasminnasati prathayatītyanupapannam | tadupapādayati mantrābhidhānāditi pratīkagṛhītama- ntropāttaprayojyavyāpāraṃ hi brāhmaṇaṃ prathayatīti vidhatte | yaśca prathasveti brūta ityanena puroḍāśakartṛkāṃ kriyāmadhvaryuḥ preṣyatītyetaddarśayati | yadyapi ca saṃbhāvyamānakriyāṇāṃ prayojyānāmanupādāyāpi vyāpāraṃ śabdena prayojakavyāpāraḥ sidhyatītyetadapyuttaraṃ saṃbha- vati tathā 'pi tūttaravibhavādupādānapūrvakataivoktā | atha vā 'stu yajamānaprathane katha- masatīti sarvastutīnāṃ kiṃcicchabdagatamarthagataṃ vā ' 'lambanamuktam | tadatra kiṃ- nibandhanā stutiriti | tadabhidhīyate | mantroktamarthamāśritya stutiḥ pravartiṣyate | mantreṇādhvaryuḥ puroḍāśaṃ brūta iti na puroḍāśaprathanopādānābhiprāyaṃ kiṃ tarhi puroḍāśaṃ bravīti, uru te yajñapatiḥ prathatāmiti | prathasvetyapītikaraṇaḥ prabhṛtyartho na śabdaḥ padārthatāyai | yaśca prathasveti brūta ityapi tadādyartha eva | prathatāmiti brūta ityarthaḥ | yaścaivaṃ brūte sa prathayatyanenaiva | guṇavādāt | atha vā tadācaṣṭa ityevaṃ mukhyameva prathayatī- tyarthamāśritya prathamabuddhayā siddhā stutiḥ || 35 ||
adṛṣṭārthoccāraṇavādino 'pi tanniyamādaparamavaśyaṃ kalpanīyamadṛṣṭaṃ tanmamāpi pratyāyana- niyamādbhaviṣyatītyavirodhaḥ | etena mantratvādiniyamaḥ pratyuktaḥ | satsvapyupāyāntareṣu viśiṣṭānupūrvīkamantraviśeṣāmnānādupāyāntaranivṛttau niyamādṛṣṭamātrakalpanayā siddhamarthā- bhidhānam || 36 ||
yeyaṃ saṃpraiṣe agnīdagnīnityatra buddhabodhanāsaṃbhavādabhidhānakarmagarhā 'bhihitā sā 'pyanupā- lambhaḥ | smaraṇasaṃskārārthatvāt | buddhīnāṃ hi kṣaṇikatvātsvādhyāyakālotpannānāṃ na prayogakālaṃ yāvadavasthānaṃ tatrāvaśyaṃ kena ciddhayānādinā 'nusaṃdhāne kartavye mantro niyamyate |
atha vā saṃskāratvāditi | yadi hi bodha evāvatiṣṭhate tato 'navakāśatvaṃ bhavediha tu tadīyasaṃskāramātrāvasthānāttadabhivyaktidvāreṇāsti jñānotpattyavasara iti na mantrānartha- kyam || 37 ||
catvāri śṛṅgeti rūpakadvāreṇa yāgastutiḥ karmakāla utsāhaṃ karoti | hautre tvayaṃ viṣu1vati hoturājye viniyuktaḥ | tasya cā ' 'gneyatvādahnaścā ' 'dityadaivatatvasaṃstavādādityarū- 1gavāmayanāntargata ekāho viṣuvāniti |
peṇāgnistutirupavarṇyate | tatra catvāri śṛṅgeti divasayāmānāṃ grahaṇam | trayo asya pādā iti śītoṣṇavarṣākālāḥ | dve śīrṣe ityayanābhiprāyam | sapta hastā ityaśvastutiḥ | tridhā baddha iti savanābhiprāyeṇa | vṛṣabha iti vṛṣṭihetutvena stutiḥ | roravīti stana- yitnunā | sarvalokaprasiddhermahāndevo martyānāviveśetyutsāhakaraṇopakāreṇa sarvapuruṣahṛdayā- nupraveśāt | evamanena mārgeṇāsti tāvaddharmasādhanasmṛtiḥ || 38 ||
aditirdyauraditiriti | nātra dyutvādīni vivakṣitāni kiṃ tarhyaditau prakāśayi- yitavyāyāmavidyamānavipratiṣiddhadharmopādānaṃ stutyartham | guṇavādena tvaudumbarādhikaraṇa- vatsaṃvādo yojayitavyaḥ || 39 ||
yadyapi pūrvapakṣe 'yamabhiprāyo nopanyastastathā 'pi saṃbhavādupanyasyate | yadi hi svādhyā- yakāle 'rthavacanamupayujyeta tatastadāśrīyeta na tvevamasti karmabhirasaṃyogāt | tadanabhyāsastu prokṣaṇādivatsaukaryāt || 40 ||
yattu paraṃ kāraṇamavijñeyatvamuktaṃ tadayuktam | sata evārthasya puruṣāparādhenāvijñānāt | tatra cārthaprakaraṇasūktadevatārṣanigamaniruktavyākaraṇajñānānyadhigamopāyāḥ | teṣāṃ hyevamartha- meva paripālanam | yathaiva ca vyākaraṇena nityapadānvākhyāne kriyamāṇe lopavikārādīnā- mupāyatvenopādānamavyutpannāśca taireva padotpādanamiva manyante | tathā 'tra nityavākyārtha-
pratipattāvārṣopākhyānamanityavadābhāsamānamupāyatvaṃ pratipadyate | tatra yathā kaścid‌vyāca- kṣāṇaḥ padatadavayavādīnāṃ cetanatvamivādhyasya viśeṣabādhādivyāpāraṃ nirūpayatyetenaivamukto 'ya- mevaṃ pratyāheti | yathā ca pūrvapakṣottarapakṣavādinau vyavahārārthaṃ kalpitāvevamṛṣyārṣeyavi- viṣayā kalpanā | atha vā paramārthenaivedamṛṣibhistathoktaṃ na tu sa mantrastaireva kṛtastadānīṃ vā puruṣāntareṣvasanneva teṣāmāvirbhūtaḥ | kiṃ tarhi yathā 'dyatve 'pi kaścitprakṛtārthaviva- kṣāyāṃ tadarthaṃ vākyamupāditsamānastadarthasarūpaṃ mantraṃ ślokaṃ vā 'nyadīyaṃ smṛtvā svavākya- sthāne prayuṅkte tatpratyayena cānye tadarthamavadhārayantyevamihāpi vedārthavidbhistadvāsitāntaḥ- karaṇairmṛgvādibhirātmīyavyavahāreṣu śrutisāmānyarūpeṇa viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanārthaṃ mantrāḥ prayu- ktāstadbalena cāsmadādīnāṃ tadanurūpā 'nityārthapratipattirmavati | pratyayadṛḍhatvārthameva cā ' 'rṣasmaraṇam | tatraivamupākhyānaṃ smaranti | yathā kila bhūtāṃśo nāma kaścidṛṣirjarāmara- ṇanirākaraṇārthī sṛṇyevetyevamādinā sūktenāścinau stutavān | bhūtāṃśo aśvinoḥ kāmamaprā- iti cānte saṃkīrtanāttasyā ' 'rṣamāśvinaṃ sūktamiti ca dyotitam | tatra sṛṇiraṅkuśaḥ sara- ṇasādhanatvāttamarhantau tatra vā sādhū iti sṛṇyāvarthātkuñjarau | ākāraśchandasi dvivacanādeśaḥ | tāvivātyarthaṃ jṛmbhamāṇāvaṣṭāṅgapraharaṇavyāpṛtau jarbharī | turpharītū hiṃsantau | nitośatirvadhakarmā tatkāriṇau naitośau—yoddhārau tāviva turpharī—tvaramāṇā hiṃsakāviti vā | parpharīkā- śobhāyuktau | udanyatiḥ pipāsārthaḥ, tatra jātau, udanyajau prāvṛṣijau cātakau jemanā—uda- kavantau jemaśabdātpāmādivihito matvarthīyo napratyayaḥ | tau yathodakalābhe/?/na mattau bhavatastathā yau maderū tau me jarāyumarāyu jarāmaraṇadharmakamarthāccharīramajaramamaraṃ ca kurutamiti vākya- śeṣaḥ | tenaivaṃ vākyārtho yāvaṅkuśacoditāviva kuñjarau sarvato jṛmmamāṇau śatrūṇāṃ nihantārau bhavato hiṃsrāviva ca hiṃsanavyāpṛtau dākṣyeṇa ca śobhete cātakāviva codakalābhe/?/na madātprī- yete tāvubhāvapi jarāmaraṇayoḥ kupitāvivājaratvasyāmaratvasya vā prītāvajaramamaraṃ me śarīraṃ vidhattāmiti | “amyak‌sā ta” ityagastyārṣaṃ tena kilendro 'maratvaṃ dhanaṃ prārthita- stathā coparitanyāmṛci “tvaṃ tū na indra taṃ rayiṃ dā” iti śrūyate | tadevāsyāmṛcya- nuṣaṅgeṇa draṣṭavyam | iyaṃ ca cchandomadvitīye 'hani marutvatīye śastre viniyuktā | tatrāmya- gityamāśabdo 'vyayaṃ sāhityavācī yato 'mātya iti bhavati sahāñcatītyamyaksā ta indra, ṛṣṭirāyudhaviśeṣaḥ pāṇikṣepyaḥ, asme iti—asmākaṃ sanemi—purāṇam | amvaṃ—toyaṃ maruto junanti—kṣipanti | agniścidityupamārtho hi sma, atase—śuṣkatṛṇe śuśukvān—dīpta/?/-
vān/?/ āpa iva dvīpaṃ dadhati prayāṃsi—annādyāni | vākyārthe tu prathamatṛtīyayordvitīyaca- turtha/?/yośca padānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ | tatra setyetadākṣipto yacchabdastṛtīyapāde kalpyate | śuṣkatṛṇe dīpto 'gniriva yā lakṣyate tava sahacāriṇī nityamṛṣṭistava vallabhā sā tāvattvatprasādenāsmā- kame/?/va | ye 'pyamī purāṇaṃ jalaṃ vṛṣṭirūpeṇa vikṣipanta āpa iva dvīpamannādyāni dhārayanti tava priyasakhāste 'pyasmākameva sa tvamevaṃ sādhāraṇadravyaḥ sannamaratvaṃ na kevalaṃ dehi | ekayā pratidhā 'pivaditīndrasyaiva stutiḥ | ekena prayatnenāpibatsākaṃ—yaugapadyena, sarāṃsi—pā- trāṇi somasya pūrṇāni indraḥ kāṇukā—kāmayamānaḥkāmukaśabdasya cchāndaso varṇavyatyayaḥ | ākārastu vibhaktyādeśaḥ | atha vā kāntakānītyādayo niruktoktāḥ kāṇukāśabdavi- kalpā/?/ yojanīyāḥ | tadevaṃ sarvatra kenacitprakāreṇābhiyuktānāmarthotprekṣopapatteḥ prasiddhata- rārthā/?/bhāve 'pi vedasya tadamyu/?/pagamātsiddhamarthavattvam || 41 ||
paraṃ tu śrutisāmānyamātramiti | yajamānastāvatprārthayitā indraśca prārthyamānaḥ sarva- dā 'sti | kīkaṭā nāma yadyapi janapadāstathā 'pi nityāḥ | atha vā sarvalokasthāḥ kṛpa/?/ṇāḥ kīkaṭāḥ | pramagandaḥ—kusīdavṛttiḥ sa hi prabhūtataramāgamiṣyatītyevaṃ dadāti | nīcāśākhaḥ—ṣaṇḍhastadīyaṃ dhanaṃ naicāśākham | tacca sarvamayajñāṅgabhūtaṃ teṣāṃ karmaṇyapravṛ- ttestadasmākamāhareti | śeṣaṃ gatārtham || 42 ||
āgneyyetyagninā devatayā liṅgena tadabhidhānasāmarthyena vā ya upadeśaḥ sa tadarthārhatāṃ mantrasya dyotayati | devatātaddhito hyeṣa smaryate yaṃ cārthaprādhānyena mantraḥ prakāśayati sā tasya devatā nābhidhānamātreṇa | ekadevatye 'pi mantre 'nekadevatāntarapadaprayoge sati taddevatyavyapadeśābhāvāt | prādhānyābhidhānaṃ ca nārthaparatvena vinopapadyate || 43 ||
ūhadarśanaṃ na mātā varghata iti | arthe ca puṣṭyādivṛddheḥ pratyakṣatvātpratiṣedhāsaṃbhavā-
dānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣviti śabde vijñāyate | tatrāpi sthaulyādivṛddhayasaṃbhavādadhikārthavācitvena dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ | sa cārthaparatve sarvapaśuviśeṣaṇamātrādyupāditsāyāṃ satyā- mavakalpate | yā cānyapadavṛddhisadbhāvapratītiriyaṃ ca1 | yadyapi mātṛprabhṛtīnāṃ pārārthyā- tsaṃbandhibhedādeva ca bhedasiddheranūhyatvaṃ sadevānuvadati tathā 'pi nyāyāvagatānūhasaṃkīrtanā- nnyāyarahiteṣūhasaṃpratyayātprakṛtau vivakṣitārthatā vijñāyate | anyathā tu tadadṛṣṭamavikṛtai- reva sādhyeta | tathā yadyapyanyadevatyaḥ paśurāgneyyevamanotā kāryetyūhaprāptidarśanaṃ, eva- musrāṇāṃ vapānāmityevamādīnāṃ yathārthamūhitānāmevā ' 'mnānamapi vivakṣitārthaṃ bhavi- ṣyati | itarathā prākṛtapadatyāge 'nyakalpane cādṛṣṭadvayaṃ kalpyeta || 44 ||
vidhireva ca brāhmaṇābhidhastatra tatra paryāyairavayavānvākhyānanirvacanādibhiścārthaprakāśa- naparatvaṃ darśayati | arthānāśrayaṇe hi sarvaṃ tadanarthakaṃ syāt | tasmādvivakṣitavacanā mantrā iti siddham || 45 ||
( iti mantrādhikaraṇam ) || 4 ||
iti śrīmadbhaṭṭakumārilasvāmiviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike prathamasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ||
evaṃ tāvadvidhyarthavādamantranāmadheyātmakasya vedasya dharmaṃ pratyupayogaḥ sādhita idā- nīṃ pauruṣeyīṣu smaryamāṇārthāvadhiṣu manvādipraṇītanibandhanāsu smṛtiṣvanibaddheṣu cā ' 'cā- reṣu cintā | tatra kiṃcidudāhṛtya vicāraḥ kartavya ityaṣṭakādismaraṇāni manvādisthāni 1arthaparatve 'vakalpata ityanuṣaṅgaḥ |
tadgranthasamarpitāni pramāṇāpramāṇavicāraviṣayatvenodāhriyante | saṃdehahetuścābhidhīyate |
pāratantryātsvato naiṣāṃ pramāṇatvāvadhāraṇā |
aprāmāṇyavikalpastu drạdhimnaiva vihanyate ||
manvādivacanaṃ smṛtyapekṣaṃ smṛtiśca mūlapramāṇāpekṣiṇīti naikasyāpi vedavannirapekṣaprā- māṇyaniścayaḥ | yatastu vedavādināmevāvibhāgenāvicchinnapāramparyaparigrahādāṛdhyamato nāprā- māṇyādhyavasānamiti yuktaḥ saṃdehaḥ | tatra pūrvapakṣavādī vadati naiṣāṃ prāmāṇyamevāpekṣitavya- miti | kutaḥ |
pūrvavijñānaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ smṛtirucyate |
pūrvajñānādvinā tasyāḥ prāmāṇyaṃ nāvadhāryate |
sarvasmaraṇāni hi pratyakṣādyavagate 'rthe tadānurūpyeṇopajāyamānānyarthaṃ samarthayanti | tadihāṣṭakādīnāṃ svargādisādhyasādhanabhāvaṃ pratyakṣādīni tāvanna gṛhṇantīti sādhitam | śabdo 'pi yathā 'gnihotrādiṣu pratyakṣeṇopalabhyate naivaṃ mantrāḥ |
pratyakṣānupalabdhe na śabde sadbhāvakalpanā |
dharmāstitvapramāṇāddhi viprakṛṣṭatarā bhavet ||
śabdasya tāvadekameva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam | sa cettenānavagamyamāno 'pyamtītyucyate tato varaṃ dharmāstitvameva niṣpramāṇakamabhyupagatamiti |
na vā ' 'numānamapyasminnaṣṭakāśrutikalpane |
na hi smṛtistayā vyāptā dṛṣṭā 'nthadvā 'numāpakam ||
yathaiva dharme saṃbandhādarśanānna kiṃcilliṅgaṃ kramate tathā 'ṣṭakādiśrutāvapi |
na vā ' 'gamena tadbodho nityena kṛtakena vā |
visrambhaḥ kṛtake nāsti nityo naivopapadyate ||
yadyapyaindriyakatvādaṣṭakādismṛtīnāṃ pauruṣeyāgamagamyatvaṃ saṃbhavati | tathā 'pi vipralambha- bhūyiṣṭhatvādaśraddheyavacaneṣu puruṣeṣvanadhyavasānam | dṛśyante hyanāgamikānapyarthānāgamikatvā- dhyāropeṇa kecidadyatve 'pyabhidadhānāḥ | tena manvādibhirapi kimaṣṭakāśrutīrupalabhya veda- mūlatvaṃ svanibandhanānāṃ pratijñātamutānupalabhyaiva śraddheyavākyatvārthamiti duṣṭapuruṣākulita- cetasāṃ bhavati saṃdehaḥ | tāvatā ca prāmāṇyavighātaḥ | nityasya vacanasyā ' 'dimatsmaraṇa- mūlapratipādane vyāpāra eva nāsti | na ca mantraliṅgāni svayaṃ mūlatvaṃ pratipadyante |
vidhiśūnyatvāt | na ca mūlāntaraṃ nyāyāgataṃ sūcaya | anyaparatvāt | na ca sarveṣāṃ smṛti- praṇayināmavigā1nam | yena pauruṣeyāgamabalādupalabdhapūrvaśrutimūlatvaṃ syāt |
na ca vijñāyate vākyaṃ kīdṛśaṃ tairnirūpitam |
arthavādādirūpāddhi paśyāmo bhrāmyato bahūn |
yadi hyetadekāntena gamyeta yathāvidhi vākyānyeva manvādibhirupalabdhānīti | tataḥ kā 'pi kalpanā syādadyatve 'pyanyaparārthavādādivacanebhyo 'pi bhrāmyantaḥ puruṣā dṛśyante | tena teṣvapyāśaṅkā bhavati | mṛtasākṣikavyavahāravacca pralīnaśākhāmūlatvakalpanāyāṃ yasmai yadrocate sa tatpramāṇīkuryāt | tasmānnā ' 'gamenāpi mūlopalabdhiḥ ||
upamānaṃ tvadṛṣṭe 'rthe sadṛśe cānirupite |
naiveṣṭamiti tenāpi na mūlaśrutisādhanam ||
arthāpattyā 'pi yatkiṃ cinmūlamityavagamyate |
taccāpramāṇapakṣe 'pi bhrāntyādi na virudhyate ||
yadi hi śrutikalpanena vinā smṛtirnopapadyate tataḥ samyaṅ‌mūlā syāt | saṃbhavati tu svapnamūlatvena tenānaikāntyādarthāpatteḥ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya vā 'navakāśaḥ | tasmādanupala- bdhigocarāpannāyāṃ śrutau satsvapi mūlāntareṣvabhipretamūlābhāvānnirmūlatvābhidhānam | nanu ye vidurevabhi/?/tikartavyatāka evaṃphalakaścāsau padārthaḥ kartavya iti | atha vā ye kartavyo 'sāvitītthaṃ viduste tathā vijānantastādṛśāḥ kathamivāsmānvipralabdhuṃ na kartavyo 'sāviti vadeyuḥ | nanvanya evaṃ vadanti kartavya ityanye na vā kartavya ityāhuḥ | kathamanyatvaṃ yadā teṣāmapyevamayaṃ smaryata iti kathite bhavatyevaṃ pratipattiḥ | atha vā ye manvādayo vidurakartavyo 'yaṃ padārtha iti kathamiva te vinā 'parādhena lokaṃ vañcayituṃ vadiṣyanti kartavya evāyamiti | smaraṇānupapattyeti | ye tāvanmanvādibhyo 'rvāñcaḥ puruṣāsteṣāṃ yajjñānaṃ tattāvadanavagatapūrvārthatvānna smṛtiḥ | manvādīnāmapi yadi prathamaṃ kiṃ citpramāṇaṃ saṃbhāvyate tataḥ smaraṇaṃ bhavennānyathā | kasmātpunaḥ putraṃ duhitaraṃ vā 'tikramya vandhyādauhitrodāharaṇaṃ kṛtam | sthānatulyatvāt | putrādisthānīyaṃ hi manvādeḥ pūrvavijñānaṃ 1yaducyate dvijātīnāṃ śūdrāddāropasaṃgrahaḥ | na tanmamaṃmataṃ yasmāttatrā ' 'tmā jāyate svayam || ityādinā vigānadarśanāditi bhāvaḥ |
dauhitrasthānīyaṃ smaraṇamataśca yathā duhiturabhāvaṃ parāmṛśya dauhitrasmṛtiṃ bhrāntiṃ manyate tathā manvādibhiḥ pratyakṣādyasaṃbhavaparāmarśādaṣṭakādismaraṇaṃ mithyeti mantavyam | yathaiva pāramparyeṇāvicchedādayaṃ veda iti—vākyānumānābhiprāyeṇoktam |
itarastvarthasyaivāvicchedasmaraṇamayamāheti matvā punarnirmūlatvamāha | vedaḥ punaḥ savi- śeṣaḥ pratyakṣagamyastatra ghaṭādivadeva puruṣāntarasthamupalabhya smaranti | tairapi smṛtamupalabhyā- nye 'pi smaranto 'nyebhyastathaiva samarpayantītyanāditā | sarvasya cā ' 'tmīyasmaraṇātpūrva- mupalabdhiḥ saṃbhavatīti na nirmmūlatā | śabdasaṃbandhavyuptattimātrameva ceha vṛddhavyavahārā- dhīnam | prāgapi hi vedaśabdādanyavastu vilakṣaṇaṃ vedāntaravilakṣaṇaṃ vā 'dhyetṛsthamṛgve- dādirūpaṃ mantrabrāhmaṇādirūpāṇi cānyavilakṣaṇānyupalabhyante | sarveṣāṃ cānādayaḥ saṃjñā iti tad‌dvāreṇottarakālamapi gamyamānānāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ sādhitam | nanvaṣṭakādiṣu puruṣāntarasthe- ṣvapi kumbhakārakriyāsviva kiṃ cidvijñānamūlamasti | yadi hi karmasvarūpamātraṃ smaryeta tataḥ pākādi tadindriyairanyānanuṣṭhato dṛṣṭavā pare smareyuḥ | yatastviha svargādisādhyasā- dhanasaṃbandhaḥsmaryate | nāsau puruṣāntareṣūtpadyamānaḥ kaścid‌dṛśyata ityandhaparamparānyāyenā- pramāṇatā | sarvasyānādivyavahāropanyāsena vedavatprasiddhya/?/bhimāno bhavatyato 'ndhaparamparāni- darśanam | vede hi prāmāṇyasyānāditvamihāprāmāṇyasya | katham—
yo yo grahītā jātyandhaḥ sa svayaṃ nopalabdhavān |
svātantryeṇāgṛhīte ca prāmāṇyaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate ||
tādṛśaṃ vā 'ṣṭakādismaraṇam | na ca codanā mūlabhūtopalabhyate | na cānanubhūtasaṃbandhā '- numāṃtu śakyate | yadi ca vedādupalabhya smṛtayaḥ pravartitāḥ syustato 'rthasmaraṇavadita upa- labhyāyaṃ manvādibhiḥ praṇīta ityapi pāramparyeṇa smaryeta | syādetad | arthasmaraṇena kṛtā- rthānāṃ niṣprayojanaṃ mūlasmaraṇamanādarādbhraṣṭamiti | tadayuktam | na hi yatkṛtaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tadeva vismartuṃ yujyate | arthasbhṛteḥ svataḥ prāmāṇyābhāvāt | sarve puruṣāstāvadetajjānanti yathā vedamūlajñānādvinā prāmāṇyaṃ na niścīyata iti te kathamiva tatrānādaraṃ kuryuḥ | api ca—
yena yatnena manvādyairātmavākyaṃ prapāṭhitam |
kasmāttenaiva tanmūlaṃ na samarpitā ||
yadi hi tairapyarthamātramevānyebhyo 'dhigataṃ na vedo dṛṣṭa iti tatastatpūrvakeṣvapyayameva paryanuyoga iti nirmūlasaṃpradāyatvaprasaṅgānnirmūlatvānna mucyase | yadi tu pralīnaśākhāmū- latā kalpyeta tataḥ sarvāsāṃ buddhādissṛtīnāmapi tad‌dvāraṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate | yasyaiva ca yadabhipretaṃ sa eva tatpralīnaśākhāmastake nikṣipya pramāṇīkuryāt | atha vidyamānaśāravā- gatā evaite 'rthāstathā 'pi manvādaya iti sarve puruṣāstata evopalapsyante | yuktatarā ca svā- dhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ sākṣādvedādeva pratītiriti smṛtipraṇayanavaiyarthyaṃ syāt | na ca tadvijñā- yate | kīdṛśādvākyādidaṃ manvādibhiḥ pratiṣannaṃ kiṃ vidhiparādutārthavādarūpāditi | paśya—
mahatā 'pi prayatnena tamisrāyāṃ parāmṛśan |
kṛṣṇaśuklavivekaṃ hi na kaścidadhigacchati ||
na ca manvādivacanādvedamūlatvaṃ niścinumaḥ | te hi nirmūlamapi vipralambhādihetoruktyā lokaṃ vañcayitumevaṃ vadeyuḥ | tasmādapramāṇam || 1 ||
sarvathā tāvanmanvādipraṇītāḥ sannibandhanāḥ smṛtayaḥ śeṣāṇi ca vidyāsthānāni svārthaṃ pratipādayantyupalabhyante | manvādīnāṃ cāpratyakṣatvāttadvijñānamūlamadṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ cidavaśyaṃ kalpanīyam | tatra ca—
bhrānteranubhavādvā 'pi puṃvākyādvipralambhanāt |
dṛṣṭānuguṇyasādhyatvāccodanaiva laghīyasī ||
sarvatraiva cādṛṣṭakalpanāyāṃ tādṛśaṃ kalpayitavyaṃ yaddṛṣṭaṃ na viruṇādvi na vā 'dṛṣṭāntara- māsañjayati | tatra bhrāntau tāvatsamyaṅ‌nibaddhaśāstradarśanavirodhāpattiḥ sarvalokābhyupagata- dṛḍhaprāmāṇyabādhaśca | idānīṃtanaiśca puruṣairapi bhrāntirmanvādīnāmanuvartitā | tatparihāropa- nyāsaśca manvādīnāmityanekādṛṣṭakalpanā | anubhave 'pi sa eva tāvadanubhavaḥ kalpayi- tavyaḥ | punaścedānīṃtanasarvapuruṣajātiviparītasāmarthyakalpanā, manvādestaccaitaṃtsarvajñavāde nirākṛtam | puruṣavākyaparā 'pyandhaparamparayā nirākṛtā | na hi niṣpratiṣṭhapramāṇātma- lābho dṛśyate | tathā vipralambhe 'pi tatkalpanā | vipralipsā prayojanaṃ lokasya ca tatra bhrā- ntimta/?/syāśceyantaṃ kālamanuvṛttirityādyāśrayaṇīyam | utpannasya ca dṛḍhasya pratyayasyaprāmāṇya
nirākaraṇād‌dṛṣṭavirodhaḥ | tasmātsarvebhyaścodanākalpanaiva jyāyasī | tatra hi tanmātrādṛṣṭā- bhyupagamaḥ | śeṣāstu mahājanaparigrahādayaḥ sarve 'nuvidhīyante | saṃbhāvyate ca manvādīnāṃ codaṃnāpūrvavijñānakāraṇatvena | tadarthamevā ' 'he/?/—tenopapanno vedasaṃyogastraivarṇikānā- miti | yāni punaranupapannavedasaṃbhāvanānāṃ mlecchādīnāmatīndriyārthasmaraṇāni teṣāṃ mūla- kalpanāvelāyāmeva codanā saṃbhāvanāpadaṃ nā ' 'rụ̄dheti mithyātvahetubhūtacatuṣṭayapāriśeṣyāda- pramāṇatvam | saṃbhāvitāyāṃ punaścodanāyāṃ kāraṇāntaṃraniṣedhe kṛte nirmūlatvāsaṃbhavātpari- śeṣasiddhaṃ codanāmūlatvam | yattu kimarthaṃ codanā nopalabhyanta iti | tatra ke cidāhuḥ | nityānumeyāstā na kadā ciduccāryante | yathāliṅgādikalpitāḥ | kathamanuccāritānāṃ mūlatvopapattiriti cet | naiṣa doṣaḥ | pāṭhāvicchedavatpāramparyeṇa smaraṇāttatsiddheḥ | yathaiva hi granthaḥ saṃpradāyādavicchinno 'stitvaṃ bhajate tathaiva pratijñayā nityānumeyaśruti- saṃpradāyāvicchedasiddhiḥ | tattvayuktam | andhaparamparānyāyādeva | yā hi codanā na kadā- ciduccāryate tasyāḥ sarvapuruṣapratyakṣādiprasarābhāvād‌durlabhataramastitvam | tathā ca smṛte- rapi saiva vandhyādauhitratulyatā | liṅgādīnāṃ tu nityatvānnityamanuccaritaśrutyanumānakā- raṇatvamaviruddham | tena varaṃ pralīnaśrutyanumānameva | na ca pralayo na saṃbhāvyate | dṛśyate hi pramādālasyādibhiḥ puruṣakṣayāccālpaviṣayatvam | na caivaṃ sati yatkiṃ citpramāṇamāpa- tsyate | śiṣṭatraivarṇikadṛḍhasmaraṇānyathānupapattilabhyatvācchrutyanumānasya | yadvā vidyamāna- śākhāgataśrutimūlatvamevāstu | kathamanupalabdhiriti ceducyate—
śākhānāṃ viprakīrṇatvātpuruṣāṇāṃ pramādataḥ |
nānāprakaraṇasthatvātsmṛtermūlaṃ na dṛśyate ||
yattu kimarthaṃ vedavākyānyeva nopasaṃgṛhītānīti | saṃpradāyavināśabhīteḥ | viśiṣṭānu- pūrvyā vyavasthito hi svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ śrūyate | smārtāścā ' 'cārāḥ ke citkacitkvasyāṃ cicchākhāyām | tatrāpi tu kecitpuruṣamevādhikṛtyā ' 'mnāyante | yena kratuprakaraṇāmnātāḥ kenacinnittenotkṛṣyamāṇāḥ puruṣadharmatāṃ bhajante | yathā ‘malavadvāsasā saha na saṃva1 det’ ‘tasmānna brāhmaṇāyāvagu2ret‘ ityevamādayaḥ | tatra yadi tāvattānyeva vākyā- nyuddhṛtyādhyāpayeyustataḥ kramānyatvātsvādhyāyavidhivirodhaḥ syāt | anena ca nirdeśe- nānye 'pyarthavādoddhāreṇa vidhimātramadhīyīrankarmaupayikamātraṃ vā | tatra vedapralayaḥ prasajyeta | na cāvaśyaṃ manvādayaḥ sarvaśākhādhyāyinaḥ |
te hi prayatnena śākhāntarādhyāyibhyaḥ śrutvā 'rthamātraṃ svavākyairavismaraṇārthaṃ nibadhnīyuḥ | na ca vākyaviśeṣo jñāyate | yathaiva hi smṛterdṛḍhatvādbhrāntimūlatvaṃ nāstyevamarthavādamūlatva- mapi | śaknuvanti hi te vidhyarthavādau vivektum | tatra smṛtervidhyātmakatvātprakṛtitā- 1tai॰ saṃ॰ ( 2-5-1 ) | 2 tai॰ saṃ ( 2-6-10 ) |
dātmyānumānalabdhāspade 'rthavādapūrvakatvaṃ niṣpramāṇakam | api ca vedo 'khilo dharmamūlaṃ sasarvo 'bhihito veda iti ca svayameva smṛrtṛbhirātmā badhvā samarpitastaccaitanniyogatastatkālaiḥ kartṛbhirbuddhikāritvādupalabdhamataḥ siddhaṃ vedadvāraṃ prāmāṇyam | yastu kartṛsāmānyātsvata- ntrameva prāmāṇyaṃ vedamūlatvaṃ vā 'numānena sādhayati tasyārthakāmānusāribhirdṛṣṭārthairācāraira- nekāntaḥ | śrūyamāṇaśrutyadhīnaprāmāṇyāpatteśca viruddhatā tasmādarthāpattirevātrāvyabhicārā- dupacārātpaścānmānādanumānatvenoktā | asyā eva smṛterdrạdhimna iti | dṛḍhatvātkāra- ṇānumānamatha vā dṛḍhatvasya | na hi manuṣyā ihaiveti | niḥśeṣasaṃskāracchidā maraṇe- nāntaritvātkarmaphalasaṃbandhānusaṃdhānāsaṃbhavenocyate | smṛtivaidikapadārthayoḥ kartṛsā- mānyādupapanno vedasaṃyogastraivarṇikānāmiti | codanāmūlasaṃbhāvanāpadalābhāryam | vismaraṇamapyupapadyata iti | dṛśyate hyadyatve 'pyarthasmaraṇaṃ granthanāśaśca | yadā tu śākhā- ntareṣu vidyanta eva tāḥ śrutayastadā 'pi kasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ kāḥ paṭhayantaïtyasyāṃśasya vismaraṇam | vaidikatvamātraṃ tu prāmāṇyasiddhaye paripālayanti | tadviśeṣajñānaṃ punaranau- payikatvādanādartavyameva | tathā pratyupasthitaniyamānāmiti | āgatamāgataṃ nimittaṃ prati ye niyamyante vṛddhavayaḥpratyutthānādayasteṣām | dṛṣṭārthatvādeva prāmāṇyamiti | etadayuktam | kutaḥ—
dharmaṃ prati yato 'tredaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prastutaṃ smṛteḥ |
tasmātkṛṣyādivatteṣāmupanyāso na yujyate |
na hi yāvatkiṃ cidācaraṇaṃ tasya sarvasya mūlamiha pramāṇī kriyate | dharmajijñāsā- dhikārāt | yadi ca gurvanugamādīnāṃ kevalaṃ dṛṣṭārthatvameva syāttataḥ kṛṣyādivaddharmaṃ pratya-
prāmāṇyameveti nopanyasitavyāḥ | syādetadapramāṇatvenaiṣāmupanyāsa iti | na | tathā sati “hetudarśanācca” ityatrodāhartavyā bhaveyuḥ | tasmācchreyāṃptamiti ca darśanaṃ niṣpha- lam | na ca niyogataḥ śāstrādṛte prāptiḥ | śakyate hyupāyāntareṇāpi sāmadānādinā gururadhyāpanādīni kārayitum | tatrāsti niyamavidheravakāśaḥ | sarvatra ca yathā kathaṃ cillokapaṅ‌ktisahāyopādānātmarakṣaṇaprītyutpādādikā dṛṣṭārthatā bhāṣyakāroktā śakyā vaktum | na cāvaghātādīnāṃ vṛṣṭikāmayāgādīnāṃ ca dṛṣṭārthānāmavaidikatvam | tasmātsa- tyapi dṛṣṭārthatve saṃbhāvyate vedamūlatvaṃ niyamādṛṣṭasiddherananyapramāṇakatvāt | ataśca gurva- nugamanādernaimittikatvādakriyāyāṃ pratyavāyaḥ karaṇe ca na bhavati | dṛṣṭaṃ ca prīto gurura- dhyāyayiṣyatītyevamādi niṣpadyate | niyamāccāvighnasamāptyarthāpūrvasiddhiḥ | evaṃ ca “ācārādgṛhyamāṇeṣu tathā syā1dityatra sakṛdasakṛdvā 'nuṣṭhānamiti vicāro yuktaḥ | ita- rathā tu dṛṣṭārthatvavaśenaivodakapānādivadavadhāraṇaṃ syāt | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇa dṛṣṭārthatvādeva prāmāṇyamityuktaṃ tatpūrvapakṣavādyatiśayārtham | etaduktaṃ bhavati | yāstāvadadṛṣṭārthāḥ smṛta- yastāḥ kathaṃ cidapramāṇī kuryādbhavān, imāḥ punargurvanugamanādiviṣayāḥ kathamivāpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyantīti | sabhāprapādīnāṃ yadyapi viśeṣaśrutirnaiva kalpyate tathā 'pi paropakāra- śrutyaiva samastānāmupādānātprāmāṇyam | tasmācchreyāṃsamityaśve gardabhenānugantavye siddha- vacchreyasāmūnairanugamanaṃ darśayati | yathā dhanvani nirudake kṛtāḥ prapāḥ pareṣāmupakurvantyevaṃ tvamiti devatāstutipare vākye siddhavatprapāsadbhāva | stasyāśca pārārthyaṃ dṛśyate | gotracihnaṃ śikhākarma tatrāpyācāraniyamasyādṛṣṭārthatvānnaiva tāvanmātrameva prayojanam | śakyaṃ hyapā- yāntareṇāpi gotraṃ smartuṃ tenānya evābhiprāyaḥ | karmāṅgabhūtaṃ tāvaccaturavattapañcāvattādi- vibhāgasiddhayarthamavaśyaṃ smartavyaṃ gotram | ataśca taccih‌nārthamapi tāvacchikhākalpasmṛteḥ prāmāṇyamastu | tanniyamādṛṣṭasya tvekāntenaivānanyagatitvātpuruṣārthatā setsyatīti | tena sarvasmṛtīnāṃ prayojanavatī prāmāṇyasiddhiḥ | tatra yāvaddharmamokṣasaṃbandhi tadvedaprabhavam | yattvarthasukhaviṣayaṃ tallokavyavahārapūrvakamiti vivektavyam | eṣaivetihāsapurāṇayorapyupade- śavākyānāṃ gatiḥ |
