tulyakakṣatayā yena vikalpapadavī vrajet ||
parādhīnapramāṇatvānna pramāṇapade sthitā |
śrutyā bādhitamātrā 'sau punarnnojjīvituṃ kṣamā ||
tulyakakṣavikalpo 'pi nāprāmāṇye 'styakalpite |
pramāṇasyāpramāṇatvakalpanā ca dvidoṣabhāk ||
pramāṇatvaṃ pratītaṃ yadujjvalattadapahnutam |
ekastāvadayaṃ doṣaḥ syātpratītiviparyayāt ||
tathā tadapramāṇatvaṃ yadabhāvapramāṇakam |
bhāve satyatha bhāvena vinaiva parikalpyate ||
so 'pi syādaparo doṣaḥ pramāṇārthaviparyayāt |
aṅgīkṛtyāpi tau doṣau pūrvaṃ kenāpi hetunā ||
prayogāntarakāle tu punardoṣadvayaṃ bhavet |
yadabhāvapramāṇatvaṃ pūrvametasya kalpitam ||
saṃpratyapaha‌nuvānasya doṣa eko hi jāyate |
pratyakṣaṃ dṛḍharūpaṃ ca yatpurastānnirākṛtam ||
eṣa jāyeta doṣo 'nyastadujjīvayataḥ punaḥ |
evamekatra catvāro doṣā vākye pradarśitāḥ ||
eta eva prasajyerandvitīye 'pi prakalpite |
evameṣo 'ṣṭadoṣo 'pi yadvīhiyavavākyayoḥ ||
vikalpa āśritastatra gatiranyā na vidyate |
vrīhiśāstrapravṛttau hi yavaśāstreṇa kṛṣyate ||
śrotā tatra pravṛtto 'pi vrīhiśāstreṇa kṛṣyate |
dvābhyāmaśvamukhīvacca śrutibhyāmabhitaḥ samam ||
śroturākṛṣyamāṇasya balābalamapaśyataḥ |
ekasminnupasaṃhartuṃ buddhiṃ yuktyā na paśyataḥ ||
ubhayorapramāṇatvaṃ pratighātātprasajyate |
tatra prāmāṇyayogyasya yadaprāmāṇyakalpanam ||
tadananyagatitvena tathā 'pyabhyupagamyate |
sati gatyantare tvetannaiva kalpanamarhati ||
ekasya vā pramāṇatvaṃ parihartuṃ na śakyate |
tadaprāmāṇyamātre tu na dvayorapramāṇatā ||
siddho lokapravādo 'yamekānekāvināśinām |
sarvanāśe samutpanne hyardhaṃ tyajati paṇḍitaḥ ||
sa cāyamubhayornāśa ubhayārthāparigrahāt |
miśrairvā yajamānasya miśrāṇāṃ vidhyadarśanāt ||
niyamārthe hyubhe śāstre yavavrīhyorvidhātṛṇī |
prāpte cānyanivṛttyaṃśaḥ phalamarthātpratīyate ||
vrīhayo nirapekṣā hi jñāyante yāgasādhanam |
yavāścaivamatasteṣāṃ miśratvaṃ nāvakalpate ||
naiva vrīhibhiriṣṭaṃ syādyavairna ca yathāśrutaiḥ |
miśrairijyeta cettatra bhavedubhayabādhanam ||
evamapratipattyaiva tulyaiṣā miśratāmatiḥ |
tenobhayāpramāṇatvādyuktaikaikāpramāṇatā ||
seyamatyantamanyāyyā dvayorapyanavasthitiḥ |
avyavasthā na yuktā hi vyavasthā yatra labhyate ||
sarvatraiva hyekarūpatvāvadhāraṇena nirūpitarūpaṃ vyavahartuṃ śakyam ||
tena yasya pramāṇatvaṃ pramāṇaṃ sarvadā 'stu tat |
yasyāpi tvapramāṇatvamapramāṇaṃ taducyatām ||
tadeva tu kadācitpramāṇaṃ kadācidapramāṇamiti na kathaṃ cidapi viśrambhaḥ syātta- detaddrīhiyavaśrutyoratyantāparihāryatvādavaśyamāpatitam |
na hi tatraikarūpatve ciha‌naṃ kiṃcivdyavasthitam |
yenaikatra pramāṇatvaṃ syādanyatrāpramāṇatā ||
śrutismṛtyoḥ punaḥ spaṣṭaṃ vyavasthākāraṇadvayam |
yena śruteḥ pramāṇatvaṃ syātsmṛteścāpramāṇatā ||
svarūpeṇa tayostāvatpramāṇatvāpramāṇate |
tato 'nyāpekṣayā syātāmaprāmāṇyapramāṇate ||
yo yasya svarūpāśrayo dharmaḥ prāptaḥ sa balavatā kāraṇāntareṇa viparyayaṃ pratipadyate |
na ca śrutijanitapratyayasya smṛtijanito bādhakatvaṃ pratipadyate |
smārtasya bādhakaḥ śrauto balavattvātpratīyate |
pratyakṣe cānumāne ca prāgetaddhayavadhāritam ||
śrutiliṅge yathā ceṣṭe vyavasthitabalābale |
saṃnikṛṣṭavikṛṣṭārthe tathaiveha śrutismṛtī ||
smṛtyā pratīyate yāvacchrutyā tāvatpramīyate |
viruddhadharmatāmeko na ca dharmaḥ pratīcchati ||
na ca śīghrahṛte 'rthe 'sti cirādāgacchato gatiḥ |
aśvairapahṛtaṃ ko hi gardabhaiḥ prāptumarhati |
smṛtyā cārthaṃ parāmṛśya yāvattadviṣayāṃ śrutim |
anumātuṃ pravarteta tāvatso 'rtho 'nyato gataḥ ||
kiṃ kartavyamitīdaṃ ca kartā yāvadapekṣate |
pramāṇaṃ kramate tāvatpramite tanna jāyate ||
yugapatpramimīyātāṃ yadi cārthaṃ śrutismṛtī
agṛhītaviśeṣatvātsyātāṃ tulyabale tataḥ ||
yadvā yāvacchruterarthaḥ sākṣādeva pratīyate |
tasminneva kṣaṇe mūlaṃ kalpayetsvaṃ smṛtiḥ śrutim ||
tato 'rthaviprakarṣe 'pi pramāṇatvena tulyatā |
bhavedeva śrutismṛtyorarthaḥ śrutiparigrahāt ||
yataḥ smṛtyā gṛhīte 'pi cireṇa śrutikalpanā |
jāyate klṛptayā tasmātsā bādhyetāpratiṣṭhitā |
smṛtimūlānapekṣā hi smṛtitvādeva hīyate |
tadapekṣā punaḥ śrutyā bādhyate mūlavarjitā ||
eṣa tāvadvikalpapadamanārụ̄dhāyā eva smṛtereko bādhaprakāraḥ |
dvitīyena prakāreṇa vikalpapadavīṃ gatā |
āpannā pākṣikaṃ bādhamatyantaṃ bādhyate smṛtiḥ ||
taddarśayati | vikalpaṃ tu vadanpakṣe tāvacchrutiprāmāṇyamabhyupaitīti | tadā ca smṛtyaprā- māṇyamavaśyaṃbhāvi tasyāścāprāmāṇyakalpanāyāṃ na śruteriva tadadhyāropaḥ |
kiṃ tu tasyāḥ pramāṇatvaṃ śrutimūlatvakāritam |
yatastasmādatanmūlā tadānīṃ sā 'vadhāryate ||
śrutimūlatvavicchedottarakālaṃ ca prāṅa‌ni/?/rākṛtamūlāntaropaplavādavigānasmṛtapuruṣapraṇīta-
tvanirṇayācca nityatvadvāranirmūlatvāsaṃbhavādavaśyaṃbhāvi vipralambhābhiprāyādi kiṃcidekaṃ mūlamāpadyate |
śrutiṃ muktvā ca yanmūlaṃ smṛteranyatprakalpyate |
tenaivāsyāḥ pramāṇatvamatyantaṃ pratihanyate ||
vrīhiśrutiparigrahakāle hi yavaśruterabhūtamevāprāmāṇyamadhyāropitam | tatprayogāntarave- lāyāṃ tulyasāṃpradāyikāmnāyamānatvena saṃnikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭārthatvādiviśeṣābhāvena ca punaḥ sahajena prāmāṇyenābhibhūyate |
na tu smṛteḥ pramāṇatvaṃ punarujjīvituṃ kṣamam |
vicchinnaśrutimūlatvādgrastaṃ bhrāntyādihetubhiḥ ||
na hyekasyā eva smṛteḥ pratyakṣaśrutyarthāparigrahakāle 'numitaśrutimūlatvaṃ tatparigrahāśra- yaṇe tu bhrāntyādimūlatvamiti viruddhāvadhāraṇā 'vakalpate | āha | satyaṃ yadi prathamameva vikalpakārī śrutyarthaṃ parigṛhya dvitīyādiprayoge smṛtyarthaparigrahaṇāyopatiṣṭheta |
tatastvaduktamārgeṇa pratihanyeta sarvadā |
na tvetasya prasaṅgo 'sti smṛteḥ pūrvaparigrahe ||
yo hi śrutiṃ prathamamaśrutvā śrutimevaikāṃ paśyati tasyāpratihataśrutyanumāne vṛtte |
na paścācchrūyamāṇā 'pi śrutiḥ syātpratibandhikā |
gardabhenāpanītaṃ hi harennāśvaścirādgataḥ ||
na caiṣa niyamo 'sti jijñāsubhiḥ smṛtiviruddhā śrutireva prathamaṃ śrotavyeti |
bahujijñāsamānānāṃ kadācitkiṃcidāpatet |
pūrvapaścādvibhāgena na taddhetubalābalam ||
ādye prapāṭhake yena vrīhiśāstraṃ pratīyate |
dvitīye yavaśāstraṃ ca na tattatprati durbalam ||
svaśākhāvihitaiścāpi śākhāntaragatānvidhīn |
kalpakārā nibadhnanti sarva eva vikalpitān ||
sarvaśākhopasaṃhāro jaimineścāpi saṃmataḥ |
na tu pūrvāvabaddho 'rtho bādhetaivottaraṃ vidhim ||
tasmātpaurvāparyaśravaṇamanāśritya ‘na caikaṃ prati śiṣyata’ ityanena nyāyena sarvapuruṣānprati nityāvasthitasamastapaṭhyamānasmaryamāṇavedaśākhāyattajñānairjijñāsubhirātmīyaśaktimātrakāri- tapūrvāparagrahaṇavibhāgairekavākyagatapūrvo taravarṇapadavadbalābalapanapekṣya mātāpitṛpraṇītopadeśa- vannirvicikitsameva prāmāṇyamabhyupagantavyam | anyathā hi—
pūrvaprāptau pramāṇatvaṃ paratvenāpramāṇatām |
prasajyamānikāmevaṃ ko 'dhyavasyetsacetanaḥ ||
itthaṃ ca bhrāntimūlatvaprasaṅge kalpite smṛteḥ |
avirodhe 'pi hi śrutyā prāmāṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ bhavet ||
sarvaiva śrutimūlā 'taḥ sarvā vā bhrāntimūlikā |
smṛtirevaṃ nirūpyeta na tu syānmūlasaṃkaraḥ ||
ucyate | yadyapi pūrvapalabdhayā smṛtyā śrutimanupalabhamānasya pratibandharahitaśrutya- numānaṃ kriyeta tathā 'pi kālāntare śrutiṃ śrutvā tatpratipakṣasmṛterbādhādhyavasānādavaśyaṃbhā- viśrutimūlatvavicchedavaśena mūlāntarasaṃcaraṇam |
tataśca pūrvavijñānaṃ mithyaitaditi cintayan |
ādāvevāpramāṇatvaṃ smṛterityadhyavasyati ||
yo hi kūṭakārṣāpaṇena kaṃcitkālamajño lokamadhye vyavaharati na tena vivekajñānaja- nitavyutpattinā 'pi tathaiva vyavahartavyam | na cāsya tadānītanajñānamātrabādhabuddhirbhavati |
samānaviṣayatvāddhi pūrveṣāmapi bādhanam |
na hi teṣāmamithyātve mithyedānīṃtanaṃ bhavet ||
nanu ca prāgavasthāyāṃ śrutiryaivānumīyate |
saivedānīṃ viruddheti gamyate na punaḥ smṛtiḥ ||
naitadevam | pratiprayogaṃ pramāṇaparyālocanāt | yadi hyekaprayogamātrālocanenaiva prayo- gāntarāṇyapyanutiṣṭheyustato yena vrīhiśāstramapramāṇīkṛtya yavāḥ parigṛhyeransa yāvajjīvaṃ taireva yajeteti naiva pratipuruṣamubhābhyāṃ vikalpyamānābhyāṃ vyavahāraḥ sidhyet | tena yāvatprayogabhāvipramāṇālocanavaśātpūrvānumitāṃ śrutiṃ kvacidapyaśṛṇvanpunarapi smṛtimevo- palabhya kartṛsāmānyaliṅgenaiva śrutimanumimānaḥ pratyakṣayā śrutyā ' 'kṣiptacittatayā tatprā- māṇyenānyathānupapadyamānena smṛtyaprāmāṇyaṃ kalpayanpūrvāvadhāritamūlavyatyayameva pratipadyate na pūrvaklṛptamūlasyāprāmāṇyādhyāropam | apaṭhayamānatayaivāsya sulabhāvajñānatvāt |
yaccaitadanavasthānaṃ tvayā māṃ prati codyate |
bhavato 'pi tadastyeva tenācodyatvamekataḥ ||
yadā hyādau śrutiṃ śrutvā smṛternnānyā 'numīyate |
tadā 'nyamūlatāpatterekāntenaiva bādhyate ||
kālāntare 'pi yo bādhaḥ sphuṭatvenāvadhāryate |
yattenāpyapramāṇatvaṃ kṛtaṃ tanna nivartyate ||
pūrvasmṛtigrāhiṇāṃ ca svayaṃ bādhamacetayamānānāmapi puruṣāntarasya śrutiśravaṇaprāthamya- balena bādhasaṃtānau 'nuvartata eva |
puruṣāntarabādho 'pi naivālpaṃ bhrāntikāraṇam |
na hi dvicandradiṅ‌mohau na bādhyete narāntaraiḥ ||
nanu yavaśruterapi tarhi pramāṇatvena parigṛhyamāṇāyāḥ puruṣāntarabādhastadānīmastīti mithyātvaprasaṅgaḥ |
ucyate paṭhyamānatvādunmajjananimajjane |
sarvānprati tayostulye viśeṣo 'nyo na gṛhyate ||
smṛtistu yāvatāṃ puṃsāṃ prathamaṃ gocarībhavet |
tāvatāṃ sarvadā 'bhāvānnāprāmāṇyenaṃ mucyate ||
apramāṇyapadaṃ caikamastyevaṃ prathamaṃ smṛteḥ |
tāvatā labdhamithyātvānna śrutiṃ bādhituṃ kṣamā ||
adhyāropyeta mithyātvamujjvalāyāḥ śruteḥ punaḥ |
labdhameva smṛtau taccetkimarthaṃ kalpyate śruteḥ ||
viruddhayorhi śrutismṛtyorvikalpaprasaṅgenāvaśyaṃ kalpanīye 'nyataratrāpramāṇatve yāvacchrutau paṭācchādananyāyena kalpayitumārabhyate tāvatsmṛtau svarūpāśrayaṃ klṛptamevopalabhya saṃśaya- cchede jāte na kadācidapyabhūtāprāmāṇyādhyāropakalpanopapattiḥ |
nanu śrutyaviruddhāyāḥ śrutimūlatvaniścayaḥ |
anumānādapi prāpsyan kenacitpratibadhyate ||
tasmātkāraṇavaiṣamyānnobhayatraikarūpatā
sidhyenmūlavyavasthā hi pratipakṣānusāriṇī ||
tataścārdhavaiśasaprasaṅganivṛttiḥ |
yathā |
pramāṇatvāpramāṇatve liṅgādīnāṃ vyavasthite |
pūrvaiḥ saha viruddhatvāviruddhatvanibandhane ||
tathehāpi vyavastheṣṭā na parasparasaṃkaraḥ |
pratibandhābhyanujñābhyāṃ śrutyā nāstyekarūpatā ||
yadyapyaudumbarīsarvaveṣṭanaṃ dharmaśāstrādhyetṛsmṛtivilakṣaṇapratyakṣaśrutyarthopasaṃhāraparasūtra- kāsepanibaddhaṃ tathā 'pyupariṣṭādvakṣyamāṇālāntaratvābhiprāyeṇa puruṣopadiṣṭatvāviśeṣācca
smṛtivadevodāhṛtam | krītarājakabhojyānnatvavacanaṃ yadyapyatharvavede 'sti tathā 'pi tasyā ' '- havanīyasaṃbaddhayajñakarmopakārābhāvāttadadhikṛtatrayīpratipāditāgnīṣomīyasaṃsthāvadhibhojanaprati- ṣedhavirodhāt “prakaraṇaviśeṣādvikṛtau virodhi syāt” ityanena nyāyenādhikṛtānadhikṛta- balābalaviśeṣābhiprāyeṇa smṛtipakṣaniḥkṣepādbhāpyakāreṇodāhniyate | kṛṣṇakeśatvaṃ ca yadyapya- navasthitavayovasthākālaviśeṣaṃ jātaputratvapakṣe saṃdigdhasamāveśaṃ ca tathā 'pi yuvaiva dharmama- nvicchedityevamādismaraṇaprakāśitārthaṃ yauvanāvasthāparigrahādantato vā vayordhānatikramā- śrayaṇādaṣṭācatvāriṃśadvarṣabrahmacaryaprāgupanayanasaṃbaddhakālasya ca vayasaḥ sātirekadvipañcāśa- ccatuṣpañcāśanmātrasaṃvatsaraparimitatvenāparihāryavayordhātikramāvaśyaṃbhāvitvādvyakta eva virodho dṛśyate | nanu ca pūrvakṛtasarvaveṣṭanottarakālavihitaveṣṭitāyā eva sparśanaṃ saṃbha- vatītyavirodhaḥ | kathamavirodho yadā sparśanaṃ nāma tvagindriyadvāraṃ spṛśyasaṃvedanam | na ca vastrāntaritāyā audumbaryāḥ sparśo gṛhyate | na ca vastre spṛśyamāna audumbarī spṛṣṭā bhavati | vastraudumbarījātivyaktisparśānāmatyantabhedāt |
atha saṃbandhisaṃsparśātspṛṣṭaivetyabhidhīyate |
bhūmisparśena tatsiddhervṛthā sparśavidhirbhavet ||
nanu bhūmāvaudumbarībuddhayabhāvādva/?/strāntaritāyāṃ ca tadrabuddhayavyatirekād‌dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyam | tathā hi |
vastrāntaritacaṇḍālasparśe 'pyāpatite kvacit |
sākṣātspṛṣṭavadeveṣṭā sacelasnānaśuddhatā ||
satyaṃ tatreṣyate snānaṃ tadvastrasparśakāritam |
aśuddhakāraṇaṃ taddhi caṇḍālasparśavanmatam ||
tathā ca tadviyukte 'pi vastre tatsparśadūṣite |
spṛśyamāne bhavatyeva doṣaḥ saṃyuktavastravaṃt ||
kathaṃ punarayaṃ dharmaśāstreṣvanupanibaddho 'pi caṇḍālaspṛṣṭavastrasparśananimitto doṣo 'dhya- vasīyate |
kathaṃ vā neṣyate doṣaḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭatṛṇādiṣu |
tatspṛṣṭaspṛśyamāneṣu na kramante 'tra yuktayaḥ ||
taducyate—
yathā kāṣṭhatṛṇādīnāṃ mārutādeva śuddhatā |
smaryate vāsaso naivaṃ toyaprakṣālanādvinā ||
nanvameṃdhyena liptasya sā śuddhirabhidhīyate |
na liptagrahaṇaṃ tatra pāṭhe 'sti tu ciraṃtane ||
amedhyasyaivaṃ yasmātpaṭhanti | caṇḍālaspṛṣṭavāsasaścāstyevāmedhyatā | tasmādasti sali- lādiśuddhiḥ | nanu ca manuṣyasyaiva caṇḍālasparśanimittaprāyaścittavidhānādaśuddhirūpamame- dhyatvaṃ gamyate na dravyāntarasya gavāśvādeḥ | tataśca vastraṃ kiṃ gavāśvādivadaduṣṭamuta puru- ṣavad‌duṣṭamiti saṃdehe gavāśvāditulyamevāvadhārayituṃ yuktam |
ucyate—
puruṣasya sacelasya snānaṃ yasmādvidhīyate |
tasmātpuruṣavadvastraṃ na gavāśvādivanmatam ||
yadā 'pi hi śuddhenaiva hastādinā caṇḍālaḥ spṛśyate gavādīnāṃ tu caṇḍālādispṛ- ṣṭānāṃ snānaprakṣālanavidhyabhāvācchuddhirvijñāyata iti na tanmadhyapātitvam | ataśca nānena prakāreṇaudumbarīsaṃbaddhavastrasparśanāttatsparśanajñānopapattiḥ | yadā tu tayaivodgātā spṛṣṭa udgāye/?/diti vidhistadā 'vaśyamevaudumvarītvacodgātuśarīraṃ prāptavyam | apāśrayaṇābhyupaga- mapakṣo 'pi ca spṛṣṭatvāparityāgenaiva sthita iti na samastācchāditāyāmavakalpate | parā- śritamapi ca vastramudgāturāśrayatvaṃ pratipadyate | tenaivaudumbaryāśritenodnāyet | tasmādasti sarvaveṣṭanasparśanayorvirodha iti yuktaṃ bādhyabādhakavyavasthāpanam | atha kimarthaṃ nemau vidhī vikalpyete iti | smṛteravidhāyakatvātsvayamatulyabalatvācca tadanumitaśākhāntara- paṭhitavidhiparigrahābhiprāyeṇoktam | nāsati vyāmohavijñāna iti |
pūrvoktenaiva mārgeṇa vyāmohaikāntakalpanām |
vikalpe 'vaśyamāpannāṃ smṛtāveva niyacchati ||
vyāmohavijñānaṃ ca jñānāntaragatavyāmohatvāvadhāraṇaṃ tadvijñānagatavyāmoharūpaṃ vā vivakṣyate | tena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ karmadhārayo vā yojyaḥ | vikalpaṃ tu vadanniti | kadā citsmṛtimūlaśrutivicchedādbhrāntyādimūlatvamāpādayati | tādṛśyā ca sakṛdapi śrautaṃ vijñānamanujñātamadhyāropyamāṇavyāmohāviṣayatvānna kadācitprāmāṇyaṃ tyajatītyapākṣika- tvābhidhānam | evaṃ kevalāpramāṇatvapakṣagrahastasya punarjīvanāsaṃbhavādapākṣikaṃ ca sarvaveṣṭana-
smaraṇamityāha—pākṣikaṃ ceti vā | vikalpavādisaṃmatapākṣikatvavaśādeva śrutiprāmā- ṇyapakṣe smārtaśrutikalpanāyāmakṛtāyāṃ mūlāntarasaṃkrānteḥ sarvakālāpramāṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ | eka- dā 'pi ca labdhaprāmāṇyāvakāśā śrutidurbalapratipakṣatayā na kadācidapi vyāmohī bhavi- ṣyatīti samarthayamāno yadeva hi tasyaikasminpakṣe mūlamityāha |
nahi pramādapāṭhatvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayituṃ śruteḥ |
duḥśrutasvapnavijñānamūlā tvāpadyate smṛtiḥ ||
tena naitatpakṣe vijñānamiti—pramāṇavijñānamabhipretyoktam | vyāmohātpakṣāntaraṃ- miti | vyāmohakalpanātaḥ pramāṇābhāvapakṣāntarasaṃkramaṇaṃ pratiṣedhati | yadvā smārtajñāna- meva pūrvāvadhāritavyāmohātprāmāṇyapakṣāntaraṃ na saṃkrāntamiti | duḥśrutasvapnādimūlatvena śrutivirodhaṃ darśayati—tulyakāraṇatvāditi | balīyaḥ pratipakṣanirākṛtatvātsarvadaiva śrutya- numānapratibandhānna smṛteḥ prāmāṇyapakṣasaṃkrāntiḥ | api cetaretarāśraye 'nyataḥ pari- cchedāditi | upariṣṭāditaretaravirodhavivaraṇādvirodhamevetaretarāśrayamāha—
parasparaviruddhe hi viruddhāvyabhicārivat |
pramāṇe yatra dṛśyete tatrānyenaiva nirṇayaḥ ||
pramāṇaśabdasya jñānasamānādhikaraṇatvena bhāvotpannalyuḍantatvena vā napuṃsakaliṅgatvā- dvedāḥ pramāṇaṃ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇamitivatpramāṇe smṛtau sparśanaṃ vyāmoha iti bhavitavyam |
karaṇaviśeṣavivakṣāyāṃ vā 'bhidheyaliṅgavacanānuvṛttau lyuḍantāṭṭịdḥdhāṇañiti ṅīpi prāpte prāmā- ṇyaṃ smṛtāviti prayoktavyam | tamimamubhayabhraṣṭaṃ bhāṣyakāraprayogaṃ samarthayamānairevamanugamaḥ kartavyaḥ |
pramāṇamayate yāti mūlabhūtāṃ śrutiṃ yataḥ |
kvibantādayatestasmātpramāṇā smṛtirucyate ||
tatra yadyapi nityatvākviblopaḥ prathamaṃ bhavet |
yalopo 'pi bhavedeva valādipratyayāśrayaḥ ||
na ca varṇāśrayatvena yalopo na bhaviṣyati |
vyorvalīti yalopo hi valādipratyayāśrayaḥ ||
yadvā yogavibhāgena vervyavasya ca lupyate |
vakāraśca yakāraścetyevaṃ lopo bhaviṣyati ||
yalope ca kṛte 'kāro yaḥ śuddhaḥ pariśiṣyate |
tadantāvadhikātpaścādataṣṭāpkriyate striyām ||
akaḥ savarṇadīrghatvaṃ parayorantaraṅgataḥ |
sarveṇāpi tataḥ kṛtvā pramāṇetyanugamyate ||
tadetaditarāśrayaṃ bhavatītyuktam |
yadvā śrutyapramāṇatvātsmṛteḥ prāmāṇyamiṣyate |
siddhācca tatpramāṇatvācchrutyaprāmāṇyakalpanā ||
tathā śrutipramāṇatvātsmṛtyaprāmāṇyakalpanam |
tadaprāmāṇyasiddhayā ca śrutiprāmāṇyaniścayaḥ ||
tadidaṃ vikalpavādina ubhayatretaretarāśrayatvamekāntavādinastvanyataratra |
tatrānyataḥ paricchedādvācyaṃ hetvantaraṃ sphuṭam |
bhāṣyakārastvihoktvaivaṃ tayorekaikamuktavān ||
tatra sparśanasya kṛptaṃ mūlaṃ kalpyaṃ smṛteriti |
naivātyantāprakṛtahetvantarābhiprāyeṇānyataḥ paricchedo 'bhihitaḥ | prakṛtayorapi ca ya- tkṛtamitaretarāśrayatvaṃ tavdyatiriktadharmadarśanānniścīyamāne bhavatyevānyataḥ paricchedaḥ |
svataḥ sthitātpramāṇatvācchruteḥ syāt klṛptamūlatā |
smṛteḥ śrutyanumāpakaprāmāṇyātkalpyamūlatā tataśca pratyakṣaśrutyaprāmāṇyakalpanāyattaṃ
smṛteḥ prāmāṇyaṃ tadbalena ca śrutyaprāmāṇyaṃ kalpayata itaretarāśrayatvamaparihāryam |
na cādhyāropyamāṇā 'pi śruteḥ syādapramāṇatā |
na ca tasyāmasiddhāyāṃ smṛtiprāmāṇyasaṃbhavaḥ ||
balavantaṃ parājitya yaḥ pratiṣṭhātumicchati |
hastinā pādayodhīva saṃtiṣṭhetācirādasau ||
evaṃ tāvatsmṛtiprāmāṇyaṃ kalpayanneva tadvādī parājīyate | yadā tu śrutiprāmāṇyagata- mitaretarāśrayatvamālocyate tadā tatrāpi pratipakṣabhūtasmṛtyaprāmāṇyāpekṣayā nirapavādaprāmā- ṇyāvadhāraṇasiddheḥ parādhīnatvātpūrvasiddhasmṛtyaprāmāṇyalipsāyām
siddhamevāpramāṇatvaṃ svarūpāśrayamāditaḥ |
kṣaṇamātramapi prāpya śrutiḥ prāmāṇyamaśnute ||
tena yattadādye padake 'nanubhi/?/tāvasthāyāṃ śrutāvāpātakṣaṇamātre smṛteraprāmāṇyaṃ dṛśyate tāvataiva labdhapramāṇatvā śrutiḥ sarvadā nirapavādaprā/?/māṇyā bhavatītyanyataḥ paricchedaḥ |
tenaikatra śruterādyātprāmāṇyādavasīyate |
smṛtyaprāmāṇyato 'nyatra kṣaṇamātrāvadhāritāt ||
kṛtvaikamavadhiṃ tasmātsiddhamādye kṣaṇe dṛḍham |
ānupūrvyā vrajettāvadyāvatsiddho 'paraḥ sphuṭaḥ ||
tadekena mārgeṇa darśayati—kalpyamūlatvātsmṛtiprāmāṇyamanavaklṛptamityādi yāva- tsmārtaśrutikalpanamanupapannaṃ pramāṇābhāvāditi |
dvitīyamārge 'pi śrutiprāmāṇyadarśanādāramya/?/ tāvannetavyaṃ yāvattadeva nirapavādaṃ siddha- miti | vrīhiyavabṛhadrathaṃtaravidhīnāṃ tvananyagatikatvātkakṣāntaritapadakā iva sthānabhe- dābhāvāttulyabalatayā 'navasthitavikalpāśrayaṇaṃ prāgupadiṣṭameva yojyam | ato nāpekṣyaṃ pratya- kṣaśrutiviru/?/ddhasmṛtiprāmāṇyamiti || 3 ||
itaśca na pramāṇatvaṃ mūlahetvantarekṣaṇāt |
vyabhicāre hi notpattirarthāpattyanumānayoḥ ||
śrutivirodhabhagnaprasarāyāṃ hi smṛtau pūrvoktena nyāyena śrutyanumānapratibandhādākāṅkṣi- tamūlāntarāvaśyakalpayitavyatvācca |
kvacidbhrāntiḥ kvacillobhaḥ kvacidyuktivikalpanam |
pratibhākāraṇatvena nirākartuṃ na śakyate ||
smṛteśca śrutibhagnāyāḥ kāraṇāntarasaṃbhavaḥ |
na tu śruterataḥ saiva tadvirodhe hi bādhyate ||
yathaiva vedamūlatvamanekāntānna labhyate |
tathā 'nyamūlatā 'pīti tadāśaṅkyedamucyate ||
upapannataraṃ caitadvedavākyānumānataḥ |
dṛṣṭe hi satyadṛṣṭasya kalpanā niṣpramāṇikā ||
( śrutiviruddhasmṛtīnāmaprāmāṇyādhikaraṇam | )
adhikaraṇāntaraṃ veti |
sarvavyākhyāvikalpānāṃ dvayameva prayojanam |
pūrvatrāparitoṣo vā viṣayatryā/?/ptireva vā ||
aparitoṣastāvatprathamenaiva śrutiviruddhatvahetunā balavatā siddhe bādhe nānvācayahetura- tīva prayojanavān | adhikaraṇāntare punaḥ pūrvoktahetunirapekṣaḥ paryāpta evaikaḥ smṛtibādha- nāyeti svatantratvena pradarśanam | virodhena ca na vyāptāyāḥ smṛterapramāṇatadvayāptau nāpavā- dāntarodbhavaḥ | vaisarjanahomīyaṃ vāso 'dhvaryurgṛh‌ṇāti ityagnīṣomapraṇayanārthaṃ visarjanahomakā- lasaṃbandhiyajamānācchādanaṃ vāso 'dhyavayurharati muktakamevaitadāvaraṇānumitaṃ smaraṇam | evaṃ yupahastino dānamācarantīti yūpaparivyāṇaśāṭakaṃ yūpahāstiśabdena nirdiśyādhvaryuha. rtavyatayā ' 'cārānumitayaiva smṛtyā pratipādayanti |
tatrāpi vedamūlatvakalpanā nopapadyate |
kartṛsāmānyataḥ prāptā lobhasaṃbhavapūrvakāt ||
ṛtvijo hi prayogamadhyapatitaṃ yajamānaṃ prakrāntakarmāvaśyasamāpanīyatvanibaddhasamā- ptyuttarakālabhāvi svācchandyaṃ ca viditvā kāryavattāvelāyāmeva khalagataprādhānya1vibhāga- vyāvṛttabhṛtakavatsvayamutpādyotpādya tāni tānyādeyakāni śraddhājanakārthavādapuraḥsaraṃ yācante | pratyakṣaśrutivihitadeyāntaranidarśanavyāmohitaśca yajamānaḥ śraddadhānatayā tathaiva pratipadya tebhyaḥ prayacchatīti taireṣā smṛtiḥ pravartitā syādityāśaṅkāyāṃ vedamūlatvaṃ nānumīyate | pūrvavacca lobhapūrvakatvakalpanabhevopapannamiti nirṇayātsaṃdehanivṛttiḥ | idaṃ ca bhāṣyakāreṇa pradarśayatā tulyakāraṇatvātpūrvatrāpi pradarśitameveti yojayitavyam |
( bhāṣyakārīyādhikaraṇākṣepaḥ | )
etāvattvihādhikaraṇadvaye 'pi vaktavyam |
smṛtīnāṃ śrutimūlatve dṛ̣dhe pūrvaṃ nirūpite |
virodhe satyapi jñātuṃ śakyaṃ mūlāntaraṃ katham ||
śākhāntaraviprakīrṇāni hi puruṣāntarapratyakṣāṇyeva vedavākyāni puruṣadharmānuṣṭhānakrame- ṇāpaṭhitāni vedasamāmnāyavināśabhayātsvarūpeṇānupanyasyārthopanibandhanadvāralabhyāni viśiṣṭa- dhvanisthānīyena tenaiva parokṣāṇyapi vyajyamānāni piṇḍīkṛtya smaryante | tatra yathaivā ' '- ptapratyayādidamiha paṭhyata iti kathitamuccāritamanuccāritaṃ vā śiṣyāḥ pratipadyante tathaiva sūtrakāravacanānyadhyāpakavacanasthānīyāni svānurūpavedavākyasamarpaṇamātraṃ kṛtvā nivṛttavyāpārāṇīti na tālvādidhvanipreraṇavatpauruṣeyatvena paribhavitavyāni |
vedo hīdṛśa evāyaṃ ṣuruṣairyaḥ prakāśyate |
sa paṭhadbhiḥ prakāśyeta smaradbhirveti tulyabhāk ||
anuccāraṇakāle ca saṃskāraireva kevalaiḥ |
tatkṛtasmaraṇairvā 'yaṃ vedo 'dhyetṛṣu tiṣṭhati ||
tenārthaṃ kathayadbhiryā smṛtārthā kathyate śrutiḥ |
paṭhitābhiḥ samānā 'sau kena nyāyena bādhyate ||
smṛtiśāstraṃ ca yadyekaṃ bhavetkṛtsnamavaidikam |
tanmuktvaikaṃ tato 'nyāni vyavahārāṅgatāmiyuḥ ||
1khalagatadhānyavibhāgavyāpṛtabhṛtakavāditi pāṭho bhavituṃ yukta iti bhāti |
kaṭhamaitrāyaṇīyādipaṭhitaśrutimūlikāḥ |
dṛśyante smṛtayaḥ sarvā bhadropanayanādiṣu ||
tadā tanmadhyapātyekaṃ vākyaṃ kiṃcidapasmṛtiḥ |
mūlāntarodbhavaṃ vaktuṃ jihvā no na pravarttate ||
bādhitā ca smṛtirbhūtvā kācinnyāyavidā yadā |
śrūyate na cirādeva śākhāntaragatā śrutiḥ ||
tadā kā te mukhacchāyā syānnaiyāyikamāninaḥ |
bādhābādhānavasthānaṃ dhruvamevaṃ prasajyate ||
yaccaitatsarvaveṣṭanasmaraṇaṃ sparśanaśrutiviruddhatvenodāhriyate | etajjaimininaiva cchāndo- gyānuvāde śāṭyāyanibrāhmaṇagataśrutimūlatvenaudumbarīprakaraṇe ca śāṭyāyanināṃ tāmūrdhvadaśe- nobhayatra vāsasī darśayatīti ‘vaiṣṭutaṃ vai vāsaḥ śrīrvai vāsaḥ śrīḥ sāme’ iti darśite tatprasaṅgenaudumbarīveṣṭanavāsaso 'pi prakāśaśrutimūlatvamevānvākhyātam |
tataśca śrutimūlatvādbādhyodāharaṇaṃ na tat |
vikalpa eva hi nyāyyastulyakakṣapramāṇataḥ ||
viruddhatve ca bādhaḥ syānna cehāsti viruddhatā |
na hi veṣṭanamātraṃ naḥ sparśaśrutyā virudhyate ||
yadi dvitrāṅgulaṃ madhye vimucyottarabhāgataḥ |
veṣṭyetaudumbarī tatra kiṃ nāma na kṛtaṃ bhavet ||
sarvā veṣṭayitavyeti na hyevaṃ sūtrakṛdvacaḥ |
na hyasyāḥ kriyate kaiścitkarṇamūleṣu veṣṭanam ||
pariśabdo 'pi yastatra sarvato veṣṭanaṃ vadet |
tadvarjitasamantatve so 'rthavāneva jāyate ||
lobhamūlaṃ ca yattasyāḥ kalpyate sarvaveṣṭanam |
tallobhaḥ sutarāṃ sidhyenmūlāgraparidhānayoḥ ||
antarīyottarīye hi yoṣitāmiva vāsasī |
smaretkauśeyajātīye nodnātaikaṃ guṇairvinā ||
prāk ca lobhādiha sparśaḥ kuśairevāntarīyate |
veṣṭitaiṣā kuśaiḥ pūrvaṃ vāsasā pariveṣṭyate ||
kuśaveṣṭanavākye ca na kiṃciddhetudarśanam |
niyame 'pi ca tad‌dṛṣṭaṃ naivordhvadaśavāsasaḥ ||
krītarājakabhojyānnavākyaṃ cātharvavaidikam |
na ca tasyāpramāṇatve kiṃcidapyasti kāraṇam ||
yadi yajñopayogitvaṃ nehāstyātharvaṇaśruteḥ |
arthāntarapramāṇatvaṃ kenāsyāḥ pratihanyate ||
śāntipuṣṭyābhicārārthā hyekabrahmartvigāśritāḥ |
kriyāstayā prabhīyante 'trāpyevā ' 'tmīyagocarāḥ ||
na cāyamapi yajñāṅgavidhiḥ śāntyādiśāstravat |
ato 'syāpi pramāṇatvaṃ puruṣārthena vāryate ||
na hyetadyajamānasya nartvijāmupadiśyate |
sarvebhyaḥ puruṣebhyo hi bhojyānnatvamidaṃ śrutam ||
vākyāntarairniṣiddhaṃ yaddīkṣitānnasya bhojanam |
tasyaiva śrūyate paścādabhyanujñāvidhidvayam ||
agnīṣomīyasaṃsthāyāṃ krīte vā sati rājani |
so 'yaṃ kālavikalpaḥ syādāśaucacchedakālavat ||
nanu cāśaucakālo 'pi dharmapīḍādyapekṣayā |
ataḥ samavikalpatvaṃ naiva tasyāpi saṃmatam ||
yasya hyalpena kālena śuddhirbhojyānnatā 'pi vā |
sa kasmāttāvatā śuddho dīrghakālatvamāśrayet ||
ekarātre trirātre vā śuddhasya brāhmaṇasya ca |
aśuddhiranuvarteta daśarātraṃ kathaṃ punaḥ ||
pāpakṣayo hi śuddhatvaṃ dharmayogyatvameva vā |
prāgdaśāhātkathaṃ tasya sadasadbhāvakalpanā ||
evaṃ prāk paśusaṃsthānāddīkṣitānnaviśuddhatā |
asti nāstīti cetyevaṃ sahate nāvadhāraṇam ||
syādetadyena yaḥ kālaḥ purastātparigṛhyate |
tasyāsāveva hoṃmasya prāgūrdhvodayakālavat ||
yuktaṃ samavikalpatvamuditānuditatvayoḥ |
na kācidatra pūrvoktā sadasattvavirodhitā ||
na cānuditahomoktāvuditoktiranarthikā |
kleśakṣayavyayādīnāṃ nātireko 'tra kaścana ||
iha tvalpena kālena śuddheryā dīrghakālatā |
na vardhayedaghāhāni sā 'nenāpi nivāryate ||
kleśaprāyaṃ ca taṃ pakṣaṃ nā ' 'śrayetaiva kaścana |
tato 'naṅgīkṛte tasmin syāttadvākyamanarthakam ||
tenarte viṣayānyatvānna vikalpo 'vakalpate |
sa cokto dharmapīḍākhyastatra cāh‌nāmavardhanam ||
dantajātānujātānyakṛtacūḍeṣu ca kramāt |
citikriyā trya/?/haikāhāstatra cāhnāmavardhanam ||
tathā gautamenāpyuktam— rājñāṃ ca kāryāvighātārthaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca svādhyāyānirvṛ- ttyarthamiti |
atha vā 'ntaryadā ' 'śaucanimittaṃ kiṃcidāpatet |
tatra śeṣeṇa yā śuddhistaccheṣo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati ||
na vardhayedaghāhāni nimittādāgatānyapi |
pūrvasyaiva hi kālasya prasaṅgena tadaṅgatā ||
pravṛtto 'napavṛktaśca daśarātrādiko 'vadhiḥ |
antaḥ patitamāśaucaṃ sa vyāpnoti svasaṃkhyayā ||
vitatya daśa saṃkhyā hi tānyahāni vyavasthitā |
śaknotyeva paricchettumantarāśaucamāgatam ||
śuddhayaśuddhī hyadṛṣṭatvādvijñāyete yathāśruti |
nanvevaṃ bhojanasyāsti viṣayāvadhikāraṇam ||
tatra dīrghāvadhirvyarthaḥ syādalpāvadhyanujñayā |
tasmādihāpi vaiṣamyaheturvācyo 'vadhidvaye ||
atrāpyasaṃbhave tasya dīkṣite vā dadatyapi |
tanniyuktakadattānnaṃ bhojyaṃ somakraye kṛte ||
āpaddharmā yathaivānye mukhyāsaṃbhavahetukāḥ |
tathaiva prāṇapīḍāyāṃ krītarājakabhojanam ||
hantaivamapramāṇatvamuktamanyaprakārakam |
jagdhavānāpadi hyārto viśvāmitraḥ śvajāghanīm ||
ucyate—
ekaṃ vinā 'pyanujñānāt kriyate gatyasaṃbhavāt |
kriyate 'nujñayā tvanyadviśeṣaśca tayormahān ||
sāmānyenāmyanujñānādviśeṣaśca viśiṣyate |
viśeṣo 'tyantanirdoṣaḥ stokadoṣetarakriyā ||
tathā ca manunā 'pyuktamāpaddharmagataṃ prati |
tatratyapāpaśeṣāṇāmante śaucaṃ bhaviṣyati ||
karmaṇā yena keneha mṛdunā dāruṇena vā |
uddhareddīnamātmānaṃ samartho dharmamācaret || iti |
dharmaśca prathamaṃ tāvatprāyaścittātmako bhavet |
tatastena viśuddhasya phalārtho 'nyo bhaviṣyati ||
yattu krītarājakabhojyānnatvavacanaṃ tadgatyantarāsaṃbhave nirdoṣatvajñāpanārthameva jñāyate | tatrāpi tu |
prabhuḥ prathamakalpasya yo 'nukalpena vartate |
sa nā ' 'pnoti phalaṃ tasya paratreti vicāritam ||
iti ninditatvānna saṃbhavadbhojyāntareṇāpi lokayātrādivaśena bhoktavyam |
yadi vā kālavaiṣamyādasatsamavikalpayoḥ |
arthabhedavyavasthānādavirodho 'vadhāryate ||
dīkṣitānnamabhojyaṃ syādakrīte rājani dhruvam |
krīte tvabhojanaṃ nāma manaḥ karma niyamyate ||
yathaivāśrāddhabhojitvaṃ yathā vā 'māṃsabhakṣaṇam |
śreyase vihitaṃ dharmyaṃ na sarvatra niṣidhyate ||

punastallakṣito vede tenaivādhyayanādiṣu ||
tenāhorātrapaurvāparyavadanāditvādvedatadarthānāmitaretarāśrayatvāprasaṅgaḥ | smṛtirapyācāraṃ vedavacanaṃ vopalabhyābhyanujñānāyaiva pravṛttetyadoṣaḥ |
yattu hetvantaraṃ dṛṣṭavā vedamūlanivāraṇam |
pratyakṣavedamūle 'pi tad‌dṛṣṭestadakāraṇam ||
vede 'pi hi bahūnyeva dṛṣṭārthagandhaspṛṣṭāni vidhīyanta iti na tāvatā vedamūlatvābhāvaḥ |
yāni tu mlecchādisamānāni niyatāniyatakriyāntarāṇyarthasukhasādhanakṛṣisevāvāṇi jyādīni mṛṣṭānnapānamṛduśayanāsanaramaṇīyagṛhodyānālekhyagītanṛtyagandhapuṣpādikarmāṇi prasiddhāni teṣu naiva kasyaciddharmatvāśaṅkā 'stīti na tatsāmānyato dṛṣṭenetaranirākriyo- papattiḥ keṣāṃcidvā dharmatvābhyupagamānna sarveṣāmeva tatprasaṅgaḥ | kiṃ tu﻿—
devabrāhmaṇapūjādi yatteṣāmapi kiṃcana |
tatreṣṭameva dharmatvaṃ ciṣṭācāramataṃ hi tat ||
loke hi kaścidācāraḥ śiṣṭatvena viśiṣyate |
kaścittu prāṇisāmānyaprāptastairapi saṃgataḥ ||
tatra yaḥ kāryarūpeṇa śiṣṭānevānuvartate |
sa eva kevalo dharmo netaraḥ prāṇimātragaḥ ||
etena vaidikānantadharmadhīsaṃskṛtātmanām |
ātmatuṣṭeḥ pramāṇatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ dharmaśuddhaye ||
tathaiva bahukālābhyastavedatadarthajñānāhitasaṃskārāṇāṃ vedaniyatamārgānusāripratibhānāṃ nonmārgeṇa pratibhānaṃ saṃbhavatītyāśrityocyate | “ yadeva kiṃcanānūcāno 'bhyūhatyārṣaṃ tadbhavatīti ” | vaidikavāsanājanitatvādveda eva sa bhavati |
tathā hi﻿—
yathā rumāyāṃ lavaṇākareṣu merau yathā vojjvalarukmabhūmau |
yajjāyate tanmayameva tatsyāttathā bhavedvedavidātmatuṣṭiḥ ||
evaṃ ca vidvadvacanādvinirgataṃ prasiddharūpaṃ kavibhirnirūpitam |
satāṃ hi saṃdehapadeṣu vastuṣu pramāṇamantaḥkaraṇapravṛttayaḥ || iti |
bahudinābhyastadharmavyāptātmano hi na kathaṃciddharmakaraṇarūpātmatuṣṭiranyatra saṃbhavatīti dharmatvenābhyanujñāyate |
yadvā śiṣṭātmatuṣṭīnāṃ vacanādeva dharmatā |
puṇyakṛddhayānavattasmādācāreṣvapi sā tathā ||
yathā vā varadānādau devatārādhanodbhave |
yadvakṣyasi sa mantraste viṣaghna iti mantrite ||
lokaḥ smarati taṃ mantraṃ viṣāpaharaṇādiṣu |
yathā vā sarpasiddhānte nakulo yāṃ kilauṣadhim ||
darntairgṛhṇāti tāmāhuḥ samastaviṣahāriṇīm |
yathā vā yāṃ bhuvaṃ kaścidadhyāvasati puṇyakṛt ||
tatsaṃparkapavitratvātseṣyate puṇyakāraṇam |
tathā ' 'cārātmatuṣṭayādidharmyaṃ dharmamayātmanām ||
vedoktamiti niścitya grāhyaṃ dharmabubhutsubhiḥ || iti |
yattu prajāpatiruṣasamabhyaitsvāṃ duhitaramahalyāyāṃ maitreyyāmindro jāra āsīdityeva- mādidarśanāditihāsadarśanācca śiṣṭācāreṣu dharmātikramaṃ paśyadbhiḥ śiṣṭācāraprāmāṇyaṃ dura- dhyavasānamiti | tatrocyate﻿—
śrutisāmānyamātrādvā na doṣo 'tra bhaviṣyati |
manuṣyapratiṣedhādvā tejobalavaśena vā ||
yathā vā na viruddhatvaṃ/?/ tathā tadgamayiṣyati ||
prajāpatistāvatprajāpālanādhikārādāditya evocyate | sa cāruṇodayavelāyāmuṣasamu- dyannamyaita, sā tadāgamanādevopajāyata iti tadda‌uhitṛtvena vyapadiśyate tasyāṃ cāruṇaki- raṇākhyabī/?/janikṣepātstrīpuruṣayogavadupacāraḥ | evaṃ samastatejāḥ paramaiśvaryanimittendraśabda- vācyaḥ savitaivāhani līyamānatayā rātrerahalyāśabdavācyāyāḥ kṣayātmakajaraṇahetutvā- jjīryatyasmādanenaivoditenetyāditya evāhalyājāra ityucyate na tu parastrīvyabhicārāt | nahuṣeṇa punaḥ parastrīprārthananimittānantarakālājagaratvaprāptyaivā ' 'tmano durācāratvaṃ prakhyā- pitam | śacyāśca patibhaktinimittapuṇyātiśayajanitatannirākaraṇāvāptaprabhāvalābhaḥ khyāta eva |
vasiṣṭhasyāpi yatputraśokavyāmohaceṣṭitam |
tasyāpyanyanimittatvānnaiva dharmatvasaṃśayaḥ ||
yo hi sadācāraḥ puṇyabuddhayā kriyate sa dharmādarśatvaṃ pratipadyeta yastu kāmakrodhalo- bhamohaśokādihetutvenopalabhyate sa yathāvidhipratiṣedhaṃ vartiṣyate | tena viśvāmitrasyāpi yadrāgadveṣapūrvakamapi tapobalārūḍhasya caritaṃ satsarvaṃ balavataḥ pathyamityanena nyāyena mahānti ca tapāṃsi kṛtvā tāni kṣayaṃ nayata uttarakālaṃ vā pāpaviśuddhiṃ prāyaścittaiḥ pratikurvā- ṇasya jīryatyapi | mandatapasāṃ gajairiva mahāvaṭakāṣṭhādibhakṣaṇamātmavināśāyaiva syāt | dvaipāyanasyāpi, “guruniyogādapatirapatyalipsurdevarādgurupreritādṛtumatīyāt ” itye/?/va/?/māgamānmātṛsaṃbandhabhrātṛjāyāputrajananaṃ, prākkṛtapaścātkariṣyamāṇatapobalena nātidu- ṣkaram | anyo 'pi yastādṛk‌tapovalo nirvahetsa kuryādeva | rāmabhīṣmayostu srehapitṛ- bhaktivaśāt | vidyamānadharmamātrārthadārayorevaṃ sākṣāvdya/?/vahitāpatyakṛtapitrānṛṇyayoryāgasiddhiḥ hiraṇmayasītākaraṇaṃ ca lokāpavādabhiyā tyaktasītāgatānṛśaṃsyābhāvāśaṅkānivṛttyartham | bhīṣmaśca |
bhrātṝṇāmekajātānāmekaścetputravānbhavet |
sarve tenaiva putreṇa putriṇo manurabravīt ||
ityevaṃ vicitravīryakṣetrajaputralabdhapitranṛṇatvaḥ kevalayajñārthapatnīsaṃbandha āsīditya- rthāpattyā 'nuktamapi gamyate |
yo vā piṇḍaṃ pituḥ pāṇau vijñāte 'pi na dattavān |
śāstrārthātikramādbhīto yajetaikākyasau katham ||
dhṛtarāṣṭro 'pi vyāsānugrahādāścaryaparvaṇi putradarśanavatkratukāle 'pi dṛṣṭavāneva | śāpā- nugrahasamarthā maharṣayaḥ śrūyante | tadyathaiva tadvacanādasāvandho jāto vijñāyate tathā yajñā- nuṣṭhānavacanāttāvati kāle dṛṣṭavānityarthāpattyā sujñānam | yadvā, “yajadevapūjāsaṃgati
karaṇadāneṣu” iti dānārtha evāyaṃ yajirbhaviṣyati kratuphalasamāni ca dānatapaścaraṇādī- nyapi śrūyante tatkāraṇātkratukriyopacāraḥ |
yā coktā pāṇḍuputrāṇāmekapatnīviruddhatā |
sā 'pi dvaipāyanenaiva vyutpādya pratipāditā ||
yauvanasthaiva kṛṣṇā hi vedimadhyātsamutthitā |
sā ca śrīḥ śrīśca bhūyobhirbhujyamānā na duṣyati ||
ata eva coktam﻿—
idaṃ ca tatrādbhutarūpamuttamaṃ jagāda viprarṣiratītamānuṣaḥ |
mahānubhāvā kila sā sumadhyamā babhūva kanyaiva gate gate 'hani || iti |
na hi mānaṣīṣvevamupapadyate | tenātītamānuṣamityuktam | ata eva vāsudevena karṇa uktaḥ “ṣaṣṭhe ca tvāmahani draupadī paryupasthāsyāti” iti | itarathā hi kathaṃ pramāṇabhūtaḥ sannevaṃ vadet | atha vā bah‌vya eva tāḥ sadṛśarūpā draupadya ekatvenopacastiā iti vyavahārārthāpattyā gamyate |
yadvā nāryarjunasyaiva kevalasya bhaviṣyati |
sādhāraṇā prasiddhistu niśchidratvāya darśitā ||
yathā yudhiṣṭhiropadeśātsabhāmadhyamānīyamānā sahasaiva rajasvalāveṣaṃ saputrakasya dhṛtarā- ṣṭrasyāyaśa utpādayitumātmānaṃ prakhyāpayituṃ draupadī kṛtavatī tathaiva kevalārjunabhāryāyā eva satyāḥ śrītvaṃ ca janenāviditaṃ parasparaṃ saṃghātāviśayaṃ ca bhedaprayogānavakā- śārthaṃ darśayituṃ sādhāraṇyaprakhyāpanamityevamādivikalpaiḥ supariharatvādrāgalobhakṛtavyavahā- rasya ca śiṣṭaireva dharmatvenāparigrahasyoktatvādanupālambhaḥ |
tathā ca droṇavadhāṅgabhūtānṛtavāde ‘prāyaścittaṃ kāmakṛte 'pyeke’ ityevamante 'pyaśvamedhaḥ prāyaścittatvena kṛta eveti na tasya sadācāratvābhyupagamaḥ | yattu vāsudevārjunayormadyapāna- mātuladuhitṛpariṇayanaṃ smṛtiviruddhamupanyastaṃ tatrānnavikārasurāmātrasya traivarṇikānāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ |
surā vai malamannānāṃ pāpmā ca malamucyate |
tasmādbra‌/?/hmaṇarājanyau vaiśyaśca na surāṃ pibet || iti |
madhusīdhvostu kṣatriyavaiśyayornaiva pratiṣedhaḥ kevalabrāhmaṇaviṣayatvāt “madyaṃ brāhmaṇasya” iti vacanāt |
yadapyetat﻿—
gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā |
yathaivaikā tathā sarvā na peyā brahmavādibhiḥ || iti |
etadapi brahmavādiśabdasya tacchīlataddharmatatsādhukāritvanimittatvāpravacanāśrayaṇena brūñ‌vadatyorekārthatvātprabrūyādbrahmaṇastveṣāmiti niyamādyasyaiva pravacanaṃ sa eva tacchīlastaddharma- statsādhukārī vā bhavati tasmādbrahmaṇā eva brahmavādinaḥ | tathā ca madyasāmānyapratiṣe- dhāṅganindārthavāde 'bhihitam |
akāryamanyatkuryāddhi brāhmaṇo madamohitaḥ || iti |
tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati yathaivaikānnasurā trayāṇāmapyapeyā tathā sarvā brahmavādibhirapeyeti | itarathā yathaivaiketi ca brahmavādibhiriti cobhayamapyanarthakameva syāt | ślokāntaranirdeśenaiva varṇatrayasaṃbandhalābhāt | tenobhau madhvāsavakṣībāvityaviruddham | tathā cānyārthadarśanamabhya- nujñānavacanam “yanmālyamāsīttatpaścātparyauhata surā vai mālyaṃ tato rājanyamasajata tasmājjyāyāṃśca snuṣā ca śvaśuraśca surāṃ pītvā vilapantaścā ' 'sate pāpmā vai mālyaṃ tasmādbrāhmaṇaḥ surāṃ na pibetpāpmanā na saṃsṛjyā iti tadetadetatkṣatriyo brāhmaṇaṃ brūyānnainaṃ surā pītā hinasti ya evaṃ vidvānsurāṃ pibati” iti | madhusīdhuvivakṣa- yaitat | yattu mātuladuhitṛpariṇayanaṃ tayostanmātṛṣvasrīyādisaṃbandhavyavadhāne 'pi bhrātrādi- vyavahārādaviruddham | yadyapi vāsudevasvaseti subhadrā khyātā tathā 'pyutpattau baladevavāsu- devayorekānaṃśāyāśca nijatvānvākhyānānmātṛṣvasrīyā subhadrā tasya mātṛpitṛṣvasrīyā duhitā veti pariṇayanābhyanujñānādvijñāyate |
vasudevāṅgajātā ca kaunteyasya virudhyate |
na tu vyavetasaṃbandhaprabhave tadviruddhatā ||
yena hyanyatraivamuktam﻿—
mama vartmānuvarteranmanuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśaḥ |
yadyadācarati śreṣṭastattadevetaro janaḥ ||
sa yatpramāṇaṃ kurute lokastadanu vartate || iti |
sa kathaṃ sarvalokādarśabhūtaḥ san viruddhācāraṃ pravartayiṣyati | etena rukmiṇīpariṇayanaṃ vyākhyātam | yattvadyatanānāmāhicchatrakamāthurabrāhmaṇīnāṃ surāpānādi dākṣiṇātyānāṃ mātuladuhitṛvivāhādi smṛtiviruddhamupanyastam | tatra kecittāvadāhuḥ | smṛtyācārayo- ritaretaranirapekṣavedamūlatvena tulyabalatvādvihitapratiṣiddhavikalpānuṣṭhānāśrayaṇādadoṣa iti | tattu vakṣyamāṇabalābalavibhāgādayuktam | anye tvevamāhuḥ﻿—
sarveṣāṃmevamādīnāṃ pratideśaṃ vyavasthayā |
āpastambena saṃhṛtya duṣṭāduṣṭatvamāśritam ||
yeṣāṃ paramparāprāptāḥ pūrvajairapyanuṣṭhitāḥ |
ta eva tairna duṣyeyurācārairnetare janāḥ ||
tathā manunā 'pyuktam﻿—
yenāsya pitaro yātā yena yātāḥ pitāmahāḥ |
tena yāyātsatāṃ mārgaṃ tena gacchanna duṣyati ||
yeṣāṃ tu yaḥ pitrādibhirevārtho nā ' 'caritaḥ smṛtyantarapratiṣiddhaśca te taṃ pariharantyeva | apariharanto vā svajanādibhiḥ parihriyante | nanu gautamenā ' 'mnāyaviruddhānāmācārāṇāma- prāmāṇyamuktam | āha﻿—
yadi vedavirodhaḥ syādiṣyetaivāpramāṇatā |
smṛtirāmnāyaśabdena na tu vedavaducyate ||
na tvetadapi yuktaṃ smṛtigranthe 'pyāmnāyaśabdaprayogāt | smārtadharmādhikāre hi śaṅkha- likhitābhyāmuktam ‘āmnāyaḥ smṛtidhārakaḥ’ iti | granthakāragatāyāḥ smṛtestatkṛtagranthā- mnāyaḥ smṛtigranthādhyāyināṃ smṛtidhāraṇārthatvenoktaḥ | tataśca manvādivākyapratiṣiddhācārāṇāṃ prāmāṇyamaśakyamabhyupagantum | āpastambavacanaṃ tu baudhāyanena smṛtiviruddhaduṣṭācārodā- haraṇānyeva prayacchatā nirākṛtam | spaṣṭakāmādihetvantaradarśanānna viruddhācārāṇāmāpa- stambavacanasya vā śrutimūlatvopapattiḥ | āha | kena vā brāhmaṇīnāṃ surāpānaṃ pratiṣiddham |
ucyate﻿—
tasmādba‌rā/?/hmaṇarājanyau vaiśyaśca na surāṃ pibet || ityanena |
nanu puṃliṅganirdeśātstrīṇāṃ na pratiṣidhyate |
surāpānamato nātra smṛtyācāraviruddhatā ||
ucyate﻿—
hananapratiṣedhe 'pi bhavetpuṃstvaṃ vivakṣitam |
tathā puṃstvavadekatvavivakṣā 'pi prasajyate ||
ahatvā kaṃcidevaikaṃ tataśca syātkṛtārthatā |
ekena ca surāpāne 'varjite pūrvavadbhavet ||
āha yattāvadekatvavivakṣāgatamucyate |
pratyekavyaktisaṃbandhājjātervā tanna duṣyati ||
ekaikasyā eva hi brāhmaṇavyakteryathāprasaktavadhapānayoḥ pratiṣedhāt | vivakṣyamāṇamapi tāvadanūdyamānatvādannakriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ vā saṃbhavati kimuta yadā jātigataikatvānuvāda evāyaṃ vijñāyate | āha | hananapratiṣedhe karmabhūtasya brāhmaṇasyoddiśyamānatvātsurāpāne ca kartṛtvenopādīyamānatvātsvargakāmaudumbarīsamānārthayajamānavattulyavivakṣāvivakṣayoraprasaṅgādu- dāharaṇavaiṣamyam | tathā hi﻿—
yo brāhmaṇa iti hyukte hananapratiṣedhataḥ |
brāhmaṇe pratiṣedhe vā liṅgaṃ nānyadvidhīyate ||
pratiṣedhavidhiparo hi vidhāyakaḥ śuddhavadhapratiṣedhāsaṃbhavādba‌rā/?/hmaṇajātimātraviśiṣṭavadha- pratiṣedhaṃ vidhāya nivṛttavyāpāro yadi liṅgamaparaṃ brāhmaṇe vadhe pratiṣedhaṃ vā vidadhyāttataḥ pratyayāvṛttilakṣaṇavākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ | yeṣāṃ tu vidhipratiṣedhau nāmātyantabhinnau vedavākyārthau teṣāṃ pratyayasaṃbandhānugṛhītaśaktirabhāvamātrābhidhānādabhyadhikalabdhavyāpāro nañ‌vidhyarthamapi dbhe/?/ṣādyarthaprāptaṃ pūrvoktanyāyavivakṣitabrāhmaṇaviśiṣṭahananāviśiṣṭaṃ cānūditaṃ pratiṣidhya caritārtho na liṅgamaparaṃ brāhmaṇavadhavidhiṣu śaknotyanāvartamānaḥ pratiṣeddhumiti śrūyamāṇamapi liṅgapra- tiṣedhaṃ pratyanupayujyamānatvādavivakṣitaṃ bhavati | eṣā hyatra vacanavyaktiryat, krodhādi- vaśena brāhmaṇaṃ hanyādbrāhmaṇo vā hantavyastanneti | vidhyekatvapakṣe punarīdṛśī vākya- yojanā yad brāhmaṇahananaṃ tanna kuryāditi yo vā brāhmaṇastaṃ na hanyāditi brāhmaṇavi- śiṣṭahananapratiṣedhavidhiḥ śuddhoddiṣṭabrāhmaṇaviṣayavadhapratiṣedhavidhirveti |
sarvathā brāhmaṇoddeśānneha mucyāmahe vayam |
na coddiṣṭasya śakyete liṅgasaṃkhye vivakṣitum ||
brāhmaṇaḥ surāṃ na pibet, na peyā brahmavādibhiriti nimittadeśakālaphalasaṃskāryānupā- deyapañcakavyatirekādekatrā ' 'khyātapratyayopāttaguṇībhūtopādīyamānasaṃkhyāparicchedyatvayogya- sādhanāṃśaviśeṣaṇatvenopādānāditaratra ca tṛtīyāvibhaktiśrutivacanaṃ vivakṣitaliṅgasyaiva pratiṣedhakamiti darśayitavyam |
ataścāpratiṣiddhatvānnaiva strīṇāṃ virudhyate |
surāpānamahicchatrabrāhmaṇyastena kurvate ||
naitadevamihāpyetatpuṃstvaṃ naiva vivakṣyate |
brāhmaṇasyānuvādyatvāttadvadhapratiṣedhavat ||
nopādeyatvamevaikaṃ kāraṇatvena saṃmatam |
viśeṣaṇavivakṣāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ hi mahādvidhiḥ ||
anūdyamānaḥ sarvo hi yathāprāptamanūdyate |
tatrānākāṅ‌kṣitaṃ nānyadvidheyebhyo vidhīyate ||
yadi hi brāhmaṇaḥ surāṃ pibedityayamavāntaravākyārthaḥ prākpratiṣedhasaṃbandhādvidhibuddhi- mavasthāpayettato guṇatvopādeyatvavidhisamavāyānna brāhmaṇapade kiṃcidavivakṣitaṃ nāma syāt |
yatastu rāgamohādeḥ surāpānaṃ prasajyate |
brāhmaṇāderatastasminna kaścidvidhisaṃbhavaḥ ||
pratiṣedhopasaṃhārimahāvākyātiraskṛtā |
nāvāntaravidheḥ śaktiḥ prādurasti kathaṃcana ||
tenehāpi yatsurāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ pibettanneti vā vacanaṃ vyajyate yo brāhmaṇaḥ sa na surāṃ pibediti vā surāviśiṣṭapānapratiṣedhena pratiṣedhavidhinā vā pratyavāyavyāvṛttyā brāhmaṇo '- nugṛhyata iti nāsya pānaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ vā pratividheyatvopapattiḥ |
loke caitadyathāprāptaṃ pānaṃ strīpuṃsakartṛkam |
pratiṣedhapare vākye tadavasthamanūdyate ||
na ca yo brāhmaṇaḥ pibedityanūditaṃ sa ca pumāniti vidhivyāpārādvinā liṅgavi- vakṣā 'vakalpate |
na cāsya liṅgasaṃbandhaḥ kevalaḥ sanvidhīyate |
na pānapratiṣedhāddhi vidhiranyatra gacchati ||
tataścobhayatrāpyavivakṣitaliṅgasaṃkhyatvaṃ siddham | nanvevaṃ sati brāhmaṇastrīvadhe 'pi puṃbrāhmaṇavadhavadba‌ra/?/hmahatyā 'stīti yadātreyyāmeva kevalāyāṃ bhrūṇahatyāprāyaścittavidhānaṃ tanno- papadyate |
ucyate﻿—
brāhmaṇastrīvadhe ko vā brahmahatyāṃ niṣedhati |
prāyaścittāntare tasyāḥ strītvamātranibandhanam ||

yatastvaviśeṣeṇa jātimātrayuktā ' 'nīyate tenāpi sāmānyasya padārthatvaṃ vijñāyate | vyaktipakṣe ca sarvā vā svatantrā vyaktayo 'bhidhīyeran vyaktiviśiṣṭo vā samudāyaḥ kā cidvaikā vyaktiriti | tatra sarvavyaktyabhidhānaṃ tāvadayuktam | anekavācakaśaktikalpanā- prasaṅgādanityaśabdārthasaṃbandhāpatteraśeṣavyaktigrahaṇāśakteśca saṃbandhāgrahaṇe sati vyavahārā- nupapatteḥ | nityavad gośabdasyāṣṭaśabdavadbahuviṣayatvādekavacanadvivacanaśrutyasaṃbhavādgo- śabdābhihitāsu ca sarvavyaktiṣu śuklaguṇābhāve gauḥ śukla iti sāmānādhikaraṇyāsaṃbhavāt | ‘paśunā yajeta’ iti ca paśuśabdopāttābhiḥ sarvavyaktibhiryāgasya kartumaśakyatvāttataśca vedāprāmāṇyaprasaktiḥ | evaṃ samudāyapakṣo 'pi na saṃbhavati | tatrāpi hi viśeṣaṇatvena vyaktayo 'bhidhātavyāstataścoktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ | vyaktivyatiriktasamudāyakalpanā, tena ca vyava- hārābhāvādabhidhānānarthakyaṃ samudāyivināśe ca tasyāpyanityatvādanityaśabdārthasaṃbandhaprasa- ṅgaḥ | samudāyasya caikatvāda‌dvivacanabahuvacanānupapattiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāsaṃbhavaśca | tena cāmūrtena yāgādyasaṃbhavādvedasyāprāmāṇyam | athaikā vyaktirabhidhīyata ityucyate tatrāpi saṃbandhānityatvaṃ, kā 'sāvabhidhīyata ityajñānādvayavahārāṇāmasaṃbhavaḥ sāmānyapratyayānupapa- ttirdvivacanabahuvacanābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ | prāk cābhidheyavyaktyutpatteruttarakālaṃ ca prayogāsaṃbhavaḥ | samāne ca gotve pratītau ceyamabhidhīyate neyamiti viśeṣakāraṇaṃ nāsti | ataḥ paraṃ bhāṣyārthaḥ | yadi caikā vyaktirabhidheyā bhavedvayaktyantare prayogo na syādabhidheyavyakte statrābhāvādatyantavilakṣaṇatvācca, sāmānyaviśeṣavinirmuktā hi vyaktirityucyate | na ca sāmānyaviśeṣau muktvā vyaktyantare 'nyadasti yena śabdaprayogaḥ syāt | nanu ca yathai- vaikā sāmānyaviśeṣavinirmuktā tathā dvitīyā yataśca yathaivaikasyāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavinirmu- ktāyāṃ śabdasya pravṛttirevamaviśeṣāditaratrāpi bhaviṣyati | yadi sāmānyarūpaṃ viśeṣa- rūpaṃ vā vyaktyantaraṃ syāttato vilakṣaṇatvācchabdo na pravartate, yadā tu tadapyubhayavini- rmuktaṃ rūpaṃ tadā tulyarūpatvādayuktā śabdasya pravṛttiriti | yadyevaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavini- rmuktatvādekatretaratra ca śabdo vartate hanta tarhi sāmānyaviśeṣavinirmuktatvameva sāmānyaṃ śabdasyābhidheyaṃ syāditi siddho naḥ pakṣaḥ | tasyā ' 'kṛtiśabdavācyatve kevalaṃ bhavataḥ pradveṣa iti | pūrvapakṣavādyāha naivaṃ mayocyate sāmānyaviśeṣavinirmuktatvādvayaktau śabdo vartate vyaktyantare veti, kiṃ tu sāmānyaviśeṣavyatirekeṇānyāpohavadvayaktiḥ kathyate | tatra kathaṃ sāmānyameva tarhi vācyamityucyate yo hyarthaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣāṇāṃ cā ' 'śrayaḥ /?/ vyaktirna sāmānyaviśeṣau | tataśca yathaivaikasyāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavyatiriktāyāṃ vyaktau
śabdasya vṛttistathā 'nyasyāmapi bhaviṣyati | siddhāntavādyāha—yadi tāvatsāmānyaviśeṣa- vinirmuktatvācchabdo vartate tataḥ sāmānyameva vācyam | atha samānaṃ nimittaṃ nāsti tadā vyaktyantare vṛttirna prāpnoti | tadabhāve 'pi cedvarteta tato 'śvavyaktāvapi vṛtti- prasakteratiprasaṅgaḥ syāditi | naivam | sāmānyanirapekṣāyāmeva śabdapravṛttau prayogakṛta- vyavasthāśrayaṇānnātiprasaṅgo bhaviṣyati, | yadyevaṃ prayogavaśena śabdo varteta tato 'dya jātāyāṃ gavi na dṛṣṭa iti śabdo na pravarteta tena prayogakṛtā cevdyavasthā kva cidaprasaṅgo na cedatiprasaṅga iti | yattu bhinnāsu vyaktiṣu sāmānyapratyayo na prāpnotyayamapi gauraya- mapīti tadihātiprasaṅgāpādanena na saṃbadhyata iti vyaktyantare prayogo na prāpnotītyasmi- nnavasare vaktavyam | śaktyā tarhi vyavasthā bhaviṣyati, yatra śaktaḥ śabdastatra vartiṣyate prayokṣyate ca yatra tu śaktirnāsti tatra prayogapravṛttī na bhaviṣyatastataśca govyaktiṣveva śakteḥ prayogavyavasthā bhaviṣyati | naivamapi vyavasthā labhyate | prāk prayogācchabdaśakte- ravijñānātprayogapratītyadhīnaṃ hi śabdaśaktijñānaṃ tatkathamivānutpannaṃ prayogakāle vyava- sthākāraṇatvenā ' 'śrayituṃ yuktam | yadyapi śrotā prayogācchaktiṃ jānāti tathā 'pi prayoktrā kathaṃ jñātaṃ govyaktāvayaṃ śaktaḥ śabdo nāśvavyaktāviti, tenāśvavyaktāvapi prayogaḥ prāpnoti | jātyā kimiti vyavasthā nā ' 'śrīyate yatra gotvamupalakṣaṇaṃ tatra śabdo varti- ṣyate yatra tannāsti tatrāśvavyaktayādau vṛttirna bhaviṣyati tataśca vyavasthā siddhiriti | satyamevaṃ sidhyati, kiṃ tvāpanno bhavānasmatpakṣamākṛtirvācyeti | na hyanabhidhāya gotva- mupalakṣaṇaṃ govyaktāveva prayogavyavasthā labhyate taccedabhihitaṃ siddhamākṛtiśabdārthatva- miti | pūrvapakṣavādī tu dvitīyaṃ pūrvapakṣamupanyasyati satyamākṛtirabhidhīyate kiṃ tu guṇa- tvena sthitā vyaktiḥ prādhānyena śabdārthaḥ | na cā ' 'vayorubhayaṃ nābhidhīyata iti pratijñā | kasya citprādhānyena kiṃ cidabhidheyatayā vivakṣitaṃ kiṃ cidguṇatvena, taduktaṃ vyaktiḥ prādhānyenābhidheyeti | evaṃ sati prayogavyavasthobhayapratītiśca tathā ' 'lambhanā- dikriyopapattiśca bhaviṣyati | itarastvāha—maivaṃ labhyate | jātiścetpūrvamabhidheyatvenābhyu- pagatā 'traiva śabdasyopakṣīṇaśaktitvānna vyaktivacanatā labhyate | na cā ' 'kṛtisaṃvedane- nāpi vyaktipratīteranyathā 'pyupapannatvātsatyāṃ gatāvanekārthatā yujyate 'bhyupagantum | arthāpattyā ca śabdasya vācakaśaktiḥ kalpyate | sā ca yadā vyaktipratīteranyathā 'pyupa- pannatvāt kṣīṇā tadā vācakaśaktikalpanāyāṃ pramāṇaṃ nāsti | na ca sāmānyaviśeṣa- vacanatvaṃ śabdasya dṛṣṭamakṣādiśabdānāmanekasāmānyavacanatvāt | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ca vyakteraśabdārthatvaṃ niścīyate | anuccarite 'pi śabde pratītasāmānyasya vyaktipratīteḥ śrutiśabdasyāpi cāgṛhītasāmānyasya vyaktipratyayābhāvāttenā ' 'kṛtireva śabdārtha iti |
sāṃprataṃ pakṣāntaramupanyasyati | atha vyaktiviśiṣṭāyāmākṛtau kimiti na vartate | tade- tatprayogapratītikriyāsaṃbhavatvena vā pakṣāntaramupanyastam | yadvā vyaktereva śabdārthatvaṃ sādhayitumidamucyate | anenābhiprāyeṇa kadā citsiddhāntavādyākṛteḥ śabdārthatvamanenā- bhyupagatamevā ' 'lambhanādikriyāsaṃbhavaśca bhaviṣyatītyanenābhiprāyeṇa vyakterapi guṇatvenābhi- dhānamicchati tato 'haṃ pūrvaṃ tāvadviśeṣaṇe vartitumarhatīti vyaktivacanatvameva sādhayiṣyā- mīti | itarastu tadabhiprāyaṃ jñātvottaraṃ vadati vyaktyantaraviśiṣṭāyāṃ prayogo na prāpno- tīti | yadi hi vyaktiviśiṣṭā jātirabhidhīyate tato vyaktyabhidhānapakṣoktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ, anekaśaktikalpanādirūpo vyaktyantare prayogaśca na prāpnoti viśeṣaṇasyānyatvāditi | tena jātireva śabdārthaḥ | nanu guṇabhūtā pratīyate 'taścānyena pradhānenābhidheyena bhavitavyamiti | naivaṃ śabdena tāvatsaivābhidhīyate | yadi vivakṣāvaśenārthādguṇatvaṃ prādhānyaṃ vā bhavati bhavatu nāma na tāvatā śabdābhidheyatvaṃ vyāhanyate | yadā cāsau śabdenābhidhīyate tadā guṇatvaṃ naiva pratīyate tenārthādguṇatvapratītiradoṣaḥ | nanu pūrvapakṣoktaiḥ kāraṇairvyaktereva śabdārthatvaṃ yuktaṃ vyaktyantare prayogo na prāpnotīti cet | ākṛtiścihnabhūtā bhaviṣyati | yathā 'nabhidhīyamānamapi kākanilayanaṃ devadattagṛhaśabdasya svārthamabhidadhataścihnabhūtatāṃ prati- padyate tadvadākṛtiścihnaṃ vyaktyabhidhāne bhaviṣyati | bhāṣyakāreṇa tu daṇḍiśabdo dṛṣṭānta- tvenopātto yathā tena na nāma kila daṇḍo 'bhidhīyate | atha ca daṇḍaviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ pratyāyyate tadvadākṛtāvapīti | nanu daṇḍiśabde prakṛtyā daṇḍo 'bhidhīyata eva kathamucyate na ca tāvaddaṇḍo 'bhidhīyata iti | kathaṃ copalakṣaṇatvenā ' 'kṛtāvupanyastāyāṃ viśiṣṭaḥ
pratyāyyata iti viśeṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayopanyastamiti | nāyaṃ doṣaḥ | viśeṣyābhidhāyaka- pratyayābhiprāyatvāddaṇḍānabhidhānasya yathā pratyayena, na ca tāvad‌daṇḍo 'bhidhīyate | atha ca tadviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ pratyāyyate tathehāpi bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ | yattūpalakṣaṇopanyāse viśeṣaṇasya dṛṣṭāntatā na yukteti | tadupalakṣaṇasyāpi viśeṣakatvānna codyam | yadvā kenacitsāmānyena dṛṣṭāntatā bhaviṣyatyanabhidheyatvena viśeṣakatvena cetyaduṣṭaṃ, tataśca samyagabhihitaṃ yathā daṇḍiśabde tadvadatrāpi bhaviṣyatīti | evaṃ cāprasaṅgātiprasaṅgau na bhaviṣyata iti | tadetanna yujyate | yuktaṃ devadattagṛhasya puruṣasya ca kevalasyābhidhānaṃ viśiṣṭapratītāvapi kākanilayanadaṇḍayoḥ pratyakṣadaṇḍaśabdāvagatayorviśeṣaṇatvopapatteḥ | na tu gotvasyāsaṃnihitasyehopalakṣaṇatvaṃ yujyate | apratītaviśeṣaṇe viśeṣyāpratīterna ca daṇḍiśabdavattadavayavena gotvābhidhānaṃ pratīmo yena dvitīyāvayavena vyakterevābhidhānaṃ syāt | ataśca yadi tāvadgotvamabhidhīyate tatastadevoktena nyāyena vācyaṃ bhavet | apra- tītasya viśeṣaṇatvāsaṃbhavāt | uktavadatiprasaṅgaḥ śabdaprayogasya prāpnoti | na ca yathā daṇḍiśabdaḥ kevale daṇḍe na prayujyata iti viśiṣṭavacano 'vadhāryate tadvadākṛtau prayogābhā- vādviśiṣṭavacano 'vadhārayituṃ śakyate | śyenacityādāvākṛtau prayogadarśanādanvayavyati- rekābhyāṃ ca jātireva vācyetyavadhāryate śyenacidvākye kevalāyāmākṛtau prayuktatvāt | kvacidapi cā ' 'kṛtyā vinā vyaktimātre prayogādarśanādevaṃ ya 'pi saṃbandhasamudāyādayaḥ pūrva- pakṣāste 'pyuktena nyāyena nirākṛtāstenā ' 'kṛtireva śabdārtha iti || 33 ||
ye tvā ' 'lambhanādicodanābhāvādayo ‘na kriyā syāt’ ityetatsūtrānubhāṣitāḥ pūrvapakṣoktā hetavasteṣāṃ sarveṣāmanena sūtreṇa parihāro 'bhidhīyate—‘tadarthatvātprayogasyā- vibhāgaḥ’ iti | tadarthatvāt—apūrvārthasvādālambhanaprokṣaṇādyaṅgānāmapūrvasādhane prayo- geṇa bhavitavyaṃ dravyaṃ cāpūrvasādhanaṃ yāgena svasiddhayarthamākṣiptatvānnā ' 'kṛtirasamarthatvāttada- bhidhānaṃ tu dravyaniyamārthaṃ pratipattavyaṃ na svārthaṃ jāteranapekṣitatvādadṛṣṭārthatvaprasaṅgātsādha- natvāpratīteśca | yadapi jāteḥ prātipadikābhihitāyāḥ karaṇatvaṃ pratīyate tadapi dravya- niyāmakatvenaiva na sākṣādayogyatvāt | tenā ' 'kṛtyabhidhānasya dravyaniyamārthatvād‌dravye vā ' 'lambhanaprokṣaṇasaṃkhyākārakasāmānādhikaraṇyādisaṃbhavādaduṣṭatā | tadāha—prayogasyā- vibhāga ityākṛtipakṣe 'pyālambhanādiprayogasya dravyādavibhaktataiveti | athavā ' 'kṛtyabhi- dhānasya dravyaniyamārthatvāduktavatprayogasyāvibhāga iti | yadvā | ākṛtivyaktyoratyanta- bhedābhāvātkadā civdyaktirūpeṇa dravyamabhidhīyate kadā citsāmānyarūpeṇa yathā vivakṣitaṃ tathā śabdasyobhayarūpavastvarthatvāvdyaktyabhidhāne 'pi na prayogasya vibhāgo nānārūpateti | jātervā vyaktito 'tyantabhedābhāvād vyaktau kṛtā dharmā jātau kṛtā eva bhavantīti na prayogamya vibhāgena prayojanamiti | yadvā | ākṛtivyaktyorubhayoryogārthatvāddhamāṇāṃ ca
yatra kva cana yāgasādhane kṛtānāṃ prayojanavattvādadravyādavibhaktateti |
tasmādākṛtipakṣe 'pyālambhanādisaṃbhavādākṛtireva śabdārtha iti siddham || 35 ||
( iti ākṛtyadhikaraṇam || 9 || ) |
iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilasvāmikṛtau mīmāṃsāvārtike prathama- syādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ |
evaṃ smṛtisahitasya vedasya prāmāṇye siddhe 'dhunā vākyārtha vyākhyānāvasare satya- parisamāptyaiva pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ kena saṃbandhena nāmadheyacintāyāḥ prastāvaḥ kriyate | ke cittāvadāhuḥ | kimudbhidādayo guṇasya pramāṇamuta kriyāṇāmeva nāmadheyatveneti | tadayuktam | evaṃ sati hi samastameva śāstraṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇādabhinnaṃ syāt | sarvatra hyetadvicāryate, kimidaṃ vākyamasyārthasya pramāṇamutānyasyeti | ye 'pi caite dve api sūtre pūrvottarapakṣau parikalpyaikādhikaraṇatvena vyācakṣate tairapyuktaṃ samāmnāyaidamarthyamityanena sūtreṇa kaḥ siddhāntānabhipretaḥ pūrvapakṣānuguṇo 'rtho vidhīyata iti vaktavyam | na hyuktaidamarthyāntarbhāva- vacanamudbhidādīnāmaniṣṭam | tasmāddvayorapyadhikaraṇayoranumitapūrvapakṣayoruttarapakṣasūtradvaya- metaditi vyākhyeyam | tatra prathamaṃ tāvadudbhidādīnudāhṛtya saṃdehaḥ kriyate, kimete kaṃ ciddharmaṃ pratyupayogaṃ gacchantyuta neti | kiṃ tāvatprāptam | ‘āmnāya3sya kriyārthatvāt’ ityānarthakyam | āha ca | 1tā॰ vrā॰ ( 19-7-3 ) | 2tā॰ brā॰ ( 19—7—1 ) 3jai॰ sū॰ ( 1-2-1 ) |
tryaṃśavedapramāṇatvādudbhidādi tato 'dhikam |
dharmāyānupayuktaṃ sadānarthakyaṃ prapadyate ||
nahyete vidhyādiṣvantarbhavanti | sādhyasādhanetikartavyānabhidhāyitvāttāvaccodanābāhyatvaṃ, stutibuddhayabhāvādarthavādātirekaḥ, karmāṅgabhūtaivaṃsaṃjñakaprakāśayitavyārthābhā/?/vānmantrakāryani- vṛttiḥ | na cānyadvedaprayojanamastītyapramāṇamevaṃjātīyakā iti | atrābhidhīyate—
sarvasya trivibhāgatvādvedasyoktena hetunā |
udbhidādyapramāṇatvamatirekānna sidhyati ||
yadā tadarthatrayānyatamārthamiti sthitaṃ tadā vicāraḥ kimarthamiti | na tāvadarthavādatvaṃ vākyaśeṣatvābhāvāt | kathaṃ punarayaṃ na vākyaśeṣo yāvatā ‘vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā’ ityā- divadekavākyatā 'vagamyate | naitadasti | vidhātavyasya hi yaḥ śeṣaḥ so 'rthavādaḥ | ayaṃ tu vidhyuddeśādeva nātiricyata ityavākyaśeṣaḥ | tatsaṃbhavinaśca stutyupayogitvaṃ na yujyata ityuktamaudumbarādhikaraṇe | na caikapadena stutirdṛṣṭā | na ceha tāṃ pratipadyāmahe | yadapyudbhedanaṃ paśūnāmanena kriyata ityevaṃ prāśastyaṃ kalpyeta tadapi tṛtīyāntasamudāyāśra- yaba/?/lavattarakaraṇatvaprasiddhayā bādhya/?/te | anyathā hi prātipadikaprādhānyādvā ‘vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā’ itivatprathamaiva prāyokṣyata | na cāsya mantratvaṃ, tādrūpyeṇāpratīteḥ | adhyetṛ- smaraṇābhāvācca | na caikapadatvātsākāṅkṣatvaṃ karaṇapratītyā vā smārakatvam | na caitadabhi- dheyaḥ kaścitpra/?/yogasamavāyyartho dṛśyate | na cāsamavetaprakāśane karmāṅgatvam | māntrava- rṇikadravyakalpanāyāmapi gauravam | na cāsya sūktavākavadviniyojikā śrutirasti yena māntravarṇikadravyakalpanā syāt | na cāsya rūpaṃ prayogārham | ataścāviniyuktatvāt ‘iṣe tvādivadapi nādhyāhāreṇa nirākāṅkṣīkṛtya prayogaḥ | sphuṭaṃ ca bāhyaṇe/?/naikavākya- tvamityamantratvam | tasmādvidhyuddeśāntargatasyaivottarādhikaraṇena vicāryate guṇavidhirnāma- dheyamiti | tatra tāvat—
prasiddherbalavattvena prayojanavaśena ca |
adhikatvātpravṛtteśca guṇarūpaṃ vidhīyate ||
prātipadikaṃ tāvadudbhedanasamarthe dravye khanitrādāvavayavapraṃsiddhayāṃ pravartate | na ca samudā- yo 'rthāntaravācī loke prasiddhaḥ | na ca lokādanavagato 'rtho vedādavagamyate saṃbandhasya śāstrāhetutvāt | tṛtīyā 'pi ca karaṇavācinī, kriyāyāśca śaktimad dravyaṃ tadādhārā vā śaktiḥ karaṇaṃ, tenodbhitsādhanako yāgo 'vagamyate | na ca yāgasyodbhittvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā kvacitprasiddham arthavattvātpravṛttiviśeṣakaratvam | vidhāyakodbhitpadapuruṣāṇāṃ pravṛttau viśeṣaḥ | anyathā hyanuccaritasamaiva pravṛttireṣāṃ syāt | atha vā prasiddhatvādguṇavidhirartha- vattvamabhidheyavattvaṃ nāmadheyatve tvartho na vijñāyata iti yojyate | atha vā bhedenārthavattvaṃ hetuḥ, udbhitpadasya yajitaḥ phalāntaratvāt | tataśca vidhipuruṣayoḥ pravṛtiviśeṣa iti vācyam | nanu nāmadheyamapi kratuṃ viśiṃṣadarthatpravṛttiviśeṣakaraṃ ca syāt | naitadasti | kutaḥ—
ākṛteravidheyatvāddhātunā vyaktirāśritā |
sā ca nāmnā 'bhidhīyeta jātiścennaiva nāmatā ||

darvihomapadaṃ na vicāryate, vicāritametadapi tatprakhyamityanena | vidhyuddeśagatānāṃ ceha vicārastatra tvarthavādagatānāṃ ‘yadekayā juhuyāddarvihomaṃ kuryāt’ iti | siddhe vā karmanāmadheyatve tadviśeṣavicārastatra | iha punaḥ sāmānyacinteti nopanyastam | yā tu tatra guṇavidhyāśaṅkā sā 'dhikaraṇamadhye paricodanāmātraṃ sarvamevaitatprāsaṅgikam | aṣṭame ca pūrvavadapūrvacintādhikārāt| kena pūrvarvihitānāṃ karmaṇāmāgreyādīnāṃ nāmadheyatvamā- śaṅkyate | taducyate | aṣṭākapālo bhavatītyādibhirdravyamātrayuktāḥ kramavatyo bhāvanāḥ pratipādyante | tāsāṃ ca sthānakrameṇāgnyādidaivatyāni yājyānuvākyāyugalānyāmnāyante | tāni kramaviniyuktāni santi māntravarṇikīḥ karmāṅgabhūtā devatāḥ kalpayanti | na hyanyathā te mantrāḥ karmopayogaṃ gaccheyuḥ | kriyāsvarūpaprakāśanena tatsaṃbandhiprakāśanena vā mantrāḥ karmopayogitāṃ gacchanti | na caitaiḥ kriyā dravyaṃ cābhidhīyate | yadagnyādya- bhidhīyate tasya saṃbandhitvaṃ na jñātaṃ tatrāsaṃbandhyagnyādiprakāśane 'naṅgatvaprasaṅgaḥ | tenāva- dhāritāṅgatvamantrānurodhenaivaṃ vijñāyate yānete vadanti te nūnamagnyādayaḥ kriyāṅgamiti te ca mantreṣu prādhānyābhidhānāddevatātvena prajñātā iti tadavailakṣaṇyātkarmasvapi devatā bhavanti | puroḍāśādibhirapi ca havirātmakatvādyogyatayā yāgasādhanatvenopaplavamāneṃrdevatai- vā ' 'kāṅ‌kṣiteti dravyadevatāsaṃbandhaniṣpatteranumitānāṃ yāgānāṃ ‘tatprakhyaṃ cā1nyaśāstram’ ityāgneyādīnāṃ nāmadheyatvam | atha vā 'ṣṭākapālādīnāṃ haviṣṭ‌vāt ‘dvirhaviṣo 'vadyati’ iti hyavadāne gṛhīte codanāntareṇa ca tatsaṃskārārthopastaraṇābhighāraṇagrahaṇāccaturavatte niṣpanne ‘ca2turavattaṃ juhoti’ iti vacanādyāvad‌dravyaṃ niṣpannānāṃ homānāṃ tathaivāgnyā- diṣuḥ prāpteṣu nāmadheyatvam| evaṃ cānekārthavidhidoṣo na bhaviṣyati| tathā prāpte 'bhi- dhīyate—

nāṣṭākapālo bhavatītyetāvatā kaścitpuruṣavyāpāro vidhīyate yo 'nuṣṭhānāya smṛti- karaṇaṃ mantramapekṣeta | na ca puroḍāśabhavanaṃ puruṣasyānuṣṭheyaṃ, pratiniyatakartṛtvātkriyāṇām | nāpi dravyaṃ, svarūpeṇa siddhātmakatvāt kartavyaṃ yena smaryeta | na ca ‘agnirmūrdhā’ ityā- dibhirdravyaṃ tad‌vyāpārovā 'bhidhīyate yenā ' 'kāṅkṣayā 'pi saṃbadhyeran | agnyādyabhidhāyināṃ na kaścittaiḥ saṃbandho vidyate |

yadi hi prathamaṃ yāgatvamavadhāryeta tato devatākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ devatāvācino mantrāḥ saṃbadhyeran, na tu tadbhavatiśabdenoktam | na ca yāgasaṃbandhātprāk puroḍāśādīnāṃ havi- ṣṭavamavadhāryate | saṃbandhiśabdo hyayaṃ na dravyasvarūpaprayuktaḥ | tadeva hi dravyamayāgasaṃbaddhaṃ payaḥprabhṛti na loke haviḥśabdavācyaṃ bhavati | etena caturavattacodanākalpitakarmanāmatvaṃ pratyuktam | āghārādiṣu tu kriyātmakatvānmantrākāṅkṣāyāṃ vacanaviniyogavaśācca bhavati māntravarṇikadevatākalpanā | sarvajaghanyaścāyaṃ devatāvidhiḥ sarvajyeṣṭhe taddhitadetā- vidhau saṃbhavati kimityāśrīyate | anyathānupapattimūlaścāsau | na ca taddhite saṃbhavatya- nyathānupapattiḥ | tasmādanenaiva kṛte dravyadevatāsaṃbandhe 'rthavādapuraḥsareṇa bhavatiśabdena vihite viśeṣārthaṃ krameṇa mantrāmnānam | agatyā cānekārthavidhiraṅgīkriyate | vidhānārthe taddhitānte śabda iti—vidhiprayojanatvābhiprāyeṇa | sarvaṃ caitattasmādavibhaktaṃ gamyate | devatā tāvatprātipadikenoktā tadviśiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ taddhitena saṃbandho 'pi tatraivārthagṛhītasta- tsāmānādhikaraṇyāccāśeṣātmīyopasarjanayuktamaṣṭākapālapadaṃ viśeṣaṇatvena tatraivāntargatam | dravyasya cā ' 'gneyatvena bhavanamabhāvyamānasya na sidhyatīti tadākṣiptā bhāvanā 'pi tatraiva |
na ca yāgena vinā ' 'gneyatvaṃ bhāvayituṃ śakyamiti puruṣavyāpāraviśeṣo 'pi yāgastadanta- rgataḥ | tataśca taddhitāntapadopāttavidhinā sarvamanyadarthādākṣipyamāṇaṃ na vākyaṃ bhinatti | bhāvanāvidhipūrvakaśca sarvatra dhātvarthakārakavidhirbhavatītyaśrūyamāṇā 'pi saiva tāvadviśiṣṭā vidhīyate | tato viśeṣaṇānyathānupapattyā sarvasaṃsargātmakatvācca tāmeva saṃbandhaśabdenā- bhidhatte, na tvavyāpārātmakatvād‌dravyadevatāsaṃbandhaḥ śakyate vidhātum | ‘avibhāgat’ iti—arthākṣepahetuḥ | ‘na cedanyena’ iti—anyathānupapattiśaraṇābhidhānam || 9 ||

agnyādayo hyutpattivākye taddhitaśrutyā 'ṣṭākapālādīnāṃ devatā, viśvedevā vākyena | nanvatrāpyaṣṭākapālādisaṃbandhādvākyameva | na | taddhitena dravyaviśeṣasya kṛte devatāsaṃbandhe vākyena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamātrakaraṇāt | vaiśvadevaśabde 'pi tatheti cet | na | yāgala- kṣitadravyasaṃbandhakalpanāviprakarṣāt | na tāvadvaiśvadeveneti prakṛtamaprakṛtaṃ vā dravyaṃ devatāsaṃ- bandhi śrūyate | tatra yajeteti sāmānādhikaraṇyādevaṃ tāvadvijñāyate vaiśvadevena yāgeneti | tataścānyathā yāgasaṃbandhānupapattyā tatsādhanaṃ dravyaṃ lakṣaṇayā devatā skandati | vākyena ca yāgamātrasaṃbandhe sati prakaraṇādidaṃ kalpanīyaṃ tenaivā ' 'gneyādinā yāgena vaiśvadevena yajeta nānyeneti | na tvagnyādividhau kācillakṣaṇāpekṣā prakaraṇāpekṣā veti vaiṣamyam | nahi prakaraṇaṃ dravyasyeti | yadā dravyasyāgnyādisaṃbandho vidhīyate na tadā prakaraṇā- pekṣetyarthaḥ | atha vā yad‌dravyasya prakaraṇaṃ na tadvaiśvadevavākyenā ' 'śritam | bhāṣye tu dravya- śabdo vastuvācī | na hi śrautasyāgnyādidravyasya devatābhūtasya prakaraṇaṃ bādhakaṃ, vaiyadhi- karaṇyaṃ vā, dravyasya yatsaṃbandhitvena śrutamagnyādi tasya prakaraṇaṃ na bādhakamiti | prakṛ- tayajñibuddheśca na dūrasthānuvādena guṇavidhirviśiṣṭāpūrvakarmavidhānaṃ vā | viprakīrṇayāgaikī- karaṇācca samudāyānuvādo 'rthavān | na hi ‘vasante vaiśvadevena’ ‘prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena’ ityādi vidhānaṃ parasparasahitānāmaṣṭānāṃ haviṣāṃ samudāyapadādṛte 'vakalpate | tasmādekadeśa- sthairapi viśvairdevairupalakṣitānāṃ chatrinyāyena tatprakhyatayaiva sarveṣāṃ nāmadheyatvam || 14 ||

pūrveṇaikasūtramapi saṃbhavati | mithaḥ saha pradāne kriyamāṇe triṃśatsaṃpattyabhāvādanarthasaṃ- bandhaḥ syāt | kutaḥ |
haviṣo guṇabhūtatvānna karmāvṛttihetutā |
devataikyātsaha tyāgo lāghavāddhi prasajyate ||
tena sakṛttyāgaḥ kartavya iti satyāṃ sahapradānaśaktau nā ' 'vṛttiryuktā | saṃpratipanna- devatātvācca sahapradānamaviruddhaṃ śakyaṃ kartuṃ tataśca triṃśattvavirodhaḥ | triṃśatpūraṇaṃ ca keṣāṃcidevaṃ, nava prayājāḥ, navānuyājāḥ, dvāvāghārau, dvāvājyabhāgau, aṣṭau pradhānāhutaya iti | apareṣāṃ tu sviṣṭakṛdvājinejyāgrahaṇādāghārau na gaṇitau | sarvathā tu pradhānāhuti- bhedadarśanasiddhiḥ || 16 ||
