guṇavidhināmadheyavicāre paryavasite 'dhunā kevalaguṇavidhitvamevāsti na veti vicāryate | atha vā 'ṣṭākapālatvasya vaiśvānarasāmānādhikaraṇyād‌dvādaśatvāntargatastatprakhyatvena nāmadheya- tvamāśaṅkya guṇavidhiḥ prasiddhayādibhiḥ prakṛtayajibuddhestatprakhyatvābhāvācca samarthanīya- 1tai॰ saṃ॰ ( 2-2-5 )
stamapi nirākṛtyārthavādatā pūrvasiddhaivopasaṃhariṣyate | tatra pūrvavatāṃ vidhānenārthavattvamapū- rvāṇāṃ nāmadheyatvāvadhāraṇāt ‘yadu1tpattāvapūrvam’ iti | tasmādguṇavidhayo 'ṣṭatvādaya- iti kecit | tadayuktam | na hyapūrvatvānnāmadheyatvaṃ siddham | apūtvāddhi yathaiva laukikārthāparijñānānna guṇavidhitvamevaṃ vaidikakarmābhidhāyitvaṃ sutarāmaprasiddhāmiti nāmadhe- yatvamapi na syāt | satyeva ca sarvatra laukike 'rthe samabhivyāhārādibhirnāmadheyatoktā | tasmādyathābhāṣyameva sūtrārthaḥ |
pūrvajñātārthavācitve nāmadheyārthavādane |
aprāptatvādihaite syurvaiśvadevavikalpavat ||
yadi hi vaiśvānarayāge 'ṣṭatvādayaḥ kutaścitprāptā bhaveyustataḥ saṃvādadvāreṇa nāmadheyatva- marthavādatā vā syānna tu prāptirasti kevaladvādaśatvavidhānāt | tathā hi |
yadyapyarthātmanā 'styeva mahāsaṃkhyāsvavāntarā |
aparicchedakatvāttu nāsau karmaviśeṣaṇam ||
na hi sattāmātreṇa saṃkhyā vyāpriyate kiṃ tarhi saṃkhyeyaparicchedena | dvādaśatvena ca kapāleṣu paricchidyamāneṣu nāṣṭatvādīnāṃ paricchedakatvamityavidyamānatā | yadyapi ca yathā- kathaṃcidastitvamāśrīyate tathā 'pyetāvanmātraṃ bhavedaṣṭau bhavantīti na tu yadaṣṭākapāla iti | saṃskṛtataddhito hyeṣaḥ, taddhitārthanimittaśca samāsastau ca sati samārthye bhavataḥ | sāmarthyaṃ cānyanirapekṣatve bhavati | sāpekṣāśca dvādaśatvenāṣṭatvādaya iti na dvādaśakapā- lo 'ṣṭākapālādiśabdābhidhānīyakaṃ labhate | tena svarūpasaṃkīrtanasyāsattvātprarocanamasaṃbaddha- taramāpadyeta | na ca dvādaśatvavilakṣaṇo 'ṣṭatvādeḥ karmopayogaḥ saṃbhavati, saṃkhyātvāt | yadyapi cāṣṭatvastutyā dvādaśatvaṃ stūyate na tvaṣṭākapālastutyā dvādaśakapālasya stutiḥ | viśe- ṣaṇaviśeṣyayoratyantabhedāt | api cāstyeva dvādaśatvasyā ' 'tmīyā stutiḥ ‘rjagatyaivāsmi- n’ iti | tasmād‌dvādaśatvena saha vikalpamānā guṇavidhaya evaite 'pi | sarvaṃ cedaṃ vaikalpi- kānekasaṃkhyāviśiṣṭavaiśvānaravidhānādekamevotpattivākyamiti na balābale viśeṣaḥ | tasmā- 1jai॰ sū॰ ( 1-4-1 ) |
tsāmarthyamiti ca pūrvaprakṛba/?/yogyāpekṣatvādvaiśvadevapūrvapakṣātideśaḥ | tadīyaṃ hi sāmarthyama- sminsamāmnāye 'sti, na ca taduktaḥ parihāraḥ | tasmādvidhānārthā iti || 17 ||
prakṛtāprakṛte ṣāge tathā dravye 'pi vā guṇaḥ |
dravyaṃ guṇavadevaṃ ca na kathaṃcidvidhīyate ||
prakṛte tāvadvādaśatvāvarodhānnāṣṭatvādayo vidhīyante | na ca dūrasthe, tadupādānaśabdā- bhāvāt | na ca karmāntaraṃ kevalāṣṭatvādiguṇakaṃ saṃbhavati | dravyadevatāsaṃyogapratyakṣayāgā- śravaṇāt | etena puroḍāśe saṃkhyāvidhistredhā/?/ 'pi pratyuktaḥ | tathā 'ṣṭākapālādi puroḍā- śavidhānam | na hi dvādaśakapālapurāḍāśāvaruddho yāgaḥ puroḍāśāntaraṃ gṛhṇāti | nāpyananūdite karmaṇi svaśabdenāprakṛte puroḍāśavidhānaṃ phalatatsādhanāsaṃbaddhaṃ kvacidupayu- jyate | nāpyavyāpārātmakatvād‌dravyaṃ vidhātuṃ śakyate | ata eva viśvajidādivadapi nādhyāhāreṇa phalaṃ kalpyate |
vaiśvānarapadaṃ nāpi yāgāyānnānuṣajyate |
vibhaktyantarayogitvānna carte 'smādanarthakam ||
syādetat | vaiśvānarapadānuṣaṅgādaṣṭākapālādidravyadevatāsaṃbandhavidheryāgāntarasiddhiriti | tannāsti | prathamānteṣu dvitīyāntānanuṣaṅgāt | na ca vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ | anyathā 'pyupa- padyamānatvāt | yadi hyanuṣaṅgavipariṇāmāvantareṇāṣṭatvādiśravaṇamanarthakaṃ syāttataḥ kiṃ vā na kriyeta, tattu stutyarthatvenopapannataratvānnānarthakam | tadā cānuvādatvādvipariṇatavibhakti- saṃbandhe 'pyadoṣaḥ | tasmānna puroḍāśavidhānam | na ca dvādaśakapāle 'ṣṭākapālādayaḥ puro- ḍāśāḥ svātmabhirvibhaktā bidyante | aṣṭatvādimātraviśeṣadarśanāt | te cāṣṭatvādayo na yāge nāpi puroḍāśe vidhīyanta ityuktam | na cāṣṭatvādīnāṃ dvādaśakapālenaikavākyatā tavopapadyate | nānāvidheyaprayojanavaśenārthaikatvābhāvāt | na ca nānāvidhānāṃ vibhajyamānānāṃ
sākāṅkṣatvaṃ vidyate | yadi caikaṃ vākyaṃ bhavettataḥ sarvaviśiṣṭaikabhāvanāvidhānānna vikalpaḥ syāt | aṣṭatvādīnāṃ ca guṇatvānna pratyekaṃ vākyaparisamāptyā pṛthaganuṣṭhānopapattiḥ | na ca saṃkhyānāṃ samuccayaḥ saṃbhavati | saṃkhyāntaropajananena sarvabhāvaprasaṅgāt | saṃkhyānta- rānupajananasamuccayastu dvādaśatve 'ṣṭatvādyantarbhāvāt | tathābhūtānāṃ ca dvādaśatvavidhinaiva prāpteranuvādatvāpattiḥ | tenaitairbhinnairvākyaiḥ svatantrā vidhīyanta ityavaśyaṃ bhavatā 'bhyupaganta- vyam | tataśca dvādaśatvamutpattivākyaśiṣṭamitarāṇi tu vākyāntaraiḥ prakaraṇāpekṣairdurbalāni santi na saṃbandhyante | evaṃ tāvadvaiśvānarayāgo balavattaraguṇāvarodhānnāṣṭatvādīnpratīcchati | api cāṣṭatvādayo 'pi naivātisọdhāste 'pi hi puroḍāśenaikavākyabhūtatvānnaiva vaiśvānarayā- gasya prāpnuvanti | tatprakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā na tasya bhaviṣyanti | tathā cātadguṇāḥ kevala- puroḍāśasaṃbandhe prayoge syuranarthakāḥ | na hi taṃ—puroḍāśaṃ pratyarthavattā 'sti | atha vā kathamatadguṇā ityata āha—na hi taṃ—yāgamanyāvaruddhaṃ pratyarthavattā 'stīti || 18 ||
aṣṭatvādyavidhānatvādvayarthyeyaṃ tatprarocanā || 19 ||
tasmādavayavadvāraṃ dvādaśatvaṃ prarocyate ||
yadvidheyamavadhāryate tadeva stotavyaṃ dvādaśatvaṃ cātra vidheyaṃ tasmādyathākathaṃcittadeva stotavyam | tatsāmīpyācca śaknuvantyaṣṭādiśabdāstadekadeśapratītiṃ kartum | eka- deśastutidvāreṇa caikadeśī stuto bhavati | tenaitaduktaṃ bhavati, īdṛśo 'yaṃ dvādaśakapālo mahābhāgo yasmin kriyamāṇe 'ṣṭākapālādayo 'pi saṃbhāvitā bhavanti te cāṣṭatvādayo brahma- varcasādisiddhipraśastāstasmātpraśasto 'yamiti | yattvastyeva dvādaśatvasyānyā stutiriti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | kutaḥ |
stuteraparimāṇatvādyāvatī hi pratīyate |
tāṃ sarvāmaikarūpyeṇa vidhyuddeśaḥ pratīcchati ||
sarvatra hyalpairbahubhirvā 'kṣaraiḥ stutayo dṛśyante, śrotṛprakārānekatvācca kvacitkāścida- rthavatyo bhavanti | yathaiva keṣāṃcidvidhyuddeśamātreṇa pravṛttau sidhyantyāmanyārthā stutirā- śrīyate tathaivālpastutyupapanne 'pi kārye mahāstutyāśrayaṇamiti || 20 ||
janakatvena pūtāderaṣṭatvādīni kāraṇam |
teṣāṃ kārayitṛtvādvā pūtādeḥ kāraṇabhidhā ||
yaduktaṃ dvādaśatvāvarodhādanarthakamaṣṭatvādividhānaṃ stavanaṃ ceti | tannānarthakam | nityaṃ hi dvādaśakapālatā | yastu guṇaphalāni brahmavarcasādīni prārthayate tasyāṣṭatvādīni dvāda- śatvopamardena nivekṣyante | tathā hi—
puruṣārthasamāsatteḥ kāmyaṃ nityasya bādhakam |
viśeṣataśca sāmānye pūrvaprāpte pravartanāt ||
puruṣārthasiddhayartho hi sarvaḥ prayāsa iti tatpratyāsannaṃ vastu balīyo bhavati | dūre ca dvādaśatvaṃ puruṣārthasya tatsādhanayāgadravyasaṃskārārthakapālaparicchedāt | aṣṭatvādayastu tadāśritāḥ santaḥ sākṣād brahmavarcasādi sādhayantīti pratyāsatterbalīyāṃso bhavanti | tasmādarthavanta iti | nanu ca—
brahmavarcasayogādi phalatvena yadīṣyate |
stutyabhāvādvidhiḥ kena vartamānāpadeśinām ||
tatra kecidāhuḥ |audumbarādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyenātra pratyavasthānamiti | tanna yuktam | tatraiva dattottaratvāt | ato 'yamabhiprāyaḥ | ‘pūta eva sa tejasvī’ ityādinā phalamucyate | ‘gāyatryaivainam’ ityādistuteḥ prātyātmiko vidhiḥ | ‘yadaṣṭākapāla’ ityādibhiḥ sārthavādakaiḥ pratyekaṃ vihitānāṃ yathāsaṃkhyena pūta evetyādibhiḥ phalasaṃbandhaḥ kriyate || 21 ||
vākyāni yāvadarthaṃ syurguṇebhyaḥ phalakalpane |
ekopakramasaṃhārādekaṃ cedaṃ pratīyate ||
putre jāte dvādaśakapālamiti yadevopakrāntaṃ tadevāṣṭatvādīnāmante ‘yad‌dvādaśakapālo bhavati’ iti ‘yasmiñ jāta etām’ iti copasaṃhriyamāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ | tāvati ca nāṣṭatvādayaḥ pṛthag bhavituṃ labhante tadekavākyatā ca na stutyā vinopapadyate | arthānta- raparatāyāmānarthakyāt | yadi hi kartṛsaṃbandhīnyetāni bhaveyustatastasya kāraṇāni prayoja- kāni syuḥ | vaiśvānarasaṃbandhīni tvetāni | tasmādguṇārtho 'nyāsaṃbhavāditi stutyartho vidhīyate | pūta eva sa ityevamādīnāṃ ca tacchabdayuktānāṃ yasmiñ jāta ityanenāpe- kṣitatvānna pūrvaiḥ saha phalatvena saṃbandhaḥ | na cātrānupayogo yena balādāṃcchidya nīyeran | na cāṣṭatvādibrahmavarcasādīnāmebhirvibhāgena saṃbandhaḥ | yatra tu vibhāgo ‘gāyatryaivainam’ ityādau tatra stutitvamabhyupagatameva | ato yā nāma pūta ityevamādīnāṃ phalakalpanā sā yāgameva prati nāṣṭatvādīn | prathamopanipāte tu yāgasyāpi stutireva | evaṃ kāma- kārarahitatvena phalavidhyasarūpatvāt | etaireva stūyamāne yadaṣṭākapāla ityādīnāmupapa-
ttyarthatā | tasmānna guṇavidhaya iti siddham || 22 ||
(iti vaiśvānareṣṭayadhikaraṇam || 11 ||)
tatsiddhiḥ | arthavādaprasaṅgāttadupakāriguṇavādavidhitallakṣaṇaṃ tatra noktamidānīmabhidhīyate | nanu ca tatraiva ‘rūpātprā1yād’ ‘dūrabhū3yastvāt’ iti nimittaṃ kathitam | satyaṃ kathitam, na tu lakṣaṇatvena | kathaṃ tarhi, iha siddhaṃ tatrodāhṛtārthavādalakṣyaviṣayavyavahārārthaṃ nītam | atra tu sarvagauṇavṛttīnāṃ lakṣaṇamucyate | nanu ca sahacaraṇasthānādīnyanyānyapyakṣapādaprabhṛ- tibhirgauṇanimittānyuktāni | loke ca dṛśyate yaṣṭīḥ praveśaya, mañcāḥ krośanti, aśva- sahastreṇāmuko rājā jita iti | tānyupasaṃhartavyāni | liṅgasamavāyenaivopasaṃhṛtānīti ke cit | chatrisamavetetarapratyayavaddhi yaṣṭisahacaritādipratyayo bhavati | atha vā gauṇyā vṛtteriha nimittamabhidhīyate na lakṣaṇāyāḥ | kiṃ cānayorbhedo 'pyasti | bāḍhamasti | kutaḥ—
abhidheyāvinābhūte pravṛttirlakṣaṇeṣyate |
lakṣyamāṇaguṇairyogādvṛtteriṣṭā tu gauṇatā ||
tatra yathaivā ' 'kṛtivacanaḥ śabdastatsahacaritāṃ vyaktiṃ lakṣayati tathaiva yaṣṭimañcāśvā- dayastatsaṃbaddhapuruṣalakṣaṇārthā bhavanti | agnirmāṇavaka iti tu nāgnitvāvinābhāvena māṇa- vakaḥ pratīyate | kiṃ tarhi—
vah‌nitvalakṣitādarthādyatpaiṅgalyādi gamyate |
tena māṇavake buddhiḥ sādṛśyādupajāyate ||
sarvatra ca tatsiddhikarādāviyameva prastaraprabhṛtau yajamānādiśabdānāṃ vṛttiriti ta udāhṛtāḥ | atrāpi ca sāmānādhikaraṇyādekatarasya nāmadheyatvaṃ, nimittābhāvādanekaśa- ktikalpanābhayācca tadanupapattyā kāryalakṣaṇādvāraṃ prayojanavattaratvena guṇavidhitvaṃ, aśa- ktervā tadasaṃbhavādarthavādatvamiti traya eva pakṣāḥ | tatra guṇavidhivādī manyate | na kā- 1tatsiddhītyārabhya, iti guṇāśrayā ityantasyaikasūtratve 'pi bhāṣye pratyekaṃ prathamāntasūtropanyāso vyāravyāsaukaryārtha iti na virudhyate | 2tai॰ saṃ॰ (2-6-5) | 3jai॰ sū॰ (1-2-1)
citprastarayajamānayoritaretarasamabhivyāhāreṇa stutiḥ pratīyate | na ca stotumapi para- śabdaḥ paratra vartate | na ca pravṛttinimittamasti | na ca pravṛttasya prayojanamanyatkā- ryalakṣaṇātaḥ | tasmāt ‘yo hotā so 'dhvaryuḥ’ ityādivadanyataraḥ kāryalakṣaṇārthaḥ | tatrāpi ‘mukhyaṃ vā1 pūrvacodanāt’ iti yajamānaśabdaḥ svārthavṛttaḥ prastaraśabdaḥ strugdhāraṇādi- kāryalakṣaṇārtha iti guṇavidhiḥ | atrocyate—
na tāvatkāryayogitvamekasyāpyupapadyate |
virodhādyajamānasya prastarāderacodanā ||
ekakapālavat ‘sūtravākena prastaraṃ praharati’ iti yajamāne prahriyamāṇe sarvatantravilo- paprasaṅgaḥ | tasmādekavākyagatottarasādanasarvahomavidhistutyarthaḥ saṃvādaḥ | kathaṃ punaḥ para- 1jai॰ sū॰ (12-2-8)
śabdasya paratra sāmānādhikaraṇyam | kimā2kārā vā stutiriti | yajamāno hi sarvā- myarhitastadaṃśatvādbarhiṣa upari prastaraḥ sādayitavyaḥ | svargatvena saṃstute cā ' 'havanīye sakalo yajamāna āropito bhavatyekakapālenākhaṇḍiteneti stutiḥ | guṇācca śabdavṛttiḥ | kathamaguṇavacana iti—vācakatvamabhyupetaṃ manvānasya praśnaḥ | siddhāntastu, ajaha3- tsvārthāḥ sarvāḥ śabdapravṛttayaḥ pūrvaśaktyanusārasaṃbhave śaktyantarakalpane pramāṇābhāvāt | saṃbhaviṣyati cātra siṃhatvāvagatavyaktyupasthāpitaprasahyakāritvādyanekadharmapratyayāddevadattapra- tyaya iti pūrvaiva śaktirnimittamiti na saṃśayahetutvena vyavahārocchedakāraṇaṃ prasiddhahānā- prasiddhakalpanamāśrayaṇīyam | a4nyeṣāṃ tu darśanaṃ sarva eva hi siṃhādiśabdā jātiguṇakriyā- samudāyavācinaḥ samastārthāsaṃbhave devadattādiṣu katipayaguṇakriyāyogādupacaryanta iti | tatrābhidhīyate—
samudāyārthavācitve naikadeśe bhavedgatiḥ |
śataśabdānna pañcāśanmukhyarūpeṇa gamyate ||
bhavati tu jātimātre dṛṣṭe sarvakriyāguṇapratyastamaye 'pi prayogaḥ | pratyayaśca mukhyātma- naiva na devadattādiṣviva siṃhaśabdādupacaritaḥ | sāmānyavācitā cā ' 'kṛtyadhikaraṇasiddhā 1ākṛtyadhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ | 2kimarthaṃ ceti praśrottarabhāṣyaṃ vidhyarthavādacintopakrameṇa saṃvādasya stutyarthatvāvasāyādayuktamiva mattvā stutiprakārapraśnaviṣayatayā vyācaṣṭe—kimākāretyādinā | 3ajahatsvārthā hati॰ na jahāti śabdaḥ svamarthaṃ yāsu vṛttiṣviti vigrahaḥ | idaṃ ca ‘sarva evaite gauṇāḥ’ ityādibhāṣyasya, prasiddhārthaparityāgenāprasiddhaguṇavācitvarūpaparoktagauṇīlakṣaṇanirākaraṇaparasya vyā- khyānārthaṃ veditavyam | 4yadaparaṃ, samudāyavācinaḥ padasya lakṣaṇayaikadeśavṛttitvarūpaparoktalakṣaṇa- dūṣaṇārthaṃ, ‘na ca sarve guṇasamudāyavacanaḥ’ iti bhāṣyaṃ tadvayākhyāṃtumārabhate—anyeṣāṃ tvityādinā |
bādhyate | kriyāguṇānāṃ cā ' 'nantyānna śakyaḥ prativyakti saṃbandho 'nubhavitum |
ekasyāmeva ca vyaktau bālyādiṣu guṇakriyāḥ |
anyāścānyāśca śakyante nābhidhātumasaṃgateḥ ||
na cāsāmānyāt sāmānyaṃ śakyate kalpayituṃ jātyantare 'pi kvacitkāsāṃcitsa- dbhāvāt |
tatra siṃhatvamevā ' 'sāṃ vyavacchedakaraṃ bhavet |
taccānabhihitaṃ naivamuktaṃ cennānyavācitā ||
na hyanabhihitaṃ siṃhatvaṃ guṇakriyāṇāṃ vyavacchedakaraṃ bhavati | apratīteḥ | abhihitaṃ cettu pratyayādevāśeṣaguṇakriyāvagamādabhidhānaśaktyanavasāya iti samudāyavācināmekade- śeṣu na gauṇatvasaṃbhavaḥ | ka1ścitpunarāha-samāropitatadbhāvo gauṇa iti | tasyaitanmatam | na kathaṃcana paraśabdastayā jātyā svanibandhanabhūtayā vinā 'tyantānabhidheyakriyāguṇamātradvā- reṇānyatra vartitumarhati | na ca siṃhaśabdenāpravartamānena siṃho devadatta iti sāmānādhika- raṇyaprayogo ghaṭate | kathaṃ tarhi—
artheṣvarthāntarātmānamadhyāropyopapāditam |
vācyamāsādya śabdānāṃ svayameva pravartanam ||
siṃhādisadṛśakriyāguṇadarśanena hi devadattādayaḥ sāmastyaparikalpanayā sārūpyamā- padyante | tataśca svārtha eva śabdaḥ prayujyate | na caitāvatā mukhyaprasaṅgo 'rthasya, adhyāro- pitatvāt | yatra tu sa evārtho na samāropyate tatra mukhya ityadoṣaḥ | tatredamucyate | naitatka- lpanāyā aśakyatvāt | tathā hi—
asaṃkīrṇasvabhāvaṃ sadvastuvastvaṃntarātmanā |
āropyate 'bhidhānārthaṃ kathaṃ na bhrāntivarjitaiḥ ||
1adhyāropitārthavṛttitvarūpaparoktalakṣaṇadūṣaṇārthamanyandra/?/ṣyaṃ, ‘nacāsati siṃha’ iti, tadvayākhyā- syati—kaścitpunarityādinā |
yadā tāvadbhrāntyā mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ toyamadhyāropya śabdaṃ prayuṅkte, tadobhayormukhyārthā- dhyavasānarūpeṇe toyapratīterbhrāntimukhyatvam | athāpi vaktā vivekī sannitaravacanārthaṃ prayuṅkte, śrotā ca na viviṅkte, tadā 'pyekasya vivekenādhyāropābhāvāditarasyāntyā- dhyavasānānnaikamapi prati gauṇatvopapattiḥ | yadā tu dvāvapyabhrāntau tadobhayoḥ sādṛśyā- dinimittāntarṇītavatyarthādhyavasānādāropābhāvaḥ | tathā hi—
dvāvapi pratipadyete siṃhapuṃsorviviktatām |
nādhyāropayituṃ śaktistenaikasyāpi vidyate ||
yathaiva hyasadṛśānāmarthānāṃ tiktamadhurādīnāṃ na kathaṃcidapi pratītyabhāvātparamparādhyā- ropaṇamevaṃ sadṛśānāmapi vivekajñānaṃ nopapadyate | na hyarthādhyavasānādanyādṛśaṃ nāma jñānaṃ vyavahārāṅgaṃ bhavatīti | kiṃ ca—
śabda eva yadā tāvadanimitto na vartate |
buddhidurlalitā tatra bhavetriviṣayā katham ||
na cārtharahitā buddhirātmākāramātramanubhavantī jāyata ityuktaṃ śūnya1vāde | api ca—
pūrvānubhūta evārthaḥ smaryate prathamaṃ padāt |
tena mukhye pratīte 'rthe kvādhyāropo bhaviṣyati ||
sarvathā tāvadayaṃ gauṇamukhyavibhāgaḥ śrotṝṇāmarthaviśeṣāvadhāraṇe vyāpriyate | te ca pada- velāyāmanadhyāropitasvārthavṛttyeva siṃhādipadamadhyavasāya devadattādipadasāmānādhikaraṇyā- nyathānupapattyā gauṇatāṃ kalpayanti | tatra caiṣāṃ svayamanāropyaiva siṃhatvaṃ tatsādṛśyādipra- tītirbhavati | sā ca kiṃ śabdādathārthādityanvicchatāmanvayavyatirekābhyāmākṛtyadhikara- ṇanyāyenārthāditi niścayo jāyate | katham—
siṃhaśabde hyanukte 'pi siṃhārthātsadṛśe matiḥ |
jāyate na tvabuddhe 'rthe siṃhaśabde śrute 'pi naḥ ||
yadā ca śrotṝṇāṃ svayamadhyāropābhāvastadā vaktaryapi naivaiṣāmevaṃ kalpanā bhavati, yathā nūnamanena siṃhatvamadhyāropitamiti | kathaṃ tarhi siṃhatvāvinābhūtānekakriyāguṇasa- mudāyo 'nena vivakṣitaḥ, yatnagauravabhayānna svairabhidhānairbravīti | na cāsya samastasya kiṃ cidekaṃ vācakaṃ padamasti tenāvinābhāvitayā kathaṃ nu siṃhatvāttatpratītirbhavediti tattāva- dabhidhīyate | yataḥ sthitayā śabdaśaktyā puṃsāṃ vyavahāro na tadvaśena śaktyantaropajana iti | kiṃca—
yadyadhyāsena vaktṝṇāṃ gauṇī vṛttiḥ prakalpate |
vede sā na kathaṃcitsyādadhyāropayiturvinā ||
1(a॰ 1 pā॰ 1 sū॰ 4) atratyavṛttikāramatānuvāde bhāṣya iti śeṣaḥ |
tasmā1dguṇapravṛttiprayojano gauṇa ityeva lakṣaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ nānyathā | nanvevaṃ sati khapu- ṣpādīnāṃ svārthāvinābhūtaguṇābhāvādgauṇaprayogābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ, sāṃkhyādikalpitapradhānādini- ṣedhe ca baud‌dhādervinā 'dhyāropeṇa prayogāsaṃbhavo 'nabhyupagate hi pratiṣedhānarthakyamabhyupagate tadvirodhaḥ syādadhyāropitaniṣedhe tvadoṣa iti | atrābhidhīyate | tavaivāyaṃ doṣaḥ | kutaḥ—
adhyasyate khapuṣpatvamasatkathamavastuni |
prajñātaguṇasattākamadhyāropyeta vā na vā ||
yattāvatkhapuṣpasthānīya ātmā, khapuṣpaṃ bhavatsiddhānta ityādiprayogaḥ | tatra kataratkha- puṣpamanyattvayā siṃhatvavadavadhāritaṃ yadadhyāropyeta tena khapuṣpasvarūpameva tāvadadhyāropā- tmakamabhyupagantavyaṃ na caitasya loke gauṇatvapratītirmukhyārthāntarābhāvāt | prathama- pratītatvāddhi khapuṣpādisvarūpaṃ na mukhyatvādapaiti | kathamasato mukhyatvamiti cet, tulyamidaṃ gauṇatve 'pi | yatra tvadhyāropyate sa gauṇaḥ, na yo 'dhyāropyate khapuṣpaṃ vā ' '- ropyamāṇaṃ viṣayāntarābhāvātsvayamevādhyāropyate vā tatraitatsyāt | vidyamānaghaṭādirūpaṃ tatrādhyāropyate na gauṇatvamiti | tadayuktaṃ, khapuṣpādau sadrūpapratyayānutpādāt | avaśyaṃ hi yādṛksaṃbandhakāle 'rtho 'nubhūtastādṛguttarakālaṃ grahītavyam | na ca śaśaviṣāṇādyarthaḥ sa- drupeṇānubhūtapūrvaḥ, na cārthāntarasadrūpagrahaṇena khapuṣpādeḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate yayostadavayavayo- rarthasaṃbandho 'nubhūtastayornaiva gauṇatvaṃ mukhyātmanā 'vabodhāt | kathaṃ tarhi śaśaviṣāṇaṃ nāstītyucyate yadi tatsadrūpeṇa na pratītapūrvaṃ sadrūpratītasya vā kathamatyantapratiṣedho- papattiḥ | paśya—
anyatra jñātasadbhāvaḥ padārtho 'nyatra vāryate |
na tvekatraiva sadrūpamasadrūpaṃ ca gamyate ||
tenaivādhyāropyata iti cet, nādhyāropyasyāpyevameva pradeśāntarasadbhāvādhīna- tvāt | na cānyasadbhāvenānyasyādhyāropaḥ sidhyati, asaṃbandhāt | kathamūṣarasadbhāvena toyarūpādhyāropa iti cet | pradeśāntare toyasadbhāvapratītervaiṣamyam | kathaṃ tarhi śaśavi- ṣāṇaṃ nāstīti prayogaḥ | pūrveṇaivābhāve 'vagate nāstiśabdo 'nuvādaka iti kecit | 1paraparikalpitānāṃ gauṇīvṛttilakṣaṇānāṃ vedāprāmāṇyāpratipādakatve 'pi nāsmadabhimatasyeti niṣkṛṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇamāha—tasmādityādinā | tasmāt—guṇayoganimittāyāḥ śabdapravṛttergauṇatveneṣṭatvāt | guṇānāṃ svaśakyasiṃhādivṛttidharmāṇāṃ, devadattādirūpārthāntare, pravṛttiḥ—yogaḥ, prayojanaṃ—śabdapra- vṛttau nimittaṃ yasya śabdasya sa gauṇa ityarthaḥ | tattvaṃ tu, svasamānajātīyadharmavattvādhyāropitatvānyata- rasaṃbandhena svaṃśakyavṛttidharmavattvaṃ gauṇīlakṣaṇaṃ vijñeyam |
atha vā sāmānyena prāgabhāvādiṣu nāstiśabdaḥ pravartamānaḥ śaśaviṣāṇaśabdena viśeṣyate na śaśaviṣāṇamavyabhicārāttenetyadoṣaḥ | atha vā yenāvayavārthau gṛhītau samāsācca rājapuruṣā- divatsāmānyato dṛṣṭena ṣaṣṭhyarthasmṛtiḥ prasaktā, na ca kadācicchaśaḥ śṛṅgarahitatvenāva- dhāritapūrvastasyaitatsaṃsargānusaṃdhānaṃ vāryate | atha vā vinaiva samāsena śaśamadhikaraṇatvena nirdiśya viṣāṇaṃ ca gavādigataṃ vinaidhyāropeṇānayoḥ saṃbandho nāstīti kathite tenaivā- nūbhūtasaṃbandhasya śaśaviṣāṇaśabdastamevābhāvaṃ gamayiṣyati | atha vā śaśamūrdhavartināṃ pṛthivyavayavānāmuparyupari cīyamānānāṃ dṛḍhadīrghasaṃniveśarūpeṇa pariṇatānāṃ nīcairvṛttākā- reṇa yadavasthānaṃ sau 'sya vākyasyādhyāsamantareṇoktaviṣayaḥ saṃbhavatītyavirodhaḥ | tathā cā ' 'ha—
yāṃ niṣedhāḥ kriyāmāhurna yātītyevamādayaḥ |
tiṣṭhatītyādibhiḥ saiva vasturūpā pratīyate ||
tena labdhamukhyārthānāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādīnāmanyatrāpi prasiddhaya1nyathāsthāyinyarthe siddho gauṇaprayogaḥ | tava tu mukhyābhāvāt dūrībhūto gauṇaḥ | yadi ca svārtha eva gauṇatā tato 'rthāntareṇaiva vṛtteratyantābhāvaḥ syāt | na hyagniśabdo māṇavake gauṇībhūtastadadvāreṇa punaranyatra gauṇatāṃ pratipadyate tathā ca vakṣyati ‘na pratinidhau samatvā2t’ iti | ye 'pi pradhānatvādīnāṃ pratiṣedhāste 'pi nādhyāropanimittāḥ | kiṃ tarhi—
paramāṇuśarīrādikāraṇātmādivādibhiḥ |
tato 'nyādṛk pradhānātmarūpaṃ nāstīti varṇyate ||
pradhānādiśabdā jagatkāraṇādiviṣayāstatraiva bauddhādibhiḥ paramāṇvādyātmakakāraṇā- bhyupagamāt | śarīrasaṃtānādyātmakakalpanāccaṃ tadvayatiriktakāraṇādiniṣedhaḥ kriyate, para- 1sadrū/?/patvena yā prasiddhistato 'nyena prakāreṇa-asadrū/?/patvenāvasthānaṃ yasyetyathaṃ: | 2jai॰ sū॰ 6-3-14)|
māṇuśarīrādiṣveva pradhānātmādiśabdavṛttiriti yāvat | tasmātsvārthābhidhānenaiva gauṇatvami- tyaduṣṭam | ataśca yajamānaḥ pratītaḥ svārthasiddhikaratvaṃ lakṣayati, prastaraikakapālāvapi ca pāramparyeṇa yajamānārthasiddhiṃ kuruta iti kāryāpattestacchabdena stūyete | etena jātisārū- pyādīni vyākhyātāni |
jātiḥ | tatrā ' 'gneyādiśabdānāṃ brāhmaṇādiṣu mukhatvameva yena kenacitsaṃbandhena taddhitotpādāt | devatāsaṃbandha eva vā 'sti na hi yadeva tyajyate tasyaiva kevalaṃ devatāsaṃ- bandhaḥ tyakturapi tenaiva saṃbandhena saiva devatā bhavati | yathā ca va3kṣyati ‘bhavati puruṣa- svā/?/pi yaṣṭuḥ sā devatā’ iti | tasmādanudāharaṇa/?/tvam | ato yatrāgnirvai brāhmaṇa ityā- diprayogāstadudāhartavyam | agnirhi pratīto mukhaprabhavatvasāmānyena brāhmaṇādīnupasthāpa- 1tai॰ saṃ॰ ( 2-6-3 ) | 2tai॰ saṃ॰ ( 7—1—1 ) | 3( a॰ 5 pā॰ 4 a॰ 6 sū॰ 19 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥ |
yati | jātiriti cātra janmopādānaṃ vivakṣitaṃ, yadyapi ca tathā vastu nāsti tathā 'pya- rthavādāntare tathoktatvādiha tacchabdanimittatā pratipatsyate |
sārūpyam | nanu sarvatraiva sārūpyanimittaṃ gauṇatvam | satyamevam | iha tu cakṣurgrā- hyaśabdavivakṣayā pṛthagupādānam | cākṣuṣaṃ hi yūpasyordhvatvamañjananimittaṃ ca tejasvitvaṃ tad‌dvāreṇa yajamānādityaśabdābhyāṃ stūyate | yajamānasya hi paśudhāraṇe viniyuktasya nikhātasya ca svapadārthakaraṇavirodhaḥ | sahasraraśmestvaśakyameva yūpakāryamādhātum | yadi ca kaścinnāstikyāddāhapratikṛtimupādadyāttasyāpi gauṇatāpattirvidhiviṣayā syāttadvaraṃ stutāveva tadāśrayaṇamityavidhitvaṃ syāt |
praṃśasā | nanu sarvatra praśaṃsānimittatbaṃ guṇavādasyoktam | satyaṃ, phalamanyatra guṇa- vādasya praśaṃsā | atra tu guṇasārūpyādivatpravṛttinimittam | kathamiti cet—
gavāśvādigatāṃ pūrvamupādāya praśastatām |
tadabhāvo 'nyapaśvādau nañsamāsena kathyate ||
na tāvanmahiṣādīnāṃ paśutvasvarūpābhāvaḥ śakyate vaktuṃ, pratyakṣavirodhāt | kāryaprati- ṣedhaḥ kalpyeta, tadapi tatra tatra vacanavihitatvānna śakyameva | na ca vikalpo, vaiṣamyāt | kalpyo hyatra vidhiritaratra klṛptaḥ stutyā vā 'rthavattvānnāgatyā tadāśra/?/yaṇam | tulyaśca 1( tai॰ brā॰ 2—1—5 ) | 2tai॰ saṃ॰ ( 5—2—9 ) |
mukhyārthatyāgaḥ, ‘paśavo goaśvā’ iti ca punarupādānamanarthakam | na ca paśutvaikārthasama- vāyinaḥ kriyāguṇāḥ śakyāḥ pravivektum | atha gavāśvasamavāyino viśeṣāḥ pratiṣidhye- ran, evamapi mandaṃ phalam | anyaśabdenaiva ca tāvānarthaḥ siddha ityanarthakam | avaśyaṃ cottarapadena pratiṣedhye 'rthe prathamamupāttena tatrānuvartitavyaṃ, viṣayarahitapratiṣedhāsaṃbhavāt | na ca praśastatvādanyadupādīyamānamupayujyate |śaknuvanti ca gavāśvādisaṃbandhāttadgataṃ prāśastyaṃ gamayitum | yadyapyapraśastatvamapi śaknuvanti tathā 'pi prakramāpekṣayā tadihānākāṅkṣi- tamiti prāśastyameva niṣidhyate | tatpratiṣedhamātramapi ca naivaupayikamiti tad‌dvāreṇā- nyeṣāṃ praśastataratvaṃ kathyate | etaduktaṃ bhavati | gavāśvādīnapekṣya naivānyasya prāśastyaṃ vidyata ityevamanyagatapraśaṃsānimittaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ | sā ceha prathamataramāśritetyananyaprayojana- tayā paścādavagamyate | anyatra punaruttarakālamevaiṣā bhavantī nimittatvenocyate |
bhūmā | yadi ‘sṛṣṭīrupadadhāti’ ityākhyātapratyayabalādvidhirāśrīyate tatra na jātyā dharma- viśeṣeṇa vā kāścidiṣṭakāḥ sṛṣṭayo nāmānyābhyo vilakṣaṇā vijñāyante, yā evaṃvidhali- ṅgairmantrairupadhīyante tā eva sṛṣṭayaḥ, tatropadhānamātramuddiśyaṃ mantreṣu vidhīyamāneṣu sakalavyāpteḥ pratyakṣavacanāṃviniyuktaliṅgaprakaraṇaviniyojyamantrānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ | tasmātprakaraṇapāṭhādeva sarvatra mantreṣu prāpteṣvekadeśānuvādaḥ sṛṣṭyabhidhānanimittārthavādārthaḥ | atra codayanti | cayanacodanayaivopadhānasya prāptatvālliṅgaprakaraṇānumitayā ca śrutyā mantraprāpteḥ pradeśānta- 1tai॰ saṃ॰ ( 5—3—4 )
rasthārthavādānupapattirekavākyādhīnatvādarthavādapravṛtteḥ | tathā ca prathanārthavāde vyākhyātam | na cānyo guṇaḥ śrūyate yadarthatā kalpyeta tatra parisaṃkhyārthataiva prāpnoti | tataśca tadava- sthamānarthakyamiti vācyaṃ punaḥśrutiprayojanam | tatra kecidāhuḥ | upadhānamevātra vidhī- yate tanmāhātmyapradarśanārthaṃ ca mantragrahaṇam | itthamidaṃ praśastaṃ yadevaṃrūpairmantraiḥ kriyata iti | cayanenārthagṛhītamupadhānamiti cenna | saṃhatasthāpanenāpi cayanopapatteḥ | na caivaṃ saṃhatānāmevopadhānaṃ syāt | na tasyeṣṭakāḥ pratyupādīyamānasya pratipradhānāvṛttinyāyasiddheḥ | api ca—
prāpnuvantyapi vaktavyā punarevaṃvidhā kriyā |
ādhvaryavasamākhyānaṃ tathā hi pratipadyate ||
tataścādhvaryukartṛkatvaṃ ca labhyate | arthagṛhītāyāṃ tvaniyamaḥ syāt | na cāvaśyamu- padhāna eva sarve mantrā viniyujyeran | aviśiṣṭasāmarthyā hi kecid grahaṇādyapi kuryuḥ | api ca—
pratyakṣabrāhmaṇoktānāṃ madhyamā citirāśrayaḥ |
tadarthamapi saṃbandhaḥ kāryo mantropadhānayoḥ ||
ye tvaupānuvākyakāṇḍādhīnāsteṣāṃ vākyādṛte saṃbandha eva nāstītyarthavadeva vacanam | na cāvaśyamanena sūtreṇārthavādatvaṃ pratipādyate talliṅgāttalliṅgeṣu bhūyastvanimittaśabdapravṛ- ttimātrakathanādato nātīva sṛṣṭināmavidhānamādartavyam |
bhāṣyakāreṇa tu vidhau lakṣaṇāṃ pariharatā 'nuvādatvamāśritam | ‘ekayā stuvate’ iti hyanuvākādyasyaivāsṛṣṭiliṅgatvādātmaparityāgenetaralakṣaṇārthatā syāt, tallakṣayitvā ca punarātmā 'pi pratipādanīya ityatigauravam, upadhānastutyarthatvena punaranuvādatvāda- duṣṭā lakṣaṇā |
liṅgasamavāyaḥ | sṛṣṭivadeva prāṇabhṛdādiṣu codyaparihārāvalpaireva liṅgairbhūyasāmanevaṃ- 1tai॰ saṃ॰ 4—3—10 ) 2tai saṃ ( 5—2—10 )
liṅgānāṃ lakṣaṇamityudāharaṇabhedaḥ svārthāparityāgāccobhayatra lakṣaṇasyāpi grahaṇamupādī- yamānatvāditi |
āha ca—
yatra lakṣaṇamuddiśya lakṣye kāryaṃ niyujyate |

katham—
vidhau yadi viśeṣaḥ syātsaṃdehaḥ kasya vā bhavet |
stutisthe tvitarasyāṃpi tulyaivaiṣā vicāraṇā ||
yadi hyevaṃ bhavet ‘aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti ‘ ghṛteneti | tato naiva kiṃcidvi- cāryeta | atha tvañjanavākyavadihāpyevaṃ śrūyeta gāmānaya śuklaḥ praśasta iti tato 'styeva saṃdehakāraṇamityetadapyudāharaṇameva syāt | ato 'nyatra sāmānyamanyatra ca viśeṣa itye- tasmātsaṃdehaḥ | kecicca saṃśayadarśanādeva vidhistutyorvākyāntaratvamācakṣate |
yadi hyekaṃ bhavedvākyaṃ viśeṣe tatsamāpyate |
viśeṣāvagamāttatra na saṃdehaḥ prasajyate ||
vākyabhede punarekaṃ sāmānye parisamāptamanyadviśeṣaparamiti yuktaḥ saṃdehaḥ | yattu ‘vidhinā tvekavākya1tvāt’ iti tadaṅgapradhānavākyānāmiva paścātsaṃbandhasadbhāvābhiprā- yeṇa | tathā hi—
svārthabodhe samāptānāmaṅgāṅigatvādyapekṣayā |
vākyānāmekavākyatvaṃ punaḥ saṃhatya jāyate ||
na tvetadyuktamiva, ye hi padasaṃghātāḥ karmaupayikeṣvartheṣu paryavasyanti teṣāṃ nānāvā- kyatvaṃ yuktam | na tvarthavādānāmekavākyatvātprākprayojanalābha iti prathamamevaikavākyatā | durlabhataraśca saṃdehaḥ syādanyonyanirapekṣayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayoritaratretaratra ca paryavasā- nāt | yadeva hi yatropāttaṃ tadeva tatrāsaṃdigdhaṃ gṛhyate sāmānyasamāptaścātra vidhiḥ paścādvi- śeṣaḥ syāt | mantravarṇavaditi cet, evamapi ta2dadhikaraṇaviṣayatvātpaunaruktyaprasaṅgaḥ | tasmādekavākyatāyāmevopakramopasaṃhārayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣaviṣayatvena vipratipatteravaśyaṃbhā- vyekagocaratvācca kimadhīnā kasya pravṛttiriti jāyate saṃdehaḥ | kasya sāmañjasyamiti— yacchrutivṛttaṃ tatsamañjasaṃ na lakṣaṇāvṛttam | tatra ca—
stutīnāṃ vidhyadhīnatvādanuvādācca lakṣaṇā |
mukhyatvāttu vidhernāsāvavirodhācca kalpyate ||

vinā stutyā vidhānaṃ tu snehadravyāntare bhavet ||
yathā raudreṇāpi mantreṇa somo gṛhyamāṇo na kevalaṃ tadartho bhaviṣyatyanyadevatyasyāma- ntragrahaṇopapatterevamanarthavādakaṃ tailavasayorvidhānaṃ, yatraiva cāṃśe stutirdṛśyate tatra vidhyudde- śasya prarocanāśaktirapagacchati, anyatra tvavihataśaktinā vidhānamiti sarvasnehagrahaṇam | ucyate—
samāpyate vidhiḥ kaścitkadācinnāprarocitaḥ |
ghṛte prarocanāṃ dṛṣṭavā vidhistatrānumīyate ||
yadyapi tāvadvidhiprakrame tailavasayorapyupādānaṃ, tathā 'pi prarocanāto vidhirghṛte dṛśyate netarayorityanupādātavye kalpayitavyā ca tadviṣayā vidheḥ prarocanāśaktiḥ klṛptā ca ghṛte | tasyāṃ ca satyāṃ kālpanikī vākyaṃ bhinatti ghṛte ca klṛptāṃ gṛhṇannitaratra ca kalpa- yan vairūpyeṇāpi vidhirbhidyeta | tasmādvidhyuddeśe 'pi tailādibhyo 'panīyate | yadyapi ca sāmānyaśabdaḥ syāttathā 'pi na kaścidviśeṣaḥ | tatra sāmānyānyathānupapattyā yatra kvaca- nānuśrute viśeṣe 'pekṣite vākyaśeṣād ghṛta eva pratyayo bhavati, ghṛte ca śabdārthe yadi śrutyanurodhenātyantāśrutatailādityāgaḥ kriyate kiṃ virudhyate saṃdehamātraṃ hi tatra bādhitaṃ na tu pramāṇaṃ kiṃcit | kriyāmātrameva ceha coditaṃ dravyaṃ tatra na yāvatkiṃcit dravyamā-
kṣipyeta yadi kaścidapi śrutileśo na syāt | ghṛtārthavādadarśanāttvavaśyakartavyāyāmaśruta- dravyavidhikalpanāyāṃ nānyatra pramāṇamastītyaṅgīkṛtya ghṛtāñjanavidhirgamyate | tatra bhrāntyu- tpannatailādyākāṅkṣā nirmūlatvādbādhyamānā na duṣyetetyavirodhaḥ, tailādigrahaṇe ca lakṣaṇātrayaṃ syāt | kriyayā dravadravyeṇa ca viśeṣo ghṛtaśabdena ca sāmānyaṃ lakṣayitavyam | tasmā- d‌ghṛtagrahaṇaṃ pramāṇamiti siddham | vṛ1ttyantare tvatraiva mantravarṇo 'pyudātdṛtaḥ | tatra tu ghṛtena kiṃ kariṣyata iti vaktavyam || 24 ||

atha yatreti saṃdigdhe vākyaśeṣo na vidyate |
tatra sāmarthyasiddhena vidhyaṃśenaiva nirṇayaḥ ||
devatāprasādābhayaprārthanādau saṃhatahastasaṃyogamātramañjaliḥ, ‘nāñjalinā vāri pibet’ ityādau vyākośaḥ | saktuhomacodanāyāṃ śabdātsaṃdehe satyasati cā ' 'kośasya vākyaśeṣe '- nyathānupapatterevā ' 'kośāśrayaṇam | nanvanenaiva nyāyena yathā śaknuyāditi vākyaśeṣādandhā- dīnāmājyāvekṣaṇādirahitaḥ karmādhikāraḥ syāt | na | asaṃdehāt, saṃdigdhanirṇayārthā- ttvevaṃ kalpanā bhavati | na cādhikāre saṃdehaḥ samastadharmopetaṃ yathā śaknuyāttathā kuryā- diti vākyaśeṣāt | santi ca tādṛśasya kartāraścakṣuṣmadādaya iti na prayogacodanā- nyathānupapattiḥ | yatra tu yāvajjīvacodanādāvevaṃ bhaviṣyati tatra śaktikṛtāṅgatyāge 'pi 1asminnadhikaraṇe vṛttyantarodāhṛtamantravarṇopekṣaṇe bhāṣyakṛto 'bhiprāyamāha—vṛtyantare tviti | bhinnavākyatayā 'vagatapramāṇabhāvānāṃ mantrāṇāmapyatraiva saṃdigdhārthanirṇāyakatve vyavasthāpite ṣaṣṭhāntye paśucchāgādhikaraṇe nirṇeyārthā/?/bhāvena tadadhikaraṇamanarthakamāpadyeteti bhāvaḥ |
satyavaiguṇyaṃ pradhānasya coditamityāśrayiṣyāmaha eva | tasmādyāvadeva labdhātmako vidhi- stāvadyat kalpate tadvaidikaṃ, siddhe tu tatkalpanaṃ pauruṣeyatvādapramāṇaṃ sāmarthyādhīnatvādvā- kyaśeṣasiddheḥ | āha ca—

tenaiva caitā na samāmananti sahasrabhāgaṃ tu samāmaneyuḥ ||

karmabhedastāvadautsargiko lakṣaṇārthastadapavādatvenābhedaḥ | tadanuniṣpādinau tvapūrvabhedā- bhedau | tatra pratikarmabhedamapūrvabhedaprasaktau tṛtīyasiddhaḥ pradhānāpradhānavicāraḥ punarapavā- datvenā ' 'rapsyate | satyapyavahantyādīnāṃ śabdāntarādibhirbhede karmākāṅkṣitadṛṣṭaprayojanaparya- vasānānna kriyājanyāpūrvāntarotpattiḥ | yattu niyamāpūrvaṃ tatkriyākṛtaṃ na bhavatīti na tayā vyapadiśyate | tena yatraiva dravyādīni prati kriyāṇāṃ pradhānatvaṃ tatraiva tadbhedanimi- ttāpūrvabhedasiddhiḥ | asya ca vivekārthaṃ yadguṇapradhānalakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyate tadapavādārthaṃ ‘dharma- mātre tu’ ‘stutaśastrayoḥ’ iti cādhikaraṇadva3yaṃ prastoṣyate | tataścā ' 'khyātadvaividhye vicārite prasaṅgāttṛtīyaṃ prakāramabhidhāyakatvaṃ pratipādayituṃ mantraprastāvaḥ, tallakṣaṇādīni tu prasaktānuprasaktena yāvatpādasamāpti | tataḥ śabdāntarābhyāsābhyāṃ bhedamuktvā paurṇamā- syadhikaraṇenābhyāsāpavādaḥ kariṣyate samudāyānuvādatvāt | tatastadapavādārthamupāṃśuyā- jāghārāgnihotrapaśusomādhikaraṇāni | tataḥ saṃkhyāsaṃjñāguṇairbhedaḥ | tāvacca guṇagato vicāro yāvatprakaraṇāntarādhikaraṇam | tatastannyāyānuvṛtti rāśākhāntarādhikaraṇāt | tatra ca ṣaṭkātiriktabhedakāraṇavyudāsaḥ saṃjñābhyāsaguṇaprakriyāṇāṃ cā ' 'śaṅkānivṛttiri- tyetāvān bhedalakṣaṇārthaḥ | eṣa eva cārtho 'vaśyaṃ vaktavyoṅgāṅgitvādyavadhāraṇārtham | na cānyasyedānīmavasaro 'stītyamevādhyāyaṃsaṃbandhaḥ | kutaḥ—

yadi hi viśeṣo gamyetedaṃ phalasaṃbandhayogyamidaṃ neti tataḥ kiṃcideva saṃbadhyeta, ana- vagamyamāne tu sarvāṇi padāni phalenaiva saṃbadhyante | yadi caikaṃ phalasaṃbandhītarāṇi ca tatsaṃbandhīnīti kalpyate tato vājapeyādhikara1ṇanyāyenaikasya phalaṃ pratyupādānavidhānaguṇa- bhāvāditarattu pratyuddeśānuvādaprādhānyādvairūpyanimittavākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ | sarveṣāṃ tu phalaṃ pratyu- pādīyamānānāmaikarūpyāttantrasaṃbandhopapattiḥ | sarvaśca satisaṃbhave guṇamatilaṅdhya pradhānenaiva nityaṃ saṃbadhyate | tasmātsarveṣāṃ phalasaṃbandhāddharmatvaṃ, tatra tu kiṃ satrivatpratyekaṃ kṛtsnaṃ phalaṃ sādhayanti, atha darśapūrṇamāsavatsaṃhatya, tathā kiṃ vikalpena samuccayena vetyādi yatheṣṭaṃ kalpanīyam | tatra phalabhūmagarīyastvādekaśabdopādānābhāvātsatrivatpratyekaṃ sādhanaśaktya- vagamātsarvebhyaḥ pṛthakphalamiti pakṣaḥ | atha vā 'ruṇādinyāyenaikavākyopādānātsaṃhatānāṃ phalam | atha vaikanirākāṅkṣatvānna tadānīmevetarasaṃbandhopapattistasmādvikalpa iti | atrā- bhidhīyate—
phalena yasya saṃbandhastato 'pūrvaṃ prakalpyate ||

yadi hi phalasaṃbandhamātraparyavasāyyeva vākyaṃ bhavettataḥ kadā cidapi sarvāṇi phalena saṃbadhyeran | iha tu tāvanmātreṇāsiddherapūrvamanyatkalpayitavyaṃ taccānupapattipramāṇakaṃ, tatrai- kāpūrvakalpanayopapanne nādṛṣṭāntarakalpanāpramāṇamasti | yo hyanekānyapūrvāṇi kalpayati kalpayatyasāvekaṃ, taccetkalpitamarthavattvādvākyasya kṣīṇānyathānupapattirnāpūrvāntarasya pramā1ṇaṃ bhavati | tasmādekameva phalasaṃbandhi tasmāccāpūrvamitaratphalavadupakārītyadhyavasīyate | na cātra virodho bhaviṣyati nāmadheyatvena parihārāt | agatyā vā ‘daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ saṃmā- rṣṭi’ itivanmatvarthalakṣaṇāśrayaṇāt, arthākṣiptasādhyāṃśadvāreṇa vā dhātvarthairātmīyakaraṇa- grahaṇasiddheḥ | evaṃ sthite kataradekaṃ saṃbadhyatāmiti sarvathā 'nekādṛṣṭakalpanāparihārāda- niyamaprāptāvucyate—
pradhānaphalasaṃbandhi tatsaṃbandhyaṅgamiṣyate |
pradhānāṅgatvamekasya na caikatrāvakalpate ||
na hyekasminvākye tadeva kadā citphalasaṃbandhātpradhānaṃ kadā citphalavadupakārādaṅgaṃ yu- jyate niyatarūpatvādaṅgāṅgibhāvasya | tasmānniyogenaivā ' 'khyātapadānnāmapadādvā 'pūrvapratītiḥ | kaḥ punarbhāvaḥ ke vā bhāvaśabdā iti | yāvantaḥ phalasaṃbaddheṣu vākyeṣvākhyātaśabdā yajatijuhotītyevamādayasteṣu pratyayārthaprādhānyātkartari ca lakārotpatteryāgādiviśiṣṭakartra- bhidhānaṃ, kathaṃ cidvā viparyayātkartṛviśiṣṭayāgādyabhidhānaṃ manvānasya praśnaḥ | sa2tyāmapi caikaparyanuyogenobhayaparyanuyogasiddhau yo 'yaṃ yajanamijyā yāga ityādyudāhṛtyaiva bhāvārthatāṃ bravīti tannūnaṃ ke 'pyalaukikā bhāvaśabdā apītyubhayapraśnaḥ | siddhāntavādī tu bhavate- rṇijantāt ‘era3c’ ityacpratyaye kṛte bhāvanāvācinaṃ bhāvaśabdaṃ vyutpādyā ' 'khyātasya cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tatparatvaṃ kartrabhidhānapratiṣedhaṃ cābhipretyodāharati—yajati dadātī- 1anena ca adṛṣṭānumānasya prasaṅgo yasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ sā 'lpīyasī bhaviṣyatīti bhāṣyārthaḥ | sūcitaḥ | 2kaḥ punarbhāva ityanenaiva bhāṣyeṇa bhāvanākṣepadvārā tadvāciśabdākṣepasiddheḥ ke punarbhāvaśabdā iti punarākṣepo 'yukta iti matvā tadabhiprāyamāha—satyāmapītyādinā | ayamāśayaḥ | yadikaścidbhā- votpannalyuḍādipratyāntadhātuvācyasya bhāvatvābhyupagamenārthaparyanuyogaṃ pariharettaṃ prati śyenena yajete- tyādyetadadhikaraṇaviṣayabhūteṣu vākyeṣu tādṛgbhāvaśabdā bhāvādanya eva bhāvo bhāvaśabdāścābhibhatā iti pratyuttarasūcanāyobhayapraśna iti | na kevalaṃ bhāva evālaukikaḥ kiṃ tu bhāvaśabdā apītyapi- śabdārtho jñeyaḥ | 3pā॰ sū॰ ( 3-3-56 ) |
ti | paraḥ punarbhavaterṇijantādanyena naiṣo 'rtho 'bhidhīyate, na cā ' 'khyātapratyayasyātra vyā- pāro, dhātvantarārthatvāt | kāmaṃ tulyajātīyatvena dhātavo brūyuste 'pi tu yāgādivacana- tvādasamarthā iti matvā ' 'ha—nanuyāgadānahomaśabdā iti | atrocyate—
yāgadānādyanusyūto bhāvanātmā 'vagabhyate |
nityamākhyātaśabdebhyastasmādbhāvārthateṣyate ||
yāvānevahyananyalabhyo 'rthaḥ śabdādnamyate sa sarvaḥ śabdārthaḥ | sarvatra cā ' 'khyāte dhātvarthaśca tadanuraktā ca bhāvanā vijñāyate | tasmādbhāvārthatvavyapadeśaḥ | tadvayatiri- ktāstu dravyaguṇaśabdā vijñāyanta eveti na pṛṣṭāḥ | tatra dravyādiśabdānāṃ niṣpannārthā- bhidhāyināṃ karaṇārthatvayogyatvātprāpnoti phalasaṃgatiḥ | sarvatra hi phalaṃ sādhyatvātsiddha- rūpaṃ sādhanamapekṣate na sādhyāntaraṃ, nāmārthaśca siddhatvāttadapekṣāpūraṇamartho nā ' 'khyātārthaḥ svayameva tāvatsādhyatvāt | tasmād‌dravyādibhiḥ phalamiti prāpte sū2treṇottaraṃ dīyate—
bhāvārthaḥ karmaśabdā ye tebhyo 'pūrvakriyāgatiḥ |
taiḥ kuryādyajinā svargameṣa hyartho vidhīte ||
1aviśeṣeṇeti—yadi bhāvaśabdebhya eva bhāvyākāṃkṣotpadyate na dravyaguṇaśabdebhya iti viśeṣaḥ syāttato dravyaguṇaśabdānāṃ nairākāṅkṣyeṇā ' 'kāṅkṣānibandhanaphalasaṃbandhāyogānnāpūrvagamakatvaṃ syāt | natvetadasti, dravyaguṇaśabdebhyo 'pi karaṇavibhaktyantebhyaḥ sādhyākāṅkṣotpatteraviśeṣādityarthaḥ | nāto 'vyavasthitaśāstrārthānupapatteraniyamapūrvapakṣāyoga iti śaṅkāvasara iti bhāvaḥ | 2 anena pratipadā- dhikaraṇapūrvottarapakṣayorustū/?/tratvamuktaṃ bhavati |
phalasaṃbandho heturapūrvapratipatteḥ | saṃbandhaścā ' 'kāṅkṣāpūrvakaḥ | sā ca bhāvaśabdebhyaḥ prasarpantī dṛśyate na dravyaguṇaśabdebhyaḥ | tasmādākhyātebhyo 'pūrvabhāvanā gamyate | tatra ca dhātvarthasya karaṇatvapratipattiḥ pratyāsatteḥ | atastenaiva phalakaraṇabhūtenānyathānupapattyā 'pūrvaṃ bhāvyata ityavadhāryate | kathaṃ punaryajyādīnpṛthakṛtya kevalapratyayavācya eva bhāvanārtho labhyate bhāvayediti | kutaḥ—
abhidadhyuḥ svaśaktyā hi vidhimātraṃ liṅādayaḥ |
ṇyantasya bhavaterarthaḥ kenāṃśenābhidhīyate ||
na ca dhātvantarārthaṃ yajyādayaḥ pratipādayanti | svārthamātravyāpṛtatvāt | ataḥ śabdarahitamevedaropyate bhāvayediti | kiṃ ca—
śabdāntarasya yo 'pyarthaḥ paryāyairabhidhīyate |
na sa tenaiva sahitastasminnarthe prayujyate ||
tadyathā pikamānayetyukte yo nāmārthaṃ na pratipadyate tasmai kokilaśabdameva kevalaṃ prayuñjate na kokilaḥ pika iti, tathā 'tra yadyākhyātasya karotirṇyanto vā bhavatiḥ paryāyaḥ tatastadarthakathane tanmātrameva prayoktavyaṃ nā ' 'khyatapratyayo 'pi, na hi tadānīṃ vivicya jñāyate kenāṃśena kriyā pratyāyyata iti | atra tu bhāvayetkuryāditi vā puna- rapi liṅ prayujyata eva | ataśca yo 'naina yajateḥ pareṇārthaḥ pratipādito 'sau bhāvayate- rapi pareṇa tenaivetyadhikāvāpa eva bhāvayatiḥ | tasmādavaidika iti | atrābhidhīyate | sarvatraiva tāvat—
siddhakartṛkriyāvācinyākhyātapratyaye sati |
sāmānādhikaraṇyena karotyartho 'vagamyate ||
iha kebhyaściddhātubhyaḥ parā tiṅ‌vibhaktiruccāryamāṇā kartrātmalābhamātrameva vyāpāraṃ pratipādayati yathā 'stibhavatividyatibhyaḥ | aparebhyastu siddhe kartaryanyātmalābhaviṣayavyāpā- rapratītiḥ | yathā yajati dadāti pacati gacchatīti | dravyameva ca viśiṣṭaśaktyupetaṃ pracalitā
tmatattvaṃ viprakīrṇasvabhāvaṃ pūrvāparībhūtaṃ prathamāvasthātaḥ pracyutaṃ parāmavasthāmaprāptaṃ vyāpāra- śabdavācyaṃ bhavati | tatra kadācitkartaivaivamavasthaḥ pratīyate, kadācitsiddhe kartaryanyaḥ | tadyadā karturevaiṣā 'vasthā bhavati tadā 'sau svayamevānyasmādātmalābhamapekṣamāṇaḥ paraniṣpa- ttāvavyāpriyamāṇatvānna karotiśabdavācyatāṃ pratipadyate | yadā tu labdhātmako 'nyatra vyāpriyate tadā karotītyevamapadiśyate | tathā ca kiṃ karoti paṭhati gacchatīti sāmānya- viśeṣarūpeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogo dṛśyate, na tu kiṃ karoti bhavatyasti veti prayujyate | tasmāllabdhātmakaka/?/rtṛvyāpāravacanāni karotyarthavantyākhyātāni | tatra ca kriyamāṇena kenacidavaśyaṃ bhavitavyam | kutaḥ—
karotiḥ kriyamāṇena na kaścitkarmaṇā vinā |
bhavatyarthasya kartā ca karoteḥ karma jāyate ||
karoternityaṃ sakarmakatvādyāvatkriyamāṇaṃ na labhyate na tāvadarthaḥ paryavasyati | sarvakā- rakāṇāṃ cāvāntarakriyāsu kartṛtvaṃ pratipādyamānānāṃ pradhānakriyāsu karmādivibhāgo jāyate | pratikriyaṃ yogyatābhedādavāntarākriyāvaicitryaṃ bhavati | tatrānvayavyatirekābhyāmidamavagataṃ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartā karoteḥ karma saṃpadyata iti | tathā hi—
nityaṃ na bhavanaṃ yasya yasya vā nityabhūtatā |
na tasya kriyamāṇatvaṃ khapuṣpākāśayoriva ||
ya eva hi pravṛttabhavanaḥ saṃbhāvitabhavano vā 'nyena prayujyate sa eva kriyamāṇatvenā- vadhāryate nānyaḥ | tathā ca na kaścitkhapuṣpamākāśaṃ vā kurvannupalabhyate | yatrāpi pādau kurvityādiṣu niṣpannānāṃ karmatvaprayogo dṛśyate tatrāpyaniṣpannasaṃskārādivivakṣayā pādādi- śabdaprayogādavyabhicāraḥ | satyapi ca karoteranekārthatve sarvatra gandhanāvakṣepaṇādau kiṃ- cidanutpannotpādanasāmānyamavagamyate | atha vā yadā 'syotpādanābhidhāyitvaṃ tadaiva viśi- ṣṭākhyātasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tadgatasyotpādyamānameva karma bhavatītyupapannam | tena bhavatikriyā tāvallabdhā | tataśca—
karotyarthasya yaḥ kartā bhavituḥ sa prayojakaḥ |
bhavitā tamapekṣyātha prayojyatvaṃ prapadyate |
bhavatikarotyoḥ śaktibhedādviklidipacatyoriva niyataṃ prayojyaprayojakavyāpāravacana- tvam | tatra ca kadācidabhidhīyamānakarmaśaktyā ' 'kṣiptaprayojya1vyāpāro vā svayamevā ' 'kṣi- 1ghaṭaṃ karotītyādau dvitīyābhihitayā karmākhyayā, śakyā, ākṣiptaḥ prayojyasya ghaṭasya, bhavanākhyo vyāpāro yasya dhātorityarthaḥ | karotimātraprayoge kathamākṣepa ityāśaṅkāyāmāha—svaya- meveti | ghaṭo bhavatītyādau prathamābhihitakartṛśaktyākṣiptaḥ prayojyavyāpāro yasminnityarthaḥ | tathā ca prayojyaprayojakavyāpārayoranyataravācidhātuṣvitarapratītirākṣepeṇaiveti na tasminnapi śabdavyāpārakalpa- nāvasara iti bhāvaḥ |
ptaprayojyavyāpāro vā kevalaṃ prayojakavyāpāra eva vivakṣyate kaṭaṃ karoti, odanaṃ paca- tīti | kadācidākṣiptaprayojakavyāpāraṃ prayojyavyāpāramātraṃ, ghaṭo bhavati, viklidyanti taṇḍulā iti | kadācidubhau bhinnau samuccitya prayogaḥ, karoti kaṭaṃ devadattaḥ sa ca bhavati | kadācidupasarjanībhūtaprayojakavyāpāraḥ prayojyavyāpāraḥ kriyate devada- tteneti svayameveti vā prayoge | kadācitpunaḥ samānapadaikadeśopāttopasarjanībhūtaprayojya- kriyaḥ prayojakavyāpāro vivakṣyate tadā ca karotipacatyostādātmyenāśakteraprayogādbhū- viklidyośca kevalaprayojyakriyāniṣṭhatvānna sākṣātpravartituṃ śaktirastīti vācakatvena dyota- katvena vā ṇijaparaḥ prayujyate bhāvayati vikledayatīti ca | tathā cā ' 'ha—
prayojyakartṛkaikāntavyāpārapratipādakāḥ |
ṇyantā eva prayujyante tatprayojakakarmasu ||
na ca teṣāmaṇyantānāmaśaktirityanyeṣāmaśaktyā bhavitavyam | anyeṣāṃ vā śakti- rityeṣāmapi tadvadbhavitavyam | kutaḥ—
śaktayaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ nānuyojyāḥ svabhāvataḥ |
tena nānā vadantyarthānprakṛtipratyayādayaḥ ||
evaṃ karotyarthadvāreṇa sarvākhyāteṣu bhāvayatyarthaḥ siddhaḥ |
tena bhūtiṣu kartṛtvaṃ pratipannasya vastunaḥ |
prayojakakriyāmāhurbhāvanāṃ bhāvanāvidaḥ ||
yattūktaṃ na vidhitvavyatiriktaṃ liṅādayo 'rthaṃ vadantīti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ—
abhidhābhāvanāmāhuranyāmeva liṅādayaḥ |
arthātmabhāvanā tvanyā sarvākhyāteṣu gamyate ||
yadā hi sarvākhyātānuvartinī karotidhātuvācyā puruṣavyāpārarūpā bhāvanā 'vagatā bhavati tadā tadviśeṣāḥ sāmānyākhyātavyatiriktaśabdaviśeṣavācyā vidhipratiṣedhabhūtabha- viṣyadvartamānādayaḥ pratīyante | tathā ca sarvatra sāmānyataḥ karotyartho 'vagamyate, kiṃ karoti pacati, kimakārṣīdapākṣīt, kiṃ kariṣyati pakṣyati, kiṃ kuryātpacet, kiṃ na kuryā- nna pacediti | tatrārthātmikāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ liṅādiśabdānāṃ yaḥ puruṣaṃ prati prayojakavyā- pāraḥ sā dvitīyā śabdadharmo 'bhidhātmikā bhāvanā vidhirityucyate | viśeṣataśceyama- rthavādādhikaraṇe varṇitā yattu paryāya/?/sthityatilaṅghanaṃ pratyayāparityāgādabhihitam | tatro- cyate—
kevalasyāprayogitvātkartṛsaṃkhyādisaṃgrahāt |
rūpāvināśasiddheśca pratyayo 'pi prayujyate ||
yadi hi kevalaḥ karotirbhāvayatirvā prayogārhau syātāṃ tataḥ kokilaśabdaprayoge pikaśabdavatpratyayo na prayujyeta, na tu kevalāyāḥ prakṛteḥ prayogaḥ, apabhraṃśatvaprasaṅgāt | tena yasmin kasmiścitpratyaye prayoktavye yasyaivārthaḥ kathyate sa evānuvādabhūtaḥ prakṛtyanu- grahārthaṃ prayujyate nānyo 'bhyadhikārthāntarāpattiprasaṅgāt | nanu ca, ik‌śtipau dhātunirdeśe vihitāvatastadyuktau karotibhāvayatī prayujyeyātām | naitadasti | tathā sati śabdapadā- rthak‌tvānnaiva tāmyāmākhyātārthaḥ kathyeta | yattu kvacidarthe 'pi dhātumik‌śtibantaṃ prayu- ñjate yajiḥ, yajatiḥ, iti ca | tat, śabde 'bhihite lakṣaṇayā 'rthapratītirityavagantavyaṃ, na ceha kiṃcillakṣaṇāśrayaṇe prayojanamasti yenāvācakaḥ prayujyeta | tatrānyadevāniṣṭamā- padyeta kṛñbhuvau dhātū tiṅā 'bhidhīyete iti | tasmādarthaparatvasiddhayarthamākhyātapratyayasahitā- veva prayujyete | yadi ca bhāvanaivaikā pratyayārthaḥ syātkarotibhāvayatī vā samastapratyayā- rthopādānasamarthau bhavetāṃ tataḥ kevalaprayogo 'pyāśaṅkayeta, na tu tadubhayamapyastīti karoti- bhāvayatibhyāṃ kathite 'pi bhāvanārthe kartṛsaṃkhyādipratyāyanārthaṃ punaḥ pratyaya uccāryate | yastu tatra bhāvanābhidhānāṃśaḥ sa prāptatvādanūdyate, anyathā hi bhāvanaivaikā pratyayārthaḥ karotibhāvayatī vā kartṛsaṃkhyādīnāmapyabhidhāyakāviti bhrāntiḥ syāt | nityaṃ ca pūrvā- parībhūtā bhāvanā ' 'khyātenocyate | tatra yadi pratyayāntaraṃ prayujyate tataḥ karotibhāva- yatibhyāṃ dravyavadupasaṃhṛtarūpocyamānā naivā ' 'khyātasadṛśī kathyeta | tasmādavaśyaṃ tadapi prayoktavyamiti | kiṃ ca—
bhāvanā gamyamānā ca dhātupratyayasaṃnidhau |
kasya vācyeti vispaṣṭaṃ na kadācitpratīyate ||
yadi hyekāntenāsyāḥ pratyayārthatvamavadhāryeta tataḥ karotibhāvayatibhyāṃ pratyayapauna- ruktyāśaṅkā syānna tu tadasti, ubhayasaṃnidhau gamyamānatvāt | kevalaprakṛtipratyayaprayo- gābhāvāddhi na viveko vijñāyate | śakyate hi vaktuṃ dhātusahitena pratyayenocyata iti | athavā pratyayānugṛhītena dhātunā, atha vobhābhyām | na ca śaktikalpanāyāṃ viśeṣaḥ, sarvathā 'rthāpattisāmyānna ca vivekajñānaprayojanamasti | syādetat, kṛdantāddhātorapratīte- stiṅa‌vyabhicāriṇyeva neti | tadayuktam | astividyatibhavatipareṣu pratyayeṣvapyadarśanāt | na vā kṛdanteṣvapyatyantaṃ bhāvanā nāsti kiṃcidapakṛṣyamāṇarūpapratīteḥ | kṛtyeṣu tāva- dbhoktavyam yaṣṭavyamiti kiṃcinnyūnā ' 'khyātādgamyate | tatrāpi karmotpanneṣu dravyaprādhā-
nyād‌brāhmaṇo na hantavya iti bhāvotpannebhyo nyūnatarā | na hi tatra prayojakavyāpāraprā- dhānyam | ekatra dhātvarthaprādhānyādaparatra svavyāpāraviśiṣṭaprayojyaparatvāt | etena bhāva- karmotpannalakārāstiṅo 'pi vyākhyātāḥ | teṣvapi hi prayojakavyāpāraguṇatvapratītira- viśiṣṭā | ato na tiṅantānāṃ tulyakalpatvam | tathā ‘avyayakṛto bhāve bhavanti’ iti smaraṇāviśeṣe 'pi svasaṃvedyamīṣannyūnabhāvanāvijñānam | ‘abhikrāmaṃjuhoti’ ‘darbhataruṇa- kenopaghātaṃ juhoti' abhiṣutya hutvā bhakṣayanti' purā vācaḥ pravaditoḥ’ iti sarvatra śrutyaiva bhāvanāntarasāpekṣā bhāvanā 'vagamyate | pakvaḥ pakvavānityapi nirvṛttarūpabhāvanopasa- rjanadravyapratītiḥ pratyakṣā | evaṃ pācakādiṣvapi draṣṭavyam | tathā ca sarvatra kārakāpekṣā dṛśyate | anyathā hi rụ̄dhitaddhitasamāsoṣviveyaṃ na syāt | na ca nirvyāpārāṇāmete vyapadeśā bhavanti | na cāsti sa vyāpāro yatra kiṃcidasanna janyate | tataśca siddhaḥ karotibhāvayatyorarthaḥ | śakyate ca sarvatra sāmānādhikaraṇyamapi darśayituṃ vinā 'pi pūrvā- parībhūtatvena | tadyathā kiṃ kartavyaṃ paktavyaṃ, kathaṃkāraṃ juhoti abhikrāmam, kiṃ kṛtvā- juhoti abhiṣutya, kiṃ kṛtavān pakvavān, kiṃ kṛtaṃ pakvaṃ, kiṃkriyo devadattaḥ paktā, keyaṃ kriyā pāka iti | na ca karotisāmānādhikaraṇyātiriktamākhyāteṣvapi bhāvanāpramāṇaṃ vidyate | tasmāddhātavo 'pi bhāvanāṃ na muñcanti | tathā cā ' 'huḥ2 karotirartheṣviva sarvadhātū- niti | yattvasyāḥ prādhānyaṃ tatkāmaṃ tiṅā 'bhidheyaṃ dyotyaṃ vā 'nvayavyatirekābhyāmastu na svarūpam | nanvevamapi yāgeneti dhātvarthe niṣkṛṣṭe tenaiva bhāvanā 'pyupātteti bhāvayediti punaḥ prayogo na prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | tathā hi | vdyarthasya jātorbhedenārthe kathyamāne yāgeneti viśeṣarūpaṃ karaṇātmanā niṣkṛṣṭam | itarattu bhāvanātmakaṃ sāmānyarūpaḥ śabdā- ntareṇa bhāvayedityanena kathyate | athavā kecitkaraṇāśakartṛsaṃkhyādayaḥ prakṛtipratyayayo- rbhedena vācyāḥ | bhāvanā tu samudāyāvyabhicārātsamuditayorevārtha ityapi śakyaṃ vaktum | tathā ca sūtrakārabhāṣyakārābhyāṃ bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdā iti sāmānādhikaraṇyamevā ' 'śritaṃ na bhāvārthatvena pratyayāḥ kathitāḥ | śāstre tu sarvatra pratyayārtho bhāvaneti vyavahāraḥ | tatrā- yamabhiprāyaḥ—
pratyayārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ prakṛtipratyayau sadā |
prādhānyādbhāvanā tena pratyayārtho 'vadhāryate ||
1tai. saṃ. ( 2-6-1 ) 2 sarvadhātūnāṃ karotyarthavācittve vṛddhasaṃmatimāha—tathā cā ' 'huriti | vibhajya senāṃ paramārthakarmā senāpatīścāpi puraṃdarotthaḥ | niyojayāmāsa sa śatrusainye karotirartheṣviva sarvadhātūn || iti |
yadyapyanyadvivekakāraṇaṃ nāsti tathā 'pi prādhānyaṃ pratyayārthadharmaṃ dṛṣṭavā nūnamiyaṃ pratya- yārtha ityavagamyate—
tathā kramavatornityaṃ prakṛtipratyayāṃśayoḥ |
pratyayaśrutivelāyāṃ bhāvanātmā 'vagamyate ||
na kevalametāvevānvayavyatirekau yau parasparaparityāgena lakṣyete tasminneva hi pade ‘tadāgame hi taddṛśyate’ ityanena nyāyena viveko 'vadhāryate | yattvastyādiparaḥ pratya- yo 'pi bhāvanāṃ jahātīti tulyaṃ dhātusamudāyapakṣayorapyetat | sarvathā yatra pratīyate tatra tāvatpratyayārthatvaṃ niścīyate | anyatra tvayaṃ vicāra eva nāsti | kvacid‌vyabhicārasya cottaramuktaṃ tadbhū1tādhikaraṇe | atha vā naivātrāpi vyabhicāraḥ | kutaḥ—
astyādāvapi kartraṃśe bhāvye 'styeva hi bhāvanā |
anyatrāśeṣabhāvāttu na tathā sā prakāśate ||
yadyapi karturaniṣpannatvādvayatiriktabhāvayitavyābhāvādastyādiṣu prayojakavyāpāro nātīva lakṣyate tathā 'pi pratyayasāmarthyādbhāvayatītyavagamyate | kimityapekṣite cāniṣpanne kartaryanyatkiṃcidityakalpanādātmānamityeva saṃbadhyate kena bhāvanena kathaṃ, avayavajananādi- prakāreṇeti | trayo 'pi tatra bhāvanāṃśā bhavanenaiva pūryante vyāpārāntarāsaṃbhavāt | tatra keci- davayavā bhāvanavyāpṛtāḥ prayujyante kecitsiddhabhavanāḥ prayojakāḥ | siddhabhavanāsiddhabhavana- varti ca sāmānyamubhayasaṃparkādbhāvanetyucyate | etena jāyate niṣpadyate sidhyatītyādīni vyākhyātāni | astiḥ punarjanisamānārthādbhavateruparitanīmavasthāmabhilapansattayā ' 'tmabhavanaṃ bhavadbhāvayatītyevamākhyātapratyayaṃ labhate | tatrāpi tu kālakṛtabhedapūrvottarasāmānyasattārū- peṇa pūrvavadeva prayojyaprayojakavyāpārakalpanā 'nusartavyā | satyāmapi tvevamādiṣu bhāva- nāyāṃ niṣpannacetanakartṛviṣayatvādvidhipratiṣedhayorasaṃbhavaḥ | syādetat | dṛṣṭo vidhirapi ‘tasmātprāyaṇīyasyāh‌na ṛtvijā bhavitavyam’ ‘rathaṃtaraṃ bhavati’ ‘atrādhvaryuḥ syāt’ ‘ihokthyāni syuḥ’ iti | satyaṃ dṛśyate na tviha pūrveṇa tulyo bhavatyarthaḥ | siddho hi puruṣaḥ karmasaṃbandhanimittamṛtviktvaṃ bhavadanyaireva vākkāyamano vyāpārairbhāvayedityucyate | tathā rathaṃtarādiṣu satyapi śrutyā bhavanavidhisaṃbandhe tatra saṃbhavādanumīyamānā bhāvanaiva vidhī- yate | yatra tvihāmuko bhavediti prayogastatra bhavatestiṣṭhatyarthavācitvātsaṃbhavatyeva vyati- riktaṃ bhāvayitavyamityevaṃ vijñāyate | sthānenānyatkiṃcidbhāvayediti | tena bhūtabhaviṣyadvarta- mānāpadeśamātreṣvevāpāramārthikaṃ bhavitṛvyāpārasya bhāvanātvaṃ na vidhyādiṣu | bhūtādikatha- 1( a॰ 1 pā॰ 1 a॰ 7 ) atreti śeṣaḥ |
ne 'pi yadā samastaṃ vyāpāraṃ dhāturevopādatte nāvayavakālādikṛtabhedāśrayaṇaṃ tadā vispaṣṭā- dvirodhāddhātvarthamātraṃ kartṛsaṃkhyādayaścā ' 'khyātapadārthatvenāvadhāryante na bhāvanā | na ca bhāvanāvyabhicāreṇa doṣa ityuktam | yattu kṛdanteṣvapi dhātavo bhāvanāṃ na vyabhicarantī- ti | satyaṃ dhātvarthā na vyabhicaranti taireva tu gamyamānatvādanabhidheyatvamapi śakyaṃ vaktum | tathā hi—
dhātvarthakārakaireva guṇabhūto 'vagamyate |
bhāvanātmā kṛdanteṣu tasmānnaivābhidhīyate ||
yathaiva bhāvapradhānatvādākhyāte tatsaṃbandhādeva guṇabhūtakārakapratītisiddherna kartṛkarmaṇo- rabhidhānaṃ bhaviṣyatyevaṃ kartādyabhidhānādeva tadanyathānupapattyā bhāvanāsiddheranabhidhānaṃ, gamya- mānāpekṣayaiva ca karotisāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ yathā pacatiśabdasya devadattaśabdena, atathābhūta- yaiva ca kārakasaṃbandho 'pyupapatsyate | atha vā bhāvanopasarjanadhātvarthaniṣpattyarthatvātkāra- kāṇāṃ dhātvarthenaiva saṃbandhasiddhiḥ | sa eva hi tāni svasiddhayarthamapekṣate bhāvanā 'pi ca tathābhūtānyeva tāni gṛhṇātītyaviruddhaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | kṛtyānāṃ tu praiṣavācitvātsatyapi bhāvanānabhidhāne tāvatsvārthaparyavasānaṃ nāsti yāvadaṃśatrayaparipūrṇā bhāvanā na labdhā | kutaḥ—
svavyāpāre hi puruṣaḥ kartṛtvena niyujyate |
praiṣaistasya svarūpaṃ ca bhāvanāṃ 'śatrayātmikā ||
na hi puruṣaḥ svavyāpāraṃ muktvā 'nyadanuṣṭhātuṃ śaktaḥ praiṣāścainamanuṣṭhāpayanti | te yadi tadvyāpāraṃ kathaṃcinnopādadyurna niyoktuṃ śaknuyurityevamapi bhāvanākṣepasiddhiḥ | yāvāṃśca brāhmaṇagataḥ kaścitpraiṣaḥ sa sarvaḥ prāptyabhāvādvidhireva bhavatīti vinā 'pi smaraṇena kṛtyānāṃ vidhāyakatvam | ayameva ca vidhipraiṣayorviśeṣaḥ |
pravartanasmṛtiḥ prāpte praiṣa ityabhidhīyate |
aprāptapraiṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ vidhitvaṃ pratipadyate ||
tasmātpratyayārtho bhāvanetyupapannam | nanu ca yadi prayojakavyāpāro bhāvaneṣyate tataḥ pacāvadhiśrayaṇādīni, yajau ca mānasaḥ saṃkalpa ityādīnāṃ bhāvanātvaṃ ta eva dhātvarthā iti dhātuvācyaiva bhāvanā syāt | naiṣa doṣaḥ—
dhātvarthavyatirekeṇa yadyapyeṣā na labhyate |
tathā 'pi sarvasāmānyarūpeṇānyā 'vagamyate ||
sarvatra hyadhiśrayaṇādau karotītyapi sāmānyavyāpārāṃśaḥ pratīyate pacatyādivācyā viklittyadhiśrayaṇādayaḥ karmasthāḥ kartṛsthāśca | tatra yadaudāsīnyapracyutimātreṇa parispanda-
rūpaṃ nirūpyate sā bhāvanā | ye tu tadanurañjanasamarthāḥ kartṛkarmagatā viśeṣāste tasyā eva karaṇetikartavyatāṃśayorniviśante | evaṃ tarhi dhātvarthasāmānyaṃ bhāvanetyetadāpannam | satyaṃ sādhyatayā sāmānyaṃ na tu gotvādirūpeṇa | katham—
anyadeva hi yāgādau sāmānyaṃ karaṇātmakam |
anyacca bhāvanā nāma sādhyatvena vyavasthitam ||
bhāvanāyāṃ hi svayameva pratipuruṣaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣau bhavataḥ | tathā tat karaṇabhūte yāgādau samavetaṃ bhāvanākaraṇāṃśāpekṣitaṃ dhātvarthasāmānyaṃ nāma yatkarmaśabdenābhidhīyate | viśeṣaṇabhāvācca yāgādayo bhāvanāviśeṣā ityucyante na tad‌vyaktitvena | śāstrapradeśe tu kriyākarmaśabdau kadā ciddhātvarthe prayujyete kadācidbhāvanāyāṃ kadācittu pratyāsattyo- bhayannāpi prayogo na svarūpābhidhānena | kutaḥ—
yādṛśī bhāvanā ' 'khyāte dhātvarthaścāpi yādṛśaḥ |
nāsau tenaiva rūpeṇa kathyate 'nyai padaiḥ kvacit ||
bhāvanāśabdo hi niṣpannātmikāṃ sattvarūpāpannāṃ liṅgasaṃkhyāyoginīmabhidhatte na cāsāvākhyāte tādṛśyabhidhīyate liṅgasaṃkhyārahitarūpeṇa gamyamānatvāt | evaṃ dhātvartho 'pi veditavyaḥ | tathā karoti bhāvayatītyetābhyāmapi śrutyā tāvadanyādṛgevārthaḥ pratīyate kuñbhāvayatyarthakaraṇikā bhāvanā na caivaṃrūpā 'sau yajetetyādiṣvastītyaparyāyatvam | tatrānantarapratyayotthāpitabhāvanāntarabuddhimavivakṣitvā 'rthasaṃvādaḥ kartavyaḥ | tenādūraviprakarṣa- mātreṇaiṣa prayogo nārthasāmyenetyavasthitamananyaśabdavācyatvaṃ bhāvanāyāḥ | sā tu pratīta- mātraiva prādhānyādapekṣāntarānadhīnatvācca prathamaṃ tāvatsādhyāṃśamapekṣate bhāvayetkimiti | tatra yāvatī vidhyupetā bhāvanā tasyāṃ pūrvapratītamapi vidhitvaṃ tāvannā ' 'śrīyate yāvadaṃśatraya- pūrṇā bhāvanā 'nuṣṭhānayogyā na bhavati | vidhitvaprakramācca prathamamevaitaj‌jñāyate yādṛśairaṃśaiḥ pūrṇeyaṃ vidhānamarhati tādṛśaiḥ pūrayitavyeti | na ca buddhipūrvakārī puruṣaḥ puruṣārtharahitaṃ vyāpāraṃ vacanaśatenāpyukto 'nutiṣṭhati | na ca puruṣārthaḥ sādhyavyatiriktāṃśapātitvena kaiścitprā- rthyate tato 'bhyarhitatarasyānyasya sādhyasyāvidyamānatvāt | tatra yadyasyāṃ bhāvanāyā- mapuruṣārthaḥ sādhyaḥ syāttataḥ puruṣeṣvapravartamāneṣu pratyayasya prayojakaśaktirbādhyeta | tena yadyapi samānapadopādānapratyāsatterdhātvarthaḥ sādhyāṃśapūraṇāyopaplavate tathā 'pyayogyatvā- nnirākriyate, na hi pratyāsattirevaikā saṃbandhakāraṇaṃ, yogyatvādyapi | tathā ca vakṣya1ti yasya yenārthasaṃbandha iti | kiṃ ca— 1yasya yenārthasaṃbandho dūrasthasyāpi tena saḥ | arthato hyasamarthānāmānantaryamakāraṇam | ityā- dinā viśvajidadhikaraṇe pūrvācāryo vakṣyatītyevaṃ vṛddhasaṃmatimāha—tathā cetyādinā |
saṃbandhamātramuktaṃ ca śrutyā dhātvarthabhāvayoḥ |
tadekāṃśaniveśe tu vyāpāro 'syā na vidyate ||
saṃbandhamātraṃ kṛtvā nivṛttavyāpārāyāṃ śrutāvanyatarāṃśaniveśo yogyatvādāśrayitavyaḥ | tadyadi sādhyāṃśādekapratyayopāttena pratyāsannatareṇa vidhitvena pracyāvyate tarto 'śāntareṇa nūnaṃ saṃpatsyata ityevaṃ pratīkṣyate | kiṃ ca—
sādhyāṃśe puruṣāṇāṃ ca pratyayo na niyojakaḥ |
svayameva hi jānanti kartavyaṃ puruṣāḥ sadā ||
yatra hi śāstrādhīnā puruṣapravṛttistatra tatsaṃnikarṣaviprakarṣāvapekṣyete, sādhyaṃ punaḥ svargapaśuputragrāmādi prāgeva śāstrātsarve puruṣāḥ pratipadyante | tataśca bhāvayetkimityape- kṣitamātre vinaiva tāvacchāstreṇaitāvadavagataṃ puruṣārthaḥ kaściditi | tatra viśeṣamātrama- navagatatvādapekṣyate | tadapi ca na sādhyātmanā, kiṃ tarhi, etadbhāvanāviṣayatvena | tataśca dūrasthasyāpi svargādereva kṛtāspadasya saṃgatiḥ | dhātvarthasaṃbandhastvanapekṣitaḥ kriyeta vidhyā- narthakyācca bādhyetatarāṃ śrutiḥ | kiṃ ca—
bhavane yasya kartṛtvaṃ kathaṃcidavadhāritam |
svavākye vā 'nyavākye vā sa sādhyatvaṃ prapadyate ||
na cātra dhātvarthāderbhavanakriyāsaṃbandho 'vagataḥ svargādīnāṃ tu kāmaśabdopabandhād- bhavanasaṃbandho vijñāyate | kutaḥ—
svargo me syāditītthaṃ hi svargādiḥ prārthyate bhavan |
tenāsau bhāvanāpekṣaḥ prayojyatvena gamyate ||
tato 'vadhṛtasvargādisādhyāṃśā bhāvanā kena bhāvayedityevaṃ karaṇamapekṣate | tatra ca śāstrādhīnapravṛttitvāttatsaṃnikarṣādāvāśrīyamāṇe pramāṇāntarācca yogyāyogyatvayorajñānā- dvidhyavirodhāccātyantapratyāsattyupasthitadhātvarthātikramakāraṇābhāvātsarvaphalabhāvanānāṃ ca kenaciddhātvarthaviśeṣeṇa vinā 'nupapatteryāgenetyevaṃ vijñāyate | yadyapi ca yāgaḥ svayameva tāvadaniṣpannastathā 'pi svasādhananiṣpāditaḥ sansādhayiṣyati sarvameva ca kadācinniṣpannaṃ kadācidaniṣpannam | na ca prākchāstrapravṛtterniṣpattiḥ kvacidupayujyate phalasiddhikāla- mātropayogitvātkaraṇaniṣpatteḥ | pramāṇavaśācca trikālavarttināmapi sādhanatvāvirodhaḥ | tasmādyāgādīnāṃ karaṇatvaṃ taccāpūrvadvāreṇeti tacchabdebhyo 'pūrvapratītiḥ | ataścaivamapi sūtrārthaḥ saṃbhavati | ye bhāvārthāḥ—bhāvanāprayojanāḥ, karmaśabdāḥ—yajyādayaḥ tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeteti | nanu coktena karmakaraṇasaṃbandhanyāyena sakarmakadhātuyuktādevā ' 'khyā-
tādbhāvanā 'vagatiḥ prāpnoti | tathā hi—
yenepsitatamairbhāvaiḥ kimityaṃśo 'varudhyate |
tadyogī tena dhātvartho na kaścitsyādakarmakaḥ ||
yadi vā sarvadhātūnāṃ sakarmakatvāpattiratha vā 'karmakebhyo bhāvanayā na bhavitavyam | naiṣa doṣaḥ | kutaḥ—
anyadeva hi dhātvarthaprāpyaṃ karma sakarmake |
anyadeva ca sarvatra pratyayārthanibandhanam ||
odanaṃ pacati grāmaṃ gacchatīti dhātvarthāpavargalabhyamekaṃ karma, aparaṃ punarbhāvanākarma | tatra kadāciddhātvarthakarmaiva bhāvanākarmatvamapi pratipadyate pākenaudanaṃ bhāvayatīti | kadā citpunaḥ svakarmaviśiṣṭadhātvarthayuktā bhāvanā karmāntareṇa yujyate grāmagamanena svārthaṃ bhāva- yediti, odanapākena ceti | taccaitaddhātvarthātparatastadavāpyamātratvena gamyamānaṃ dhātvarthā- ntaratirohitaṃ bhāvanākarmatayā sarvatrāvadhāryate | tacca prāyeṇaivaṃ kāmaśabdenaiva saṃbandhamā- padyate | sukhakāma āsīta, svāsthyakāmaḥ śayīteti | satyapi āsiśetyorakarmakatve yaḥ pratyayena karotyartho 'bhihitastatkarmatvena ca svādīnyavadhāryante | tena karoteḥ sarvadā sakarmakatvādakarmakākhyātānāmapi ca tatsāmānādhikaraṇyadarśanātkiṃ karotyāste, kiṃ karoti śeta iti siddhaivamādiṣvapi sakarmikā bhāvanā |
yajerapi tu yatkarma pūjyatvāddevateṣyate |
tadujjhitvaiva putrādeḥ karmatvaṃ bhāvanāśritam ||
tasmātsakarmakākarmakayoraviśeṣādāsanena bhāvayedityapi prayogasiddhiḥ | kastarhi saka- rmakākarmakayorbhedaḥ | ucyate—
sākṣādavyabhicāreṇa dhātvartho yatra karmebhāk |
sakarmakaḥ sa dhātuḥ syātpāramparye tvakarmakaḥ ||
āsanaśayanādau hi na niyamenā ' 'nantaryeṇa vedaṃ taditi vā karma nirūpyate, tenākarmakā abhidhīyante | pacigamyādīnāṃ tu viklidyattatsaṃyujyamānasākṣātsaṃbandhikarmāvyabhicārātsa- karmakatvaṃ, na tu bhāvanāviśeṣaṇe kaścidviśeṣaḥ | seyaṃ bhāvanāṃ 'śadvayaparipūrṇā satī sarva- karaṇānāmupāyānanugṛhītānāṃ karaṇatvānupapatteḥ kathaṃ bhāvayeditītikartavyatāmapekṣate | sā ca pratyakṣādīnāmanugrāhakadarśanaśaktyabhāvādatyantaśāstragamyeti yathāsaṃnikarṣaṃ tadasaṃbha- vādvā yathākathaṃcidupasthāpyamānā śāstrānusāreṇa śrutyādyupadeśena codanāsāmānyādyatide- śena vā 'tyantādṛṣṭopakāradvāreṇānyathānupapattyā kalpyate | tataḥ paripūrṇatvādanuṣṭhātuṃ
yogyeti vidhīyate | tadvidhānāccārthāpattyā yāgādividhānamityupapannaṃ bhāvārthasūtram | bhavanti kecitkarmaśabdā yāgo yajanamijyetyudāhartavye tatsāmānādhikaraṇyasiddhaśye- naikatrikādyudāharaṇaṃ yāgādikaraṇatvacodanottarakālabhāvikarmaśabdatvena pāratantryātsujñānam | svatantrāṇāṃ kathaṃcidapi bhāvārthatvāśaṅkāsaṃbhavāt | yāgādayo hi svātantryeṇāpi kadā cidanumānād‌bhāvārthāśaṅkāviṣayāḥ syuriti | ke cidbhāvārthā na karmaśabdā yathā bhāva- yetkuryāditi codāharaṇaṃ bhūtyādayastu prayojyavyāpāravacanatvānnaiva yathāvarṇitabhāvārthā ityanudāharaṇam | tatra yathākathaṃciṇṇijantavyutpattyā bhāvaśabda eko nīyeta netarau | tāvapi tu prayojyavyāpārāṃśena kathaṃcida‌bhāvārthāvityudāhṛtau | atha vā dvitīyasūtrārtha- vyākhyānena bhāvanāprayojanatvamaṃśavācitve nāstīti vinā 'pi sakalārthābhidhānādbhavanti bhāvārthāḥ | kathaṃ punaramī na karmaśabdā yadā dhātumātraṃ karmaśabdatvenoktaṃ, nirviśeṣasya sāmānyasyānuṣṭhātumaśakyatvādakarmaśabdatvam | ato viśeṣavācināmeva dhātūnāṃ karmaśa- bdatvagrahaṇādacodyametat | yadi hi śyenacitrādarśapaurṇamāsaśabdāḥ phalaiḥ saṃbadhyeraṃstato yāgakaraṇatvābhāvāttatsāmānādhikaraṇyanimittanāmadheyatvānupapatteḥ prasiddhayādibhirguṇavi- dhitvameva syādataḥ sthita etasminnadhikaraṇe ityāha | kasmātpunaridaṃ tatraiva na nītaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇenāsaṃbandhāt | atha nāmadheyatvaṃ kasmādatra nā ' 'nīyate bhedalakṣaṇenāsaṃbandhāt | tasmādyathānyāsameva sthitayorarthātpaurvāparyasiddhiḥ | na caiṣāmarthineti—phalapadābhiprāyam | vivibhaktitvāditi | saṃbandhanimittākhyātavibhaktivigamādatha vā niṣpannārthābhidhāyisu- bvibhaktiviśeṣayogo vivibhaktitvam | tasmānna dravyādiśabdānāṃ phalasaṃbandha iti | āha ca—
sādhyasādhanasaṃbandhaḥ sarvadā bhāvanāśrayaḥ |
tena tasya na siddhiḥ syādbhāvanāpratyayādṛte || 1 ||
na tāvatpratyayasyeṣṭamapūrvapratipādanam |
na ca dhātoḥ svatastatsyānnāmno vā parataḥ samam ||
yadi hi bhāvanāvacanasyaivāpūrvapratipādakatvamiṣyate dhātorvā pratyayanirapekṣasya tato nāmapakṣo durbalaḥ syādiha tu yathaiva dhātoḥ pratyayasaṃbandhānugṛhītasya bhāvanānurañjanani- mittaṃ karaṇavācitvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ nāmapadasyāpītyaviśeṣaḥ || 2 ||
yaduktaṃ yadaikasmādapūrvaṃ tadetarattadarthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti tadgataṃ tāvadvastudharmeṇa viśeṣaṃ darśa- yati | katham—
bahvadṛṣṭaprasaṅgāddhi dharmo neṣṭaḥ pade pade |
nāmnaḥ phalena saṃbandhe parihāro na tasya ca ||
ekasmādadṛṣṭe kalpite yadītarad dṛṣṭārthatvena tādarthyaṃ bhajate tato lāghavaṃ labhyate | asya tu tādarthyasiddhaye tato 'pi punaradṛṣṭaṃ kalpyata eva tato varaṃ phalenaiva sarvāṇi saṃbaddhāni | na ca saṃbandhavairūpyakleśāśrayaṇaṃ, nāmnaśca phalasaṃbandhe 'vaśyaṃ dhātvarthastadanu- grahārtho 'bhyupagantavyaḥ | sa ca svayaṃ niṣpādyaḥ siddharūsya nāmārthasya na śaknoti dṛṣṭe-
nopakartum | na hi nāmārthastamapekṣate śabdaprayogavelāyāmeva niṣpannatayā gamyamānatvādape- kṣaṇīyasya vā siddhatvenāyogyatvatprayujyate 'sminniti cābhidheya eva prayogaḥ | tadādhāraiva hi niṣpannarūpopalabdhiranutpannatve kriyārūpasya vaktavye vināśitvapradarśanaṃ niṣpannasyāpi kṣaṇikatvena punaḥ punarniṣpattyapekṣopapatteḥ | tebhyaḥ parākāṅkṣā—anyākāṅkṣā, niṣpādya- tvena vā pradhānākāṅkṣā1 na vidyata ityadhyāhāraḥ | atha vā tebhyaḥ parā—dūre, ākāṅkṣe- tyarthaḥ | kutaḥ, bhūtatvādeveti | svarūpakathanārthamupanyastaṃ niṣpannatvādeveti | punarante tadeva hetutvenoddiṣṭaṃ sūtrakāreṇa || 3 ||
akhyātavartī dhātvarthaḥ sādhyarūpaḥ pratīyate |
tasminphalavatīṣṭe tu nāmno dṛṣṭārthateṣyate ||
dhātvarthastāvatprakṛtyaiva sādhyātmako viśeṣatastvākhyātagatena dhātunocyamānaḥ | sa yadi phalasādhanatvena codyate tato 'siddharūpatvāttasya sādhanākāṅkṣā yāṃ satyāṃ nāmapadaṃ guṇavidhitvena nāmadheyatvena vobhayathā 'pi dṛṣṭenaiva tādarthyaṃ labhate | nanu nāmadheyapakṣe nāma- padamapi sādhyārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti dhātutulyaṃ syāt | na | tasya phalasaṃbandhe guṇavidhitvena siddhārthatvāt | api ca— 1niṣpādyatvena pradhānasya sato yā sādhanākāṅkṣā sā na vidyate niṣpādyatvābhāvādityarthaḥ |
sādhyātnako 'pi dhātvartho yadā nāmnā 'bhidhīyate |
tadā dravyavadevāsau niṣpannātmā pratīyate ||
yadyapi vastusvarūpeṇa dhātvarthaḥ sādhyastathā 'pi nāmapadenocyamāno liṅgasaṃkhyāyo- gitvātsiddharūpo 'bhidhīyate | abhidhānakṛtā cā ' 'kāṅkṣotpattirna vastukṛtā | tasmādyuktā dhātorevā ' 'kāṅkṣā na nāmna iti | kiṃcā ' 'śritatvātprayogasya iti | adhunā śabda- pratyāsattikṛto viśeṣo 'bhidhīyate | puruṣavyāpārātmikāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ dhātvarthopaśleṣo 'pi puruṣeṇā ' 'śritastadatikramahetvabhāvācca na nāmapadagraṇam | tasmādasti viśeṣaḥ || 4 ||
( iti bhāvārthādhikaraṇam || 1 || )
siddhaṃ kṛtvā 'pūrvaṃ tatpratipattyupāyaśabdaviśeṣavicāraḥ kṛtaḥ | tasya siddhatvamevā- prasiddhamatastadeva tāvatpratipādanīyamityata āha—
phalāya vihitaṃ karma kṣaṇikaṃ cirabhāvine |
tatsiddhirnānyathetyevamapūrvaṃ prati gamyate ||
vedavākyopāttasvargayāgādisaṃbandhānyathānupapattyā codanayaivāpūrvamapi coditaṃ bhavi- ṣyatīti pramāṇavat | tasmādastyapūrvamiti | atrāpare nipuṇaṃmanyāstannirākaraṇamāhuḥ—
pramāṇapañcakājñānādapūrvaṃ ṣaṣṭhagocaraḥ |
tasmādanvarthanāmaitanna vastutvena gamyate ||
vastvavabodhanārthāni pratyakṣādīni pañca pramāṇāni | tadyatra tāni na pravartante tadabhā- venābhāvātmanaivāvagamyate | na cāpūrve tāni pravartante | tasmātsarvapramāṇāpūrvatvādanvarthanāmai- vāsadrūpamapūrvaṃ pratipattavyam | tatra pratyakṣeṇa tāvannāvagamyate, rūpādyanātmakatvena cakṣurā- dibhirasaṃbandhāt | nāpyanumānena, kenacilliṅgena sahādṛṣṭasaṃgatitvāt | na hi viśeṣataḥ sāmānyato vā 'sya kenacitsaṃbandho 'nubhūtapūrvaḥ | sarvatraiva ca vastusattābodhāyānumānama- paryāptamityu1ktaṃ prāk |
padavākye na caitasya vācake śṛṇumaḥ kvacit |
śabdagamyatvamapyasya tena naivopapadyate ||
āgamikatvamapyasya padena vocyamānasya syādvākyagamyasya vā | tatra padaṃ na tāva- tkiṃcitsākṣādetasya vācakamasti | yattvapūrvamiti tadanvarthatvātsutarāmastitvaṃ bādhate | na ca pramāṇāntarānavagate 'rthe padaṃ pravartate | na ca svātantryeṇa pramāṇamiti sthitam | tathā ca vākyasyāvācakatvādevāprāmāṇyam | na ca kecitpadārthāḥ śrūyante yeṣāṃ bhedaḥ saṃsargo vā 'pūrvaṃ bhavet | ye 'pi śabdāntarādayaḥ śrutiliṅgādayaśca śabdaprakārāste 'pi ca svabhāva- siddhe vastuni bhede viniyoge vā kāraṇaṃ na sadbhāve kasyacidityapūrvaṃ pratyapramāṇam | upadeśānavagate cātideśo 'pi na pravartate vidhipratiṣedhaviṣayatvācca samastasya vedasya | na kvatidvastusvarūpapratipādanārthatvaṃ bhavatīti nā ' 'gamagamyamapūrvam | na cādṛṣṭapūrvasyā- dṛṣṭasadṛśasya copamānaviṣayatvam | kāmaṃ vā 'nupalabhyamānaśaśaviṣāṇādisārūpyādabhā- vātmakatvopamānaprasaṅgaḥ | tasmādasadrūpeṇopameyam | 1sattā ca nānumānena kasyaccitsapraṃtīyate ityanena pratyakṣasūtre ślokavārtike uktamityarthaḥ |
arthāpattyā 'pi naivaitadastītyevaṃ pratīyate |
anyathā 'pyupapannatvātphalayāgādisaṃgateḥ ||
dṛṣṭārthāpattistāvaddharmāstitvavadevātrāpi nirākartavyā | svabhāvādinā 'pi īśvaradari- drādivaicitryopapatteḥ | śrutārthāpattirapi kīdṛśī bhavati yatra pratyakṣeṇaivānupapattirdṛśyate | na ca kalpyamāno 'rthaḥ kena ciddhirudhyate, tadyathā ‘sruveṇāvadyati’ ityukte na ca kathaṃcidapi māṃsapuroḍāśādīni tenāvadātuṃ śakyanta iti | pratyakṣagamyatvāt | api ca tatrāpi prasakterevaṃ kalpyate dravāṇāmiti | na caiṣā kalpanā kena cidvirudhyate śrutahānyaśrutaparikalpanābhāvāt | apūrvaṃ tu na kadācitphalasādhanatvena saṃbhāvyate | yato 'nyakāraṇaniṣedhe sati tadviṣayā pariśeṣasiddhiḥ syāt |
yadi tvanyanivṛttyaiva pariśeṣaḥ prakalpyate |
śaśaśṛṅganimittatvaṃ phalānāṃ kiṃ na gamyate ||
na hi kāraṇāntarapratiṣedhamātreṇāpūrvanimittatā gamyate, śaśaviṣāṇādibhiranaikāntāt | api ca yadi tāvadapūrvaṃ yāgasya sādhyamiṣyate tataḥ śrutaṃ svargaṃ parityajyāśrutaṃ parika- lpitaṃ bhavet | atha phalaṃ prati sādhanabhūtaṃ, tataḥ śrutayāgaparityāgātsaiva gatiḥ | na cā ' 'kārā1ntareṇa tannirūpayituṃ śakyate | tenā ' 'gamaprāmāṇyādyāgādeva phalena bhavita- vyam | kathaṃ naṣṭaḥ sādhayatīti cet | yadi śāstrādevaṃ gamyate kiṃ bhavato virudhyate | dhriyamāṇena vā phalaṃ sādhanīyamityatra kiṃ pramāṇam | api cā ' 'kāśādīni nityā- vasthitāni kasmātphalaṃ na sādhayanti | yadi ca śrūyamāṇātirekeṇāvasthāyitvasaṃbhavā- dapūrveṇa phalaṃ sādhyata iti kalpyate tato varamākāśādereva kalpitaṃ, tasya hi sthānasadbhā- vāvapi tāvatprasiddhau kevalaṃ phalanimittatvamāśrayaṇīyam | apūrve tu sadbhāvaprabhṛti sarvaṃ niṣpramāṇakaṃ kalpanīyam | atha yāgasaṃbandhinā kenacidavasthitena phalaṃ dātavyamitya- bhiprāyaḥ | tathā satyapi—
yaṣṭurevā ' 'tmano yāgaiḥ saṃgatasya sthitasya ca |
nimittatvaṃ varaṃ klṛptaṃ lāghavaṃ hi tathā sati ||
yadi yāgasya vināśitvādanyena tatsaṃbandhinā phalaṃ sādhyamānaṃ yāgena sādhitaṃ bhavati tato lāghavādatikrāntayāgenā ' 'tmanaiva varaṃ sādhayitavyam |
yadvā karmavināśo 'yaṃ phalaṃ naḥ sādhayiṣyati |
bhaṅigayāgavidhānāddhi tadayatnena kalpyate ||
1sādhyasādhanabhāvarahitākārāntareṇa nāpūrvaṃ nirūpayituṃ śakyamityarthaḥ |
vināśini hi karmaṇi codite kiṃ dṛśyate, karma ca vinaṣṭaṃ śāstrapratyayācca kālāntare phalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti niścīyate | yacca1 yat, pratītyopajāyate tatra tasya nimittatvamityava- dhāryate | tasmādabhāvanimittameva phalamastu | syādetat | na kvacidavastunaḥ sādhakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti | taducyate | apūrvasya vā kva dṛṣṭaṃ yenātrā ' 'śrīyate tadavaśyakartavye laukika- nimittadharmātikra2me kimapūrvanimittatvaṃ kalpyatāmutābhāvanimittatvamiti, klṛptābhāvanimi- ttatvātilaṅghanena kālpanikāpūrvanimittatvaparigraho na yujyate | kiṃ ca—
yadi caikāntato brūyuḥ śabdāḥ kālāntare phalam |
tatastenaiva kalpyeta nimittaṃ vastu kiṃcana ||
kriyāphalasaṃbandhapratipattimātracaritārthāsu codanāsvanupātte kālāntare karmasvabhāvādā- nantarye gamyamāne kuta etatkālāntarabhāvi phalaṃ tatsiddhayarthaṃ cāpūrvaṃ kalpyata iti | tatraitatsyāt | kṛte karmaṇyanantaraṃ phalamanupalabhya kālāntaraphalotpādadvāramapūrvakalpana- miti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ—
pūrvaṃ niścitya śāstrārthaṃ prayoge hi pravartate |
prayogottarakālaṃ tu na śāstrārtho 'vadhāryate ||
‘nahya3vidvānvihito 'sti’ iti tāvadavaśyaṃ yāvacchāstragamyaṃ tatsarvaṃ prāganuṣṭhānāda- vagantavyam | na ca tatkāle karmaphalakālaviyogajñānakāraṇamasti | yacca śāstrapravṛtti velāyāṃ tadantargatatvena nāvadhāritaṃ taduttarakālamevāvadhāryata iti kuta etat | api ca—
sarvakartṛṣvaśakta4tvādvaiguṇyaṃ saṃpratīyate |
tena ca pratibaddhatvānnārthāpattirapūrvabhāk ||
dṛśyata evānantaraphalānutpattikāraṇavaiguṇyamiti na kālāntaraphalasiddhayarthamapūrvaṃ kalpa- nīyam | anaikāntikī hi tadā 'rthāpattirvaiguṇyameva varamananubhūtamapi kalpayet | na ca janmāntaraphalotpattyarthamapūrvakalpanā || kutaḥ—
sukhaduḥkhātmakatvena samāneṣveva janmasu |
kriyānantarameveha staḥ svarganarakāvapi ||
1yacceti-yacca-phalaṃ, yat-vinaṣṭaṃ. karma, pratītya-adhigamya, prāpyetyarthaḥ | 2yalloke tṛptyādiphalotpattinimittasya bhojanādeḥ kriyātvaṃ dharmo dṛṣṭastadatikrametyarthaḥ | 3( a॰ 3 pā॰ 8 a॰ 8 sū॰ 18 ) | 4sarveṣu padārtheṣu bahavaḥ kartārasteṣu madhye, kvacitpadārthe kasyacitkarturaśakteraparihārya- tvādityarthaḥ |
na hi svarganarakau nāma niratiśayasukhaduḥkhasvabhāvau deśaviśeṣātmakau vā yāvihaiva janmani nānubhūyeyātām | alaukikānāṃ jihāsopāditsānupapatteḥ | ye tu laukike prakṛṣṭe sukhaduḥkhe te karmānantarameva saṃbhāvyete ityaviśeṣaḥ1 | kiṃ ca—
pratiṣedheṣu cāpūrvaṃ na śāstrārthena janyate |
tadatikramajanyaṃ tu na bhavecchāstrapūrvakam ||
‘brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ’ iti hi nivṛttiḥ śāstrārthaḥ | na ca tayā kālāntare kiṃ cijjanayitavyamiti nāpūrvakalpanāmapekṣate | hananasya tu narakapātaḥ phalaṃ, tadyadi tenā pūrvaṃ janyeta tato hananasyācoditatvāllaukikakriyājanyaṃ sadapūrvaṃ na vedamūlaṃ syāt | kalpitamapi ca tanniṣkriyatvānnaiva deśāntare śarīrādiprāpaṇasamarthamityanarthakam | na cāsyā ' 'śrayaḥ saṃbhavati, kriyāśrayasya puroḍāśādervinaṣṭatvāttadvyatirikte cā ' 'rambhānupa- patteḥ | evamaṅgāpūrvāṇyapi nirākartavyāni | kiṃ ca—
aṅgāni yadi vā 'pūrvaṃ kurvantyārādavasthitam |
asaṃbandhātpradhānānāṃ na syāttenopakāryatā ||
na hi kalpitamapyaṅgāpūrvaṃ pradhānairasaṃbandhamānamupakartuṃ samarthaṃ, na cāmūrte pradhāne tada- pūrve vā nipatituṃ samartham | yadapi na prokṣaṇādinimittaṃ dravyasamavāyi tadapi tanmātro- pakṣīṇatvādanyatrāsaṃcarannaiva phalasādhanasyāpūrvasyopakuryāt | atha tvaṅgāpūrvāṇyapi yaja- mānātmanyevāvatiṣṭheran, evaṃ sati puruṣārthatvāpatteḥ karmāṅgatvahāniḥ syāt | api ca yugapatprayogavacanena grahaṇādaṅgāpūrvairyugapadevopakartavyam | na ca paraspareṇāsaṃbaddhānāṃ yauga- padyaṃ saṃbhavati | na caiṣāṃ kaścitsaṃbandhe heturasti | etena pradhānāpūrvāṇāṃ phale yaugapadyaṃ pratyuktam |
tasmātkṛtatvamātreṇa pradhānaṃ puruṣe phalam |
aṅgāni ca pradhāneṣu janayantīti gamyate ||
na cāpūrvasyotpattirabhivyaktirvopapadyate | kutaḥ—
na tāvadyugapajjanyaṃ karmabhiḥ kramavartibhiḥ |
na cānavayavatvāttatkramaśo 'pi pratīyate ||
evaṃ sāvannotpadyate | na cābhivyajyate | katham |
indriyārthobhayeṣāṃ naḥ saṃskārādvyaktiriṣyate |
na ca yāgādibhiḥ kiṃcitsaṃskṛtaṃ saṃpratīyate ||
sarvābhivyaktīnāṃ trayānyatamasaṃskāradvāratvātsaṃskārāntaramavaśyaṃ kalpanīyaṃ tataḥ punaḥ 1svarganarakayorapyauhikatvena paścāderaviśeṣa ityarthaḥ |
sa eva kleśa ityapramāṇatā | yadi ca kriyānantaramapūrvamupalabhyeta tato 'bhivyajyata iti brūyāma | yadi cāsya prāgastitve pramāṇaṃ bhavet | na tu tadubhayamapyastīti | sarvathā nāstyapūrvaṃ | na caitatsūtraṃ tatpratipādane vispaṣṭamityavyākhyānametat | atrocyate | yadidaṃ svamatiparikalpitaṃ vigrahavadivāpūrvaṃ bhavadbhirnirākriyate na tenāsmākaṃ kiṃcidvirudhyate | yato naitattādṛśaṃ kasyacidiṣṭaṃ, kiṃ tarhi—
karmabhyaḥ prāgayogyasya karmaṇaḥ puruṣasya vā |

ātmasthonmīlanaṃ tena vyaktirasya bhaviṣyati ||
