kaścittu pratibandho 'sya karmabhiḥ so 'panīyate |
tasmādastyapūrvam | sūtrasyāpi ca na prakṛtaupayikamanyamarthaṃ paśyāmaḥ | tenā ' 'rambhaco- danaivāpūrvasyāpi codanetyayamevārthaḥ | yadi punaḥ phalavacanasāmarthyāttadevaṃ na vinaṣṭa- miti, apūrvakalpanāniṣpramāṇakatvaṃ manvāno varametadityāha | na hi karmaṇāṃ rūpamupala- bhāmaha ityayuktaṃ, ‘rūpa1śabdāvibhāgācca’ ityatra pratyakṣopalabdhyabhidhānāt | yāgapra- stāve ca sati tasyācalanātmakatvāt, yadāśrayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayatītyasaṃbaddham | atrocyate—
kālāntarakṣamaṃ rūpaṃ karmaṇo nopalabhyate |
bhaṅigarūpopalabdhistu na phalāyopayujyate ||
yadyapi karmasvarūpamupalabhyate tathā 'pi kālāntarāvasthānābhāvānna tadupayujyata iti nopalabhāmaha ityucyate |
yāge 'pi prastute cātra calanaṃ yadudāhṛtam |
tatprakṣepāṃśarūpeṇa yāge 'pyastīti niścayāt ||
na hi saṃkalpamātreṇa phalaniṣpattiḥ | samastātsamastetikartavyatākācca karmaṇaḥ phalaśravaṇāttatra d‌vyavadānaprakṣepādīnāṃ grahaṇāsādanādīnāṃ ca saṃyogavibhāgaphalatvātsthāyitve tadāśrayeṇāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam | na cāsāvasti | na cābhivyaktaṃ rūpamupalabhyate | saṃkalpādīnāmapi saṃkalpā- ntarāditirodhānānnātra svarūpāvasthānopapattiḥ | avasthānaṃ cā ' 'tmasamavetasya vā syātpra- deyadravyasamavetasya vā | na tāvadātmani calanaṃ samavaiti, sarvavyāpinaḥ saṃyujyamānaviyu- jyamānadeśāsaṃbhave calitumasāmarthyāt | kathaṃ sarvavyāpitvamasyeti cetsarvatropalabhyamāna- 1( a॰ 6 pā॰ 3 a॰ 3 sū॰ 12 )
kāryatvāt | ahaṃpratyayena hi caitanyasvabhāvasyā ' 'tmano 'stitvamātramavagamyate na tu deśataḥ kālato vā viśeṣyate | tataśca—
anavacchinnasadbhāvaṃ vastu yaddeśakālataḥ |
tannityaṃ vibhu cecchantītyātmano vibhuteṣyate ||
sarvatra kāryopalambha iti—ahaṃpratyayamevāviśeṣitaṃ vadati | sukhaduḥkhādyupalabdhirvā | na hi kva cidgataiste nopalabhyante | na caite śarīradharmā iti sthitamātmavāde | tatra yadya- sarvagata ātmā bhavettato yadeva tadvatā deśena śarīraṃ yujyate tadaiva sukhādyupalabdhiḥ syānnānyatra | śarīramātrāntargatātmavādī tvāha—nanu tadeva deśāntarādāgamanasya liṅgam | ataśca viruddhahetutvamasyeti | kutaḥ—
yugapadyadi sarvatra kāryamātmagataṃ bhavet |
tataḥ sarvagatatvaṃ syātparyāye tu śarīravat ||
yadi hi śarīrādbahirapi kiṃcidātmakāryamupalabhemahi śarīrāntare sukhaduḥkhādīnvā tataḥ sarvagatatvamadhyavasyema | yatastu svaśarīrāntarvartyeva kāryaṃ yatra yatra ca tadgatistatra tatra paryāyeṇopalabhyate taccharīrakāryavadeva tatsahitagatasyopapatsyate | anyathā hi śarī- ramapi sarvagataṃ syāt | tasmāccharīravadevāsya tatra tatra gamanāpatteḥ sutarāṃ sakriyatvaprasaṅgaḥ | saṃdeho vā 'stu sādhāraṇānaikāntikatvāt | āha ca—
ātmā śarīrasaṃmiśrastenaiva saha saṃgamāt |
tatra tatra sukhādīni kāryāṇi pratipadyate ||
tatrottaraṃ na hyasatyāgamane kiṃcidviruddhamiti | yeṣāṃ tu na tu tadeveti pāṭhaḥ teṣāṃ siddhāntavādyeva paryāyeṇa sarvatrā ' 'tmakāryopalambhanamāgamanaliṅgatve 'pyaviśiṣṭamāśa- ṅkyottaraṃ vadatīti granthayojanā | kathaṃ punaridamuttaraṃ na hyasatyāgamana iti | tathā hi—
naivāvirodhamātreṇa svapakṣaḥ sidhyati kvacit |
parasyāpyavirodhitvamaviśiṣṭaṃ hi dṛśyate ||
pareṇāpi hi śakyaṃ vadituṃ na hi sati gamane kiṃcidviruddhamiti | atrābhidhīyate |
ubhayatrāvirodhitvaṃ prāptaṃ na hyasatīti yat |
punarbravīti tannūnaṃ virodhyāgamanaṃ matam ||
parisaṃkhyārūpeṇāsatyeva ' 'gamane na kiṃcidviruddhaṃ sati tu bahu viruddhamityāha | tadupavarṇyate—
svatastāvadamūrttatvānna bhūtairmiśratā ' 'tmanaḥ |
tataśca tairasaṃśliṣṭo na netuṃ śakyate kvacit ||
yadā mūrtānāmapi sūkṣmāṇāṃ candrādityaprakāśādīnāṃ na mṛtpiṇḍādibhiḥ saha miśratvamupapadyate, tannayanena vā nayanaṃ tadā ' 'tmanaḥ svabhāvenātyantāmūrtasya jñānasaṃ- tānasya vā bhūtairmiśratvaṃ bhavediti kuta etat | yo 'pi syādvādī baddhātmanāṃ śarīrādatya- ntavyatirekālābhādastyeva mūrtatvaṃ jīvasyeti brūyāttasyāpītaretarāśrayaprasaktirmiśra- tvānmūrtatvaṃ mūrtatvācca miśrabhāva iti | tasmānmuktāvasthānidarśanena lakṣaṇato 'syāmūrta- tvānna śarīrasaṃparkanimittamūrtatvasiddhiḥ | tataśca śarīrādanyastenāsaṃpṛktaśca | asparśatvā- ccānākṛṣyamāṇaḥ śarīre gacchati tadgatākāśapradeśavadātmā paścānniḥsṛtastatraiva tiṣṭhet | na hi tasya vāyunā pṛthivyādibhirvā preraṇaṃ yena svatantraḥ paraprerito vā gacchet | jvālā- prabhṛtīnāṃ tu sparśavattvādvāyunā preryamāṇānāmulmukādinā vā nīyamānānāṃ yuktaṃ gamanam | tena kevalaṃ śarīraṃ gacchadacetanaṃ syāt | sarvagatatve tu yatra yatra gamyate tatra tatrā ' 'tmānu- syūtirastīti yuktā caitanyānuvṛttiḥ, yathā pūrvākāśapradeśatyāge sarvagatatvādeva pareṇāva- kāśadānasiddhiḥ | kiṃ ca—
asarvagatapakṣe syājjīvo dehādanirgataḥ |
aṇuḥ śarīramātro vā sarvathā 'pi na yujyate ||
jñānasaṃtatipakṣastāvannirākṛtaḥ | tatra nityaḥ sannātmā śarīrābhyantaravarttī |
yadyaṇuḥ kalpyate tatra dehaṃ na vyāpnuyādasau |
tataśca sarvagātrasthasukhapuṣṭyādyasaṃbhavaḥ ||
yadā hyaṇumātra ātmā bhavati tadā yāvāneva pradeśaviśeṣastenādhiṣṭhitastanmātragatā- nāmeva sukhaduḥkhādīnāmupalabdhiḥ prāpnoti, tataścaikasminkṣaṇe śiraḥpādavedanānubhavo na syāt | atha laghusaṃcāritvāttatra tatropalabhyata ityucyate, na tatra pramāṇamasti | na ca kālabhedo lakṣyate, anavasthitasyopalabdhikālāsaṃbhavānnaikatrāpyupalabhyeta | tasmādakalpa- neyam | śarīrāvayavānāṃ cāpariśoṣaṇaṃ puṣṭyādi cā ' 'tmādhiṣṭhitānāṃ bhavati mṛtāva- sthāyāṃ viparyayadarśanāt | tatra ya evāvayavastenotsṛṣṭaḥ sa eva mṛtavacchuṣyet | atha śarī- raparimita ārhatapakṣeṇābhyupagamyate tatrāpi bahvadṛṣṭaṃ kalpanīyam ||
sadbhāvo 'vayavānāṃ ca tathā teṣāmanantatā |
saṃśleṣaśca vinā 'nyena tadbhāve 'pi ca nityatā ||
atisaṃkocavistārau puttikāhastidehayoḥ |
antarābhavasaṃcārastadbhāvājñānakāraṇe ||
sarve hyavayavasadbhāvādayaḥ pratyakṣādyaviṣayāḥ santa utprekṣāmātreṇa kalpyante | te śabdavaccehāpi pratyākhyeyāḥ | śarīramātrāvadhikānāṃ caiṣāmutprekṣitumapyānantyādaśakyaṃ, na caiṣāṃ dravatvādinā vinā kaścitsaṃśleṣaheturvidyate | na cāsaṃśliṣṭānāmekajīvārambhasāma- rthyam | sarvasaṃyogānāṃ ca viyogāvinābhūtatvād‌ghaṭāditulyaḥ kadācijjīvasya pradhvaṃso bhavet | gātracchede ca tadvartināṃ jīvāvayavānāṃ tato niḥsṛtyā 'vaśiṣṭe śarīrabhāge punaḥ praveśa ityetadapramāṇakam | yattu viyojitamātrāṇāṃ hastādīnāṃ sphuraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, tadabhidhāta- preritavāyunimittamiti na tāvatā jīvāvayavānugatirvijñāyate | tathā sati saṃkocavikā- sāveteṣāṃ bhavata ityatra na kiṃcitpramāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ | dīpaprabhāprabhṛtīnāṃ tu kathaṃcitpratya- kṣatvādupapadyete | na ca pradīpaprabhāyāḥ saṃkoco bhavati śarāvādicchādane śeṣaprabhāvinā- śādanāvṛtā hi jvālā ' 'tmasamīpe prabhāmaṇḍalamārabdhuṃ samarthā nā ' 'cchāditā | etenaiva ca vikāso 'pi pratyuktaḥ | anya eva hyavayavāstatra pracīyamānā vistāraṃ janayanti na tāvatāmeva vikāsaḥ | sparśavatāṃ ca parasparadeśapratibandhāddeśāntaravyāptyā vikāso ghaṭate, jīvāvayavānāṃ tvamūrtatvātsarveṣāṃ samānadeśatvāvighātānnityamaṇumātratvaprasaṅgaḥ syāt | kathaṃ caikasya jīvasya puttikāhastiśarīraparimitau saṃkocavikāsau yujyete | maraṇakāle cāntarābhavaśarīrasaṃcaraṇaṃ taccāsti, kena citpratibandhena sadapi na gṛhyate, tena ca śarī- rāntare jīvanikṣepa ityādi niṣpramāṇakam | tasmātsarvagatatvam | yattu śyāmākataṇḍu- lamātrādipradarśanamupaniṣatsu tadvākyāntarapradarśitavibhutvasyaiva sataḥ sūkṣmagrahaṇagocaratvāt | yadapi dvaipāyanenoktam1 | aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ puruṣaṃ niścakarṣa balādyama iti | tadapi kāvyaśo- bhārthaṃ vispaṣṭamṛtyuvyavahārapraśaṃsanārthaṃ ca prativratāpraśaṃsāpare vākye prajāpativapotkhedanā- divad‌draṣṭavyam | tathā hi tenaiva gītādiṣvanekaprakāraṃ sartagatatvaṃ varṇitam | nanu ca sarvagatatve vyomavatsarvaśarīreṣveka evā ' 'tmā prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | śarīrabhūyastvātpra- tiśarīraṃ ca sukhaduḥkhopalabdhivyavasthādarśanāt | itarathā hyekaśarīreṇaiva caritārthatvāda- nekaśarīravaiyarthyaṃ syāt | janmāntaraśarīravadadoṣa iti cet | na | tatra karmāntaravaśe- nopabhogāntarārthaṃ punaḥ punarārambhātsarvaśarīragatasukhādyupalabdhiśca pratiśarīraṃ syāt | anyadī- yaiścendriyaiḥ śarīrāntaragatasyā ' 'tmīyatvādupalabdherandhabadhirādīnāmabhāvaḥ syāt | varṇa- viśeṣavyavasthayā ca karmacodanābhedo na syāt | ekasyaivā ' 'tmanastena tena śarīreṇa saṃbadhyamānasya sarvavarṇopapatteḥ | ātmanānātve tvadoṣaḥ | sarveṣāmapi ca sarvagatatve mūrti- rahitatvātsamānadeśavṛttyavirodhaḥ | tadapekṣayaiva ca caitanyātmakatvādyavibhāgāccopaniṣa- 1bhārate iti śeṣaḥ |
tsvaikātmyavyavahāraḥ | kathaṃ punarnānātve 'pi sarveṣāṃ sarvaśarīraiḥ saṃbandhādanyadīyasukhaduḥ- khādyanupalabdhiḥ | ke cittāvadāhuḥ—
yathā śarīramātre 'pi mātṛgarbhātmavartinām |
sukhādīnāṃ vyavasthaivaṃ sarvatraiṣā bhaviṣyati ||
śarīraparimāṇātmavādino 'pi kilāyaṃ tulyo doṣastasyāpi garbhātmasamānadeśatvānmā- tṛkṣetrajñastadgatāni sukhādīnyupalabheta | tatra yastasya parihāraḥ sa sarvātmanāṃ sarvaśarīreṣu bhaviṣyatītyaviśeṣaḥ | yadyatropapattirucyeta na tu parapakṣasāmyāpattirevopapattistasya ca tava cobhayorapyanyena paryanuyogāt | api ca tasya tvagindriyaparimāṇatvādantaḥśarī- rākāśe bāhyavadevā ' 'tmano 'nabhyupagamānnaiva garbhaśarīreṇa mātṛkṣetrajñasya prāptirasti yena tulyadoṣatā syāt | tasmādeva parihartavyam ||
deśaprāptyā yadīṣyeta sukhāderupabhogyatā |
tato doṣaḥ prasajyeta yogyabhoge tvaduṣṭatā ||
yadi hyātmanaḥ sukhādīnāṃ ca samānadeśalakṣaṇa eva saṃbandha upabhogakāraṇamiṣyeta tato 'yaṃ doṣaḥ syāt | iha tu cakṣurādīnāmiva kṣetrajñayogyatālakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | tatra yathaiva tvagindriyeṇa sparśasamānadeśānāmapi rūpādīnāmagrahaṇam, evamanyenā ' 'tmanā 'nyadī- yadharmādharmopāttasukhaduḥkhādyagrahaṇam | tasmādātmavādoktasvasvāmibhāvavyavasthānādadoṣaḥ | evaṃ sarvagatatvātsiddhamātmano niścalatvam | atha dvayavadānasamavetamāsīttata āha—tadvinaṣṭa- miti | na ca tasyāvināśaḥ | tadviparītadravyāntaropalambhāt | na cāsya grahaṇapratibandha- hetuḥ kaścidasti yena na gṛhyeta | athārthāpattyā grahaṇapratibandhādi kalpyeta tathā 'pi satya- pūrvādbahutaramadṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaviparītaṃ ca kalpayitavyaṃ, tāvadavinaṣṭamāste, tathā na dṛśyate, tathā pratibandhahetuḥ, tasyāpyadarśananimittaṃ cetyevaṃ tasya tasyānyadityanavasthā, tathā kṣaṇikasya karmaṇaḥ sthānamanupalabdhikāraṇaṃ ca kalpyamityatigauravam | 1bhasmībhāve iti pāṭhāntaram | 2viśeṣakalpanāyāṃ iti pāṭhāntaramū |
evamanāśritakarmāvasthānakalpanāyām | athā ' 'tmāśritameva saṃyogavibhāgāvakurvadā- sīt | tatrāpi dṛṣṭaviparyayādṛṣṭakalpane syātām | tasmādvaramapūrvakalpanameveti siddhaṃ mūlā- dhikaraṇaprayojanam | dravyādīnāṃ phalasaṃbandhe teṣāmadṛṣṭārthatvātkarmaṇāmiva pratinidhyabhāvaḥ | karmaphalasaṃbandhe tu dravyādeḥ karmotpattyā dṛṣṭārthatvātsa/?/mānakāryatvajñānādasti pratinidhiḥ | kathaṃ tarhi pūrvapakṣavādinaḥ prakrāntāparisamāptidoṣābhāvaḥ | samāpanīyameva karma yena kena cid‌dravyeṇa | sadṛśopādāne tu na yatitavyaṃ sadṛśādapi phalāprāpteḥ, karmaṇaścāvihi- tasādhanaviśeṣasyānapekṣitasadṛśatvādyena kena citsiddheḥ | na ca tatpūrvadravyasya pratinidhi- rityucyate | anyārthatvādasādṛśyācca | pūrvadravyaṃ hi phalāya pravṛttamāsīdidānīmānī- yamānaṃ tu pratyavāyaparihārāya naimittikaphalāya vā pravṛttasya karmaṇaḥ siddhayarthamiti | nāmadheyasiddhirapi prayojanameva | sā tu pūrvoktatvānna pradarśitā || 5 ||
( itpapūrvādhikaraṇam || 2 || )
evamākhyātabhedānusāreṇāpūrvabhedānugame sarvatra prāpte tadapavādārthaṃ guṇapradhānavivekā- rambhaḥ | tatra tāvat—
ākhyātatvāviśeṣeṇa bhūtairbhavyārthajanmanaḥ |
siddhe ca sādhyatāśakteḥ sarvākhyātapradhānatā ||
yāvaddhi prayojanakalpanaṃ tatsarvaṃ dhātvarthānnyāyyaṃ prayojanavacca pradhānamapūrvasādhanaṃ ca | tena yajyādivadevāvahantyādīnāmapi vrīhyādibhirniṣpādyo 'rthaḥ | ataśca te 'pyapūrvasādhana- miti | atrocyate—
nāmākhyātārthasaṃbandhe yadaklṛptaprayojanam |
tasyādṛṣṭārthatā yuktā netarasyāpramāṇikā ||
sarvatraiva dravyakarmasaṃbandhe karmaṇāṃ dravyeṇa vinā 'nutpatteḥ prathamaṃ tāvad‌dravyaṃ karmotpādayata, dṛṣṭopakāritvāttadarthamābhāsate | tatra kvacidbhūyaḥ karma parāvṛttya dravyasyopakaroti kva cidātmalābhamātramanubhavati | tadyadā ' 'tmalābhamātraṃ tasya dṛśyate tadā sākāṅkṣatvādadṛṣṭaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyate | yadā tu kāryāntaraupayikena dṛṣṭenaiva taṇḍulanirvṛttyādinā dravyopa- kāreṇa nirākāḍkṣī bhavati tadānīmadṛṣṭakalpanāvasarābhāvādanyathaiva vidhānārthavattvopapatternā- dṛṣṭasādhanatvaṃ pratīyate || 6 ||
yaiḥ karmabhirdravyaṃ svarūpato dharmato vā na kartumiṣyate yathā prayājādibhistāni svasā- dhanāni prati pradhānabhūtatvādadṛṣṭārthāni bhavanti || 7 ||
yaiḥ punardravyamutpādyate yathā ' 'dhānenāgnayo 'vāpyante kriyante vā yathā varaṇenartvijaḥ saṃskriyante, yathā 'vahantinā vrīhayaḥ, peṣaṇena taṇḍulāstāni guṇabhūtāni prayojanavad‌dravya- saṃskṛterīpsitatvāt | yadā dṛṣṭārthamadṛṣṭārthaṃ cobhayathā 'pi tulyavadanuṣṭhīyeta tadā kiṃ prayo- janaṃ cintāyāḥ |
taducyate | praiyaṅgave 'pi carāvatideśaprāpto vrīhisādhanaka evāvahantiḥ kartavyana pūrvapakṣe | kutaḥ—
pradhāne hi śrutaṃ dravyaṃ nāṅgadravyasya bādhakam |
prayājejyājyavattena hantau syādvrī/?/hyabādhanam ||
siddhānte tu bādhyante | kutaḥ—
pradhānaupayikaṃ dravyaṃ saṃskārairapi yujyate |
tena hantyādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ saṃskartavyāḥ priyaṅgavaḥ ||
nanu ca pūrvapakṣe 'pi pradhānaprayuktavrīhyāśrayatvena prakṛtāvaprayojakatvātpraiyaṅgave carau pradhānenāgṛhyamāṇānvrīhīnavaghāto na labhate | naitadevam—
tulyo hi vrīhisaṃbandhaḥ śāstrādyāgāvaghātayoḥ |
vājinejyādi tulyaṃ ca nāprayojakalakṣaṇam ||
‘vrīhibhiryajeta’ ‘vrīhīnavahanti’ iti tulye codane, tatreyaṃ prayojikeyaṃ neti nāsti viśeṣahetuḥ | na ca vājinādivadavahanteranuniṣpāditvam | na ca pa1dakarmavatparaprayuktapra- kṛtaikahāyanyadhīnanirākāṅkṣatvam | na caikadeśadravyatvamuttarārdhādivat | nāpi ‘puroḍāśa- kapālena’ itivadarthābhidhānakarmatvam | tasmādavahantirapi prayojakaḥ | na cāsminpakṣe niyogato yāgārthā eva vrīhayo 'havantavyāḥ | laukikairapi karmasidhyaviśeṣāt | na cātra prakṛtagrahaṇe pramāṇaṃ, prakaraṇasyāviśeṣakatvāt |

naitadasti | nirguṇendrābhidhānādanutkarṣa iti | prasajyata evotkarṣaḥ | kutaḥ— 1pragātha iti—anena ca, pādaṃ punarārabhata iti vacanāvagatasya, ādyāmṛcaṃ sakṛtpaṭhitvā tasyā antyapādena saha dvitīyādyārdharcaṃ paṭhitvā tadantyapādena saha dvitīyāntyārdharcapaṭhanarūpasya prapratha- nasya māhendragra/?/hasaṃnidhāvāmrātasya tadaṅgatvānaṅgīkārātsaṃnidhibādhaḥ sūcitaḥ | anyathā kramasaṃnidhī uparudhyeyātāmiti dvivacanānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ |

mahadindraśabdayostāvadavaśyaṃ pṛthagarthābhidhānaśaktiḥ kalpayitavyā | tayośca guṇaguṇya bhidhāyitvādviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyātmakatvamavadhāritam | tatra yāvadeva saṃhatāvuccāritau tāvadeva pūrvānubhūtārthasaṃbandhitayā viśiṣṭārthapratyayo jāyate | na cāsya nivartakaṃ kiṃcidasti | na ca samudāyasyāpūrvaśaktyantarakalpanāpramāṇaṃ vidyate | labdhātmikā ca samudāyaprasiddhirava- yavaprasiddhiṃ bādhate | na cāvayavārtharahitārthāntaraprayogaṃ vispaṣṭamantareṇa tadātmalābhaḥ | kiṃ ca—

pratyakṣe 'pi tāvadarthe 'nekaśabdaśakteḥ kalpanā niṣpramāṇikā, kimuta yatrārthasadbhā- vo 'pi kalpanīyaḥ | tadihendraśabdaprayogānyathānupapattyendrastāvadadṛṣṭo 'pi kalpyate, tatra yadipunarmahendraśabdaprayogānyathānupapattirbhavettato 'rthāntaraṃ mahendro nāma kalpyeta | yadā tu pūrvakalpitābhyāmeva mahadindrapadaśaktibhyāṃ prayogaḥ sidhyati, sa eva cārthaḥ kiṃ cidvi- śiṣṭaḥ pratyabhijñāyate, kastadā 'rthāntaraṃ kalpayituṃ śakṣyati | tasmādindra eva mahattva- viśiṣṭo mahendro nānya iti siddham | na ca samāsaṃ kṛtvā taddhite kriyamāṇe kasya cidasāmarthyaṃ samāsavelāyāṃ taddhitavelāyāṃ cāpekṣaṇīyārthāntarānupādānāt | na ca dviruccā- raṇanimittavākyabhedaprasaktiḥ | sakṛduccāritaikapadopāttānekārthakathanāt | vṛttidvayātmakaṃ hi māhendrapadam | ekaikā ca vṛttirvākyārthe vartate | tatra yayorvākyayorarthaumāhendrapadenopāttau tau tābhyāṃ nirbhidya kathyete | yaccātrāsakṛduccāraṇaṃ dṛśyate naḥ tadvedavacanasyaiva | na hi kadā cidapyevaṃrūpo vedo 'sti mahāṃścāsāvindraśca mahendro devatā asyeti māhendraḥ | na caitadevaṃ vaidikaṃ padamevaṃ vibhajyate | vibhāgasya pauruṣeyatvenāvaidikatvāpatteḥ | kiṃ tu—

śabdaśaktividbhiḥ puruṣaiḥ svavākyenaikenānekena vā kathyate kastatra vākyabhedaḥ, śatakṛtvo- 'pi hi svavākyamuccāryamāṇaṃ na vedaṃ dūṣayati | na ca tadīyoḥ 'rthaḥ kathyamānaḥ pauruṣeyatvaṃ bhajate, avaśyaṃ cāneko 'rthaḥ puruṣaiḥ kathyamānaḥ krameṇa kathayitavyaḥ, so 'pi ca prakṛti- pratyayapaurvāparyeṇetyevaṃ kathyate mahāṃścāsāvindraścetyādi | na caivaṃ sāpekṣatvam |'athavā1 bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasyāpi samāsa’ iti yadyapīndraśabdastaddhitāpekṣastathā 'pi mahattvaṃ prati pādhānyāllabhate samāsam | ataśca yugapadapekṣāyāmavirodhastathā 'pi tu vṛttiḥ krame- ṇaiva | kutaḥ—

devatā hi vidheyatvādvivakṣitaguṇeṣyate |
lakṣaṇatve tu tasyāḥ syādavivakṣā guṇādiṣu ||
yadi hi taddhitasaṃbandhe devatoddiśyamānā syāttato 'syā guṇavivakṣā bhavet | iyaṃ punaravidhīyamānā devatātvameva na pratipadyata ityavaśyopādātavyā | tataśca vivakṣitaguṇa- tvāttadapāye na kathaṃ ciddevateti gamyate | yathā śuklavāsā bhojayitavyo ‘lohitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti’ ‘daṇḍī praiṣānanvāhaṃ’ iti viśeṣaṇarahitānāmakarmāṅgatvam | yadā te 'pyuddiśyante yo 'yaṃ śuklavāsāstamānayetyādau tadā vinā 'pi viśeṣaṇenā ' 'nīyante | tadiha yadyapi tāvaddevatārūpeṇopakuryāttathā 'pi na guṇarahitā ' 'śrīyeta, kimuta yadā 'mi- dhānopakāriṇī vidhigatavyatiriktābhidhānābhihitā naiva pratyabhijñāyate saiveyaṃ devateti |
samāsena ca vidhīyamānāyāṃ nānekārthavidhidoṣaprasaktiḥ | tatra māhendragrahagatā na kathaṃ cidindraśabdenocyate |
yā tu tenocyate sā tatra naiva devatetyanarthakamevāsyāḥ prakāśanam | ataśca ‘na śrutisama- vāyitvāt’ ityayamapi sūtrārtho bhavati śrutisamavetaṃ devatātvaṃ bhaviṣyati tadadhīnajñānami- tyarthaḥ | tacca taddhitasaṃvāde sati jñāyate | tasmādasti devatābheda iti | kathaṃ tvaṃsmin pakṣe bhāṣyagamanikā | tadabhidhīyate |
pūrvapakṣavādī tāvadanutkarṣaṃ pragāthasya vadati, yaśca māhendrād‌grahādindrābhidhānasamartha- mantrānutkarṣaṃ vadati tenākarmāṅgabhūtārthaprakāśanavaiyarthyādindra evātra śuddho devatābhūtaḥ prakāśyata ityabhyupagataṃ bhavati |
tasya ca devatātvaṃ nābhyupagamamātreṇa sidhyati, nāpi pramāṇāntareṇeti ya etad‌gra- hotpattivākye devatābhidhānaśaktistaddhitaḥ śrūyate ‘māhendraṃ gṛhṇāti’ iti tatsaṃyogā- dvijñāyate | sa ca yadi samāsānniṣkṛṣya kevalādindraśabdādutpādyate, tato mantrābhi- dheyasadṛśaṃ devatātvamuktaṃ bhavati |
siddhavaccaitamarthaṃ pūrvapakṣavādino 'bhipretaṃ manvāno niṣkṛṣya bravīti indro 'sya deva- 1( a॰ 2 pā॰ 2 a॰ 3 sū॰ 6 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥ |
tā—iti taddhitasaṃyogena jñāyate, na cāsya mahattvamapekṣamāṇasyākṛte samāse śuddha- syopasarjanībhūtasya taddhitasaṃyogaḥ, taddhitasaṃyogāpekṣasya veti—satyami sāpekṣapradhāna- samāse prātipadikāvasthāyāṃ taddhitāpekṣā, na ca tadānīmasuvantatvātsamāsopapattiḥ | tena yatraiva pṛthagbhūtaṃ subantaṃ saṃbandhārhameva padāntaramapekṣate yathā rājapuruṣaḥ śobhana iti, tadvi- ṣayamevait, ‘bhavati vai pradhānasya sāpekṣasyāpi samāsa’ iti draṣṭavyam |
akṛte ca samāse taddhitāpekṣāyāṃ vākyāttaddhitotpattirityabhyupetaṃ syāt | śuddhasya vā taddhitasaṃsparśādviśeṣaṇānantargatiprasaṅgaḥ | kramavṛttiḥ punarbhavato nābhipretaiva, pūrvaṃ taddhitasaṃbandhe pūrvoktāveva dravyaviśeṣaṇottarapadavṛddhiprasaṅgadoṣau |
na ca samāsārthe vṛttasya śuddhasya taddhitasaṃbandhaḥ | tenaikasminneva prayoge tantrasaṃbandho '- bhyupagantavyaḥ | tataśca ‘aika1śabdye parārthavat’ iti tathaiva vairūpyadoṣaḥ |
vispaṣṭaścāyamanyo 'rtha iti prāksamāsādanekārthavidheḥ samāsapadalamyatvādvākyameda- māha | kṛte tu samāse naiṣa doṣaḥ | tasmānnendro devatā 'mahattvaviśiṣṭaḥ śuddhaḥ kiṃ tarhi, viśiṣṭa eva |
atha vā nendro devatā kevalapadopāttaḥ śuddha ityabhiprāyaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi, mahattvaviśiṣṭaḥ, samāsaprātipadikāttaddhitotpatteḥ |
na tvavayavasaṃbandheneti—nāvayaprasiddhinirākaraṇaparaṃ, kiṃ tarhi, nāvayavasaṃba- ndhena taddhitotpattirniṣkraṣṭumaśakyatvādityabhiprāyaḥ |
tasmāddevatāntaramiti | satyapi dravyaikatve saguṇanirguṇāśrayaṇāddevatāntaratvam | āha ca—
ācāryo mātulaśceti dravyaikatve 'pi dṛśyate |
apekṣāhetubhedena vyavahāraḥ pṛthaktayā ||
yadapyucyate indrasya vṛtravadhottarakālamiti | pūrvaṃ sarvatra śuddhātmanaḥ pratipanna- devatātvasya paścāttano 'yaṃ guṇaḥ stutimātropayogī na devatātve 'ntarbhavatīti manyate | asya tūttaraṃ gatārtham |
sthite ca devatāntaratve, śuddhasya devatāyāḥ prakāśanaṃ, śuddhena vā viśiṣṭasya, viśi- ṣṭacodanāyāmapi vā śuddhasya devatātvaṃ, śuddhaśabdoccāraṇe 'pi vā viśiṣṭe devatātvaṃ pratipadyata ityādi sarvamandhakāranirīkṣitaṃ sāhasamātreṇābhyupagamyeta, na caitadyuktam | ato yatra vidhimantrayordevatāsaṃvādastatra pragātho nīyeta | asmatpakṣe punaḥ—
yāṃ kāṃ cidapyupādāya devatāṃ sādhitā stutiḥ |
adṛṣṭaṃ yāgamātrārthaṃ karotyārādavasthitam || 17 ||

yadi cā ' 'dimānanādirvā guṇaḥ kevalamindrastutyarthamevopādīyate na devatātve 'ntarbhavati, tato 'syopādānamevānarthakaṃ syāt | sarvā hi devataivamarthamabhidhīyate vidhīyate vā, kathaṃ nāma taduddeśena karma kriyeteti |
yadi cāvihite vihite ca guṇe kevalenendreṇa vyavahiyate tato nārtho guṇābhidhā- nena | kiṃ ca—
guṇo 'nantargataścātra paścādābhihito bhavet |
lakṣaṇatvena voktaḥ sannacāprāptestadasti te ||
na hi grahasaṃbandha indrasya prāpto yena tadratendrānuvādena mahattvaṃ kevalameva stutyartha- mucyeta | na ca mahānindraḥ prāpto yato guṇenopalakṣya vidhīyeta | tasmādaprāptavidherdevatā- ntaratā || 18 ||
pūrvavanmantravyapadeśabhedavyavasthā || 19 ||/?/

śabdādaraḥ || 20 ||
balavatpramāṇavirodhe saṃskārapakṣastyajyeta, na ca so 'sti, liṅgabalīyastvādutkarṣasi- ddherityaparyudāsaḥ saṃskārapakṣasya |
atha vā 'rthaikadeśo 'yaṃ samāsārthaprakāśanam |
kariṣyatyavirodhāya manotāsthāgniśabdavat ||
anutkṛṣyamāṇa eva vā pragāthaḥ sannidhivaśādavayavadvāreṇa mahendramavirodhāya dṛṣṭārtha- tvāya ca prakāśayiṣyati, yathā 'gnīṣomīye manotāyāmagniśabdaḥ prakaraṇātsamāsasthaḥ pratī- yamānaḥ sāhacaryātsomamapi pratipādayansamudāyārtho vijñāyate | ataścānutkarṣe 'pya- doṣa iti || 21 ||
āmnāteṣvapi mantreṣu notkṛṣṭeṣvarthadarśanam |
sarveṣu bhavatītyevaṃ notkṛṣṭatvaṃ na duṣyati ||
na hi yamādīnāṃ grahāntareṣvapi devatātvaṃ yenendravadutkṛṣṭairmantraiḥ prakāśyeran | ata- steṣāṃ tāvadvidhyānarthakyaprasaṅgādavaśyamadṛṣṭārthatvena bhavitavyam | tataśca tatsāmānyādi- tareṣu tathātvaṃ, tasmānna saṃskārakarmatvamiti || 22 ||
yamādayo na vidyante yadyapi grahadevatāḥ |
anyakarmopayogitvātprakāśyāḥ syustathā 'pi naḥ ||
maṇḍūkasūktasyāgnau prayogaḥ, tatra maṇḍūkenāgnivikarṣaṇāmnānāt | akṣasūktasya rāja- sūye, tatra ‘akṣairddīvyati’ iti vidhānāt |
mūṣikāsūktasyaikādaśinyām, ‘ākhuste' paśuḥ | ityupaśayasaṃbandhasaṃkīrtane sati tad‌dvāreṇopaśayasyaiva stutiḥ | kuṣumbhakasūktādīnāṃ tu yadi kva cidviśeṣarūpeṇārtho nāsti tataḥ sāmānyavidhānenārthavattā bhaviṣyati |
vācaḥ stome sarvamantropadeśāt | tathā ' 'śvine sūryodayāvadhi samāptyasaṃbhave sarvāsā- mṛcāmupadeśāt |
tatra vacanenaivā ' 'samavetārthamantravidhānasāmarthyādagateradṛṣṭārthāśrayaṇaṃ, na ca kvacida- dṛṣṭārthatvena sarvatraiva dṛśyamānamapyarthaṃ projhjhyādṛṣṭārthatvakalpanā yujyate | tathā hi—
na japādāvadṛṣṭārthe vaiṣṇavyādinidarśanāt |
yājyādāvapi dṛṣṭārthe syādadṛṣṭārthakalpanā || 23 ||
yaduktaṃ manotāyāmivāgniśabda indraśabdaḥ samāsārthaṃ lakṣayiṣyatīti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ | etasmādeva doṣāt | na hīndraśabdasya svārthamabhidadhataḥ kaścidvirodho yena śruti- vṛttiṃ jahyāt |
sarvādṛṣṭārthānāṃ ca yathākathaṃ cillakṣaṇayā dṛṣṭārthatvāpādanasaṃbhavādayuktametat | yattūkta- mutkṛṣyatāmeveti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ—
prakṛtastotraśeṣatvaṃ śrutyā saṃnidhiklṛptayā |
vinā sāmānyasaṃbandhālliṅgaṃ cāviniyojakam ||
yadi hyekāntena prathamaṃ dṛṣṭārthatvamavadhāritaṃ syāt tataḥ kramasaṃnidhikalpyā śrutirbā- dhyeta, yatastu viniyogottarakālā prayojanakalpanā na tadvaśenaiva viniyogastena kramasaṃ- nidhibhyāṃ viniyukte dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā prayojanaṃ kalpyamānaṃ na virudhyate | na cotkṛṣṭasya pragāthasyānyatra viniyogaheturasti |
liṅgaṃ hi devatāṃ prakāśayituṃ sāmarthyena tanmantraṃ svarūpe viniyuñjīta, tathā cātvā-
narthakyaprasaṅgaḥ | karmasaṃbandhe tu na kaścidasya vyāpāraḥ | tadetalliṅgaṃ yadi sāmānyataḥ kena citkarmasaṃbandhaḥ | kriyate, tataḥ kathaṃ tasyopakariṣyatītyapekṣite yathā śaknotītyevamā- śrayaṇāddevatāprakāśanadvāreṇeti viniyuṅkte |
na cātra sāmānyasaṃbandhakāraṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ | tasmādutkṛṣṭānāmānarthakyameva syādityadṛ- ṣṭārthataiva nyāyyā | kiṃca—
evaṃ ca saptamī ṣaṣṭhī dvitīyā stautiśaṃsatī |
śrutivṛttā bhaviṣyanti tvatpakṣe 'nyārthavṛttayaḥ ||
guṇaguṇyabhidhānakriyāṇāmakṣarārūḍhatvātsaptamīśrutisaṃyogo ghaṭate | prakāśane hetukaraṇa- tvāttṛtīyāyuktāḥ kavatyādayaḥ śrūyeran | nanu stutāvapi kavatīnāṃ karaṇatvāttṛtīyaiva prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ—
ādhāratvamapi hyāsāṃ karaṇatvaṃ ca vidyate |
tatraitayoryathābhīṣṭaṃ nirdeśa upapadyate ||
prakāśanaṃ punaḥ paramārthatastāvadātmādhāram | karmatvapratipattyuttarakālaṃ ca vyāpyatvā- ddevatādhāram | tatra kavatīnāmaikāntikameva karaṇatvamiti vaiṣamyam |
api ca stauti śaṃsatīti stutibhāvanā pūrvāparībhūtā śrūyate | tasyāṃ ca dhātvarthaḥ karaṇabhūtaḥ śeṣāṇi ca kārakāṇi nityaṃ dhātvarthaṃ niṣpādayanti saṃbadhyante | tatra yadi mantrāḥ stotranirvṛ- ttyarthā bhavanti tato 'pekṣitārthakaraṇācchāstradṛṣṭamarthaṃ kurvanto dṛṣṭārthā bhavanti | prakāśanaṃ tu kurvanto 'cāditakaraṇādadṛṣṭārthā bhaveyuḥ | tataśca varaṃ stutīnāmevā 'dṛṣṭārthatvam | kiṃ ca |
śrutyaiva ṣaṣṭhī pārārthyaṃ devatānāṃ bravīti naḥ |
na pradhānaṃ guṇāśceṣṭāḥ stutestena pradhānatā ||
devatāprādhānye hi prātipadikārthaparatvādavyatiriktārthaviṣayā ‘agnirmūrdhā’ ivatprathamaivaśrūyeta | 1ṛ॰ saṃ॰ ( 1-2-38 ) |
yadapi kiṃ citprathamāntaṃ tadapi yogyatāpūrvakaikavākyatvavaśena guṇasaṃbandhārthameva | yathā, indro yāto—jaṅgamasya, avasitasya—sthāvarasya ca rājeti |
na ca guṇānāmupayogo 'stīti tatprādhānyānāśrayaṇe stutyarthataiva yuktā | satyamiti granthacchedaḥ | tatrārthavādanyāyena śeṣapadānarthakyaprasaṅgātsatyapi pūrvatra prādhānyaparyavasāna- saṃbhave stutyarthenaivaikavākyatā yuktā |
na caivaṃ stautiśaṃsatyoḥ prakāśanalakṣaṇārthatā bhaviṣyatīti stutereva prādhānyam || 24 ||
pṛthaktvaniveśinī dvidvādaśasaṃkhyā na prakāśanābhede sati śabdenocyate | sāmānyā- vivakṣāyāṃ vā pratyṛcaṃ pratipadaṃ ca tannirvṛtterna dvādaśatve 'vatiṣṭhate | nanu ca stutāvapi tulya- metat | tathā hi—
sāmānyastutirekaiva bhedo 'pi pratyṛcaṃ sthitaḥ |
na cānyathā vivakṣā 'sti yato dvādaśatā bhavet ||
atha stomavaśādṛksamudāyasādhyāḥ stutayo gaṇyante tathā prakāśanānyapītyaviśeṣaḥ | ucyate—
kriyāḥ phalāpavargiṇyastatsaṃkhyāgaṇanāḥ sadā |
apūrvadvādaśatvācca dvādaśatvaṃ nirūpyate ||
prakāśanārthatve hi pratyṛcaṃ pratipadaṃ ca tannirvṛttidarśanātkriyāsamāpterna kiṃ citkā- raṇamasti, yena dvādaśatvaṃ paricchidyeta | apūrvārthatve tu teṣāṃ śāstragamyatvādyathoktastomasaṃ- padaḥ prāṅ‌nirvṛttipramāṇābhāvādṛksamudāyenāpūrvanirvṛttestad‌dvāreṇa kriyāsamāptyupalakṣaṇādapū- rvāṇāṃ dvādaśatvena mtutidvādaśatvasiddhiḥ | na hi pratyṛcaṃ sarvastotrebhyo vā tatkalpanāyāḥ
kiṃ citpramāṇamasti yathā prakāśanasya darśanam || 25 ||
ṛcāmanūhyatvādāgneyagrahacodanayaivā ' 'gneyīnāṃ stutisādhanatvasiddheḥ ‘āgneyīṣu stuvate’ ityanarthakaṃ vacanam || 26 ||
sabandhasya bhedanibandhanatvātsaṃbandhavacanena stotraśastrayorbhedaḥ | sa ca prakāśanaikatvānna prāpnoti | nanu stutyekatvāditaratrāpi tulyametat | atha pragītāpragītamantrasādhanatvena bhedaḥ, tadvayaktidvāreṇa vā, sa pūrvapakṣe 'pyaviśiṣṭaḥ | tatrottaraṃ dvādaśatvavat | atyantabhedāddhi stotraśastrāpūrvayostad‌dvāreṇa kriyayorbhedamupacarya saṃbandhavacanam | na tu prakāśanaṃ svataḥ phalato vā bhidyate || 27 ||
yadidaṃ dvitīyāpratipāditakarmārhamabhidhānamidaṃ cāparaṃ prādhānye kāraṇam | pradhāna- kriyā hi kena cidrūpeṇepsitā ‘agnihotraṃ juhoti’ ‘ādhāramādhārayati’ itivadbhavati na saṃskārakriyā 'tyantaguṇabhūtatvāt |
atha vā stotraśastrasamākhyayorabhidhānatvaṃ tatprādhānyajñāpanārtham | itarathā hi prakā- śanamityevaṃ samākhyā syāt | avahantyādivadrā/?/ naiva bhavet || 28 ||

devataiva pradhānatvātphalaṃ yācyeta karmavat |

na karmāntaratā 'styatra balavatpratyabhijñayā |
na copātto guṇaḥ kaścinna ca vākyāntare stutiḥ ||

taireva vihitaṃ kasmānna smārayati codanā ||

tatrobhayoranuvādatvāsaṃbhavādagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvācca dvayorapi vidhāyakatvam | abhyā- sācca karmabhedaḥ syāt | balavatpratyabhijñāyāścābhyāsādhikaraṇa evottaraṃ bhaviṣya1ti | tasmānnaivamabhidhāyakatvasiddhiḥ | ye 'pyāhuḥ—
yasmādvrīhyādivanmantrāḥ karaṇatvena karmaṇām |
brāhmaṇena niyujyante tadvatte na vidhāyakāḥ ||
tairapi sāmānyato dṛṣṭamātraṃ vyapadiṣṭam | kutaḥ—
vidhiśaktirniyogena na mantrasyāpanīyate |
tato vidhāsyati hyeṣa niyogātsmārayiṣyati ||
na hi viniyuktena na vidhātavyamiti kiṃ citpramāṇaṃ yadi svato vidhiśaktirastyeva | atha tvasau prathamameva nāsti vyartho viniyogopanyāsaḥ | na cobhayakaraṇe virodhaḥ | tathā hi—
vidhāyakaṃ sadapyarthaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ smārayiṣyati |
‘mantratastu virodhe syā2t’ ityatraitadvadiṣyate ||
ye ca vacanenānaviniyuktāste ca tvatpakṣe nirākaraṇahetvabhāvādvidhāyakāḥ prāpnuvantī- tyetadapyakāraṇam | na cātra mantropanyāsasya kaścisaṃbandha ityanyathā varṇyate | vividha- mevā ' 'khyātaṃ guṇapradhānakarmatvenoktam |
athedānīṃ prastūyate kiṃ tāveva dvau prakārāvutānyo 'pyastīti | tatra na tṛtīyaḥ prakā- ro 'stīti matvā pūrvapakṣavādī vadatyaikārthyamiti | tathā prāpte 'bhidhīyate || 30 ||
asti tṛtīyaḥ prakāro yadabhidhāyakatvaṃ nāma | paśya— 1(a॰ 2 pā॰ 2 a॰ 2) atreti śeṣaḥ | 2(a॰ 5 pā॰ 1 a॰ 9 sū॰ 16) |

vidhiśaktiḥ praṇaśyettu te sarvatrābhidhāyakāḥ ||
mantragatānāṃ brāhmaṇagatānāṃ cā ' 'khyātaśabdānāṃ yeṣāṃ śabdāntareṇa vidhiśaktirapa- gacchati teṣāmabhidhāyakatvam | tatra ‘na tā naśanti’ ityatra tāvadyacchabdopahito vidhā- yako 'nuvādatvaṃ prārthayate | tathā ‘ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāya’ ityāmantraṇavibhaktyā | dāmi gṛhṇāmītyuttamapuruṣeṇa | ‘yadi somamapahareyuḥ’ iti yadiśabdena | te caivamādayaḥ prāyeṇa mantreṣviti mantrā udāharaṇam | avidhāyakā mantrā iti ca prasiddhiḥ |

na ca teṣāmapi samastavedālocanena mantratvanirūpaṇādiha girāpadavānmantra iherāpa- davāniha traisvaryavānihaikaśrutimāniti hyādita evāvadhāryate | yadyevamūhādīnāmapi mantra tvaprasaṅgaḥ | tatrāpi hi prakṛtivikṛtyālocanena śakyamevaṃ nirūpayitum | ihāgnipadavā- nnirvāpamantra iha sūryādipadavāniti | naitatsamānam | kutaḥ—

nyāyena kalpyamāne tu na śakyaṃ tannirūpaṇam ||

mantrabrāhmaṇalokeṣu vaktavyaṃ kvopayujyate ||
ṛksāmayostāvatparimāṇaṃ prayogasamarthaṃ prasiddhamiti na kaścidvākyalakṣaṇādekavākya- tālakṣaṇādvopakāro bhavati |
tathā brāhmaṇe 'gnihotrādivākyaiḥ sādhyasādhanetikartavyatāvatyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ niyukteṣu puruṣeṣvekānekavākyajñānaṃ kvopayujyate | nanvayamupayoga ekavākyatālakṣaṇajño vākyabhedaṃ parihariṣyati | nāyamupayogaḥ | kutaḥ—
vākyabhedo hyasāmarthyaṃ śabdāvṛttyādi doṣataḥ |
ekanānātvavijñānanirapekṣo 'vadhāryate ||
padatadekadeśatatsamūhāvṛttiprasaṅgātmakastadvibhāgalakṣaṇo vā vākyaikatvanānātvajñāna- nirapekṣaireva doṣatvenāvadhāryate | vibhāgalakṣaṇe gamyamānasaṃbandhaparityāgo 'nekādṛṣṭakalpanā ca doṣaḥ | itaratrā ' 'vṛtteravedatvādaprāmāṇyamiti naikavākyalakṣaṇenārthaḥ | pauruṣeyavākye tu lakṣaṇanirapekṣasya lokasya vyavahārasiddheratyantānaupayikatvam |
yadi cārthaikatvena vākyaikatvamavadhāryate vākyasyārthapratyāyanārthatvāttatsvarūpaikatvajñāno- ttarakālabhāvinā kiṃ vākyaikatvajñānena | vaktṝ/?/ṇāṃ ca parapratyāyanārtho vākyaprayoga iti nā ' 'tmārthaṃ lakṣaṇajñānāpekṣā | śrotṝṇāṃ punaratyantānavagate 'rthe pravartamānaṃ puruṣavākyamapi na vedavākyādbhidyate | avagatārthaṃ tvanuvādatvādanādṛtyameveti naikānekajñānamapekṣyate |
kimarthaṃ na vaidikānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ noktam | yadi tvarthāpattyoktameveti | tanna | śrutyā tallakṣaṇamabhidhāyārthāpattyā laukikavākyasiddhirāśrayitavyā | na cārthāpattiḥ saṃbhavati | na hyetallaukikavākyalakṣaṇajñānamīdṛśena vaidikavākyalakṣaṇajñānena vinā nopapadyate |
na caitasyāpi vākyalakṣaṇatā siddhā, vākyaikatvavaśenārthaikatvalakṣaṇārthāpattyupanyāsāt | api ca kadācidvaidikavākyānāmapyetallakṣaṇam | atyantaviprakṛṣṭaṃ vā kiṃcidbhavedityā- śaṅikatatvānna niyogato 'rthāpattiḥ | na ca parisaṃkhyā, sāmānyaviśeṣabhedānupādānāt |
yahi hi sāmānyenedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kvacidabhidhāya punaḥ kevalapauruṣeyasaṃbaddhamucyeta tataḥ parisaṃkhyāvaśena vaidikānāmidaṃ tāvanna bhavatītyetāvanmātraṃ gamyeta | na tu lakṣaṇaviśeṣo 'ne- kopaplavāt | evamapi hi viparyayakalpanaṃ saṃbhavati, arthānekatvādekaṃ vākyaṃ nirākāṅkṣaṃ cedvibhāge syāditi |
atha vā 'rthaikatvānnānāvākyatvamiti | tasmādakalpaneyam | kiṃ ca—
kathaṃ cārthānapekṣatve vākyaikatvaṃ prasidhyati |
na hi varṇasvarūpeṇa jñātenaitannirūpyate ||
vākyaikatvāccārthaikatve 'vadhāryamāṇe 'vaśyamarthanirapekṣaṃ vākyaikatvamavagantavyam | na ca tasyāvadhitvena kiṃcitpaśyāmo varṇaśataṃ varṇasahastraṃ vā | tathā hi—
ajñātārtheṣu varṇeṣu bahuvākyaikavartiṣu |
na kadācinmatirdṛṣṭā vākyeyattvāvadhāraṇe ||
tasmātpadeṣu yāvatsu śrūyamāṇeṣu dṛśyate |
vispaṣṭamaikyamarthasya tāvatāmekavākyatā ||
lokamantrabrāhmaṇeṣvavyabhicāryetadeva vākyalakṣaṇamiti sthitam | yattu na prāgvākyādartha- tadekatvāvadhāraṇamastīti | atra brūmaḥ—
padārthaiḥ padavijñātairvākyārthaḥ pratipādyate |
lokasiddhairna tatrāsti vākyaikatvanimittatā ||
yadi hi vākyaṃ padavadvācakaṃ bhavettatastadekatvānekatvānuvartitā vākyārthasyābhyupa- gamyeta kadācit |
yadā tu pṛthagbhūtaireva padairitaretaranirapekṣaiḥ sveṣu padārtheṣūkteṣu tatsaṃsargādeva padavyā- pārānapekṣo vākyārthapratyayo bhavati, tadvaśena ca tāvanti padānyekaṃ vākyamityavadhā- ryate, na tadā vākyatadekatvayorvyāpāraṃ paśyāmaḥ | tasmādavirodhaḥ |
bhāvanaiva ca vākyārthaḥ svakārakaviśeṣitā |
tasyāśca jñāyate nityaṃ bhedaḥ śabdāntarādibhiḥ ||
yasminpadasamūhe śabdāntarādibhirna bhāvanāntaraṃ pratipādyate tasyaikavākyatvaṃ bhāvanā- ntarāpekṣayā tu nānātvam | taccaitadubhayamapyanyata eva jñāyata ityanimittaṃ vākyaikatva- marthaikatvasya | tasmādyathābhāṣyameva vyākhyātavyam |
bhedalakṣaṇe mantraprastāve ca tadbhedastāvadṛg‌yajuḥsāmātmako 'bhihitaḥ | tadavāntarabhedā- kāṅkṣāyāmṛk‌sāmānāmadhyetṛsiddhe bhede lakṣaṇaṃ na kriyate | yajuṣāṃ tu praśliṣṭapaṭhitatvānna lakṣaṇādvinā bhedajñānamityāramyate |
nanu bhinnapratīkaviniyogāttadbhedaḥ set‌syatīti | na tāvatsarveṣāmeva brāhmaṇe vini- yogo 'sti | na ca ‘uttarādiḥ pūrvāntalakṣaṇam’ ityetadvedavacanam | nyāyena tu sūtrakā- rairevā ' 'tmīyabrāhmaṇaviniyogeṣvetaduktamiti nyāyasya lakṣaṇamucyate |
tatrāvayavavyutpattibalenā ' 'ha—yāvatejyata iti | sarvamantrāṇāmanena yajeteti hi prathamaṃ prakaraṇāmnānānumitavākyaviniyogo bhavati | tataḥ sākṣādyāgasaṃbandhāsaṃbhavātta/?/dupa- kāriprakāśanena tairiṣṭaṃ bhavatīti kalpyate | tenocyate—
yāvatā padasaṃghena smāryate yāgasādhanam |
tāvadyajuśca vākyaṃ ca vaktavyatvānnirūpyate ||
vacanārhaṃ hi vākyaṃ kārye samarthaṃ ca tadarhaṃ bhavati na nyūnamadhikaṃ vā, tāvataiva cejyate | tattu kīdṛśamityekārthaṃ sākāṅkṣāvayavaṃ ceti lakṣaṇam | īdṛśaṃ cedekaṃ yaju- ryattato 'dhikaṃ tadvākyāntaraṃ yajurantaraṃ cetyuktaṃ bhavati |
evaṃ sarvatra purastātparastādvaikārthatvasamarthapadaparigrahaṇādasamarthapadavimokena ca bhinnāni yajūṃṣi kalpyante | tenaikavākyalakṣaṇoktau cārthādyajurbhedavākyabhedalakṣaṇayoḥ siddhiriti, etasmāccetkāraṇādityāha | kimudāharaṇamiti | abhidheyavācinamarthaśabdaṃ gṛhītvā lakṣaṇadvayasamāveśāsaṃbhāvanayā pṛcchati | tathā hi—
ekārthatvaṃ padasya syātsākāṅkṣāvayavaṃ na tat |
sākāṅkṣāvayavaḥ saṃghastasyaiko 'rtho na vidyate ||
padasya hyākṛtirnāmaiko 'rtho bhavenna tu tadavayavānāṃ varṇānāṃ prakṛtipratyayayorvā vibhāge sākāṅkṣatvam, arthapratyāyanaśaktyabhāvāt, samūhāvayavāstu padāvi vibhāge parasparamākā- ṅkṣanti, na tveṣāmekārthatvaṃ, pratipadamarthabhedāt, samūhasya ca pṛthagarthāntarāprasiddheḥ | ato lakṣyābhāvādalakṣaṇametaditi |
prayojanavācyabhiprāyeṇa devasya tvetyudāhṛtam | nanviti paraḥ svābhiprāyaṃ prakaṭa- yati | yadā padārthavyatiriktaḥ kaścideko nirbhāgo vākyārtho nāsti tadā tattatpadārtha- 1tai॰ saṃ॰ (1-1-4) |
dharmāveva sāmīpyavaśātteṣāṃ gamyamānau bhedasaṃsargau syātām | ata āha—tathā 'pyekārthatā na syāt | katham—
bhedo nāma padārthānāṃ vyavacchedaḥ parasparam |
sa ca pratipadārthatvānnaikatvaṃ pratipadyate ||
vyaktipadārthapakṣe sarvavyaktīnāṃ gavādipadenaivopāttatvādviṣayaśabdaiḥ śuklādibhiḥ kṛṣṇā- divyavacchedamātraṃ vaktavyam | tatsaṃsargaḥ padārthāntargatatvānna vākyārtho bhavatīti tadupasa- rjanasteṣāṃ bhedo gṛhyate |
sa ca yathā śuklaśabdena gośabdasya kṛṣṇādibhyo bhidyamānatvādbhavati, evaṃ śukla śabdasyāpi gośabdenāśvādibhyo nivartitasya bhavati, vyavacchedyanānātvācca nāstyekatve pramāṇam | bhedasāmānyagrahaṇe vā sarvavākyārthaikatvaprasaṅgaḥ | yadā tu bhedavantaḥ padārthā eva vākyārthastadā siddhameva nānātvam | tathā—
saṃsargo 'pi padārthānāmanyonyenānurañjanam |
ekaikatra tadapyastītyekatvaṃ na pratīyate ||
ākṛtipadārthapakṣe śuklatvagotvayoḥ svarūpeṇābhihitayoḥ saṃnidhānāditaretarānurañja- namarthasiddhabhedaṃ vākyārthaḥ | sa ca gotve śuklatvasaṃsargaḥ śuklatve vā gotvasaṃsargaḥ sāma- styenaikaikavyaktyupasaṃhārādupalabhyata iti nānā |
yadyapi ca kathaṃcid‌dvipade sa evobhayatrāpi saṃsarga ityekatvaṃ gamyeta, tathā 'pi bahu- pade yena yena pradeśena padadvayaṃ saṃsṛjyate tena tena saṃsargarūpeṇopalabdheranekatvam | kiṃ ca—
svaprādhānyātpadārthānāṃ dharmāvetāvubhāvapi |
dharmibhedena bhidyete na hyekatvamupāśritam ||
yāvaddhi prayojanaikatvaṃ nā ' 'śrīyate tāvatsvatantrāḥ padārthā naikatāmāpādayituṃ śakyanta iti pṛthageva bhedasaṃsargāvanubhavanti | tasmādapi nānā | yadyapi cāsmākamākṛtipadārthaka- tvānnaiva bhedo vākyārthatvenābhipretastathā 'pi pūrvapakṣavādinā vikalpamātreṇopanyastaḥ | siddhāntābhiprāyavivaraṇaṃ prayojanavācitvādarthaśabdasyopapannam |
evaṃ satyeka eva kaścitpadārthaḥ pradhānabhūtastadviśeṣaṇatvenetaropādānamiti sarveṣāṃ ca 1tai॰ saṃ॰ (1-1-4) |
tadbhedāttatsaṃsargāccaiko bhedaḥ saṃsargo vetyapi śakyaṃ vaditum | tasmātkarmasamavāyitvena dṛṣṭārthatvādaśeṣasavitrādipadārthaviśiṣṭanirvāpaprakāśanaṃ samastasya padasamūhasyaikaṃ prayojana- miti siddhamudāharaṇam | parastu nirvāpaprādhānyamajñātvā pṛcchati—nanvatra devasyeti | siddhāntavādyāha—yadi nirvapāmītyanuṣaṅgastata evaṃ, sa cānuṣaṅgastadguṇabhāvena bhavet, na cāsya guṇabhāvaḥ prayojanavattvāt | savitrādīnāṃ cākarmasamavāyādityekārthatvam |
atha kimarthamubhayaṃ sūtritāmiti | yeṣāṃ saṃhatānāmekaprayojanatvaṃ teṣāṃ tadaśaktervya- stānāmekāntenaiva sākāṅkṣatvaṃ bhavatītyavācyaṃ tat | atha vā vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvaṃ saṃhataikaprayojanatvena vinā na bhavati pratyekakāryeṣu nirapekṣapravṛttisiddheḥ | ataḥ sākā- ṅkṣavibhāgenaivetarākṣepāttanmātramevābhidhātavyamiti |
pratyudāharaṇe darśayati—ucyata iti | puroḍāśa vibhāgaprakāśanamekaṃ prayojanaṃ nira- pekṣāṇāṃ dṛṣṭam | nirvāpe dattottarā 'pi vibhāganānātvaparicodanā saṃhatya viśeṣaṇānu- pādānātpunaḥ punaḥ prayuktasyānuṣaṅgadoṣābhāvādupanyasyate | tatrottaraṃ na tāvannirapekṣasā- dhanabhedādapi kriyānānātvamiti vakṣyā2maḥ | sādhanaprādhānyaṃ tu pratyuktameva | etatkṛto 1(a॰ 1 pā॰ 1 a॰ 7 sū॰ 25) atreti śeṣaḥ | 2anuṣaṅgādhikaraṇe ‘citpattistvā punātu’ ityudāharaṇe ‘na ca tasya kārakabhedādbheda ityādhimeti śeṣaḥ |
viśeṣaḥ karmānaṅgatvādanādaraṇīya iti sāmānyaprakāśanādekārthatvam | ‘tasminsīda’ ityasya pūrvāpekṣitve satyapi prayojanabhedādvākyāntaratvam | tasmātsaṃhatayoreva lakṣa- ṇatvam || 46 ||
(iti yajuḥparimāṇādhikaraṇam || 14 ||)
yeṣāmadṛśyamānakarmasamavetārthatvena laiṅigakaviniyogābhāvena vacanādviniyogasteṣāṃ prāgdṛ- ṣṭārthamantrāvadherekamantratvaṃ yuktam | tathā hi—
kalpyasteṣāmadṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ sa cālpaḥ syātpramāṇavān |
kalpite ca tadekatve sākāṅkṣāḥ syurviyojitāḥ ||
yadā hi bah‌vadṛṣṭakalpanā niṣpramāṇiketyekamadṛṣṭaṃ sarvebhyaḥ kalpitaṃ bhavati tadā pra- tyekaṃ tatsādhanaśaktyabhāvādvibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvamapyastītyekavākyatā | kathaṃ punarasmi- npakṣe pratīkabhedena viniyogaḥ “iṣeṃ tveti śākhāṃ chinatti" “ūrje tvetyanumārṣṭi ityevamādiḥ | kathaṃ ca ‘klaptīrvācayati’ iti bahutvanirdeśaḥ | taducyate—
eko 'pi bahubhirmantraḥ pratīkairviniyujyate |
punaḥ punaḥ prayogācca klṛptīrityabhidhīyate ||
ādimadhyāvasānagrahaṇenaiko 'pi mantrastatra tatra viniyujyamāno 'pi na pīḍyate | 1tai॰ brā॰ (3-7-5) | 2tai॰ saṃ॰ (1-1-1) | 3tai॰ saṃ॰ (1-7-9) | 4‘yāvatā kriyāyā upakāraḥ prakāśyata’ iti bhāṣyāt bhinnapratītiviṣayānekamukhyaviśeṣya- rāhityarūpārthaikatvasyaivaikavākyalakṣaṇatvapratīteḥ stotraśastramantrāṇāṃ caikādṛṣṭasādhanatve 'pi mantraikyābhā- bādbhāṣyasthādṛṣṭaśabdaḥ kalpyākhyātalabhyacchedanādikriyābhiprāyo draṣṭavyaḥ | evaṃ vārtikasthādṛṣṭaśabdo 'pi | evaṃ cādṛṣṭasya vākyārthasyānumānaṃ yasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ sā 'lpīyasītyeva bhāṣya vyākhyātavyam |
yāvadviniyogaṃ hi sakala āvartiṣyate khaṇḍasyāprayojanatvāt | kalpatāṃ kalpatāmiti ca punaḥ punaḥ prayogādekavākyatve 'pi bahuvacanāvirodhaḥ | ucyate | naitadevam |
rūpāduttarakāle hi viniyogaprayojane |
tasmātprāgeva tat‌klṛpterbhedābhedaparīkṣaṇam ||
tiṣṭhatu tāvatprayojanakalpanaṃ viniyogavākyaṃ vā | na hi taduttarakālaṃ svarūpanirūpaṇaṃ yuktam | ajñātarūpasya viniyogāśakteraviniyuktasya ca prayojanakalpanānupapatteḥ | tatta- nnirapekṣaṃ tu rūpaṃ pāṭhādevāvadhāryate | tatkālāvadhṛtabhedābhedānuvartitvaṃ tu prayojanavini- yogayoḥ | pramāṇavaccānekamapi kalpanīyamityuktam | rūpopalabdhivelāyāṃ ceṣetvādinā na parasparasākāṅkṣatvamekaprayojanatvaṃ copalakṣyate | tataśca niṣpratidvaṃdve 'vadhārite bhede paścānna kiṃcidekatvāpādane kāraṇaṃ saṃbhavati | na ca prāganupalabdhaṃ sākāṅkṣatvaṃ kalpa- yituṃ śakyam | tena ca vinā yadyapyekaprayojanatvaṃ bhavettathā 'pyekāṅgavaikalyādekavākya- tvābhāvaḥ, kimuta yadā rūpabhedādviniyogabhedastadbhedāccādṛṣṭārthatve 'pi prayojanabhedaḥ | tvatpakṣe 'pi cāvaśyaṃ yāvadviniyogaṃ tena tena bhavitavyam | iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ | tava sama- stānmantrānmama vyastebhyaḥ | na caiṣāmadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ, brāhmaṇopadiṣṭadṛṣṭārthasādhanatvāt | tadba- lena caiṣāṃ yāvatā vinā coditakaraṇasāmarthyaṃ nāsti tāvadanāmnātamapi kalpanīyaṃ cchina- dmītyādi | yadvā yathaiva “rathaghoṣeṇa māhendrasya stotramupākaroti” iti vacanādavācakaḥ syāpi viniyogamātrānusaṃghānena stotrābhimukhyacih‌natvaṃ bhavati, evamiṣetvādīnāṃ chedanā- dismaraṇahetutvam | ubhayamapi caitatpramāṇavaditi sūtrakāraiḥ kaiścitkathaṃ cidāśritam | sarvathā 'traivamadhyavasātavyam | vikalavākyaprayogāsaṃbhavādavācakaprayogānupapatteścādhyāhāraḥ | atha vā yathāmnātaviniyogānusārāttādṛśenaiva smartuṃ saṃskārādhāne yatitavyam | tatrānu- ṣṭhātrabhiprāyādhīno 'nyataraparigraha iti dṛṣṭaprayojanabhedādapi siddho vākyabhedaḥ | kiṃ ca—
anyonyanirapekṣāṇāṃ kāryānyatve niyogataḥ |
pratyekaṃ yāgahetutvādyajuṣṭavvamavakalpate ||
tathā ‘āyuryajñena kalpatām’ ityevamādīnāṃ nirākāṅkṣabhinnarūpopalabdhernaikatvā-
pattiḥ satyapyekāryatve | na ca tadasti | āyuḥkalpanādīnāṃ bhinnatvāt | nirvāpavadabheda iti cenna | klṛptīriti mantrabahutvacodanāyāḥ pratyakṣatvāt | iha tāvadarthānāmakarmā- ṅgāpavādavivakṣāyāṃ satyāṃ mantroccāraṇamātraṃ prayojanam | tatra ca bavhyaḥ klṛptayaḥ śrūyante | tadbhedaścārthabhedamantareṇa na bhavatītyakṣaropasarjanabhūto 'rtho nānātvenā ' 'śrīyate | klṛpti- viśeṣavacanaṃ ca dṛṣṭārthamiti mantrabahutvāpādanārthatvāt | yathā vibhāga iti | sakṛcchru- tanirvāpavailakṣaṇyāt‌klaptīnām | punaḥ punaruccāritaśabdo 'pi yathā vibhāgaḥ sādhanabhede satyapi na bhidyate, tathā klṛptibhedo 'pi na bhaviṣyatīti manyate | naitadevamityuttaram | iha sāmānyavivakṣānupayogāt | atha vā siddhāntavādyeva yathā vibhāge naitadevamiti svayamevaikavākyabhūtamuttaraṃ dadāti | nanu ca vibhāgavākyānāmapi bhedo 'styeveti nopanya- sanīyam | evaṃ tarhi naivedaṃ prabhedapratipattyarthaṃ, kiṃ tarhi dṛṣṭāntena sahaikatvāpādanaparatvā- ttadīyavikalpāpādanāyopanyasyati | yathā vibhāge tathā 'tra vikalpaḥ kasmānna bhavatīti | naitadevamiti | samānaviṣayatve hi vikalpo bhavati, na ceha sāmānyavivakṣā yena vibhā- gavadaikārthyaṃ bhavet | klṛptiviśiṣṭāyurādyāśāsanaparatvāt | vibhāge hi sādhanānāmaprayo- janatvātsāmānyabhūtakriyāmātraprakāśanaparatvam | iha punarāyurādīnāmāśāsyatvena prādhā- nyāttadviśeṣaṇatvena klṛptyupādānaṃ na tvāyurādiviśiṣṭā sā prakāśyate, niṣprayojana- tvāt | athāpi kriyāprādhānyaṃ tathā 'pi tadbhedaparatvānnānārthatvam | bhedaparatve ca pūrvokta- meva dṛṣṭārthatvamucyate | atha1 vā ‘klṛptīrvācayati’ iti naiva mantraparaḥ klṛptiśabdaḥ, 1api cetyādi bhāṣyam, iha klṛptīriti pūrvabhāṣyeṇa punaruktamiva bhāsamānaṃ klṛptiśabdasya pūrvā- bhipretamantraparatvapakṣāpekṣayā 'rthaparatvarūpapakṣāntarābhidhānārthatvena vyākaroti—athavetyādinā |

matvā phalabhūtastṛtīyastṛtīyoṃ 'śa upanyastaḥ | tatra cārthagṛhītāvapi bhedābhedau vispaṣṭīkaraṇārthaṃ punarante darśitau | kimarthaṃ punarādau vyavahitayoḥ samapradhānā- ṅgāṅigabhāvadvāreṇa bhedābhedayorupanyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ | eṣā hyācāryasya śailīti kecit | tathā hi pūrvādhikaraṇayorapyapūrvabhedamevopanyastavān | atha vā yalliṅgadarśanaṃ vakṣyati vikṛtau prayājādayo dṛśyanta iti tatsākṣādbhedanirākaraṇāyāsamarthaṃ samapradhānabhāvaṃ nirākariṣyati, tannirākaraṇe ca satyavinābhāvādvidhibhedāvapi nirākṛtāveva bhavata iti tadupajīvanāyetthamu- panyāsaḥ | kevalabhedopanyāse tu tadasaṃbaddhameva syāt | tatra dvedhā pūrvapakṣo bhaviṣyati | ekaḥ samaprādhānyadvāreṇā ' 'gneyādīnāṃ karmavidhitve satyeva paurṇabhāsyamāvasyāsaṃyuktayo- staddvayatiriktakarmavidhānāt, aparaḥ punastayoreva karmavidhitvamitareṣāṃ tu guṇavidhānārthatva- mityevaṃ, prathamaṃ tāvaddvayatirekapakṣaṃ parigṛhṇāti śabdāntaratvādabhyāsācca samapradhānānīti | yadyapi caitau hetū sākṣātsamapradhānatvena na saṃgacchete tathā 'pi tatpratijñānena yo 'rthādbhedaḥ prati- jñātastena saṃbandhādekavākyatvam | etaduktaṃ bhavati | ayāgebhyaḥ śabdāntaratvādyāgebhyaścābhyā-
sādbhedastataśca samapradhānānīti | na ca samastānuvādasya kiṃ citprayojanamasti | na ca guṇaphalanimittānāṃ kiṃcicchrūyate yatra vidhivyāpārataḥ karmasvarūpavidhānamupekṣeta | na caiṣā saṃjñā keṣu citprakṛteṣu prasiddhā | vartamānāpadeśe 'pi ca sati prayogavacanārthavādapañca- malakārādīnāmanyatamena ‘samidho yajati’ ityādivadvidhiḥ | satyapi ca yacchabdopabandhe “yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla” ityādivat vidhiśaktyanavalopaḥ | na ca śākhāntarīyavadvidhivi- kalpaḥ | śākhāntarāṇāṃ puruṣāntaraṃ prati pratipādanenārthavattvāt | na tviha karmāntarakalpanā- danyat prayojanamasti | na ca kasya cidanyasya vidheḥ stutiḥ saṃbhavati ekevākyatvābhāvāt | kiṃ punaranayoḥ karmaṇordravyadevatam | taducyate—
dhrauvaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ dravyaṃ devatā māntravarṇikī |
rūpavantāvato yāgau vidhīyete pṛthaktayā ||
“sarvasmai vā etadyajñāya gṛhyata1” iti sarvārthatvādyathaivoṣāṃśuyājasya dhrauvājyadravyakatva- mevamanayorapi yāgayoḥ | tathā ' 'jyabhāgayoḥ krame catasro 'nuvākyāḥ paṭhyante | dve āgne- yyau dve saumyau | te balīyasā vākyenāvacchidyānayoḥ karmaṇorvidhīyete “vārtraghnī paurṇa- māsyāmanūcyete" “vṛdhanvatī amāvāsyāyā2m” iti | na hi paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdā- bhyāmetatkarmavyatiriktamanyadihocyate | nanu kālavacanāvetāviha prayujyete | kiṃ kālasya mantrasaṃbandhena | dṛṣṭaśca saptamīnirdiṣṭānāṃ karmaṇāṃ pradhānabhāvastadyathā “yena karmaṇertsettatra jayāṃ juhuyāt” iti | tenānuvākyādvayasya tulyārthatayā vikalpyamānasyānurūpā yā- jyā 'pi kalpayitavyā | atha vā yugapadvidhānātsamuccaye sati dvidevatyakarmādhyavasāyād dve dve yājye api kalpayitavye | yadvaikaivāgnīṣomadevatyā | atha vā vārtraghnyorevaikā yājyā kartavyā tathā vṛdhanvatyoḥ | ataśca śrutivihitamantrakarmasaṃbandhānyathānupapattyā 'gnīṣomau devato- bhayatrādhyavasīyate | ājyabhāgayostu purākalpasarūpeṇa vākyena devatā tāvatprāptaiva | ‘yasyai kasyai ciddevatāyai havirnirvapan ājyasyaiva nau purastādyajan’ iti | yājyāprāptiścābā- dhitaivānuvākyāgamaśca dāśatayībhyaḥ kartavya iti na kiṃ cidviruddham | tasmādasti karmānta- ratve 'pi rūpamiti bhedo 'taśca samapradhānāni | bheda iti gṛhṇīmaḥ samapradhānatvaṃ tu na mṛṣyā- mahe | kutaḥ |
niveśaḥ keṣu cittveva pṛthaktvenābhidhānayoḥ |
phalaṃ ca tadviśiṣṭebhya iti sābhyaṃ na yujyate ||

darśapūrṇamāsābhidhāne hi viśiṣṭayāgavācinī, tena tanmātrasyaiva phalatvāditareṣāṃ tatsaṃ- nidhānādaṅgatvena bhavitavyam | atrābhidhīyate—
prasiddhenāprasiddhasya nityamiṣṭaṃ viśeṣaṇam |
tasmādyajyanurodhena nāmārtho 'tra nirūpyate ||
sarvatra nāmayuktakarmavidhāne sāmānādhikaraṇyātkadācidyajyarthaviśeṣo nāmnā nirū- pyate kadā cinnāmārtho yajinā | yo yatra pūrvataraprasiddhārtho bhavati sa itaraṃ svaviṣaye sthāpa- yati | yathā jyotiṣṭomenetyatra jyotirbhistrivṛdādibhiḥ staumairyogātprasiddhārthena nāmnā dakṣiṇīyādibhyo yaṃjirnivartya somayāge sthāpyate | tathā rājasūyenetyatra nāpa yāgāyāgavi- ṣayatvenopaplavamānaṃ prakṛtayāgaprasiddhena yajinā svaviṣayaṃ nīyate | tadiha prātipadikadvayasamā- sadvivacanārthānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsapadopāttānāṃ na kvacitprasiddhirasti yayā yajestadviṣayatvaṃ vijñā- yeta | yajiḥ punaryāgamātre prasaktaḥ sannadhikāreṇa prakṛteṣu sthāpitaḥ śaknotyaprasiddhaṃ darśapūrṇamāsaśabdaṃ svaviṣaye niyantum | tataśca darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmityavivakṣitāvayavasamā- sārthadvitvaṃ varṇalolībhā1vamātrarūpeṇa kevalakaraṇasaṃvādiprakṛtāśeṣayāganāmatvaṃ rājasūya- śabdavatpratipadyate | ‘supāṃ supo bhavanti’ iti bahuvacanasya sthāne dvivacanaṃ samastasamu- dāyagataikavacanasya vā | kathaṃ punardarśapūrṇamāsābhyāmityaprasiddham | yadā tāvat—
vācyakālayujo yāgāḥ prakṛtāḥ santi ke cana |
dvisaṃkhyotpattiyuktāśca prasiddhiryeṣu vidyate ||
tannāmāśeṣasvārthaparityāgenātyantaparānurodhivṛttiṃ bhajate yatra kaścidapyaṃśo 'prasiddhaḥ | iha tu darśena kālena paurṇamāsena ca saṃyuktā āgneyādiyāgā vidyante | dvitvayuktāścā ' '- jyabhāgādayasteṣāmayuktaḥ parityāga iti | taducyate |
prakṛtipratyayau pūrṇau viśeṣṭuṃ yajatiṃ kṣamau |
āgneyādyājyābhāgādāvekatraikārthaśūnyatā ||
yadyapyāgneyādiṣu svābhidheyakālayogātprātipadikaṃ varteta tathā 'pi teṣāṃ bahutvād dvitvānupapatterasamarthaṃ padaṃ, yatrāpi dvitvamastyāghārayorājyabhāgayorvā tatrāpi prātipadi- kasyātyantamaśaktiḥ | na cārthaprakaraṇaśabdāntarairvispaṣṭaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyamasti, yena kena cidvarṇasāmānyādākhyāvikāranyāyena gauṇatvena vā tadviṣayatvamadhyavasīyeta | kasmātpuna- rimāvevāpūrvau pūrṇamāsyamāvāsyāsaṃjñakau dvau yāgau phalāya na vidhīyete | tathā hi |
siddhānte 'pi tu yāgābhyāṃ śabdābhyāmanukīrttitau |
tāveva samudāyau dvau vidhāsyete phalaṃ prati ||

yadi kaściddarśapūrṇamāsaśabdayoḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdayośca vailakṣaṇyānna pūrvaka- rmapratyabhijñānaṃ phalavākye 'stīti brūyātsa vaktavyastulyaste doṣo 'yamiti | tavāpi hi paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsaṃjñakāveva samudāyau phalavantāviṣṭau | na ca tayoḥ prayogavākye 'sti śabdatvātpratyabhijñānam | atha tatra vinā 'pi saṃjñānusāreṇa kālayogādva‍ṛttiriṣyate sa mamāpyastyeva kālayogaḥ “paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta" “amāvāsyāyāmamāvā- syayā yajeta” iti | naitadevam | evamapi hi—
ṣaṇṇāmagnyāṃdiyāgānāmanayośca dvayorayam |
samānaḥ kālasaṃyogaṃ iti neṣṭāvadhāraṇā ||
na hyaṣṭānāṃ kālasaṃyoge satyavadhāraṇe heturasti, yenānayoreva phalasaṃbandhaḥ syāt | syādetat | eteṣāṃ madhye yayoḥ kayościtphalasaṃbandha iti | tadayuktam |
viśeṣahetvabhāve hi grahaṇaṃ niṣpramāṇakam |
pakṣe vā 'ṅgapradhānatvaṃ virodhānna vikalpate ||
vinā viśeṣahetunā yāgatvakālasaṃbandhasāmye sati yāveva gṛhītau tatraivetareṣāṃ prādhā- nyaprāmāṇyabhājāṃ satāmaṅgatvāpādanād viruddhatā syāt | atha vikalpena sarveṣāṃ pākṣiko- 'nugrahaḥ kalpyeta tatrāpi tasyaiva kadā citpradhānatvaṃ kadā cidaṅgatvamiti vipratiṣiddham | ubhayātmanāṃ cāṅgatayā pravṛtteḥ pradhānatvena ca nivṛtterāgneyādīnāṃ vikṛtigamane yāva- jjīvaṃ saṃśayaprasaṅgaḥ | sarvasaṃkhyāśca kena cidavāntarasāmānyāvacchedena saṃkhyeyeṣu vartante | na vā 'pūrvayorāgneyādīnāṃ vā samastānāmekadeśe vā kiṃcidavāntarasāmānyaṃ dṛśyate yena dvitvamavadhāryeta | ya eva hi gṛhītastasyaiva yāgāntarāpekṣayodbhūtena bahutvena keva- lātmāpekṣeṇa caikatvena dvitvaṃ bādhyate | tataśca dvivacanasyāprasiddhiḥ | siddhānte tu śabdadvayena samudāyadvayāpādanādasamudāyīkṛtayāgavailakṣaṇyādavāntaradharmayogātsaṃbhavati dvi- tvayogastadvaśena ca kālayogātkathaṃ ciddarthapūrṇamāsaprātipadikayorapi vṛttisiddhirityupapa- dyate yāgaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ na tu pūrvapakṣe samudāyatvāpādanābhāvātsaṃkhyāvṛttiriti prakṛtayāgamātra eva phalasaṃbandhaḥ | atha kasmādaṣṭāveva yāgāḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyākālagatadvitvāpekṣayā labdhaviśeṣaṇāḥ santo na vidhīyante | yathā siddhānte samudāyagatadvitvāpekṣayā ṣaḍ vidhāsyante | nedṛśenāsphuṭena prakṛtayāgamātrāvalambyā ' 'khyātaṃ śakyaṃ nivartayitum | na cātyantavyatirekātkālagatā saṃkhyā yāgasāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśārhā bhavati | samudāyasa- mudāyinostvavyatirekādaviruddhaḥ saṃkhyāsaṃbandhaḥ siddhānte | tasmātpūrvapakṣe yajivaśenaiva nāmapadavṛtteraviśeṣeṇa sarve yāgāḥ samapradhānāḥ | tathā prāpte 'bhidhīyate | prakaraṇaṃ paurṇa-
māsyamāvāsyāsaṃyuktayorālambanaṃ syāt | prakriyata iti prakaraṇam | atha vā prakaraṇaṃ tayoḥ sahakāri bhavettataśca tanmātrapratipādyo 'rtho grahītavyaḥ | kutaḥ—
vidhāyako niyuṅkte hi sarvo 'sādhāraṇe yajau |

na hyanena yajinā paurṇamāsyamāvasyāpadābhyāṃ vā yāgamātre buddhiḥ kriyate | na ca prakṛtakarmagrahaṇaṃ tvatpakṣe 'sti | tatrājñātarūpe satyapūrve karmaṇi na kathaṃcitpravarteta | tataśca vākyamevānarthakaṃ bhavet | prakṛtagrahaṇe tu teṣāṃ dravyadevatāyogādetatkālavartitvācca rūpajñānādarthavattvam | nanūktaṃ matpakṣe 'pyasti dravyadevatamiti | satyam |

na hi māntravarṇikī devatā saṃbhavati | mantrāṇāṃ kramaviśeṣeṇā ' 'jyabhāgārthatvāt | na cāsya vākyena bādhaḥ | virodhabhāvāt | sarvatra hyavirodhena vākye niviśamāne viro- dhapakṣastyaktavyaḥ | i1ha ca paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdau yadi karmavacanāveva syātāṃ tato na virodhaḥ parihriyeta | kālavacanatve tvanayoravirodhaḥ | sādhāraṇyāccāvirodhapakṣa eva samarthanīyaḥ | kiṃ ca |

sarvatraivā ' 'kāṅkṣāpūrvakaḥ saṃbandho bhavati | ājyabhāgau ca prajñātāgnīṣomadevatyau tadabhidhāna- samarthamantrākāṅ‌kṣitvādayatnena mantrān gṛhṇītaḥ | tvatpakṣe tvapūrvayoḥ karmaṇorajñātadevatvānna mantrāpekṣā | tataśca mantratadviśeṣadvitvādikalpanādanapekṣitānekārthavidhiprasaṅgaḥ | punaśca māntra- varṇikānekadevatākalpanā | na hyekasya karmaṇo 'nekayā devatayā 'nekayā 'nuvākyayā kārya- masti | punaścāśrutayājyākalpanāśrayaṇamājyabhāgayoścāśrutapuronuvākyākalpanam | yaccaikā yājyaikā cā 'nuvākyā bhaviṣyatīti | na tat | anuvākyāsamākhyābādhāt | api ca tvatpakṣe liṅgasyāviniyojakatvādvākye ca karaṇatvenā ' 'śrayaṇāt “vaiṣṇavīmanūcya” ityādi- vadadṛṣṭārthaprasakterna prakāśakatā, prakāśyenānapekṣitatvāt | māntravarṇikadevatākalpanātaśca varamārādupakārakatvam | ājyabhāgayoḥ punardvitvātprajñātadvidevatatvācca prakāśyākāṅikṣatāḥ prakāśakā mantrā liṅgakramaviniyuktāḥ santa ekāntena dṛṣṭārthatāṃ pratipadyante | tatra ca mantratadviśeṣadvitvādiṣu prāpteṣu kāladvāreṇa vyavasthāmātravidhānāllāghavaṃ vākyasya, na vā ' 'narthakyam | na hi saṃnidhānādvayavasthā siddhā | tasmānna devatāvidhirasaṃbandhāt | ataścārūpatvādakarmāntaratā | kiṃ punaḥ samastānuvādasya prayojanaṃ, paśya—
padatadbhāgavākyārthavidhiśūnyā hi codanā |

na tāvannityama1rthasya prāpakamasti | upāyāntareṇāpi pratigrahādinā puruṣāntarāhitā- nāmātmanepadenāniyatānāṃ sulabhatvāt | pratyakṣavacane sati anyathānupapattipakṣe sati, arthāpattilabhyaśrutyaparigrahācca | ‘ya evaṃ vidvān’ ityapi vartamānāpadeśaḥ pratyakṣāyāṃ liṅi brāhmaṇādivākyeṣūpalabhyamānāyāṃ na vidhiśaktiṃ labhate | asti caitadupanyāsasya pratyakṣavidhiyuktodakopasarjanādisaṃbhā2ravidhānārthatvamityaprāptameva brāhmaṇādiviśiṣṭamādhānaṃ vidhīyata iti | kiṃ nimittasārūpyamiti﻿—yadiśabdādyanupabandhābhiprāyam | brāhma- ṇādīnāṃ vasantādividhibhiḥ samuccāraṇamiti﻿—parapadasaṃbandhasaṃcāritāyāṃ vidhiśaktau nimittaphalatvāt | nanu brāhmaṇādīnāmādadhātinā 'pīti﻿—aprāptau viśiṣṭavidhā- nopapattyabhiprāyam | itarastu prāptatvena vidheyatvaṃ nivartayati﻿—na tvamīṣāmādhāna- saṃbandho na vidita iti | kena prāpto vidita iti﻿—prāpakākṣepaḥ | itarastu nirākaraṇamapaśyanbalīyāṃsaṃ ca pratyakṣavidhiṃ kimarthaṃ prathamamevopanyasyāmīti matvā kāmaśrutibhirityāha | kāḥ kāmaśrutaya iti﻿—sakrodhaṃ prāpaṇaśaktāvākṣiptāyāṃ svarūpamevaiṣa na jānātīti manyamāno darśayati﻿—agnihotrādiphalavidhaya iti | katha- 1arthasyeti-arthāpatterityarthaḥ | 2saṃbhāravidhānārthatvamiti-saṃbhārabidhiśeṣatayā tatstāvaka- tvenārthavattvānnā ' 'narthakyabhiyā vidvadvākyasyā ' 'dhānaprāpakatvaṃ vaktavyamityāśayaḥ | kathaṃ stutiriti cet | ‘evaṃ saṃpannaṃ bhrātṛvyamavarti saha kurute’ ityarthavādasahitaṃ ‘ya evaṃ vidvānagnimādhatte’ iti vākyaṃ ‘apa upasṛjati’ ityādiviśeṣavihitānāmudakādisaṃbhārāṇāṃ ‘atha saṃbhārānsaṃbharati’ iti yatsāmānyataḥ sthāpanavidhistasya śeṣaḥ | yo vidvānevamudakādisthāpanapūrvamagnimādhatte sa sthāpanarūpā- ṅgasāmarthyātsahāyasaṃpannamapi vairiṇaṃ vartanarahitaṃ kuruta ityevaṃ sthāpanapraśaṃsā jñeyā |
manyaparābhiḥ satībhistatprāpitamityāśaṅkyārthāpattiṃ darśayati | tena ‘karmaje ka2rma yūpavat’ iti āhavanīyādigrāhibhiḥ karmabhirananyopāyatvādgṛhītamādhānamiti | sa3rvaprakārasaṃbhave ca viśiṣṭavidhirbhavatīti saṃbhavāpekṣayā vākyabhedamāha | evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ | ādhāne 'pi pūrvavadeva prāpakāṇi śravaṇāni | katham | asarvaśeṣatvāt | yadi hi sarvakarmaṇāṃ śeṣabhūtamādhānaṃ bhavettatastairākṣipyeta vā na vā | teṣāṃ tu ‘rūpaṃ vā 'śe- ṣabhūtatvāt’ ityanenaiva nyāyenā ' 'havanīyādigrahaṇamātraparyavasānānna kaścidapyādhānā- ṅgatvapratipādane heturasti | yattu ‘seṃrvārthaṃ vā’ iti vakṣyati tatsarvakarmārthāgnyarthatvā- diti vyākhyāsyate | kimato yadyevamiti﻿—aṅgāṅgamapyanyathānupapattyā śakyamākṣe- ptumiti manyate | siddhāntavādī tvanyathānupapadyamānatvādagnayaḥ kāmaśrutibhiḥ prāptuvanti 1tai brā॰ ( 1-1-10 ) | 2( a॰ 7 pā॰ 3a॰ 9 sū॰ 28 ) | 3apiceti bhāṣyaṃ vasantā- divākye viśiṣṭavidhāne vākyabhedāprasakterayuktamāśaṅkya viśiṣṭavidhānaprayuktagauravābhiprāyeṇa vākya- bhedoktirityevaṃ vyācaṣṭe sarvaprakāretyādinā | 4( a॰ 7 pā॰ 3 sū॰ 29 ) | 5( a॰ 3 pā॰ 6 a॰ 5 sū॰ 15 ) |
nā ' 'dhānamityāha﻿—nanvādhānamagnīnāmabhyupāya iti | tatra nāma rūpamātraṃ gṛhyate yallaukikopāyasādhyaṃ bhavati vastraśakaṭādi | na cā ' 'havanīyādayo laukikopāyāstasmādavaṃ- śyameṣāṃ vedenaivopāyo 'pyākṣeptavyaḥ | sa tu nā ' 'dhānavyatirikto 'stīti tadapyākṣipta- miti | ucyate | na | anaikāntikatvāt | agnīnāṃ hi yācñākrayāpahārādayo 'bhyupāyāḥ santi | sarvaiśca tairāhavanīyādimātraprārthinyaḥ kāmaśrutayo nirākāṅkṣāḥ kriyante | tasmā- nnaikāntenā ' 'dhānaṃ prāptamityasti niyamavidheravakāśaḥ | tatraitatsyāt | naivopāyāntaro- pāttānāmāhavanīyāditvaṃ saṃbhavati saṃskāranimittatvāditi | tatrocyate |
satyaṃ prathamamādhānādutpadyante 'gnayastrayaḥ |
paścāttu vrīhivatteṣāṃ nopāyāntaravāraṇam ||
yathaiva hi vrīhyādīnāṃ na tāvatkṛṣimantareṇotpattiḥ | atha ca na sarvapuruṣaistathaivā ' '- pyante | krayādibhirapi labhyamānatvāt | evaṃ tāvatprathamameka ādhānenotpādayi- ṣyanti | apare tu tasmādupāyāntareṇa prāpsyanti | tataśca yathā ghaṭādīn kumbhakāra utpādyopādya vikrīṇāti dadāti ca tathaivaikaḥ kaścitpunaḥ punaragnīnādhāyāparebhyo/?/ dadyāt | ataḥ pratipuruṣamādhānaṃ pakṣe prāptaṃ pakṣe netyasti vidhānasya viṣayaḥ | pakṣe 'pi vā naiva prāptirastīti vakṣyāmaḥ | pratyakṣavidhipakṣe punarupāyāntarāṇi nivartante | tadā hyādadhī- tetyātmanepadenā ' 'dhātṛgāmyevā ' 'dhānaphalamiti gamyate | tasya ca phalamāhavanīyādi tadakarturna bhavatīti taṃ pratyanāhavanīyatvameva syāt | arthākṣepapakṣe tvānumānikyāḥ śrute- rātmanepadaparasmaipadavivekābhāvādakartṝviṣaye 'pyavirodhādupāyāntarāṇi na nivarteran |
ato 'vaśyameva vidheyametaditi | api ca satīṣvevā ' 'dhānaśrutiṣviti pākṣikī- mapi prāptiṃ nirākaroti | pūrvameva hi vyākhyātaṃ niyamādīnāmaprāptavidhitvaṃ śrutasaṃbhāva- nāyāmaśrutakalpanānavasarāt | santi cā ' 'dhānasya pratyakṣā śrutaya iti nānyāḥ kalpa- yituṃ labhyante | yadi hyetā na syustatrā ' 'dhānādṛte 'gnihotrādīnāmaśakyānuṣṭhānatvādvi- dhayo 'narthakā bhavantīti svasiddhayarthamādhānaśrutiṃ parigṛhṇīyuḥ | satīṣu tvaśrutakalpanābha- yādyeṣāmetābhiḥ prāpitaṃ teṣāmeva kāmaśrutayaḥ prayojikā iti na kalpayanti | sarvapūrvo- ktadoṣaparihāreṇedānīṃ pratyavatiṣṭhate | pratyakṣamanyadvidhāyakamastyādhānasya vacanam | yasminsati nimittārthānītarāṇīti ‘ya evaṃ vidvānagnimādhatte’ iti | tatra prativi- dhatte saṃbhāravidhānārthā punaḥ śrutireṣeti | paraḥ punaḥ prakaraṇena saṃbhārasaṃbandhaṃ manvānaḥ pṛthagvākyatvamāpādyaitadevotpattivākyamityāha | na hyudakopasarjanādīnāmādhānenaikavā- kyatā saṃbhavati | bhavedatrārthabhede nānāvākyatvaṃ yadyādhānaṃ vidhīyeta | tadba‌rā/?/hmaṇādisaṃ-

yadi hyete dve api vākye vidhātṛṇī syātāṃ tataḥ samānaviṣaye satī spardheyātāṃ kataradvidhattāmiti | atra punarekaṃ vidhāyakamekaṃ stāvakam | na ca stāvakena brāhmaṇādi- saṃyuktasya vidhāyakatvaṃ nivāryate tadānuguṇyāt | yadi tu ‘ya evaṃ vidvān’ ityapi vidhisarūpaṃ syāttato vihitasya punarvidhānānupapatterasmatpakṣaṃ nirundhyāt | liṅā tu vihitasya saṃbandhisaṃbhāravidhiprarocanārthaṃ tu stutisahitasya punaḥ śravaṇamityavidhāyakam | liṅā ca tāvaddhātvarthavidhānaṃ svapadenopāttatvācchrautam | prāśastyaṃ punarvākyena, tata- ścā ' 'numāniko vidhiriti viprakṛṣyate | nanvidamapi vākyamiti﻿—brāhmaṇādipadā- rthāparityāgābhiprāyam | siddhāntavādī vadati, ādhānaṃ tāvacchutyā, śeṣaṃ vākyena nāma 1( a॰ 1 pā॰ 4 a॰ 6 sū॰ 9 ) | 2guṇārthameveti﻿—stutivācinā guṇaśabdena ‘apā- mupasarjanaṃ tu vidhīyate’ iti bhāṣyastho vidadhātiḥ stutiparo vyākhyātaḥ |

na kasyacidapi karmaṇaḥ prakaraṇe śrūyate ‘śvetamālabheta’ ‘caruṃ nirvapet’ iti | tatra saṃdehaḥ | kimanārabhyavādānāṃ prakṛtyarthatvātprākṛtayorevā ' 'lambhanirvāpayoḥ śvetacarū guṇau vidhīyete, kiṃ vā karmāntare yāvacchrute, uta yajimatī veti | tatrānārabhyādhīta- tvopanyāsaḥ saṃśayabījāpaunaruktyaprathamapakṣaparigrahatannirākaraṇārthaḥ | katham | yadi tāvadālambhanirvāpau prakṛtya śrūyeyātāṃ tataḥ prakṛtapratyayānuvṛttireva prasajyeteti karmāntarā- 1tai॰ saṃ॰ ( 2-1-1 ) | 2tai॰ saṃ॰ ( 2-3-2 ) | 3( a॰ 2 pā॰ 1 a 1 ) | 4( a॰ 2 pā॰ 2 a॰ 11 sū॰ 26 ) |
śaṅkā na syāt | anārabhyavāde tu sati śvetādiguṇasyopādeyatvātkadāciddūrasthānu- vādena guṇo vidhīyate kadācidvā viparivṛttyabhāvātkarmāntaramiti jāyate saṃdehaḥ | tathā ‘dravya1saṃyogāccodanā paśusomayoḥ’ ityanena gataprāyamivātra yajimatkarmavidhānaṃ lakṣyate | tattu prakṛtayāgābhāvādanuvādaśaṅkāyāmasatyāṃ śvetādeśca guṇasyautpattikadravya- saṃyukte 'pi karmaṇi vidhānopapatteḥ kathaṃ syāditi punarupanyasyate | pūrvapakṣaścānyayo- rālabhbhanirvāpayoraprakaraṇādavaśyaṃ prakṛtāveva grahītavyāvityevaṃ pravartate | tannirākaraṇamapi ca prakaraṇābhāvādasādhāraṇopalakṣaṇābhāvācca na prākṛtayorlaukikavyāvṛttarūpayoḥ pratīti- rastītyevaṃ bhaviṣyati | guṇavidhiviṣayatvāccā ' 'lambhanirvāpau guṇavidhiśabdenoktau2 | kiṃ tāvatprāptam | yathaivāyaneṣu guṇasaṃbandhapare vākye karmavidhiśabdābhāvādakarmāntaratvaṃ tathehāpi bhaviṣyatīti caśabdenānvādiśyate | kva cāsau guṇavidhiriti viṣayāvadhāraṇā- rthamaprakaraṇagrahaṇam | atha vā yadyapyetāvatā pūrvavailakṣaṇyenāprakaraṇe śrūyate tathā 'pi karmaṇo vidhiśabdānavarodhādguṇārthaiva punaḥ śrutiriti | darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śakaṭeṣā sā śvetīkṛtyā ' 'labdhavyā, nirvāpaśca carau kartavyaścaruparimito vā | bhūtibrahmavarcasakāma- yośca sarvebhyo darśapūrṇamāsāvityevaṃ prāptayoranuvādaḥ | tathā vāyavyamiti sarvavanaspatīnāṃ vāyudevatātvātkathaṃcidīṣāyā evānuvādaḥ | sauryamiti cā ' 'gneyasyaiva tejodevatyasāmā- nyādanuvādaḥ | tasmādguṇo vidhīyata iti || 12 || 1( a॰ 2 pā. 2 a. 6 sū. 17 ) | 2uktāviti | anena caivaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātaṃ bhavati | ālambhaviṣayo nirvāpaviṣayaśca yo guṇavidhiḥ sa dārśapūrṇamāsikālambhanirvāpaviṣaya iti |

aruṇādau tāvannaiva pramāṇasamavāyo 'sti | na hyekatra saṃbhavamātraṃ samavāyaḥ | kiṃ tarhi viṣayaikatvam | iha cāruṇasya kriyāsaṃbandhaḥ śrutyā | tasya tu śrutikalpitakriyākā- rakasaṃbandhasya bhūyo 'pyapekṣāvaśena krayaviṣayatvam | tāvatā ca prayojanānavāpterape- kṣāntare satyapūrvasaṃbandhavataḥ krayasya jyotiṣṭomārthatvamiti viṣayanānātvam | ataśca sarveṣāṃ viniyojakatvamaviruddham | na cātra viprakṛṣṭagrahaṇe saṃnikṛṣṭasya bādho dṛśyate | na hi krayaṃ gṛhṇannaruṇāyāḥ kriyāsaṃbandhaṃ bādhate | nāpi jyotiṣṭome kurvan krayasaṃbandham | yatra tvekaḥ śeṣastāvāneva ca saṃbandhāntaravirodhinaikena pramāṇenānyaśeṣyartho vijñāyate | pareṇa tadabādhānupapattinā śeṣyantarārthaḥ | ekasaṃbandhe ca kṛtārtha- syā ' 'kāṅkṣābhāvātpunarviniyogāntarānupapattiḥ | tatra pramāṇayoḥ parasparāpa- hāryasamānaviṣayatvalakṣaṇaḥ samavāyaḥ | tathā yatra śeṣabhede 'pyekasminneva śeṣiṇi tulyo- pakāranibandhana ekena pramāṇenānyaḥ śeṣaḥ sādhanatvena pratīyate | anyenāparaḥ | na caika- sādhitopakāraḥ śeṣī śeṣāntaramapekṣate | tatrāpyekaviṣayāpahāritvātsamavāyaḥ | sa ca vi- rodha eva sati bhavatīti samavāyagrahaṇenaiva siddho virodhaḥ | yatra punaḥ spaṣṭa eva śeṣa- bhedo yathā ‘samidho yajati’ ityādiṣu | yatra vā tasyeva kiṃcidādhikyaṃ bhavati yathā 'ruṇāyāṃ vyākhyātam | tathā yatra śeṣibhedo yathā ' 'gneyādiṣvaṣṭākapālādīnām | yatra vā tadgatamādhikyaṃ yathā darśapūrṇamāsāṅgānāmevopakārabhedastatrāpi viṣayānyatvādasama- 1ekārthavṛttitvāditi—ayamarthaḥ | ekaikasmiñśrutyādirūpe 'rthe vṛttitvādbalābalavācaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ yugapadabhidhānāśakterekaikasya dvitīyena balābalāvadhāraṇeti |
vāya iti | yacca śrutyā viniyujyate, yacca samākhyayā, tatsarvaṃ tulyam | yastu sarvāṅgajanya ekaḥ pradhānopakāraḥ, tatraiṣāmaparyāyavidhānādekameva pramāṇaṃ śeṣatvaṃ ceti vyāpārabhedāda- samavāyaḥ | tathā yatra sa eva śeṣastasminneva śeṣiṇi saṃnikṛṣṭena viprakṛṣṭena ca pramāṇena viniyujyate tatrāpyekasyaiva pramāṇatvenetarasya prayojanāntarārthatvādasamavāya iti | tasmā- dvirodhaviṣayameva samavāyagrahaṇam | tatra ṣaṇṇāmapyekatraiva balābale kathayitavye kramava- rtitvādvāco yugapadaśakterekaikasya saṃpradhāraṇā | yattu dvitīyopādānaṃ tatpratiyoginā vinā balābalakathanāśaktestenocyate—dvayordvayoriti | ekārthavartitvādvāca ityasyāparā vyākhyā yeyaṃ balābalavāgeṣā pratyekaṃ śrutyādiṣu samavaiti na samudāye | tā1ni hi śeṣa- viniyogenārthavanti na balābalam | atastasyāḥ pratipradhānavṛttitvādayaugapadyenaikaikasya saṃpradhāraṇāyāṃ kartavyāyāṃ dvitīyopādānaṃ virodhabalābalabādhānāṃ pratiyoginyanupapattiṃ darśa- yitumasaṃbhavāt—dvayordvayoḥ saṃpradhāraṇetyuktam | tatraikaikasya pañcabhiḥ pañcamiḥ saha vicāre kartavye yadekaikena saha kriyate tadbādhitabādhyasya bādhakabādhakena bādhasya sujñānatvāt | yāni hi śrutibādhyairliṅgādibhirbādhyante tāni śrutyā bādhyantetarāmiti na tayā saha saṃpradhārayiṣyante | tatra prathamaṃ tāvatkramaprāptaṃ śrutilaṅgayoḥ saṃpradhāraṇamiti | kimi- hodāharaṇamiti—kevalapadaprayogābhāvātsarvatra vākyatve sati na śrutiliṅgayoḥ svasāmarthyātireko lakṣyata iti manyamānasya praśnaḥ | vakṣyamāṇavivekābhi- prāyeṇā ' 'ha—aindyā/?/ gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhata iti | kimi2ndrasyaivopasthānaṃ kartavyamutendrasya 1tāni hi—ityasya granthasyāyamāśayaḥ | balābalaṃ prati śrutyādīnāṃ prādhānyātpratipradhānaṃ guṇāvṛttinyāyena balābaloktirāvartanīyeti | 2‘atra cintyate’ itibhāṣye nyūnatāṃ parihariṣyanva- kṣyamāṇabhāṣyālocanayā ca dviko/?/ṭikasaṃśayaparatayā bhāsamānamapi cātuṣkoṭikasaṃśayopalakṣaṇatayā vyā- karoti—kimindrasyaivetyādinā |
gārhapatyasya vā 'thavā samuccitayorathavā gārhapatyasyaiveti | yadi liṅgaṃ balīyastata indropasthānam | atha tulyabalatvaṃ virodhaśca tato vikalpaḥ | atha tulyabalatve 'pya- virodhastataḥ samuccayaḥ | atha virodhaḥ śrutibalīyastvaṃ ca tato gārhapatyasyaivopasthāna- miti | yattu siddhavadgārhapatyārthatvāṅgīkaraṇena ‘vacanāttvayathārthamaindrī syāt’ ityuktaṃ tadiha sthāpayiṣyamāṇaśrutibalīyastvābhiprāyeṇa | tenaiva sarvavākyatvābhiprāyeṇa śruti- liṅge 'rthe vākyatvabhrāntyā punaḥ pṛcchati—kā punaratra śrutiḥ kiṃ liṅgamiti | tatrottaraṃ gārhapatyaśabdaśravaṇaṃ mantrasāmarthyaṃ ceti | paraḥ punarāha—yadyevaṃvidhapadasamūhātmake śrutiliṅge hanta tarhi vākyaṃ nāma na kiṃcidapyasti | taducyatām, atha vākyaṃ nāma kimiti | siddhāntavādī tu tathaiva śakyavivekajñānatvaṃ manyamāna āha—saṃhatyārthamabhi- dadhati padāni vākyamiti | yadyapi ca na saṃhatānāṃ kaścideko 'bhidheyastathā 'pi gamyamānābhiprāyeṇoktam | athavaikala/?/kṣyamāṇārthaprayuktatayā saṃghātatvamāpāditāni yadā svārthamabhidadhati tadā tadbhūtānyeva santi/?/ vākyatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti | yadyevaṃ tata ubhayo- rapyudāhṛtayormantrabrāhmaṇayorvākyalakṣaṇayogādvākyayoriyaṃ saṃpradhāraṇā na śrutiliṅgayo- riti | yadi vā 'vaśyaṃ śrutiliṅgayorvirodhaḥ samarthanīyastataḥ śrutiliṅgavākyāni lakṣa- ṇato vivektavyānīdaṃ nāma teṣāṃ parasparamantaramiti | tadabhidhīyate |

yā hi ‘aindyā/?/ gārhapatyam’ ityeṣā śaktistayaitānyeva padāni pratyarthaṃ loke viniyuktāni na mantra aindro gārhapatyāṅgam | anyatra gatayā śaktyā 'nyasyāviniyo- gāt | svasāmarthyapravṛttaustu brāhmaṇapadaiḥ śaktyā śaktyanapekṣamaṅgatvamabhidhīyate | na cātra sāmarthyaṃ prathamaṃ gṛhyate | nivṛttābhidhānānyathānupapattyaiva tasya gamyamānatvāt | tena jñāte viniyoge śaktiḥ kalpyata iti nāsau viniyogakāraṇam | yadyapi vastutaḥ prathamaṃ vidyate tathā 'pi pramāṇataḥ paścādgṛhyata iti kārakahetutve satyapi jñāpakatvenākāra- ṇamityucyate | yadi tu pauruṣeyamidaṃ bhavettathā sati vakturabhidhānaśaktijñānaṃ viniyogā- bhidhānātprathamataraṃ bhavet | na tvevamasti | vedasyāpauruṣeyatvāt | tasmātsarvapuruṣāṇāṃ pratipattṛtvātpaścāttanaṃ śaktijñānamityakṣaraśravaṇakṛta evāyaṃ gārhapatyāṅgatvapratyayaḥ | ‘kadācana starīrasi’ ityatra punaryadyapīndraśabdenendro 'bhidhīyate tathā 'pi viniyogo nābhidhīyata iti śruteravyāpāraḥ | na hyatra kasyacicchabdasya śravaṇādindrasya śeṣitvaṃ mantrasya śeṣatvaṃ pratīyate | yathetaratra dvitīyāśravaṇādgārhapatyasyepsitatamatvamaindyā/?/śca tṛtī- yāśrutyā karaṇatvam | kevalaṃ tu mantrasyābhidhānasāmarthyādviniyogayogyatā dṛśyate | na ca tāvatā viniyogo 'bhihito bhavati | na ca vihitaḥ | mantrasyāvidhāyakatvāt | brāhma- ṇavākye tvavidhānaṃ vidhānaṃ cobhayamapi niṣpannam | nanu mantrasyāpyabhidhānapūrvakameva sāmarthyakalpanam | satyamevam | na tu tadviniyogasyābhidhānam | kiṃ tarhi | arthasvarūpa- mātrasya | anyaiva ca tena prathamaṃ tadabhidhānaśaktiḥ kalpyate | anyā ca tadbra/?/lena viniyogaśaktiḥ | katham |

dharmatvamabhihitamiti draṣṭavyam | kathaṃ tarhi prakaraṇāntare samāmnāto yāgadharmo bhaviṣyatīti | vākyasaṃyogasya devatāviṣayatvātprakaraṇena ca vinā 'pūrvasādhanatvalakṣaṇā- mupapatterna kathaṃcidyāgenāpūrveṇa vā saṃbandha iti manyamānasya praśnaḥ | tatra vākyasaṃyogā- dityukte pareṇa svābhiprāye vivṛte bhāgaśabdenaiva mukhyārthāsaṃbhavādyāgopādānamiti darśa- yati | parasvasvīkaraṇātmakasya bhāgarūpasyāvidyamānatvādyastaduddeśena tyajyamānatvanā- māṃ 'śo vidyate tena yāgo lakṣyate | sa caikadevatye pūṣaviśiṣṭo bhavatīti tadbhāgavyapa- deśo ghaṭate | dvidevatye punarvyāsaṅgī miśraḥ saṃkalpo 'nyatareṇa vyapadeṣṭumaśakya iti | yathaivaindrāgnasya puroḍāśasya grahasya cā ' 'gneyendrapītaśabdābhyāmagrahaṇaṃ tathaindrāpauṣṇādeḥ pūṣabhāgatvena | yadyapi caivaṃvidhaśabdoccāraṇādiha samāsopālambho nāsti tathā 'pyartha eva bhāgaśabdagrāhyo na vidyata ityapravṛttiḥ | yadyapi ca dvayorarthayordevatātvaṃ pratipadyamānayoḥ samudāyaprasiddhayarthatvenāvayavāvupayujyete tathā 'pi saṃkalpasyānyatareṇāvyapadeśādanupalakṣa- ṇatvaṃ siddham || 44 ||

vidhirevāyam | kutaḥ | pūrvavattvāddhayanuvādo bhavedatyantaprāptāvityarthaḥ | na cāyamatyanta- prāptaḥ | tena vinā 'pyavyagratāyāḥ śakyatvāt | kaṇṭhabandhaḥ punaḥ prāyeṇāprāpta evetyasti niyamavidheravakāśaḥ || 3 ||

dvedhā saṃbhave tādṛśī pramāṇagatirāśrayaṇīyā yā pramāṇāntaraṃ na bādhate | yajurvedā- mnānācca nivītāderādhvaryavasamākhyopabaddhaṃ vākyam | tatra yadi karmadharmo 'yaṃ tataḥ kartṛ- viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ satyāṃ samākhyayā 'dhvaryuniyamātsamākhyā 'rthavatī bhaviṣyati | manuṣyadharmāṇāṃ tu na samākhyā niyāmiketi vakṣyāmaḥ | tatrāsau bādhyeta | itarathā 'nugrahīṣyate | tasmādapi karmadharmaḥ || 5 || 1‘arthavādo vā prakaraṇāt’ ityasminsūtra upavītastutyartha iti vakṣyata ityarthaḥ |

yathaiva ‘upavītaṃ devānām’ ‘prācīnāvītaṃ pitṝṇām’ iti ca parasparanirapekṣadeva- pitṛpradhānakarmaṇyeṣa vidhirevaṃ tadbuddhayanuvṛttermanuṣyāṇāmityapi tatpradhānakarma pratyeṣyāmaḥ | kathaṃ gamyata iti—pṛṣṭe manuṣyāṇāmiti ṣaṣṭhayantena saṃbandhāt— ityetāvatyuttare datte manuṣyāṇāmeva prāpnotīti punaścodayati | athavā sama1sta eva caukaḥ praśnaḥ | 1samasta eva ceti—‘kathaṃ gamyata ityādinā—na manuṣyapradhāne ‘ityevamanta ityarthaḥ |
satyamevaṃ prāpnoti | phalakalpanāprasaṅgagauravāttu parityajyate | tasmāttadīyakarmavyatirekā- deva ṣaṣṭhī | tatsaṃbaddhasya nivītasya nāsaṃbaddhaphalakalpanā bhaviṣyati | manuṣyagrahaṇaṃ ca tatpradhānakarmapratipattyarthamiti nānupāttasaṃbandhāpattiḥ | na ca tasminsati prakṛtaikavākyatā ghaṭate || 7 ||
sarvathā nātraiko 'pi pakṣo nirdoṣaḥ | prakaraṇasaṃbandhe vākyasaṃbandhabādhādanvāhāryādi- saṃbandhe vākyabhedātprakaraṇasya ca viśeṣakatvānupapatterātithyādisaṃbandho 'tyantanirmūla eva | ṣaḍ‌bhirapi śrutyādibhirasaṃsparśānmanuṣyasaṃbandhena tadanumīyate | tacca na yuktam | tasyā api ṣaṣṭhayā nivītapadasaṃbandhivyatirekajanitatvapratīteḥ | na hya2nupāttasaṃbandhivya- tirekairvibhaktaya utpadyante | tasmānmanuṣyārthataiva prāpnoti | tatrāpi ca prakaraṇasamākhyāvā- dhaphalakalpanāprasaṅga | sati ca gatyantare na yuktaṃ tadāśrayaṇam | asti caudu3mbarādhikaraṇa- siddhamarthavādatvaṃ gatiḥ || 8 || 1( a॰ 2 pā॰ 1 a॰ 15 sū॰ 47 ) | 2anupāttāḥ saṃbandhino yeṣāṃ saṃbandhākhyānāṃ vyatirekāṇāṃ tairiti vigrahaḥ | 3( a॰ 1 pā॰ 2 a॰ 2 ) |
‘upavyayate’ ityanena ca vidhinaikavākyatvaṃ nivītaprācīnāvītayordṛśyate | taccānu- vādadvāreṇa stutau satyāmavakalpate na vidhau | na hyaṅgāṅigatvarahitayorubhayoḥ svata- ntrayoḥ parasparāsaṃbaddhayorvidhīyamānayorekavākyatā bhavati | vacanavyaktibhedāt | anyā hi pradhānavidhestāvanmātropasaṃhāriṇī vacanavyaktiranyā ca stuteḥ parāṅgabhāvānugatarūpā | na cātra vidhāyako dṛśyate | sa yadi vā 'dhyāhartavyo 'thavā ' 'tithyādigatasyāpyaṅga- tvāya parikalpyeta | na ca tatkalpanaṃ yuktam, avihitasyānaṅgatvādanaṅgasya ca prayoga- vacanenāgrahaṇāt | va1kṣyati hi na cāvihitamaṅgaṃ bhavatīti | tatrāṅgatvādvidhirvidheścāṅgatvaṃ kalpyata itītaretarāśrayatvaṃ prāpnotīti | pratyakṣeṇa ca vidhinā yathākathaṃcidekavākya- tāyāṃ saṃbhavantyāṃ na parokṣaikavākyatā yuktā | tathā sati cānekādṛṣṭakalpanā syāt | tasmādaucityena stutiḥ | yathā nivītaprācīnāvīte manuṣyāṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca praśaste tathopavītaṃ devānāmiti | loke 'pi caivaṃ dṛśyate | yathā vasiṣṭhasyārundhatī, yathā śaśāṅkasya rohiṇī 1( a॰ 3 pā॰ 4 a॰ 4 sū॰ 13 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥ |

ataḥ paraṃ ṣaṭsūtrāṇi bhāṣyakāreṇa na likhitāni | tatra vyākhyātāro vivadante | kecidāhurvismṛtāni | likhito granthaḥ pralīna ityapare | phalgutvādupekṣitānītyanye | anārṣeyatvādityapare | tathā ca ‘digvibhāgaśca tadvat’ iti nivītādhikaraṇāti- deśastadānantaryādupapadyata iti | vṛttyantarakāraistu sarvairvyākhyā1tāni | santi ca jaimi- nerevaṃ prakārāṇyapyanatyantasārabhūtāni sūtrāṇi | vyavahitātideśāśca ‘pānavyāpacca2 tadvat’
ityādiṣvāśritāḥ | tasmātsūtramātraṃ vyākhyeyam | tatra kaiścintri/?/ṇyadhikaraṇāni kalpi- tāni | aparaiścatvāri | prathamaṃ tāvadidaṃ cintyate | yadetatpūrvādhikaraṇe darśapūrṇamāsayo- rvidhīyamānatvenopavītamudāhṛtaṃ tatra saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ taddarśapūrṇamāsayorevāvatiṣṭhate 'thavā sarva- karmārthamiti | ye tvadhikaraṇatrayaṃ samarthayante | teṣāmevaṃ saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsayoravasthānaṃ vidhiścātha sarvakarmārthatvamanuvādaśceti | kiṃ prāptaṃ sarvadharmaḥ syāt | kutaḥ |

mṛtāgnihotre hi pitṛdevatye śrūyate ‘prācīnāvītī dohayet | yajñopavītī hi devebhyo dohayati’ iti | tadyadi sarvārthamupavītaṃ tato 'yaṃ pitrye 'gnihotrasaṃbandhī nityavadyajño- pavītānuvādo 'vakalpate | na cāyaṃ darśapūrṇamāsasthasyaivānuvādaḥ | viprakṛṣṭatvāt | hetu- vannigadārthavādānarthakyācca | yadi hi tasminneva karmaṇyanyāvasthāyāṃ dharmo bhavati tataśca tadavasthāparijihīrṣayā hetuvannigado 'vakalpate | na tu kratvantarasthaṃ parihartavyamatyantavipra- karṣeṇaivāprasaktatvāt | na ca devebhya iti bahuvacanaṃ darśapūrṇamāsayoravakalpate | vaikalpi- kendramahendraikadevatyatvātsāṃnāyyasya | agnihotre tu sāyaṃprātardevatālocanenopapannaṃ bahutvam | tasmādagnihotrasthopavītānuvādānyathānupapatteḥ sarvadharmatvamiti || 1 || 1anena ca prakṣiptatvākhyamanārṣeyatvamupekṣābījaṃ parābhimataṃ nirastaṃ veditavyam | 2(a॰ 3 pā॰ 4 a॰ 12 sū॰ 32 ) |

na vā sarvadharmaḥ | kutaḥ | prakaraṇāddarśapaurṇamāsārthatvapratīteḥ | atha yaduktaṃ liṅgada- rśanāditi | parihṛtaṃ tat | tasyaivaitaddarśanaṃ darśapūrṇamāsasthasyeti | saṃnikṛṣṭānuvādāsaṃbhave ca viprakṛṣṭānuvādo 'pyāśrīyate | yathāprāptyapekṣo 'hi sa bhavati | bahuvacanaṃ cāvivakṣi- tam | athavā prakṛtivikṛtidevatālocanenopapatsyate | tataścāyamartho bhavati | yasmāddeva- yuktakarmāntaradharmo 'yamataḥ pitrye 'gnihotre na kartavya iti || 2 ||
vidhirvā syādapūrvatvāt || 3 || si॰
tadevodāharaṇam ‘upavyayate devalakṣmameva tatkurute’ iti | tatra vidhiranuvāda iti saṃdehaḥ | kathaṃ puvaranavadhārite vidhitve sarvārthatvadarśapūrṇamāsārthatvavicāro vṛttaḥ | siddhena vyavahārādidamarthato 'dhikaraṇaṃ pūrvaṃ draṣṭavyam | kiṃ prāptamanuvāda iti | kutaḥ |

na hi samastānuvādavākyasya kiṃcitphalamasti | nivītaprācīnāvītasaṃkīrtanamapi ca vidhīyamānopavītastutyarthatvenaivārthavadbhaviṣyati | vartamānāpadeśānāmapi ca tadābhāsatvā- tprayogavacanārthavādapañcamalakārebhyo vidhiśaktirvyākhyātā | tasmādvidhiḥ | yattu smṛtereva prāptamiti | tatrāpyapūrvatvādidamevottaram | anya eva hyasau puruṣadharmaṃ prāpto 'nyaścāyama- pūrvaḥ kratudharmo vidhīyate | tasmānnānuvādaḥ | asya ca prayojanaṃ kartradhika1raṇe vakṣyāmaḥ | e2vaṃ vā | yattu mṛtāgnihotre śrūyate ‘prācīnāvītī dohayet | yajñopavītī hi devebhyo dohayati’ iti | tatraivaṃ vicāryate kimidamhīnasthitamiva dvādaśatvaṃ darśapaurṇamāsagatameva stutyarthamuktam | uta jīvadagnihotre vidhānārthamiti | kiṃ prāptaṃ tataḥ pūrvavadeva sūtraṃ vyā- 1(a॰ 3 pā॰ 4 a॰ 4) | 2‘vidhirvā syādapūrvatvāt’ iti sūtraṃ ṣaṭsūtrīmadhikaraṇa- catuṣṭayena vyākhyātṛmatarītyā siddhāntaparatayā vyākhyāyādhunā vyadhikaraṇavādimatarītyedamevasūtramudā- haraṇāntare pūrvapakṣaparatayā vyākhyātumārabhate—evaṃ vetyādinā |

ityevaṃ sviṣṭakṛdādīnāmaprayojakatvaṃ bhavati | yadā tu khalu sarvapradānamavagabhyate tadā vidyamānasaṃyogāsaṃbhavāccoditaikadeśānuṣṭhānānupapattyā śakyamekadeśyutpādanamadhyavasātumiti sviṣṭakṛdādyarthaṃ puroḍāśāntarāṇyutpādyeran | śeṣaśabdaḥ ‘śeṣātsvikṛṣṭate samavadyati’

yathaiva ‘ājyena śeṣaṃ saṃsthāpayati’ iti pūrvakarmaṇaḥ paryavasānādadhike pūrvasadṛśe vā śeṣaśabdaḥ prayujyate | yathā ca ‘tataḥ śeṣeṇa viśiṣṭadeśajātyādimanto janma prati- padyante’ iti svargaphalakarmaṇo niḥśeṣopayogādanyaphalasya cānyatra vyāpārāsaṃbhavāttato '- nyeneti vaktavye tataḥ śeṣeṇeti gautamācāryeṇoktam | evamihāpi yatpradhānahavirbhyo '- nyaddhavistenaivānyatvenā ' 'dhikyena vā bhaviṣyati | athavā guṇatvena vā śeṣādityeva- mabhidhāsyate | śeṣaśabdo hyupayuktetaradvidyamānaṃ bravīti | na ca pradhāna- haviṣāṃ kiṃcidvidyate | anyeṣāṃ ca sarvametadrūpamasti | tasmād‌dravyāntarāṇi gṛhyeran | yathā vakṣyati ‘nirdeśātta2rayānyadarthāditi cet’ iti | athāpyatyantaṃ śeṣaśabdānurodhaṃ kṛtvā teṣāmeva kiṃciccheṣyate | tathā 'pyastyevānyadvicārasya prayojanaṃ nāvaśyaṃ pakṣoktenaiva prayojanena bhavitavyam | idamapi saṃbhavati | yadā pradhānavākyādaśeṣa- pradānaprasaktau satyāṃ śeṣakāryavaśena śeṣāḥ sthāpyante, tadā yathaiva pradhānaṃ tasya haviṣa prayojakamevaṃ sviṣṭakṛdādīnyapīti | tadarthāvadānanāśadoṣāpahāreṣvapi pradhānavadeva havirantaraḥ mutpādyeta | yadā punaḥ pradhānacodanākṣiptasyaiva śeṣasya mvi/?/ṣṭakṛdādīni grāhakāṇi bhavanti 1( a॰ 4 pā॰ 1 a॰ 13 sū॰ 28 ) | 2( a॰ 4 pā॰ 1 a॰ 13 sū॰ 29 ) |
tadā teṣāṃ paraprayuktadravyopajīvanādayaprayojakatve sati nāśadoṣāpahāreṣvapyakriyā siddhā bhavati | tasmātsatyapyubhayoḥ pakṣayorasarvapradāne 'sti prayojanamityarthavānvicāraḥ || 37 ||
yadyāgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla ityevamādyeva bhavettataḥ sarvapradānamevāvadhāryete | atra punastasmā- tpuroḍāśāderniṣkṛṣya kiṃcideva hotavyaṃ śrayate ‘dvirhaviṣo 'vadyati’ ‘madhyātpūrvārdhācca dviravadyati’ ‘aṅguṣṭhaparvamātramavadānaṃ bhavati’ ‘dvayavadānaṃ juhvati’ ityevamādivākyā- locanena hi kiṃcideva hotavyamavagatamataḥ śeṣayitavyaṃ kiṃcit || 38 ||
yadyetāni vākyānyutpattivākyāvagatamaśeṣahomamabādhamānāni na niviśeran, yadi caitāni pradhānasya pratyāsannatarāṇi bhaveyustato bādheran | etāni tu saṃskāravākyāni avirodhenaivopapadyante | śakyate hyaṅguṣṭhaparvamātrairmadhyapūrvārdhoddha‍ṛtairdiśaḥ pravṛttairavadānaiḥ saṃskṛtya saṃskṛtya niḥśeṣaṃ haviḥ pradātum | ataḥ sarvavākyavaśenaivaṃ śāstrārtho bhavati | yadaśeṣaṃ havirjuhoti tadevamupāyamiti | tena na kasyacidbhomaḥ pratiṣidhyate | tasmātsa- rvapradānaṃ kartavyam | yattu yathāśrutetikartavyatāko yugapanna śakyate kartumadvayavadānahoma- prasaṅgāditi | jyotiṣṭomavadabhyasitavyo homaḥ | tadarthatvāt | devatārthatvādyāgārthatvāda- pūrvārthatvādvā kṛsnasyāṣṭākapālasya | naikadeśamātrahomenotpattivākyārthasaṃbhāvanā bhavet | athavā 'vadānasaṃskārasya dravyārthatvāt || 39 ||

‘dvirhaviṣo 'vadyati’ ityetasya saṃskāratvādyāvatsaṃskāryaṃ dhriyate tāvadāvṛttirbhava- tviti śakyate vaktum | homasya phalabattvāt ‘yaistu dra1vyaṃ na cikīrṣyate tāni pradhāna- bhūtāni’ ‘dra2vyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ’ iti ca prādhānyāvagamādekena dvayavadānena nivṛttasya na dravyamastīti na punarāvṛttiryuktā | tasmiṃścānāvartamāne 'rthābhā- vādavadyatirapi nā ' 'vartate | kārye hi pravartamānaṃ dravyaṃ saṃskāraṃ gṛhṇāti nodāsīnam | na ca dvayavadānavyatiriktasya haviṣaḥ kāryamastīti na saṃskāramapekṣate | tasmātso 'pi nā ' 'vartate | yadi hi dravyārtho homo bhavettatastadvaśena svayamāvartetākhaṇḍanaṃ cā ' 'varta- yet | atadarthasya nā ' 'vṛttiḥ | na caiṣa vākyārtho yajjuhotīti hyūmānasya dvirakhaṇḍa- namupāyo vidhīyata iti | na hi juhotiśabdena dravyamupādīyate | na caiṣa karmaṇi lakāro yato hūyamānānuvādatvaṃ pratipadyate | kriyāyāmeva tvidaṃ dvayavadānaṃ vidhīyate | yo 'pi yajjuhotīti yacchabdād‌dravyapratyayo bhavati so 'pi yacchabdasyāvaidikatvā- tkriyāviśeṣaṇabhūtasyānuvādatvapradarśanārthaṃ vyākhyātṛbhiruccāritasya paramārthānālocanādbha- viṣyatītyupekṣaṇīyaḥ | yattu jyotiṣṭomavadutpattivākyāvagatasya samastadravyaprāptyarthabhāva- rtiṣyata iti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ |
