yāvanneva nirvartate tāvadastyeva ‘dvayavadānaṃ juhoti’ ityanena niṣkṛṣya saṃbandha kalpitaḥ | tasmiṃśca siddhe nā ' 'numāniko 'vakalpate | tena yatsāmānyapravṛttamāgneyatvaṃ tad‌dvayavadānacodanayā sāptadaśyamiva prākaraṇikairdvayavadānaviṣayamevopasaṃhriyate | tatrai- ṣo 'rtho vijñāyate dvayavadānamāgneyaṃ karoti | ato 'vayavāntarāṇāmacoditatvānna homapra- saṅgaḥ | kiṃ ca |
na cāvaśyaṃ pradānena havirāgneyamipyate |
dvayavadāne gṛhīte hi sarvāgneyatvasaṃbhavaḥ ||
taddhitena hi tādarthyamātramuktaṃ na pradānam | dvedhā 'pi ca tādarthyaṃ bhavati pradānena pradānārthadravyasādhanatvena vā | tathā hi | ‘vrīhibhiryajeta’ iti vacanānna tāvad‌vrīhayaḥ sākṣātpradīyante 'tha ca pradeyaprakṛtitvādevamupadiśyate | tasmādyadyapi puroḍāśaḥ samastaḥ sākṣānna pradīyate tathā 'pi dvayavadānaprakṛtitvādāgneyo bhaviṣyati | tena dvayavadānenaiva tāvaddīyamānena tasyā ' 'gneyatvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati | dvāveva ca tau vyākhyāprakārau | eko devatāsaṃbandhasya dvayavadāne saṃkrāntiriti | aparaḥ punaridameva puroḍāśasyā ' 'gneyatvaṃ dva‌yavadānaṃ tato gṛhyata iti | tasmānna sarvahomaḥ || 40 ||
evaṃ ca śeṣaśabdo mukhya evopayuktetaravidyamānavacano bhaviṣyati | uttarārdhādiśa- bdaśca nāvayavividhikalpanārthāpattikleśamāśrayiṣyati | atrābhidhīyate | yattāvadukaṃ sāpta- daśyavadāgneyatvaṃ dvayavadānamātra upasaṃhṛtamiti | tanna ghaṭate | katham |

sāpta1daśyaṃ hi sāmidhenīnāmuktamanārabhyavādena na kratūnām | tasya tu kratusaṃbandhastada‍dvāreṇā ' 'numānikāḥ kalpyaḥ | na ca pratyakṣasaṃbandhe satyānumā- nikaḥ kalpyata iti yukta upaptaṃhāraḥ | na tvaṣṭākapālasyāsphuṭo devatāsaṃbandhaḥ | taddhitaśrutyā 'bhihitatvāt | sa hi dvayavadānasyaivā ' 'numānikaḥ syāt | utpatti- vākye ca karmaṇo 'ṣṭākapālena saṃbandhaḥ śrūyate | dvayavadānena punarutpannavākye | tatraita- tsyāt | karmasaṃbandho 'ṣṭākapālasyā ' 'numāniko dvayavadānasya pratyakṣastadbhāve vā ' '- numānikakalpanaṃ na saṃbhavatīti | naitadyuktam | evaṃ sati ‘dvayavadānaṃ juhoti’ ityetadevo- tpattivākyamabhyupagataṃ bhavet | yadi hyaṣṭākapālavākyaṃ juhotivākyenopasaṃhṛtaṃ tato 'nenaiva karmotpattiḥ kriyeta | tataścā ' 'gneyavākye ‘codite hi ta2darthatvāttasya tasyopadiśyeta’ ityevaṃ vākyabhedaḥ prāpnoti | na cānanumāya yāgamāgneyādivākyānāṃ vākyāntarāpekṣā tatsaṃbandho vā 'vakalpata ityuktam | ato yadyapyānumānikaḥ saṃbandhastathā 'pi svārthaparyavasāyitvā- nyathānupapatteḥ prathamataramanumita iti siddhe saṃbandhe na śakyaṃ pratyakṣaśatenāpyanyathātvaṃ kartum | na ceha sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvaḥ saṃbhavati | avayavāvayavinoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣavyava- hārābhāvāt | aṣṭākapālacodanayā hi pratyakṣameva samastaḥ puroḍāśa upadiśyate | dū/?/vyavadānacodanayā 'pi, tatastulyabalatvam | nanu dū/?/vyavadānavyatiriktāvayavaprāptiḥ sāmā- nyena puroḍāśaśabdena kriyamāṇā durbalā syāt | ucyate |

tataḥ sāmānyavṛttiḥ syātsa tu sākṣādvidhīyate ||
ākṛtiśāstrāṇyākṛtāvasaṃbhavanti vyaktilakṣaṇārthāni bhavanti | tāni vyaktiṣu paro- kṣatvād‌durbalāni jāyante | na tvavayavivyaktiḥ karma sādhayituṃ na śaknoti | yatasta- cchabdasyāvayavalakṣaṇārthatā kalpyeta | atha vinaiva kāraṇena lakṣaṇāśrayaṇam | tato 'vaya- vaśāstrasyāpyavayavāntaralakṣaṇārthatvāddaurbalyaṃ syāt | tasmādyathaiva d‌vyavadānaṃ svāvayavani- rapekṣamātmanaiva kevalena vidhīyate tathaivāṣṭākapālasya d‌vyavadānamavayavāntarāṇi cānapekṣya pratyakṣavidhānātprāptistatprāptau ca yadā 'vayavāntarāṇyanuṣajyante ko vārayati | na tu tāni svamahimnā saṃbadhyante tatparā vā codanā | na cātyantamavayavāvayavinorvyātireka iti yadā ' 'locyate tadā 'vayavāntarāṇyapi pratyakṣāṇyeva bhavanti | tenāṣṭākapālaco- 1aspaṣṭasya tu bidherudāharaṇaṃ darśayati—sāptadaśyaṃ hītyādinā || 2( a॰ 2 pā॰ 2 a॰ 3 sū॰ 6 ) |
danā d‌vyavadānacodanāvaśenaivaṃ karma prāpnoti d‌vyadānaṃ dattvā punaḥ śeṣapradānam | athavā vikalpaḥ kadācitsakalasya pradānaṃ kadācid‌d‌vyavadānamātrasya | athavā 'ṣṭākapālasyotpattiḥ- vākyaśiṣṭatvādābhikṣāvadbalīyastve sati d‌vyavadānaṃ tena saha bādhavikalpasamuccayānna prati- padyata iti ‘guṇaścā1pūrvasaṃyoga’ ityevaṃ karmāntaraṃ kalpayet | yataḥ kutaścicca dravyāntarādupādī- yeta, aṣṭākapālasaṃbandhābhāvāt | pūrvakarmasaṃbandhe 'pi ca punardravyāntarādevotpannasyāṣṭākapā- lena saha vikalpasamuccayāvupanyasitavyau | athavā kṛtsnapuroḍāśagrahaṇe 'vadhārite dūvyavadā- nacodanāyāśca guṇaparatvātkarmāntaravidhyaśakteraṣṭākapālaviṣayatvāvagamātsaṃskārasya yāva- tsaṃskāryamāvṛtteḥ pradhānasya ca yathāśrutaguṇasaṃpādanāya jyotiṃṣṭomavadāvṛtteriṣṭatvāt ‘upā2yo vā tadarthatvāt’ ityayameva pakṣaḥ prāpnoti niravadānapramāṇābhāvāt | niraṃvadānāśrayaṇe cātya- ntaduṣṭā parisaṃkhyā syāt | na hyatra niyama upapadyate, sarvapuroḍāśāvayavānāṃ nityavatprāpteḥ | yadi hi katamo 'vayavaḥ prakṣipyatāmityevaṃ niyamāpekṣāyāṃ satyāṃ madhyapūrvā1rdhad‌vyavadānaṃ vidhī- yate tataḥ syānniyamārthatvam | nityaprāpte tvavayavini d‌vyavadānapunaḥśruteravayavāntarani- vṛttiparatvādasvārthagrahaṇamityā3didoṣatrayamaparihāryaṃ syāt | tatra hi tatparihartuṃ śakyate yatra parisaṃkhyāyamānaprāptiśāstramaklṛptamutprekṣābhimukhaṃ vartate | na cātrāṣṭākapālaśāstramaklṛ- ptam | na ca klṛpte sati doṣaparihāraḥ saṃbhavati | tasmānna niravadānam | yadi ca niravadānaśāstrādāgneyatvaṃ yāgārthad‌/?/vyavadānaviṣayamupasaṃhriyeta tataḥ śeṣāvayavānāmadevatā- rthatvānna svatvamapetaṃ syāt | tataśca ‘bha4kṣārtho vā dravye samatvāt’ ityādiṣu yadṛtvigbhiḥ sāmyādasvāmitvaṃ yajamānasya tatra tatrocyate tatsarvaṃ virudhyate | tatraitatsyāt | devato- ddeśasaṃbandho d‌vyavadānasyaiva tyāgaḥ punaḥsamastasya haviṣaḥ | tyāgakṛtā ca svatvanivṛttirna devatāsaṃbandhakṛtā | tasmādaviruddhaṃ tadabhidhānamiti | tadasat | kutaḥ |

yadā hi sāmānyaśāstraṃ pravṛttavyavahāraṃ bhavati tadā na śakyaṃ kenāpi vyāvarta- yitum | tadyadi samastāṣṭākapālanirvṛttyarthā vrīhayo devatoddeśena niruptāste sarve dāta- vyatvena prakrāntāsteṣāṃ ya eva na dīyeran, tatraiva prakrāntāparisamāpanadoṣo bhavet | tataśca sarvapradānameva prāpnoti | yadi tu dvayavadānaśāstreṇa viśeṣṭumiṣyate tata ādita evaivama- vadhārayitavyam, aṣṭākapālanirvṛttyartheṣu caturmuṣṭiṣu ye dvayavadānanirvṛttyarthāstānagnaye juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti | yadyapi ca viśeṣo na gamyate tathā 'pyeteṣāṃ madhye ye 'tra dvayavadānaṃ sādha- yanti tāvanto na mameti śakyaṃ saṃkalpayitum | tadyathā loke kaścidbahudravyasamudāye 'va- sthite kaṃcidabhidhatta itastvaṃ yāvattṛpti gṛhāṇeti | tatra na tadavayavaviśeṣo gamyate 'tha ca na sarvatyāgo 'dhyavasīyate tathehāpi draṣṭavyam | yattu tāvanmātrameva na nirupyate tatra ‘caturo muṣṭīnnirvapati’ ‘aśvaśaphamātraḥ puroḍāśo bhavati’ ityādivacanasāma- rthyādīdṛkparimāṇādgṛhītaṃ dvayavadānaṃ devatārthātāṃ pratipadyata ityavagamyate | yattadanyattattada- nugrahārthaṃ nādhikatyāgārthamiti draṣṭavyam | ato yathaiva ‘anaso 'dhinirvapati’ ityukte nirvāpaparicchedārthamupātteṣvapi śakaṭasthiteṣu vrīhiṣu na svatvamapauti tathaiva dvayavadānāpādā- nabhūte puroḍāśe 'pīti svatve sati śakyāḥ parikrayādayastena kartumiti samatvavacana- virodhaḥ | etena dvayavadānaprakṛtitvādevāṣṭākapāla āgneyaḥ kṛto bhavatītyeṣo 'pi pakṣaḥ pratyuktaḥ | tatrāpi śeṣaparityāgānupapatteḥ | na ca vrīhivatpuroḍāśasya prakṛtitvaṃ yuktam | vrīhayo hyanadanīyā vākyāntaraśiṣṭāśca prakaraṇādutpattivākyaśiṣṭaprakṛtidravyāpekṣapuro- ḍāśāvaruddhayāgānuvādena vidhīyamānā na śaknuvanti prakṛtitvapratipattimantareṇa yāgasā- dhanatvaṃ pratipattum | aṣṭākapālastvadanīya utpattivākyaśiṣṭaśca śaknoti sākṣādyāgaṃ sādhayitum | na ca pūrvataraprāpte prakṛtyapekṣiṇi dvayavadāne codyate | tasmānna tatprakṛti- tvena yāgaṃ sādhayati | kastarhi sarvapradānasya parihāraḥ | ucyate |
